This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince]prince[/url].

Prince is a general term for a ruler, monarch or member of a monarch's or former monarch's family, and is a hereditary title in the nobility of some European states.

description:
Sexual slavery is a process wherein someone 'forces' by varied means someone else to engage into sexual activity of some sort.

The mentioned 'force' could be outright force/coercion or be part of an agreement between a dominant and a submissive.
The means are varied and numerous, some not exhaustive means are blackmailing, hypnotism, mind breaking and sexual violence or some form of consensual slave contract.

There are two distinct forms of sexual slavery:
1. A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_slavery]non-consensual one[/url], an act of performing non-voluntary sexual activity due to coercion.
2. A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_slavery_%28BDSM%29]consensual one[/url], usually in some form of a dominant person owning a submissive person as property.

In the environment of visual novels, mainly nukige there has to be postulated a third form of sexual slavery:
3. A semi-(non-)consensual one, wherein the 'submissive' has first to be persuaded by the dominant person by means usually regarded as a criminal act in real life. The Japanese subculture has defined the word 調教 [choukyou] for this, which literally means ‘to teach an animal to do something or to behave correctly’.
name: Sexual Slavery

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yakuza]yakuza[/url] member.

Yakuza are members of traditional organized crime syndicates in Japan.

Despite uncertainty about the single origin of Yakuza organizations, most modern Yakuza derive from two classifications which emerged in the mid-Edo Period: tekiya, those who primarily peddled illicit, stolen or shoddy goods; and bakuto, those who were involved in or participated in gambling.
name: Yakuza
Incest
description:
This character engages in an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incest]incestous[/url] relationship.

Incest is sexual intercourse between close relatives.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demon]demon[/url].

In religion and mythology, occultism and folklore, a demon is a supernatural being described as something that is not human and in ordinary usage malevolent.
name: Demon

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loneliness]lonely[/url]. A lonely person is one who has no companions or friends; is lack of sympathetic or friendly companionship, intercourse and support. This person may or may not feel depressed because of their situation, it usually depends on whether they are aware of it or not. 

Loneliness is a complex and usually unpleasant emotional response to isolation or lack of companionship. Loneliness typically includes anxious feelings about a lack of connectedness or communality with other beings, both in the present and extending into the future. As such, loneliness can be felt even when surrounded by other people. The causes of loneliness are varied and include social, mental, emotional, and spiritual factors.
name: Lonely

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teal]teal[/url] eyes.

Teal is a low-saturation color, a bluish-green to dark medium, similar to medium blue-green and dark cyan. It can be created by mixing green with blue into a white base, or deepened as needed with a little bit of black or gray color.
name: Teal
Narcissist
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Narcissism_%28psychology%29]narcissist[/url].

Narciccist characters have an inordinate fascination with themselves, excessive self-love and vanity.

Narcissism is the personality trait of egotism, vanity, conceit, or simple selfishness. Applied to a social group, it is sometimes used to denote elitism or an indifference to the plight of others.

name: Arrogant
description:
This character is [url=http://www.thefreedictionary.com/arrogant]arrogant[/url].

Arrogant characters have or display a sense of overbearing self-worth or self-importance. They are marked by or arising from a feeling or assumption of their superiority toward others.

name: Hikimayu
aliases: Round Drawn Japanese Heian Period Eyebrows
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hikimayu]Hikimayu[/url]-styled eyebrows, or drawn round eyebrows on the forehead.

In pre-modern Japan, hikimayu was the practice of removing the natural eyebrows and painting smudge-like eyebrows on the forehead.

Aristocratic women used to pluck or shave their eyebrows and paint new ones using a powdered ink called haizumi, which was made of soot from sesame or rape-seed oils.

This character is [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/timid]timid[/url].

A timid character is someone who is lacking in self-assurance, courage in facing danger, difficulty, opposition, pain, etc. Someone who is easily alarmed and timorous.
name: Timid

description:
This character is the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alter_ego]alter ego[/url] of another character from the same game.

An alter-ego (Latin, "the other I") is a second self, a second personality or persona within a person, who is often oblivious to the persona's actions. A person with an alter-ego is said to lead a double life.
name: Alter Ego

description:
This character is a [url=http://www.thefreedictionary.com/teammate]teammate[/url] of another character in this story.

A teammate is a fellow member of a team that you are a part of.
name: Teammate

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sweater]sweater[/url].

A sweater is a garment intended to cover the torso and arms.
name: Sweater
Kilt
description: This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kilt]kilt[/url], a knee-length non-bifurcated skirt-type garment with pleats at the rear, originating in the traditional dress of men and boys in the Scottish Highlands of the 16th century. Since the 19th century it has become associated with the wider culture of Scotland in general, or with Celtic (and more specifically Gaelic) heritage even more broadly. It is most often made of woollen cloth in a tartan pattern.

name: Executioner
description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Executioner]executioner[/url].

A judicial executioner is a person who carries out a death sentence ordered by the state or other legal authority, which was known in feudal terminology as high justice.

This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alcoholism]alcoholism[/url].

Alcoholism is a disabling addictive disorder. It is characterized by compulsive and uncontrolled consumption of alcohol despite its negative effects on the drinker's health, relationships, and social standing.

This trait is intended for characters that are addicted to alcohol, for characters that drink an alcoholic beverage once or twice in a story use the Drinking trait.
name: Alcohol Abuse
Men with Men Sex
description:
This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gay_sex]men with men sex[/url].

Men who have sex with men (abbreviated as MSM, also known as males who have sex with males) are male persons who engage in sexual activity with members of the same sex, regardless of how they identify themselves; many men choose not to (or cannot for other reasons) accept social identities of gay or bisexual.

name: Shousei
description: Found more often in written than in spoken Japanese, the speaker uses [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns#List_of_Japanese_personal_pronouns]this personal pronoun[/URL] as a measure of respect through the derogation of self.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_exchange_program]foreign exchange student[/url].

A student exchange program is a program where students from secondary school or university choose to study abroad in partner institutions.
name: Foreign Exchange Student

description:
This character is the member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gang]school gang[/url].

Usually school gangs only violate the school rules and does not require actual law enforcement such as police to intervene. But there are times their activities step outside the school, like fights with other gangs, illegal races and such. In those situations police would take over dealing with them.
name: School Gang Member

description:
This character is shown to be [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intelligence]intelligent[/url].

Smart is used when referring to a person with good understanding or a high mental capacity, someone who is quick to comprehend.
name: Smart
Ignorant
description:
This character is or seems [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ignorance]ignorant[/url] and lacking [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Common_sense]common sense[/url].

Ignorant characters are unaware of most things that are considered common knowledge by regular people. It is not because they are incapable of learning, but usually because they just never got the chance to learn or didn't try.

They don't understand the things that are considered obvious by most people because their thought process is different doesn't usually end with the same results with others.

Their actions might seem stupid, meaningless and outright wrong, but that doesn't mean that they are stupid, cruel or evil, they are usually just different.

An ignorant character may be from a distant place or time or maybe he/she just got out of prison, or returned from a prolonged conflict.

An ignorant character is different from an uneducated one since it is not about education. Though a character may carry both of the traits.

name: N+ Cup

This character's breasts are [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bra_size#Continental_Europe_.2F_Japan]N cup size[/url] or larger.

The cup size should come from a reliable source such as the game itself or the developer's website. Don't try to guess a character's cup size, if they are just big use [url=https://vndb.org/i723]E+ cup[/url] instead (standard trait for large breast). This trait should be used to find documented ultra large breast girls like for example: https://vndb.org/c30463, https://vndb.org/c30460

Following Japanese/EU realistic chart: http://helmet.kafuka.org/thepile/Useful_Notes:_Breasts_in_Anime_and_Manga

This character is a member of a music club associated with a school.

The main goal of the music club members is to gather together to learn and play music, sing the songs, and perfecting their skills day by day.
The club has the opportunity to hold a performance at the school's festival, which is usually a concert at the auditorium.
name: School Music Club Member
Shimapan
description: The character wears striped panties.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thief]thief[/url].

Someone who carries out an act of or makes a career of theft is known as a thief, and the act of theft is known as stealing, thieving, or sometimes filching. In criminal law, theft is the illegal taking of another person's property without that person's freely-given consent.
name: Thief

description:
This character wears an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crowns_of_Egypt]egyptian crown[/url].

The Egyptian civilization used a number of different crowns throughout its existence. Some were used to show authority, while others were used for religious ceremonies. Each crown was worn by different pharaohs or deities, and each crown had its own significance and symbolic meaning.

[url=http://www.landofpyramids.org/crown-of-egypt.htm]More examples[/url]
name: Egyptian Crown
Curly
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curly_hair]curly hair[/url].

Curly hair is used when referring to hair that is twisted or wavy.

name: Psychological Trauma
description:
This character suffers a mental breakdown as a result of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychological_trauma]traumatic event[/url]. 

Psychological trauma is a type of damage to the psyche that occurs as a result of a traumatic event.

A traumatic event involves a single experience, or an enduring or repeating event or events, that completely overwhelm the individual's ability to cope or integrate the ideas and emotions involved with that experience. The sense of being overwhelmed can be delayed by weeks, years or even decades, as the person struggles to cope with the immediate circumstances. Psychological trauma can lead to serious long-term negative consequences that are often overlooked even by mental health professionals.

Trauma can be caused by a wide variety of events, but there are a few common aspects. There is frequently a violation of the person's familiar ideas about the world and of their human rights, putting the person in a state of extreme confusion and insecurity. This is also seen when people or institutions, depended on for survival, violate or betray or disillusion the person in some unforeseen way.

name: Bikini
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bikini]bikini[/url].

The bikini is typically a women's swimsuit, either a one-piece or a two-piece. For the two-piece, one part of the attire is covering the breasts; the other the groin and, optionally, part or all of the buttocks, leaving an uncovered area between the two.

The bikini is often worn in hot weather, while swimming or sunning. A bikini is often worn as an undergarment to the wetsuit for waterskiing, scuba diving, surfing, and wakeboarding.

The shapes of both parts of a bikini resemble women's underwear, and the lower part can range from revealing thong or g-string to briefs and modest square-cut shorts.

name: Attempted Homicide
description: Attempted murder is the intent to murder, meaning that the perpetrator either tried to murder and failed (example: attempted to shoot the victim and missed or stabbing with a knife and failing to kill) or planning to commit a murder (example: purchasing a gun or other deadly weapon with intent to use it on someone and writing about their intent to kill).

name: Ring
description:
This character wears one or more rings.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ring]ring[/url] (jewellery) is a decorative ornament worn on fingers, toes, or around the arm or neck.

name: Massage Therapist

A hairjob is the act of using one's hair to stimulate a male partner's penis.

The character wears an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Overall]overall[/url].

An overall, coverall, over all, or dungarees, is a type of garment which is usually used as protective clothing when working. Some people call an overall a "pair of overalls" by analogy with "pair of trousers".

Armpit Licking

Armpit licking is performed on this character. Apply i1993 to the performing character.

Armpit licking is the act of licking someone's armpit.

name: Royalty
description:
This character is a member of a  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_family]royal family[/url].

A royal family is the extended family of a king or queen regnant. The term imperial family appropriately describes the extended family of an emperor or empress, while the terms "ducal family", "grand ducal family" or "princely family" are more appropriate to describe the relatives of a reigning duke, grand duke, or prince. However, in common parlance members of any family which reigns by hereditary right are often referred to as royalty or "royals".

This character has actual [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antenna_%28biology%29]antennae[/url].
Antennae are appendages used for sensing in arthropods.

This trait is intended for characters that really have antennas and should not be mixed with the hair trait antennas i14 which refers to a particular kind of ahoge.
name: Antennae

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Butt_plug]butt plug[/url] is a sex toy that is designed to be inserted into the rectum for sexual pleasure. In some ways, they are similar to a dildo, but they tend to be shorter, and must have a flanged end to prevent the device from being lost inside the rectum.

Butt plugs come in a variety of colors, shapes, sizes, and textures. Some are designed to look like penises, while some are ribbed or wavy. The majority, however, are shaped, having a thin tip which is wider in the middle, a notch to hold it in place once it is inserted, and a flared base to prevent complete insertion into the rectum. Some plugs are designed (long, flexible and curved) to penetrate the sigmoid colon.

Butt plugs are made of a variety of materials, the most common being latex. Other materials used include silicone, neoprene, wood, metal, glass, stone, and many other materials.
name: Butt Plug
Younger Sister
description:
This character is a younger sister.

A younger sister is a female sibling who is younger than at least one of the other siblings.

name: Arm Warmers
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arm_warmer]arm warmers[/url].

Arm warmers can describe any glove-like articles of clothing that lack finger coverings and/or were originally designed to keep wrists and lower arms warm.

This character has cyan hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Cyan

description:
This character's parents were closely related to each other, genetically.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inbreeding]Inbreeding[/url] is the reproduction from the mating of two genetically related parents.
name: Inbred

description:
This character attempts at [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suicide]suicide[/url].

Suicide is the act of a human being intentionally causing his or her own death. Suicide is often committed out of despair, or attributed to some underlying mental disorder which includes depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, alcoholism and drug abuse. Financial difficulties, troubles with interpersonal relationships and other undesirable situations play a significant role.
name: Suicide

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hunter]hunter[/url].

Hunting is the practice of pursuing any living thing (usually wildlife) for food, recreation, or trade. In present-day use, the term refers to lawful hunting, as distinguished from poaching, which is the killing, trapping or capture of the hunted species contrary to applicable law. The species which are hunted are referred to as game and are usually mammals and migratory or non-migratory gamebirds.

Fictional hunters on the other hand are known to hunt anything from animals to humans to monsters...
name: Hunter
Pottery
description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pottery]pottery[/url].

Pottery is the craft of making ceramic material into pots or potterywares using mud. Major types of potterywares include earthenware, stoneware and porcelain.

name: Water Gun
description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Water_gun]water gun[/url] is a type of toy gun designed to shoot water or liquid in science terms. Similar to water balloons, the primary purpose of the toy is to soak another person in a game such as water warfare.

name: Ahoge
description:
This character's hair has an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glossary_of_anime_and_manga]ahoge[/url].

An ahoge is a single strand of hair that sticks out of a character's head.

This character is considered a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yamato_nadeshiko]Yamato Nadeshiko[/url], a traditional ideal Japanese woman.

Yamato Nadeshiko is a Japanese term meaning "personification of an idealized Japanese woman", "ideal" in the historical context of the patriarchal, traditional culture of Japan.
name: Yamato Nadeshiko
Relationships
description:
These are the role traits associated with characters'  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interpersonal_relationship]interpersonal relationships[/url].

An interpersonal relationship is an association between two or more people that may range from fleeting to enduring. This association may be based on limerence, love, solidarity, regular business interactions, or some other type of social commitment. Interpersonal relationships are formed in the context of social, cultural and other influences.

name: Gender Choice
description:
The player can choose this character's gender and/or the English pronouns they use. This is usually used for a game's protagonist (as in many VNs tagged with [URL=https://vndb.org/g2201]Protagonist Gender Choice[/URL]).

NOTE: The "pronoun choice" aspect *only applies to English pronouns*.

name: Facial Piercing
description:
This character has one or more [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_piercing]facial piercings[/url], or they get pierced during the story.

For a character with pierced ears use [url=/i145]Earrings[/url] instead.

This character suffers a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miscarriage]miscarriage[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stillbirth]stillbirth[/url].

Miscarriage, also known as spontaneous abortion and pregnancy loss, is the natural death of an embryo or fetus before it is able to survive independently. Some use the cutoff of 20 weeks of gestation after which fetal death is known as a stillbirth.
name: Pregnancy Loss

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sleeveless_shirt#Sleeveless_T-shirt]sleeveless shirt[/url].

A vest, undershirt, tank top, or a wife beater is an article of underwear worn underneath a dress shirt intended to protect them from body sweat and odors. It also makes dress shirts less transparent. The term most commonly refers to upper-body wear worn by males. It can also be worn during winter months as an extra layer of warmth.
name: Tank Top

description:
This character is seen with a  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suitcase]suitcase[/url].

A suitcase is a general term for a distinguishable form of luggage. It is often a somewhat flat, rectangular-shaped bag with rounded/square corners, either metal, hard plastic or made of cloth, vinyl or leather that more or less keeps its shape. It has a carrying handle on one side and is used mainly for transporting clothes and other possessions during trips. It opens on hinges like a door. Suitcases lock with keys or a combination.
name: Suitcase

description:
This character is connected to one or more body fluid tube.
A body fluid tube is a cylindrical pipe inserted into the mouth, anus or vagina used to feed, exchange or transport fluids, feces or other bodily substances.

Three common scenario occur while using fluid tubes:
- Exchange of feces leading to [url=https://vndb.org/i1169]scat[/url]

Do NOT use this trait for some random tubes, but only for tubes that lead to enema, scat, or coprophagia and apply those traits in conjuction with this accordingly to the case.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/99884.jpg]NSFW Body Fluid Tubes[/url]

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/82/99882.jpg]NSFW Tubes and Mutual Scat and Coprophagia 2[/url]

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shawl]shawl[/url].

A shawl is a simple item of clothing, loosely worn over the shoulders, upper body and arms, sometimes also over the head.

It is usually a rectangular or square piece of cloth, that is often folded to make a triangle but can also be triangular in shape. Other shapes include oblong shawls.
name: Shawl
Microphone
description: This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microphone]microphone[/url]. This can be either a microphone held in their hand or one tied to their ear.

name: Sex in Front of an Audience
description:
This character engages in a sexual act whilst somebody else is watching them. The sexual act is not hidden from the onlooker(s), they are aware of it.

Note 1: This trait differs from [url=https://vndb.org/i879]Sex in Public Places[/url] in that the place can be private or public, only the presence of an audience counts.

Note 2: See [url=https://vndb.org/i1827]Discreet Sex[/url] for when the audience is not aware of the act (or at least not shown to be).
These characters use "ore", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronoun]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

description:
This character participates in sexual acts where food or drinks play a significant role.

Possible examples include a masturbation scene using a cucumber, or a person putting food on themselves and having their partner eat or lick it off them.
name: Food Play
Strap-on Dildo
description:
This character wears and uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strap-on_dildo]strap-on dildo[/url].

A strap-on dildo is a dildo designed to be worn, usually with a harness, during sexual activity. Harnesses and dildos are made in a wide variety of styles, with variations in how the harness fits the wearer, how the dildo attaches to the harness, as well as various features intended to facilitate stimulation of the wearer or a sexual partner.

A strap-on dildo can be used for a wide variety of sexual activities, including solo or mutual masturbation, as well as penetrative oral, anal, or vaginal sex. Sexual lubricant can be used to ease insertion.

Strap-on dildos can be used by people of any sexuality or gender, upon people of any sexuality or gender.

name: Fisting
description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisting]inserts their fist[/url] into another character's vagina or anus in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1137]i1137[/url] to the character being fisted.

Don't use this trait for cases where a character fists themselves. Use [url=/i592]Masturbation[/url] instead.

name: Tarot Cards
description:
During the story of the game this character is seen carrying [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tarot]tarot cards[/url].

The tarot is a pack of playing cards (most commonly numbering 78), used from the mid-15th century in various parts of Europe to play a group of card games such as Italian tarocchini and French tarot. From the late 18th century until the present time the tarot has also found use by mystics and occultists in efforts at divination or as a map of mental and spiritual pathways.

This character carries a video camera.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Video_camera]video camera[/url] is a camera used for electronic motion picture acquisition, initially developed by the television industry but now common in other applications as well. The earliest video cameras were those of John Logie Baird, based on the electromechanical Nipkow disk and used by the BBC in experimental broadcasts through the 1930s. All-electronic designs based on the cathode ray tube, such as Vladimir Zworykin's Iconoscope and Philo T. Farnsworth's Image dissector, supplanted the Baird system by the 1940s and remained in wide use until the 1980s, when cameras based on solid-state image sensors such as CCDs (and later CMOS active pixel sensors) eliminated common problems with tube technologies such as image burn-in and made digital video workflow practical.
name: Video Camera

description:
This character is the leader of a music club associated with a school.

Typically, the main goal of a music club is to gather together to learn to play music, sing songs, and perfect their skills day by day. A club typically has the opportunity to hold a performance at the school's festival, which is usually a concert in an auditorium.
name: School Music Club President
Autofellatio
description: This character performs a blowjob on themself.

This character is a daughter of an upper class family.

The upper class is the social class composed of the wealthiest members of society, who also wield the greatest political power. The upper class is generally contained within the wealthiest 1-2% of the population, and is distinguished by immense wealth (in the form of estates) which is passed from generation to generation.

This trait is about the social status of the character and does not refer to her behavior.
name: Ojousama
Confinement
description:
This character gets held in [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/confinement]confinement[/url].

Confinement is to shut or keep a person in a small closed space and prevent that person from leaving this place because of imprisonment, illness, discipline, etc.

This trait can be used for both people imprisoned by law, civil confinement for psychiatric patients and ones that are confined by others illegally, like a kidnapping.

name: Kansai-ben
description:
This character speaks using an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansai_dialect]accent from the Kansai region of Japan[/url].

The Kansai dialect is a group of Japanese dialects in the Kansai region of Japan.
It is characterized as being both more melodic and harsher by speakers of the standard language.

name: Waist Length
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Long_hair]very long hair[/url].

Very long hair is used when referring to hair at waist length or longer.

name: Parrot
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parrot]parrot[/url] or has parrot-like physical features.

Parrots are birds that are found in most tropical and subtropical regions.

Characteristic features of parrots include a strong, curved bill, an upright stance, strong legs, and clawed zygodactyl feet. Many parrots are vividly coloured, and some are multi-coloured. The plumage of cockatoos ranges from mostly white to mostly black, with a mobile crest of feathers on the tops of their heads.

Parrots, along with ravens, crows, jays and magpies, are among the most intelligent birds, and the ability of some species to imitate human voices enhances their popularity as pets.

This character wears a [url=http://www.sorayabyrozi.com/productphotos/486-884-1-og.jpg]arm cuffs[/url].

An arm cuffs is an article of jewelry that is worn around the upper arm between the shoulder and the elbow. Usually arm cuffs are manufactured from metal, leather, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells.
 
Arm cuffs can have various style too. Gold spiral arm cuffs are in [url=http://imbbpullzone.laedukreationpvt.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/Upper-Arm-Bracelet-1.jpg]Egyptian style[/url] while gold band with decorative golden swirls are in [url=http://images.costumeexpress.com/mgen/31289.jpg?zm=1600,1600,1,0,0]Spartan style[/url].
name: Arm Cuffs
Smoking Pipe
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoking_pipe_%28tobacco%29]smoking pipe[/url].

A smoking pipe for tobacco smoking typically consists of a chamber (the bowl) for the combustion of tobacco and a thin stem (shank) ending in a mouthpiece (the bit). Pipes can range from the very simple machine-made briar pipe to highly-prized handmade and artful implements created by renowned pipe-makers which are often very expensive collector's items.

Character takes part in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physical_exercise]physical exercises[/url].

Don't apply this to characters who are just getting some exercise incidentally while doing something else.
name: Working Out

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parachuting]parachuting[/url].

Parachuting, or skydiving, is a method of exiting an aircraft and returning to Earth with the aid of gravity, then slowing down during the last part of the descent by using a parachute.
name: Parachuting
Bisexual
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bisexuality]bisexual[/url].

Bisexuality is sexual behavior or an orientation involving physical or romantic attraction to both males and females, especially with regard to men and women.

It is one of the three main classifications of sexual orientation, along with a heterosexual and a homosexual orientation, all a part of the heterosexual–homosexual continuum. Pansexuality may or may not be subsumed under bisexuality, with some sources stating that bisexuality encompasses sexual or romantic attraction to all gender identities. People who have a distinct but not exclusive preference for one sex over the other may also identify themselves as bisexual, and people who lack sexual attraction to either sex or genders are known as asexual.

name: Tomesode
description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kimono#Tomesode]Tomesode[/url] (留袖) is a type of kimono. It is an expensive formal dress worn by married women.
Originally, there was a custom that the long sleeves of the furisode were shortened after marriage, thereby creating a tomesode. This was because the long swinging sleeves would be impractical when the married woman worked in the kitchen. 

The tomesode distinguishes itself from other kimono by only having patterns under the waistline. It has five or sometimes three family crests, or kamon, which indicates the formality of the kimono.

Kuro-tomesode (black tomesode) are often worn for wedding ceremonies by married female relatives of the bride or groom. The eri, obijime and obiage are always white, and the obi matches the colourful pattern of the kimono to signify a happy occasion. It is believed that the black colour is to match the clean white colour of the bride, as this kimono is rarely used at other occasions than weddings of near family members (sisters or daughters). A friend of the bride or groom would not wear kurotomesode, but homongi or iro-tomesode.

name: Tribadism on Penis
description:
This is a sexual act involving one man and two women. The women rub their vulvas together with the man's penis between them. The man may also take a more active role by thrusting his penis between their vulvas or by penetrating either of the women (or both of them alternately).

Apply this trait to the characters rubbing their vulvas on another character's penis. Apply [url=/i1705]i1705[/url] to the character having their penis rubbed.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/73/85273.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/70699.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/85274.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Different position.

name: Forehead Necklace
description:
This character wears a necklace designed to be worn on one's forehead.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/85999.jpg]Example[/url]

This character is a son of an upper class family. The male equivalent of an [url=/i1727]Ojou-sama[/url].

The upper class is the social class composed of the wealthiest members of society, who also wield the greatest political power. The upper class is generally contained within the wealthiest 1-2% of the population, and is distinguished by immense wealth (in the form of estates) which is passed from generation to generation.

This tag is about the social status of the character and does not refer to his behavior.
name: Onzoushi

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eccentricity_(behavior)]eccentric[/url].

Eccentricity (also called quirkiness) refers to unusual or odd behavior on the part of an individual. This behavior would typically be perceived as unusual or unnecessary, without being demonstrably maladaptive.
Eccentricity is often associated with genius, intellectual giftedness, or creativity. People may perceive the individual's eccentric behavior as the outward expression of their unique intelligence or creative impulse.
name: Eccentric
Avoidable Death
description: This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death]dies[/url], but it is possible to avoid this outcome by satisfying some game conditions or make choices leading otherwise.

name: Tribadism
description:
This character engages in the sexual act of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tribadism]tribadism[/url] during the story.

Tribadism is a form of non-penetrative sex in which a woman rubs her vulva against her partner's body for sexual stimulation, especially for ample stimulation of the clitoris. This may involve female-to-female genital contact or a female rubbing her vulva against her partner's thigh, stomach, buttocks, arm, or other body part (excluding the mouth). A variety of sex positions are recorded, including the missionary position.

The term is usually used in the context of lesbian sex, and originally encompassed societal beliefs about women's capability of being penetrative sexual partners.

This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blunt_instrument]blunt instruments[/url] family.

A blunt instrument is any solid object used as a weapon, which damages its target by applying direct mechanical force, and has no penetrating point or edge, or is wielded so that the point or edge is not the part of the weapon that inflicts the injury. Blunt instruments may be contrasted with edged weapons, which inflict injury by cutting or stabbing, or projectile weapons, where the projectiles, such as bullets or shot, are accelerated to a penetrating speed.

Blunt instruments typically inflict blunt force trauma, causing bruising, fractures and other internal bleeding. Depending on the parts of the body attacked, organs may be ruptured or otherwise damaged. Attacks with a blunt instrument may be fatal.
name: Blunt Instruments
Student Council Member
description:
This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_government]student government[/url].

A student government is a student organization present in many colleges, universities and has started to appear in some high schools. In higher education, the student union is often accorded its own building on the campus, dedicated to social and organizational activities of the student body.

name: Necklace
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Necklace]necklace[/url].

A necklace is an article of jewellery which is worn around the neck.

This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Split_Personality]split personality[/url].

Dissociative identity disorder is a psychiatric diagnosis that describes a condition in which a person displays multiple distinct identities or personalities (known as alter egos or alters), each with its own pattern of perceiving and interacting with the environment. The victim may or may not be aware of the existence of the alternate personality.

Notes:
1) Do NOT confuse this with [url=http://vndb.org/i239] Pretending[/url], in which the character is intentionally creating a "fake" persona, to hide his identity and is in full control of it.
2) Do NOT confuse this with Hypnotism (i266 & i270) or Mind Control (i488 & i271) since they are not creating new personalities, they are imposing someone else's will on the character at most.
name: Split Personality

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fellatio]Fellatio[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i100]i100[/url] to the performing character.

Fellatio is the act of using the mouth, lips, and tongue to stimulate the penis. [url=/i1636]Cunnilingus[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a female receiver.
name: Blowjob

description:
This character has a [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SpikyHair]spiky hairstyle[/url].

Spiky hair is the process of using products to make the hair stand on end like spikes sticking out of the head. It's often associated with the punk rock subculture and, in fiction, it's used to show that a character is wild and cool as well as being badass. While spiky hair is prominent in real life, fictional characters are almost always shown with perfectly spiked hair despite the fact that it would get flattened while they're in bed. While it is a typically male hairstyle, it has become somewhat fashionable for women to have a spiky hairstyle.
name: Spiky
Pointed Hat
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pointed_hat]pointed hat[/url].

Pointed hats have been a distinctive item of headgear of a wide range of cultures throughout history. Good examples of modern pointed hat are: Santa hat, party hat, night cap and the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conical_Asian_hat]conical asian hat[/url].

name: Brooch
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brooch]brooch[/url].

A brooch, also known in ancient times as a fibula, is a decorative jewelry item designed to be attached to garments, often to hold them closed. It is usually made of metal, often silver or gold but sometimes bronze or some other material. Brooches are frequently decorated with enamel or with gemstones and may be solely for ornament (as in the stomacher) or sometimes serve a practical function as a fastening, perhaps for a cloak.
The character is an antagonist for the main characters. Their intentions may be bad, good, or they may just be doing their job, but the important point is that they oppose the protagonists.
name: Antagonist

description: This character wears torn or damaged clothing.
name: Torn Clothing
Nurikabe
description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurikabe]nurikabe[/url] is a [url=https://vndb.org/i622]youkai[/url], or spirit, from Japanese folklore. It manifests as a wall that impedes or misdirects walking travelers at night. Nurikabe's main ability is that it can change its form and expand itself.

Trying to go around is futile as it extends itself forever, but knocking on the lower left part of the wall makes it disappear. It has been suggested that the legend was created to explain travellers losing their bearings on long journeys.

name: Flight Attendant
description:
This character is a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flight_attendant]flight attendant[/URL].

Flight attendants are members of an aircrew employed by airlines primarily to ensure the safety and comfort of passengers aboard commercial flights, on select business jet aircraft, and on some military aircraft.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bracer]bracer[/url].

A bracer (or arm-guard) is a strap or sheath, commonly made of leather, stone, or plastic that covers the inside of an archer's arm to protect it while shooting. Bracers keep the inside of the archer's forearm from getting hurt by the string of the bow or the fletching of the arrow; they also prevent loose clothing from catching the bow string.
name: Bracer

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leggings]Leggings[/url] are a type of skin-tight clothing covering the legs, which can be worn by both men and women. Modern leggings are typically made from a blend of lycra (aka spandex), nylon, cotton, or polyester blend, but they can also be made from wool, silk and other materials. Leggings are sometimes worn fully exposed, and are more traditionally worn partially covered by a garment such as a skirt, a large t-shirt or shorts, or fully covered by an outer garment, such as a full length skirt.

Leggings are typically ankle-length, and some are stirrupped or encase the feet. Some are shorter. Leggings are worn to keep a person's legs warm, as protection from chafing during an activity such as exercise or as a decorative or fashion garment. Leggings are worn by both men and women during exercise but usually only by women at other times. In contemporary usage, leggings refers to tight, form-fitting trousers that extend from the waist to the ankles.
name: Leggings

description: The Japanese calligraphy (Shodo) is one of the most popular fine arts of Japan. Calligraphical works are appreciated not less than products of painting. But this kind of the fine arts possesses also philosophical sense. In the simplest understanding the calligraphy is an art to write beautifully.
name: Calligraphy
Remarriage
description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remarriage]Remarriage[/url] is a marriage that takes place after a previous marital union has ended, as through divorce or widowhood. In this event, the ex-spouse will have married another person to continue a marital relationship, with another partner.

This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tricorne]tricorn[/url] hat

Typically made from animal fiber, tricorns had a rather broad brim, pinned up on either side of the head and at the back, producing a triangular shape. The hat was typically worn with the point facing forward.
name: Tricorn Hat
Legal Guardian
description:
This character is the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legal_guardian]legal guardian[/url] of someone.

A legal guardian is a person who has the legal authority (and the corresponding duty) to care for the personal and property interests of another person, called a ward. Usually, a person has the status of guardian because the ward is incapable of caring for his or her own interests due to infancy, incapacity, or disability. Most countries and states have laws that provide that the parents of a minor child can designate who shall become the child's legal guardians in the event of death.

name: Pregnant Sex
description: This character has sex while being pregnant.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sun_hat]sun hat[/url].

A sun hat is a broad-brimmed hat that protects the head and shoulders from direct exposure to the sun.
name: Sun Hat

description:
This character use "waga", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Waga is a very formal pronoun, it means "my" or "our". Used in speeches and formalities; 我が社 waga-sha (our company) or 我が国 waga-kuni (our country).
name: Waga

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fedora]fedora[/url].

A fedora is a men's felt hat that is creased lengthwise down the crown and pinched in the front on both sides. The creasing does not define the hat, however. Fedoras can also be creased with teardrop crowns, diamond crowns, center dents, and others, and the positioning of pinches can vary if they are found at all.
name: Fedora
Knee-high Socks
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knee_highs]knee-highs[/url].

Knee-highs are hosiery that covers the feet and legs almost up to the knee.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/43/79743.jpg]Example[/url]

name: Sports Visor
description: A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports_visor]sports visor[/URL] is a type of crownless hat consisting simply of a visor or brim with a strap encircling the head. The top of the head is not covered and the visor protects only the face, including eyes, nose, and cheeks, from the sun.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wolf]wolf[/url] or has wolf-like physical features.

The gray/grey wolf is a species of canid native mostly found in the remote wilderness. They have sharp claws and long and bushy fur and tail.

Not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/i735]dogs[/url], as wolves are not domesticated and classed as different species.

Also not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/i706]werewolves[/url], as these characters are not humans that are affected by curses or moonlight.
name: Wolf
Scientist
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientist]scientist[/url].

A scientist in a broad sense is one engaging in a systematic activity to acquire knowledge. In a more restricted sense, a scientist is an individual who uses the scientific method.

name: Cloak
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloak]cloak[/url].

A cloak is a type of loose garment that is worn over indoor clothing and serves the same purpose as an overcoat; it protects the wearer from the cold, rain or wind for example, or it may form part of a fashionable outfit or uniform.

Long, elegant gloves that don't cover the users fingers.

Example: https://s.vndb.org/sf/19/79419.jpg
name: Fingerless Evening Gloves

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magician_%28fantasy%29]magician[/url].

A magician is someone who uses or practices magic that derives from supernatural or occult sources.

This trait signifies a character capable of casting magic spells, it does not mean that the character actually does so during the story, in that case also use the Spell Casting trait.
name: Magician
Jester Costume
description: [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/53/59853.jpg]Jester's costume[/url] usually consist of a multi-colored long-sleeved tunic and puffy pants, a hat with two or more "horns" (pom poms or bells are optional), a star-shaped or ruffle collar, and a jester's shoe covers.
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuki-onna]yuki-onna[/url], the semi-spirit entity which controls ice, cold weather or just can freeze everything.
name: Yuki-onna

description: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/17/79417.jpg]Christmas cap[/url] is a pointed cap, usually red and white fabric, worn by Santa Claus.
name: Christmas Cap

description: Awahime is a female worker in a Japanese [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soapland]Soapland[/url].
name: Awahime
Gokkun
description: This character engages in consuming large quantities of semen at once, typically from multiple partners.

name: School Sports Club President
description: The person is the president of a sports club at school.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor]empress consort[/url].

An empress consort is the wife of a reigning emperor. An empress consort usually shares her husband's rank and holds the feminine equivalent of the emperor's monarchical titles.
name: Empress Consort
Body Piercing
description:
This character has one or more body piercings, or they get pierced during the story.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_piercing]Body piercing[/url], a form of body modification, is the practice of puncturing or cutting a part of the human body.
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Notebook]notebook[/url]
name: Notebook

description:
This character performs [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fellatio]fellatio[/url]. Apply [url=/i1637]i1637[/url] to the receiving character.

Fellatio is the act of using the mouth, lips, and tongue to stimulate the penis. [url=/i101]Cunnilingus[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a female receiver.
name: Blowjob

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/White-collar_worker]white-collar worker[/url].

A white-collar worker refers to a salaried professional or an educated worker who performs semi-professional office, administrative, and sales coordination tasks, as opposed to a blue-collar worker, whose job requires manual labor.
name: White-collar Worker
Half-Japanese
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hafu]half Japanese[/url].

The word hafu (ハーフ) is used in Japanese to refer to somebody who is biracial, i.e. ethnically half-Japanese. The label emerged in the 1970s in Japan and is now the most commonly used label and preferred term of self-definition.

The word hafu comes from the English word "half" indicating half foreign-ness.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lactation]lactates[/url].

Lactation describes the secretion of milk from the mammary glands. Lactation can be induced in humans by a combination of physical and psychological stimulation, by drugs, or by a combination of those methods. It can be stimulated outside of pregnancy for sexual purposes.
name: Lactation

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pantyhose]pantyhose[/url].

Pantyhose are sheer, close-fitting legwear, covering the body from the waist to the feet.
name: Pantyhose
Kneepit Sex
description:
Kneepit sex is performed on this character. Apply i1976 to the performing character.

Kneepit sex is a non-penetrative sexual act where the penis is thrusted inside a person's kneepit.

[url=https://cdn.luscious.net/images/977/lusciousnet_bbb6f58e552703f6f48684b_152844634.640x0.jpg]Example 1 NSFW[/url], [url=https://cdn.luscious.net/images/246/lusciousnet_ed72be6c08b3e634fb5bc8b_1754450519.640x0.jpeg]Example 2 NSFW[/url]

name: Deity
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deity]deity[/url]

A deity is a recognized preternatural or supernatural immortal being, who may be thought of as holy, divine, or sacred, held in high regard, and respected by believers, often religiously referred to as a god.

Deities are depicted in a variety of forms, but are also frequently expressed as having human form. Some faiths and traditions consider it blasphemous to imagine or depict the deity as having any concrete form. They are usually immortal, and are commonly assumed to have personalities and to possess consciousness, intellects, desires, and emotions similar to those of humans. Such natural phenomena as lightning, floods, storms, other 'acts of God', and miracles are attributed to them, and they may be thought to be the authorities or controllers of various aspects of human life (such as birth or the afterlife).

name: Sniper
description:
This character is a professional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sniper]sniper[/url]. 

A sniper is a highly trained marksman who operates in one to two man teams which maintain close visual contact with the enemy and engages targets from concealed positions or physical distances exceeding the detection capabilities of the enemy personnel, without being detected.

name: Smoking
description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoking]smokes[/url] tobacco or cannabis.

Smoking is a practice in which a substance, most commonly tobacco or cannabis, is burned and the smoke is tasted or inhaled. This is primarily practised as a route of administration for recreational drug use, as combustion releases the active substances in drugs such as nicotine and makes them available for absorption through the lungs. It can also be done as a part of rituals, to induce trances and spiritual enlightenment.

This trait is only for smoking, for other types of recreational drug use and the leading addiction use the [url=https://vndb.org/i261]Drug Abuse[/url] trait.

This character carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laptop]laptop[/url].

A laptop is a portable personal computer with a clamshell form factor, suitable for mobile use.
name: Laptop

description: A dandere character is one who is normally quiet and silent, possibly to the point of coming across as emotionless at times, but will suddenly become talkative, sweet and cute when alone with the right person if they manage to push the right button to get them to pour their heart out, revealing that they're actually just shy.
name: Dandere

description:
This character wears old-style [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloomers_(clothing)]bloomers[/url].

Please do NOT use this trait for typical Japanese girl's  gym shorts. Use the [url=http://vndb.org/i178]Sport Bloomers[/url] trait instead.
name: Traditional Bloomers

description:
This character shows childish violent behavior to others characters whenever he feels frustrated, not caring if they had anything to blame for.
These attacks can get extremely violent but since they are considered a part of the comedy they don't cause any permanent harm.
name: Childishly Violent

description:
A character with this trait is a misanthrope.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Misanthropy]Misanthropy[/URL] is the general hatred, distrust or disdain of the human species or human nature. A misanthrope, or misanthropist is someone who holds such views or feelings.
name: Misanthrope
Clown
description:
A character with this trait is a clown, be it a professional or an amateur one.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clown]clown[/URL] is a comic performer who employs slapstick or similar types of physical humour, often in a mime style. Clowns have a varied tradition with significant variations in costume and performance. The most recognisable clowns are those that commonly wear outlandish costumes featuring distinctive makeup, colourful wigs, exaggerated footwear, and colourful clothing. Their entertainment style is generally designed to entertain large audiences, especially at a distance.

This character becomes the victim of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rape[/url], but this event can be avoided by making better choices or succeeding better in earlier segments of the story.

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

This trait itself is intended to be used in situations where player can avoid the rape scene altogether. For situations that fit better to the child traits, like the ability to interrupt a rape scene in motion, use the related trait, [url=http://vndb.org/i543]Rape Attempt[/url] in this example, instead.
name: Avoidable Rape
Hazel
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eye_colors#Hazel]hazel eyes[/url].

Hazel eyes often appear to shift in color from a light brown to a golden-green. Hazel mostly consists of brown and green. The dominant color in the eye can either be green or light brown/gold. This is how many people mistake hazel eyes to be amber and vice versa. This can sometimes produce a multicolored iris, i.e., an eye that is light brown/amber near the pupil and charcoal or dark green on the outer part of the iris (and vice versa) when observed in sunlight.

name: Bondage Sex
description:
This character engages in the acts of bondage during sexual scenes. Use this trait on the bound person and use i680 on their partner.

Bondage is the use of restraints for the sexual pleasure of the parties involved. It may be used in its own right, as in the case of rope bondage and breast bondage, or as part of sexual activity or BDSM activity.

name: Injury
description:
As a result of an event in this story this character gets  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Injury]injured[/url].

Injury is damage to a biological organism.

These traits are intended for events that characters survive with an injury and does not apply if they die during that scene or they magically heal shortly afterwards.

name: Animal Pelt
description:
This character wears an animal pelt as clothing.

An animal pelt is obtained by skinning an animal.
People wearing animal pelts, not for cosplay, but as an everyday outfit are considered indigenous, barbaric and uncivilized.

name: Assault
description:
This character gets [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assault]assaulted[/url].

Assault is a crime of violence against another person. The specific meaning of assault varies between countries, but can refer to an act that causes another to apprehend immediate and personal violence, or in the more limited sense of a threat of violence caused by an immediate show of force.

Assault is often defined to include not only violence, but any intentional physical contact with another person without their consent.

This trait is intended to be used in situations that the victim can't or doesn't fight back, at least on an equal level to make the situation more of a fight then an attack. In the other case, please use the Fighting trait.

name: Daydreamer
description: This person sometimes lose connection with real world in order to devote their-self to idle dreams and illusions. At the same time, they cease to notice everything that is happening around. Their companions have to scream or use a brute force to make them come down to earth.

name: Violet
description:
This character has purple hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

name: Livestock (Consensual)
description:
This character allows themselves to be treated as [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Livestock]livestock[/url] by other characters. To be treated as livestock is different from [url=https://vndb.org/i1370]petplay[/url] in that the characters are used for agricultural purposes such as for labor, breeding, or the production of milk.

They may be kept in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pen_(enclosure)]pens[/url], on farms, or in barns or allowed to roam free but treated as livestock nonetheless.

Miko is a Shinto term in Japan, indicating a shrine maiden or a supplementary priestess who was once likely seen as a shaman but in modern Japanese culture is understood to be an institutionalized role in daily shrine life, trained to perform tasks, ranging from sacred cleansing to performing the Kagura, a sacred dance.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Onmyouji#Onmy.C5.8Dji]onmyouji[/url].

Onmyouji was one of the classifications of civil servants belonging to the Bureau of Onmyou in ancient Japan's ritsuryo system. People with this title were professional practitioners of onmyoudou.

Onmyouji were specialists in magic and divination. Their court responsibilities ranged from tasks such as keeping track of the calendar, to mystical duties such as divination and protection of the capital from evil spirits. They could divine auspicious or harmful influences in the earth, and were instrumental in the moving of capitals. It is said that an onmyouji could also summon and control shikigami.
name: Onmyouji

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Librarian]librarian[/url].

A librarian is an information professional trained in library and information science, which is the organization and management of information services or materials for those with information needs.

description:

Plate armour, plate armor or plate mail is personal armour made from large metal plates, worn on the chest and sometimes the entire body.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teasing]teases[/url] someone.

Teasing comes in two major forms, playful and hurtful. When teasing is playful and friendly, and especially when it is reciprocal, teasing can be regarded as flirting.

People may be teased on such matters as their appearance, weight, behavior, abilities, and clothing. From the victim's point-of-view, this kind of teasing is often hurtful, irrespective of the intention of the teaser.

When teasing is unwelcome, it may be regarded as harassment or mobbing, especially in the work place, or as a form of bullying or emotional abuse. If done in public, it may be regarded as humiliation.
name: Teasing

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bassist]bass player[/url].

A bassist is a musician who plays a bass instrument such as a double bass, bass guitar, keyboard bass or a low brass instrument such as a tuba or sousaphone. Different musical genres tend to be associated with one or more of these instruments. Since the 1960s, the electric bass is the standard bass instrument for rock and roll, jazz fusion (and occasionally other forms of jazz), heavy metal, country, reggae and pop music. The double bass is the standard bass instrument for classical music, bluegrass, and Swing-era and Bebop-era jazz. Low brass instruments such as the tuba or sousaphone are the standard bass instrument in Dixieland and New Orleans-style jazz bands.
name: Bassist
Viola
description: The viola is a bowed string instrument. It is slightly larger than a violin and has a lower, deeper sound.

This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greatsword]greatsword[/url].

A greatsword is referenced today mostly as an extremely large or powerful weapon, like the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zweih%C3%A4nder]zweihänder[/url], in comparison with less sizable weapons, such as the longsword or claymore.

These weapons fall between the line of the 16th century two-handed swords wielded by the landsknecht and the shorter arming sword of the knights and the spatha of the Romans and Vikings. The greatsword, and perhaps longswords in this manner, were not a form of "specialized weapon" as much as they were "outsize(d) specimens". Indeed, the weapons were referred to by a variety of names none of which, however, related to espée deuz mains, or twahandswerd, both meaning the huge Renaissance two-handed sword. Instead, the weapons were referred to as simply notably large weapons as in Grans espées d'Allemagne or "big swords of Germany".
name: Greatsword

Swordsmanship refers to the skills of a swordsman, a person versed in the art of the sword. The term is modern, and as such was mainly used to refer to smallsword fencing, but by extension it can also be applied to any martial art involving the use of a sword.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betrayal]Betrayal[/url] (or backstabbing) is the breaking or violation of a presumptive contract, trust, or confidence that produces moral and psychological conflict within a relationship amongst individuals, between organizations or between individuals and organizations. Often betrayal is the act of supporting a rival group, or it is a complete break from previously decided upon or presumed norms by one party from the others. Betrayal is also a commonly used literary element and is often associated with or used as a plot twist.

Transgender is the state of one's "gender identity" (self-identification as woman, man, neither or both) not matching one's "assigned sex" (identification by others as male, female or intersex based on physical/genetic sex).

"Transgender" does not imply any specific form of sexual orientation; transgender people may identify as heterosexual, homosexual, bisexual, pansexual, polysexual, or asexual; some may consider conventional sexual orientation labels inadequate or inapplicable to them.

This trait refers to characters acting outside the social norms of their physical gender. It does not necessarily cover looking, dressing like or claiming to be of that gender.

Succubus is a female demon or supernatural being, who takes the form of a human woman in order to seduce men, usually through sexual intercourse. In modern fictional representations, a succubus may or may not appear in dreams and is often depicted as a highly attractive seductress or enchantress.
name: Succubus

Bullying is a form of abuse. It involves repeated acts over time attempting to create or enforce one person's (or group's) power over another person (or group) , thus an "imbalance of power". The "imbalance of power" may be social power and/or physical power.

Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional, verbal and physical. It typically involves subtle methods of coercion such as intimidation.
name: Bullying

name: Medusa
description:
In Greek mythology [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medusa]Medusa[/url] was a monster, a Gorgon, generally described as having the face of a hideous human female with living venomous snakes in place of hair. Gazing directly into her eyes would turn onlookers to stone. 

Famous is the story about Medusa beheaded by the hero Perseus, who thereafter used her head, which retained its ability to turn onlookers to stone, as a weapon until he gave it to the goddess Athena to place on her shield.

[url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Medusa]Monster girls medusa[/url] exists too, they are an high level type of [url=https://vndb.org/i1759]lamia[/url], having in common the same appearance: upper body of a human woman and the lower body of a snake.They differ from normal lamias as they possess the ability to cause the body of whomever they make eye contact with to harden like stone.

name: Furisode
description:
A furisode (振袖, lit. swinging sleeves) is a style of kimono distinguishable by its long sleeves, which range in length from 85 centimeters for a kofurisode (小振袖) to 114 centimeters for an ōfurisode (大振袖).

Furisode are the most formal style of kimono worn by unmarried women in Japan. The furisode is made of very fine, brightly colored silk, and is commonly rented or bought by parents for their daughters to wear when celebrating Coming of Age Day the year they turn 20. By wearing a furisode, a young woman signifies that she is both single and a legal adult, and thus available for marriage. In this sense, a furisode might be likened to the formal gowns worn by debutantes in the West.

The furisode is generally worn for formal social functions such as the tea ceremony or wedding ceremonies of relatives. Since furisodes can be quite expensive, many women rent them as needed rather than purchasing them.

name: Domestic Violence
description:
This character a victim of the acts of domestic violence.

Domestic violence can be broadly defined as a pattern of abusive behaviors by one or both partners in an intimate relationship such as marriage, dating, family, friends or cohabitation. Domestic violence has many forms including physical aggression (hitting, kicking, biting, shoving, restraining, slapping, throwing objects), or threats thereof; sexual abuse; emotional abuse; controlling or domineering; intimidation; stalking; passive/covert abuse (e.g., neglect); and economic deprivation.

In games and anime Domestic Violence may appear as a comedy routine.

Civil Servant
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Civil_servant]civil servant[/url].

A civil servant or public servant is a person in the public sector employed in a government department or agency. The term explicitly excludes the armed services, members of which are enlisted and thus not considered ordinary civilians, although civilian officials may work at the Defense Ministry in non-enlisted positions.

Civil servants should be distinguished from politicians. A politician is someone who is involved in the decision making in issues concerning public policy, and in democracies they are usually members of a political party, and are elected by vote or appointed. Civil servants, on the other hand, are employees of the public sector, they may range from public administrators and government bureaucrats to law enforcement officers, government clerks and public works workers.

A nightgown, nightie or nightdress is a loosely hanging item of nightwear, today almost exclusively worn by women. A nightgown is made from cotton, silk, satin, or nylon and may be decorated with lace appliqués or embroidery at the bust and hem.
name: Nightgown

name: Ventriloquism
Futuristic Suit
description:
A futuristic suit is a complete line of clothing, footwear, and other safety gear designed for futuristic: military forces, law enforcement, firefighting professionals, mech pilots.
The term futuristic of "futuristic suit" means that the suit is so advanced in design, form, concept, as to seem suited for some future time and ultramodern or future technology. 

The concept of a futuristic suit is entirely based on fantasy but usually is a mixture of: futuristic tactical suit, futuristic space suit and futuristic armor.
The range of the protection on a futuristic suit can vary from a simple [url=http://www.raph.com/3dartists/artgallery/6811.jpg]jumpsuit look[/url], to a  [url=http://2-dpanda.deviantart.com/art/HNA-w-chassis-327897238]light armored suit[/url], ending in a  [url=https://dbystedt.files.wordpress.com/2010/08/mech-suit-three-quarter-view.jpg]heavy amored or mech suit[/url].
