Rope bondage is bondage involving the use of rope to restrict movement, wrap, suspend, or restrain a person, as part of BDSM activities.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peaked_cap]peaked cap[/url].

A peaked cap is a form of headgear worn by the armed forces of many nations and also by many uniformed civilian organizations such as law enforcement agencies.

The cap has a crown, a band, and a peak (British English) or visor (American English). The crown is one color, often white for navies, light blue for air forces, and green for armies, and may be piped around the edge in a different color. The band can be one color, often black, or can be striped, vertically or horizontally. Most caps have some form of cap device (or cap badge). In the British Army, each regiment and corps has a different badge. In the American armed forces, the cap device is uniform throughout the branch of service, though different variants are used by different rank classes. The peak or visor is short, historically made of leather, or in newer caps may be a shiny plastic. Sometimes it is covered in fabric and may be adorned with embroidered ornamentation.
name: Peaked Cap

description:
This character becomes the target of  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bullying]bullying[/url].

Bullying is a form of abuse. It involves repeated acts over time attempting to create or enforce one person's (or group's) power over another person (or group) , thus an "imbalance of power". The "imbalance of power" may be social power and/or physical power.

Bullying consists of three basic types of abuse – emotional, verbal and physical. It typically involves subtle methods of coercion such as intimidation.
name: Bullying

description:
This character performs a [url=/http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Footjob]footjob[/url]. Apply [url=/i1632]i1632[/url] to the receiving character.

A footjob is the act of rubbing one's feet on a partner to stimulate or excite them. In most cases, the performer uses their feet to rub a man's penis. Sometimes the recipient is a woman, and the performer uses their feet to rub the recipient's vulva.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/14/19414.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Footjob

description:
This character gets into a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coma]coma[/url].

In medicine, a coma is a state of unconsciousness, lasting more than 6 hours in which a person cannot be awakened, fails to respond normally to painful stimuli, light or sound, lacks a normal sleep-wake cycle and does not initiate voluntary actions. A person in a state of coma is described as comatose.

Coma may result from a variety of conditions, including intoxication (such as illicit drug abuse, overdose or misuse of over the counter medications, prescribed medication, or controlled substances), metabolic abnormalities, central nervous system diseases, acute neurologic injuries such as strokes or herniations, hypoxia, hypothermia, hypoglycemia or traumatic injuries such as head trauma caused by falls or vehicle collisions. It may also be deliberately induced by pharmaceutical agents in order to preserve higher brain functions following brain trauma, or to save the patient from extreme pain during healing of injuries or diseases.
name: Coma

description:
This characters wears tassets.

Tassets are a piece of armor designed to protect the upper leg area. These consists of hanging plates hanging down from a belt area.

It can be either metal or leather. Or both (studded).

[url=http://ep.yimg.com/ay/yhst-87491460501412/king-tasset-belt-7.gif]Example 1[/url], [url=http://www.kultofathena.com/images%5CLP200911_l.jpg]Example 2[/url] - Metal
[url=https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/75/78/7b/75787b3c183fb095f61cc8591f7001ac.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Leather

[url=https://vndb.org/c33]Example 4 - Saber[/url]
name: Tassets
Death
description:
This character may [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death]die[/url] during the course of the story.

Death is the termination of the biological functions that sustain a living organism.

This trait is intended to be used for characters that can die during the shared route of the game as well as on the paths to good endings. Please do not attach it to characters that can die only at bad endings and game over scenes.

This character is a subject of sexual scenes involving a form of sexual slavery informally called "public use" or "public cum dumpster".

"Public Use" or "Public Cum Dumpster" is a term used in hentai to identify a particular kind of sexual slavery (Choukyou or Non-Consensual) where a girl is left to be sexually used by every stranger. Usually the "public use" of a girl happens in VN after a sexual slavery journey that ends in the lost of interest or final punishment by the master.

Key factors of "public use" trait are:
- Extremization of the concept where a girl is considered an unwilling object to be used sexually by everyone, pratically sexual slavery at his fullest
- The girl is not a sexual slave of a small circle of people (protagonist, anti-hero, heroine's friends) but she is left to be fucked by everyone in particular strangers (whole city, all students in school, ecc...) 
- The girl is left restrained, stuck in pillory, enchained or stuck in cages or wall in public places (toilet, market, square, ecc...)

Note: Use this trait in conjunction with the relevant and correct sexual slavery trait. Do not confuse this trait with [url=https://vndb.org/i879]Sex in Public Places[/url] which does not imply sexual slavery. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/100350.jpg]NSFW Example Pillory[/url],[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/100351.jpg]NSFW Example Stuck[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/52/100352.jpg]NSFW Example Toilet 1[/url],[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/53/100353.jpg]NSFW Example Toilet 2[/url]
name: Public Use

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Badminton]badminton[/url]. 

Badminton is a racquet sport played by either two opposing players (singles) or two opposing pairs (doubles), who take positions on opposite halves of a rectangular court divided by a net. Players score points by striking a shuttlecock with their racquet so that it passes over the net and lands in their opponents' half of the court.
name: Badminton

description:
This character has the ability to become [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Invisibility]invisible[/url].

Invisibility is the state in which an object or something cannot be seen. Realistically, this occurs when an object cannot reflect light at the observer. In fictional cases, invisibility can be achieved through magical or technological means.
name: Invisibility
Swimming Board
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_float]swimming board[/url].

Swimming boards are a flotation aid used to develop a swimmer's kicking action. They can be used on all strokes but are primarily used on Freestyle, Butterfly stroke and Breaststroke.

Swimmers of all ability can use them. Young swimmers can develop their kicking action while elite swimmers can refine their kick. They are also used to strengthen a swimmers legs.

Swimming boards should not be mixed with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surfboard]surfboards[/url].
In traditional Chinese dress, a changshan  is the male equivalent of the women's [url=/i453]cheongsam (qipao)[/url]. It is also known as a changpao or dagua.
name: Changshan
Hair Tie
description:
A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_tie]hair tie[/URL] is a gadget used to fasten hair, particularly long hair, into a hairstyle (usually a ponytail). Hair ties are useful in securing one's hair back to keep it away from the face and to give some style to hair. [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Hair_ties.jpg]Typical hair ties[/URL] are round, elastic bands that are used in a very similar fashion as rubber bands. 

Not to be confused with [URL=http://vndb.org/i1061]ribbon hair tie[/URL], which is a ribbon (generally non-elastic) that is used like one would use a standard hair tie.

Also not to be confused with [URL=http://vndb.org/i661]hairpins[/URL] which are clips hat are used to keep hair in place.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/23/123.jpg]Example[/url]

This character wears a ribbon tie.

The ribbon tie is a long piece of thin cloth worn for decorative purposes around the neck or shoulders, resting under the shirt collar and knotted at the throat. It is usually tied in a bow.
name: Ribbon Tie

description:
This character is a [url=http://jisho.org/words?jap=%E7%9C%8B%E6%9D%BF%E5%A8%98&eng=&dict=edict]kanban musume[/url].

This term (看板娘) traditionally refers to a pretty girl who attracts customers by working at her parents' shop. It generally refers to any girl who works at a shop run by her family.
name: Kanban Musume
Twin Boobjob
description:
A twin boobjob is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i1265]i1265[/url] to the performing characters.

This is a sexual act in which two women rub their breasts against each other with a man's penis between them.

name: Hypnotism
description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypnotism]hypnotises[/url] others.

Hypnosis is a mental state. It is usually induced by a procedure known as a hypnotic induction, which is commonly composed of a long series of preliminary instructions and suggestions. Hypnotic suggestions may be delivered by a hypnotist in the presence of the subject, or may be self-administered ("self-suggestion" or "autosuggestion").

name: Cross Necklace
description:
This character wears a necklace with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_cross]christian cross[/url].

The Christian cross, seen as a representation of the instrument of the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, is the best-known religious symbol of Christianity. It is related to the crucifix (a cross that includes a usually three-dimensional representation of Jesus' body) and to the more general family of cross symbols.

name: Crotchless Catsuit
description:
This character wears a crotchless and/or open cup catsuit.

An open cup and/or crotchless [url=https://vndb.org/i133]catsuit[/url] is a close-fitting one-piece garment that covers the torso and the legs, and frequently the arms but leaving an opening in the crotch and breast area. In general it looks kinkier than a traditional catsuit and more functional to the purpose of having sex since it doesn't need to be removed to achieve vaginal and anal insertion.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/38/91038.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

name: Butterfly
description:
This character has sex in a [url=http://www.sexinfo101.com/butterflypositions.shtml]butterfly[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1699]i1699[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In a sexual context, "butterfly" may refer to a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Missionary_position#Butterfly_position]specific position[/url] in which the receiving partner lies down, face up, while the penetrating partner stands or kneels on a lower surface. However, this trait (or one of its child traits) should be used for any position in which the receiving partner lies down, face up, while the penetrating partner kneels, squats or stands in front of them with their torso mostly upright. The receiving partner may have their hips raised up or rotated slightly. The penetrating partner may kneel or stand on a lower surface than the receiver so that they are not too high up.

If the penetrating partner is supporting themselves over the top of the receiving partner, consider using the [url=/i93]missionary[/url] trait instead. If the penetrating partner is standing and the receiving partner's hips are raised far above their shoulders, consider using the [url=/i810]piledriver[/url] trait instead.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/12/84312.jpg]Example 1[/url] - Penetrating partner standing on a lower surface
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/53/79853.jpg]Example 2[/url] - [url=/i496]Seventh Posture[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/13/84313.jpg]Example 3a[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/14/84314.jpg]Example 3b[/url] - [url=/i936]Tominagi[/url]

This character is [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/short-tempered]short-tempered[/url].

A short-tempered person is easily moved to anger.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angry]Anger[/url] is an emotion related to one's psychological interpretation of having been offended, wronged or denied and a tendency to undo that by retaliation.

The external expression of anger can be found in facial expressions, body language, physiological responses, and at times in public acts of aggression.
name: Short-tempered

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sweatpants]sweatpants[/url]. 

Sweatpants are a casual variety of soft trousers intended for comfort or athletic purposes, although they are now worn in many different situations. Because of their comfort and fashionable varieties, they have become one of the most commonly worn items of clothing.
name: Sweatpants

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cycling]cycling[/url], either for fun or competitively.

Cycling is the use of bicycles for transport, recreation, or for sport. Apart from ordinary two-wheeled bicycles, cycling also includes riding unicycles, tricycles, quadracycles, and other similar human-powered vehicles (HPVs).
name: Cycling
Chinese
description: This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chinese_people]Chinese[/url].
These characters has a special place in their hearts for the environment, wildlife and plant life.
name: Nature Lover
Demon Blooded
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demon]demon[/url] blooded.

The character's lineage had some involvement with demons in the past. As a result of this, they have some some demonic powers as well as curses that they must bear the burden of.

name: King
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King]king[/url].

A king is a male sovereign or monarch; a man who holds by life tenure, and usually by hereditary right, the chief authority over a country and people.

name: Soccer
description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archery]football[/url].

Soccer is a sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball. The game is played on a rectangular field of grass or green artificial turf, with a goal in the middle of each of the short ends. The object of the game is to score by driving the ball into the opposing goal.

In general play, the goalkeepers are the only players allowed to touch the ball with their hands or arms, while the field players typically use their feet to kick the ball into position, occasionally using their torso or head to intercept a ball in midair. The team that scores the most goals by the end of the match wins.

name: Sex on Roof
description:
This character has sex on a roof. This can include "traditional" roofs like on houses, or open outer areas on top floors of a building such as a school.

[URL=https://e-hentai.org/s/ea49dbb390/41985-294]NSFW House Example[/URL]
[URL=https://e-hentai.org/s/0538da149d/742467-45]NSFW School Example[/URL]

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freckle]freckles[/url].

Freckles are clusters of concentrated melanin which are most often visible on people with a fair complexion. They are mostly found on the face, although they may appear on any skin exposed to the sun.
name: Freckles
Low Self-esteem
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Self-esteem]low self-esteem[/url].

Characters with low self-esteem have no belief in their own worth. They tend to suffer from heavy self-criticism, hypersensitivity to criticism of others, chronic indecision, excessive will to please, perfectionism, neurotic guilt, floating hostility, and defensive tendencies.
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kigurumi]kigurumi[/url] or animal costume. They can also represent cartoon characters.
name: Kigurumi

description:
These are the traits for characters' hair colors. It doesn't matter if this hair color is natural or a result of some conditions affecting hair color.

See the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples of each hair color in the database. Please always refer to this chart when in doubt.

Note 1: if a character's hair color is ambiguous and cannot be described with a single color, tagging the character with multiple color traits is allowed. (Example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10551]Crayanne[/url])

Note 2: if a character has several well distinguishable colors in his/her hair, please use the [url=http://vndb.org/i894]Multicolored[/url] trait along with the relevant color traits. (Example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10040]Aaron Vanich[/url])
name: Hair Color

description:
This character has some shuriken.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shuriken]shuriken[/url] is a traditional Japanese concealed weapon that was generally used for throwing, and sometimes stabbing or slashing.

They are sharpened hand-held blades made from a variety of everyday items such as needles, nails, and knives, as well as coins, washers, and other flat plates of metal.
name: Shuriken
Housewife
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Housewife]housewife[/url].

Housewife is a term used to describe a married woman whose main occupation is running or operating the family's home—caring for and educating her children, cooking and storing food, buying goods the family needs in day to day life, cleaning or maintaining parts of the home, making clothes for the family, etc.—and who does not generally maintain employment outside the home.

name: Enema
description:
This character receives an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enema]enema[/url].

An enema is the procedure of introducing liquids into the rectum and colon via the anus.

name: No Name
description:
This character is never referred by his/her name. Titles such as 'sensei' or 'onii-chan' are used by the characters when they are talking to or about this character. When required, the game displays this character's name as 'Protagonist', 'Player', 'Student A' or something similar.

This should not be mixed with the [url=http://vndb.org/i593]Nameable[/url] trait, since this character's name cannot be changed.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Altruism]altruistic[/url].

Altruism is selfless concern for the welfare of others. It is a traditional virtue in many cultures, and a core aspect of various religious traditions, though the concept of 'others' toward whom concern should be directed can vary among religions.

Altruism is the opposite of selfishness.
name: Altruistic
Painting
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Painting]painting[/url].

Painting is the practice of applying paint, pigment, color or other medium to a surface (support base). The application of the medium is commonly applied to the base with a brush but other objects can be used. In art, the term painting describes both the act and the result of the action. Paintings may have for their support such surfaces as walls, paper, canvas, wood, glass, lacquer, clay, copper or concrete, and may incorporate multiple other materials including sand, clay, paper, gold leaf as well as objects.

name: Atakushi
description:
This character uses "atakushi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns for "I"[/url], to address themselves.

An informal variation of watakushi. In fiction, generally used by upper-class ladies.

name: Shoejob
description:
A shoejob is performed on this character. Apply i1781 to the performing character.

A shoejob is the act of rubbing shoes or boots on a partner genitalia to stimulate or excite them. In most cases, the performer uses their shoes or boots to rub a man's penis. This is a sexual practice similar to footjob but wearing shoes or boots.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/01/23101.jpg]Example NSFW[/url]

name: Tanuki
description: This character is a raccoon dog, a raccoon-like canid indigenous to East Asia.

name: Kemonomimi Headband
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headband]headband[/url] with animal ears.

A headband is a clothing accessory worn in the hair or around the forehead, usually to hold hair away from the face or eyes. Headbands generally consist of a loop of elastic material or a horseshoe-shaped piece of flexible plastic or metal.

Kemonomimi, literally meaning "animal ears", is based on the the concept of drawing animals as bishoujo or having bishoujo wear or have animal accessories (such as ears or tails). Catgirls are the most prolific in this category, although bunnygirls, foxgirls, and dog girls are also common.

Kemonomimi characters typically appear human except for added animal-like qualities.

This trait is intended for characters wearing head accessories animal ears. And it should not be mixed with the other two kemonomimi traits:
Hair > [url=http://vndb.org/i31]Kemonomimi[/url] refers to hair styles that look like animal ears and
Body > [url=http://vndb.org/i677]Kemonomimi[/url] refers to humanoid characters with actual animal ears.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bokken]bokken[/url].

A bokken is a Japanese wooden sword used for training, usually the size and shape of a katana, but sometimes shaped like other swords, such as the wakizashi and tantou.

Some ornamental bokken are decorated with mother-of-pearl work and elaborate carvings.

Bokutou should not be confused with shinai, a sword made of bamboo that is used for practice in kendo.
name: Bokken
Tiger
description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tiger]tiger[/url] or a tigress.

The tiger (Panthera tigris) is the largest cat species, most recognisable for their pattern of dark vertical stripes on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside.

This character works as a producer.

In [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_idol]Japanese Idolism[/url], a producer is a manager who is in charge of coordinating [url=https://vndb.org/i347]idol[/url]s. They may be put in charge of a individual or managing a unit group.
name: Producer
Crew Cut
description: This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crew_cut]crew cut[/url]. A short cropped hairstyle.

This character has four arms, limbs with hands which are not relied on (though may be used for) walking. This is usually in addition to a normal 2 legs though this is not required.

Examples: c52558 & c12706
name: Four-Armed

description:
The character is a [url=http://www.oocities.org/yctan11/keyword.html]jinyou[/url], a human who has his origins from youkai, and thus partially is one.

They are humans, but with inhuman-like abilities and sometimes inhuman-like appearance. They are the descendants of youkai from long time ago who had decided to live on in the human society and thus had took human spouses. The special abilities the jinyou have are a result of their youkai blood that they had inherited from their youkai ancestors (thus the nature of the abilities are also determined by their ancestors).

The kanji for jinyou is 人妖, first one meaning "Man" and the second one meaning "Demon" (this kanji is the same as the one in 妖怪 "youkai", which is referring to the supernatural beings in Japanese and Chinese mythology and doesn't always mean "demon" literally). Putting the two kanji together, it'll roughly mean, "a human youkai".
name: Jinyou

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/School_uniform]school uniform[/url].

A school uniform is an outfit—a set of standardized clothes—worn primarily for an educational institution.
name: School Uniform
Childbirth
description:
The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Childbirth]childbirth[/url] during the story.

Childbirth is the culmination of a human pregnancy or gestation period with the expulsion of one or more newborn infants from a woman's uterus.

name: No-dachi
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/No-dachi]no-dachi[/url].

A nodachi is a large two-handed Japanese sword carried by foot soldiers and was designed as a weapon for war versus cavalry and open field engagements. The length of the nodachi's hilt varied between 30 to 33 centimeters. The blade was usually around 122 centimeters long. Its cutting capability and range exceeded that of a katana, due to its weight and size.

name: Singer
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singer]singer[/url].

A singer is a person who uses his or her voice to produce music. Singers are often accompanied by musicians and instruments, while other people sing for pleasure. Vocal skill is usually a combination of innate talent and professional training.

Use this trait ONLY for professional singers or students of a singing class. For other characters who do sing in games, like music club or band members in a regular school, use the [url=http://vndb.org/i346]singing[/url] trait.

A [url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Slime]slime[/url] is semi-liquid monster, with a flexible half-transparent body that can change into various forms. They are intelligent enough to speak, but their thoughts are simple, and they instinctively wander around in search of human men who will end up as their prey.

A slime monster can grow upon feeding and duplicate himself originating a smaller copy. Various kind/color of slime monster exists every one with his own characteristics: bubble slime, red slime, dark slime, queen slime, sea slime, ecc...
name: Slime

description: A revolutionary is a person who either actively participates in, or advocates revolution. To be such the person must advocate the overthrow of a government or the complete change of a society or take an active part in either one of the two. Terrorists can also be revolutionaries depending on their goals.
name: Revolutionary

description:
This character acts in a [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/cynical]cynical[/url] way, showing contempt for accepted standards of honesty or morality by one's actions, especially by actions that exploit the scruples of others. It has little to no relation to Greek philosophy [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cynicism]cynicism[/url].

A cynical person believes that only selfishness motivates human actions and disbelieves in or minimizes selfless acts or disinterested points of view.
name: Cynic
Fashion Design
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fashion_design]fashion design[/url].

Fashion design is the art of the application of design and aesthetics or natural beauty to clothing and accessories. Some work alone or as part of a team.

This character is subject to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pegging_%28sexual_practice%29]pegging[/url]. Apply this trait to the character being pegged, and apply [url=/i729]i729[/url] to the character wearing the strap-on.

Pegging is a sexual practice in which a woman penetrates a man's anus with a strap-on dildo.
name: Pegging

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel]angel[/url].

Angels, in a variety of religions, are regarded as spiritual beings. They are often depicted as messengers of God in the Hebrew and Christian Bibles and the Quran.

The term "angel" has also been expanded to various notions of spiritual beings found in many other religious traditions. Other roles of angels include protecting and guiding human beings, and carrying out God's tasks.
name: Angel

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stepsibling]step brother[/url].

A stepbrother is the son of one's stepparent from a previous relationship. They are not related by blood.
name: Step Brother
NEET
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neet]NEET[/url].

NEET is a government initialism for people currently "Not in Education, Employment, or Training". NEET classification comprises people who are unemployed, not engaged in housework, not enrolled in school or work-related training, and not seeking work. The "NEET group" is not a uniform set of individuals. It includes those people who will be NEET for a short time while testing out a variety of opportunities, and those who have major and often multiple mental disorders and are likely to be NEET for most of their lives.

This trait does not apply to people that are very rich and have no need to worry about earning income for the rest of their lives.

name: Goat
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goat]goat[/url].

The domestic goat is a subspecies of goat domesticated from the wild goat of southwest Asia and Eastern Europe. The goat is a member of the family Bovidae and is closely related to the sheep as both are in the goat-antelope subfamily Caprinae. There are over 300 distinct breeds of goat. Goats are one of the oldest domesticated species, and have been used for their milk, meat, hair, and skins over much of the world.

This character is seen with a crystal ball.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crystal_ball]A crystal ball[/url], also known as an orbuculum, is a crystal or glass ball believed by some people to aid in the performance of clairvoyance.
name: Crystal Ball

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student]student[/url].

A student is a learner, or someone who attends an educational institution.

This trait is intended to be used for students that are not a member of the child traits such as high school student or university student. If a character is a member of those please use the appropriate trait instead.
name: Student
Blade
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blade]blade[/url].

This trait is intended to be used for made up or unidentified types of blades that does not have well known real world counterparts, for the common types of blades, like [url=http://vndb.org/i73]swords[/url] and [url=http://vndb.org/i201]knives[/url] use (or make) the appropriate traits.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corset]corset[/url]. 

A corset is a garment worn to hold and shape the torso into a desired shape for aesthetic or medical purposes (either for the duration of wearing this item, or with a more lasting effect).

In recent years, the term "corset" has also been borrowed by the fashion industry to refer to tops which, to varying degrees, mimic the look of traditional corsets without actually acting as one. While these modern corsets and corset tops often feature lacing and/or boning and generally mimic a historical style of corsets, they have very little if any effect on the shape of the wearer's body.
name: Corset

description:
[url=http://yokai.wikia.com/wiki/Daidarabotchi]Daidarabotchi[/url] is a gigantic youkai from Japanese mythology, sometime said to pose as a mountain range when sleeping. 

His size was so great his footprints were said to have created in numerable lakes and ponds. He is the responsible for the Japanese geography, since he is able to move mountains and leave them wherever he wants.
name: Daidarabotchi

description:
This character wears one or more tiny braids on his head.

Do not confuse this trait with the [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/53/103653.jpg]micro braids[/url] afro hairstyle where the character has tens of micro braids; tiny braids are just decorative braids for characters with straight or curly hair.
If the tiny braid is used as an headband just use [url=https://vndb.org/i2350]braided headband[/url] instead.

[url=https://vndb.org/c54082]Example 1[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/c12950]Example 2[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/c22818]Example 3[/url]
[url=https://vndb.org/c33206]Twin Tiny Braids Example 1[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/c12115]Twin Tiny Braids Example 2[/url]
name: Tiny Braid

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helmet]helmet[/url].

A helmet is a form of protective gear worn on the head to protect it from injuries.

Ceremonial or symbolic helmets (e.g., English policeman's helmet) without protective function are sometimes used. The oldest known use of helmets was by Assyrian soldiers in 900BC, who wore thick leather or bronze helmets to protect the head from blunt object and sword blows and arrow strikes in combat. Soldiers still wear helmets, now often made from lightweight plastic materials.

In civilian life, helmets are used for recreational activities and sports (e.g., jockeys in horse racing, American football, ice hockey, cricket, and rock climbing); dangerous work activities (e.g., construction, mining, riot police); and transportation (e.g., Motorcycle helmets and bicycle helmets). Since the 1990s, most helmets are made from resin or plastic, which may be reinforced with fibers such as aramids.
name: Helmet

description: A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/moody?s=t]moody[/URL]. Regardless of whether they have an actual mental condition or not, their moods change at the drop of a hat. Moody characters tend to also be impulsive and whimsical.
name: Moody
Childhood Friend
description:
This character is a childhood [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Friend]friend[/url] of someone.

A childhood friend is usually considered to be a friend that shares extremely strong interpersonal ties with someone based on this friendship's having roots to these character's early childhoods.

name: Avoidable Rape
description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rapes[/url] another character, but this event can be avoided by making different choices or succeeding better in earlier segments of the story.

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

This trait itself is intended to be used in situations where the player can avoid the rape scene altogether. For situations that fit the child traits better, like the ability to interrupt a rape scene in progress, use the child trait, [url=/i543]Rape Attempt[/url] in this example, instead.

name: Blue
description:
This character has blue hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

name: Arranged Marriage
description:
The character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arranged_marriage]arranged marriage[/url], a marriage arranged by someone other than the couple getting wedded.

An arranged marriage is one in which someone other than the couple getting married makes the selection of the persons to be wed, curtailing or avoiding the process of courtship. The match could be selected by parents, a matchmaking agent, matrimonial site, or a trusted third party. In many communities, priests or religious leaders as well as relatives or family friends play a major role in matchmaking.

name: Grenade
description:
This character has some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grenade]grenades[/url].

The term grenade refers to any explosive device designed to be thrown by hand. Most grenades explode, projecting fragments, i.e., pieces of the casing, serrated wire, or an incendiary material.

name: Honest
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honesty]honest[/url].

Honesty is associated with virtues such as integrity, truthfulness, and straightforwardness.

name: Wedding
description:
This character participates in their own marriage ceremony during the story (mostly at the end).

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wedding]wedding[/url] is the ceremony where people are united in marriage. Wedding traditions and customs vary greatly between cultures, ethnic groups, religions, countries, and social classes. Most wedding ceremonies involve an exchange of wedding vows by the couple, presentation of a gift (offering, ring(s), symbolic item, flowers, money), and a public proclamation of marriage by an authority figure or leader.

Please don't apply this trait to those who were married before the story began.

This character is one of identical twins, that in the course of the story pretends to be other twin.

Add for both, if exchange is on both sides.
name: Twin Switch
Prison Uniform
description:
A character with this tag wears or has worn a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prison_uniform]prison uniform[/URL].

A prison uniform is any uniform worn by individuals incarcerated in a prison, jail or similar facility of detention.

name: Poor
description:
This character is [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/poor]poor[/url].

Poor people have little or no money, goods, or other means of support. Some may even be [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poverty]poverty-stricken[/url].

name: Tantou
description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tant%C5%8D]tantou[/url].

The tantou is commonly referred to as a knife or dagger. The blade is single or double edged with a length between 15 and 30 cm. It is shorter than it's successor - wakizashi, it's sides also generally have no ridge line and are nearly flat.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brassiere_measurement#Continental_Europe_.2F_Japan]A cup size[/url] breasts.

The cup size should come from a reliable source such as the game itself or the developer's website. Don't try to guess a character's cup size unless it appears to be AA (very flat-chested) or E+ (very well-endowed).
name: A Cup

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guan_Dao]guan dao[/url].

A guan dao is a type of Chinese pole weapon that is currently used in some forms of Chinese martial arts.

It is comparable to a European fauchard or glaive and consists of a heavy blade with a spike at the back and sometimes also a notch at the spike's upper base that can catch an opponent's weapon. In addition there are often irregular serrations that lead the back edge of the blade to the spike. The blade is mounted atop a 1.5 m to 1.8 m long wooden or metal pole with a pointed metal counter weight used to balance the heavy blade and for striking on the opposite end. The blade is very deeply curved and therefore unlike most polearms, solely useful for sweeping cuts where it relies on range and power.
name: Guan Dao
Multicolored
description:
This character's hair has more than one color in it. For example, the hair may be striped or gradated.

Note: ONLY use this trait when the character has several colours in their hair.

Example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10040]Aaron Vanich[/url] has multicolored hair.
Counter example: [url=http://vndb.org/c10551]Crayanne[/url] does NOT have multicolored hair.

A character with this trait wears a pair of Geta.

[URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geta_%28footwear%29]Geta[/URL] are a form of traditional Japanese footwear that resemble both clogs and flip-flops. They are a kind of sandal with an elevated wooden base held onto the foot with a fabric thong to keep the foot well above the ground. They are worn with traditional Japanese clothing such as kimono or yukata, but (in Japan) also with Western clothing during the summer months.
name: Geta
Swim Brief
description:
This character wears [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swim_briefs]swim briefs[/url].

A swim brief or racing brief is any briefs-style male swimsuit such as those worn in competitive swimming and diving. The popularity of the Australian Speedo brand racing brief has led to the use of its name in many countries around the world (e.g. the United States, New Zealand, UK and Europe) to refer to any racing brief, regardless of the maker.

This character engages in espionage, a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spy]spy[/url].

Espionage or spying involves an individual obtaining information that is considered secret or confidential without the permission of the holder of the information. Espionage is inherently clandestine, lest the legitimate holder of the information change plans or take other countermeasures once it is known that the information is in unauthorized hands.
name: Spy

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insect]insect[/url] who bears resemblance to one.

Insects include butterflies, bees, ants, grasshoppers, cockroaches, beetles, flies, mantises, etc.
name: Insect

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trident]trident[/url].

A trident is a three-pronged spear. It is used for spear fishing and was also a military weapon.

Tridents are featured widely in mythical, historical and modern culture. The sea god Poseidon or Neptune is classically depicted bearing a trident. Note that a trident is not a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pitchfork]pitchfork[/url].

As a weapon, the trident was prized for its long reach and ability to trap other long-weapons between prongs to disarm their wielder. In Ancient Rome, in a parody of fishing, tridents were famously used by a type of gladiator called a retiarius or "net fighter". The retiarius was traditionally pitted against a secutor, and cast a net to wrap his adversary and then used the trident to kill him.
name: Trident

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iranian_peoples]Iranian[/url].

The Iranian people are an Indo-European ethnic-linguistic group that comprise the speakers of Iranian languages, a major branch of the Indo-European language family, as such forming a branch of the Indo-European-speaking people.
name: Iranian
Hypnotism
description:
This character becomes the target of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypnotism]hypnotism[/url].

Hypnosis is a mental state. It is usually induced by a procedure known as a hypnotic induction, which is commonly composed of a long series of preliminary instructions and suggestions. Hypnotic suggestions may be delivered by a hypnotist in the presence of the subject, or may be self-administered ("self-suggestion" or "autosuggestion").

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prison_officer]prison officer[/url], also known as corrections officer, correctional officer, detention officer or penal officer, is a person responsible for the supervision, safety, and security of prisoners in a prison, jail, or similar form of secure custody. Historically, terms such as jailer, jail guard, prison guard, and turnkey have also been used.

Corrections officers are responsible for the care, custody, and control of individuals who have been arrested and are awaiting trial while on remand or who have been convicted of a crime and sentenced to serve time in a prison or jail. They are also responsible for the safety and security of the facility itself. Most officers are employed by the government of the jurisdiction in which they operate, though some are employed by private companies.
name: Prison Guard
Guimpe
description:
A guimpe is a linen cloth, often starched, which covers the neck and shoulders of the wearer, sometimes the entire chest as well. It had been in common use among women of means throughout most of the Middle Ages but gradually fell out of fashion by the Renaissance. Its use persists to the present day among certain orders of nuns, who use it as part of their religious habit.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/07/48207.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/49/8949.jpg]Example 2[/url]

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Widow]widow[/url].

A widow is a woman whose spouse has died.
name: Widow
Inflated Belly
description: A character's belly is inflated during sexual play. This could be due to excessive amount of liquid was injected or insertion of over - sized objects through any orifice. It can be consensual or forced.

name: Athletics
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athletics_(sport)]athletics[/url], whether as a profession or as a hobby.

Athletics is a collection of sporting events that involve competitive running, jumping, throwing, and walking. The most common types of athletics competitions are track and field, road running, cross country running, and race walking.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychic]psychic[/url].

A psychic is a person who professes an ability to perceive information hidden from the normal senses through extrasensory perception (ESP), or is said by others to have such abilities.
name: Psychic
Ankle Bracelet
description:
This character wears an ankle [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bracelet]bracelet[/url].

An anklet (or an ankle bracelet) is an article of jewelry that is worn around the the ankle. Bracelets can be manufactured from metal, leather, cloth, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dadao]dadao[/url].

Based on agricultural knives, dadao have broad blades generally between two and three feet long, long hilts meant for "hand and a half" or two-handed use, and generally a weight-forward balance.
name: Dadao

description:
This character looks and acts like he/she is from a different country than the VN is set upon. For example if the VN was set in Japan, he/she'd be a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaijin]gaijin[/url].

Gaijin is a Japanese word meaning "non-Japanese", or "alien". This word is a short form of gaikokujin, which means "foreign country people".

This trait is intended to be used for characters that are clearly foreigners to the game's setting, according to the other characters from the game, but their country of origin is not revealed in any point, or just doesn't exists (anymore) in the real world. Making it not possible to use the other country traits but this.
name: Foreigner
Multiple Penises
description:
This character possesses two or more penises, either naturally or due to a temporary or permanent effect (magic, operation, etc...).

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/93/89293.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latex_clothing]latex clothing[/url].

Latex rubber as a clothing material is common in fetish fashion and among BDSM practitioners, and is often seen worn at fetish clubs. Latex is sometimes also used by couturiers for its dramatic appearance. Worn on the body it tends to be skin-tight, producing a "second skin" effect. There are several magazines dedicated to the use and wearing of it. Less commonly, latex clothing can be loose-fitting.
name: Latex

description:
Over-the-knee socks are hosiery that covers the feet and legs up to above the knee, but lower than the thigh-high socks, that almost reach the hips.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/07/81807.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Over The Knee Socks

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secretary]secretary[/url].

A secretary, or administrative assistant, is a person whose work consists of supporting management, including executives, using a variety of project management, communication & organizational skills. These functions may be entirely carried out to assist one other employee or may be for the benefit of more than one.

In other situations a secretary is an officer of a society or organization who deals with correspondence, admits new members and organizes official meetings and events.
name: Secretary
Projectile Weapons
description:
This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Projectile_weapons#Miscellaneous]projectile weapons[/url] family.

A projectile is any object projected into space (empty or not) by the exertion of a force. Although any object in motion through space (for example a thrown baseball) may be referred to as a projectile, the term more commonly refers to a weapon.

This character attempts to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rapes[/url] someone, but stops or gets stopped before penetration.

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

This trait should also be used on characters that the games give the option to not to proceed with the rape.
name: Rape Attempt

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pareo]pareo[/url].

The pāreu or pareo is the Cook Islands and Tahitian word for a wraparound skirt. Originally it was used only to refer to women's skirts, as men wore a loincloth, called a maro. Nowadays the term is applied to any piece of cloth worn wrapped around the body, worn by males or females.
name: Pareo
Human Subject Research
description:
This character is subjected to some experimental treatment. The goal of the research can be anything from curing a disease to developing super-solders. As long as the experiments are seemingly scientific in nature, and not magical, the trait applies. Whether said research and science would be feasible in real life or not is irrelevant.

Wikipedia article: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_subject_research

This character is left handed.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handedness]Left-handedness[/url] is the preference for the left hand over the right for everyday activities such as writing. In ancient times it was seen as a sign of the devil, and was abhorred in many cultures. A variety of studies suggest that 13% of the world population is left-handed.
name: Left Handed

description:
This character has an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olive_skin]olive skin tone[/url].

This is used to describe a character with a naturally tan-colored skin tone, darker than the typical anime character but not quite brown.
name: Olive
Genius
description:
The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genius]genius[/url], in one field at least if not many.

Genius is something or someone embodying exceptional intellectual ability, creativity, or originality, typically to a degree that is associated with the achievement of unprecedented insight.

Another character uses their fingers to stimulate this character's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vagina]vagina[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vulva]vulva[/url]. Apply [url=/i1595]i1595[/url] to the performing character.

[url=/i1633]Handjob[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a male receiver.
name: Vaginal Fingering

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neuroticism]neurotic[/url].

Feelings of anxiety, obsessional thoughts, compulsive acts, and physical complaints without objective evidence of disease, in various degrees and patterns, dominate the personality of neurotic characters.

It is an enduring tendency to experience negative emotional states. Individuals who score high on neuroticism are more likely than the average to experience such feelings as anxiety, anger, guilt, and depressed mood. They respond more poorly to environmental stress, and are more likely to interpret ordinary situations as threatening, and minor frustrations as hopelessly difficult.
name: Neuroticism

description:
This character draws manga.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mangaka]Mangaka[/url] (漫画家) is the Japanese word for a comic artist or cartoonist. Outside of Japan, manga usually refers to a Japanese comic book and mangaka refers to the author of the manga, who is usually Japanese. As of 2006, about 3000 professional mangaka were working in Japan.
name: Manga Artist
Loose Socks
description:
This character wears [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Loose_socks]loose socks[/url].

Loose socks are a style of baggy sock worn by Japanese high school girls. The two most popular styles are the traditional 2x2 rib knit and tube-style loose socks, which are thigh-high length tube socks worn pushed down around the ankles.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/88/90988.jpg]Example[/url]

name: Slit Skirt
description:
This character wears a slashed or slit skirt.

A slit or slashed skirt is a skirt with a slit or slashes that show the legs off.

[url=https://cdn.lulus.com/images/product/xlarge/1266218_195802.jpg]Slit Skirt[/url]
[url=http://sareesvilla.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Slashed-skirt-Sareesvilla.jpg]Slashed Skirt[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/70/89470.jpg]Sprite Example[/url]

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kama_(weapon)]kama[/url] is a traditional Filipino and Japanese farming implement similar to a sickle used for reaping crops and also employed as a weapon. The kama is often included in weapon training segments of karate, silat and in some Chinese martial arts and can be used singly or in pairs.
name: Kama

description:
This character acts [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/secretive]secretive[/url].

A secretive character is keeping an important secret, hiding something from the rest of the characters.

Based on the character he/she might not mind keeping it at all. But he/she might also be under great stress either due to worry that the secret will get out or might be battling the desire to tell it and be free.
name: Secretive
Kendo
description:
This character practices [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kendo]kendo[/url].

Kendo meaning "Way of The Sword", is a modern Japanese martial art of sword-fighting based on traditional samurai swordsmanship, or kenjutsu. Kendo is a physically and mentally challenging activity that combines strong martial arts values with sport-like physical elements.

name: Wedding Ring
description:
This character is seen wearing a wedding ring.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wedding_ring]wedding ring[/url] or wedding band is a metal ring indicating the wearer is married. Depending on the local culture, it is worn on the base of the right or the left ring finger.

This character wears one or a pair of hair accessories that cover the bun portion of a [URL=https://vndb.org/i16]bunned hairstyle[/URL].

Bun covers are usually worn over an [url=https://vndb.org/i17]odango hairstyle[/url].

[url=https://vndb.org/c48729]Example 1[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/c30801]Example 2[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/c22436]Example 3[/url]
name: Bun Covers
Parted to Side
description: This character has hair that is parted to the side. The hair is parted off center, creating bangs or a fringe that is uneven. Examples include Fate/Stay Night's [url=/c37]Ilya[/url] and Steins;Gate's [url=/c6496]Moeka[/url]. If the hair is parted on center, use the [url=/i1095]Parted in Middle[/url] trait.

name: Christian Priest
description:
This character is a priest for a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Priest#Christianity]Christian[/url] sect, ie, Catholic, Anglican, Orthodox.

A priest performs mass and takes care of a church.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chainsaw]chainsaw[/url].

A chainsaw is a portable mechanical saw, powered by electricity, compressed air, hydraulic power, or most commonly a two-stroke engine. It is used in activities such as tree felling, limbing, bucking, pruning, by tree surgeons to fell trees and remove branches and foliage, to fell snags and assist in cutting firebreaks in wildland fire suppression, and to harvest firewood. Chainsaws with specially designed bar and chain combinations have been developed as tools for use in chainsaw art. Specialist chainsaws are used for cutting concrete.
name: Chainsaw
Twin Buttjob
description:
This character is one of the performers of a twin buttjob. Apply i1936 to the receiving character.

This is a sexual act in which two women rub their butt together against a man's penis. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/46/88346.jpg]Example 1 NSFW[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/47/88347.jpg]Example 2 NSFW[/url]

A character with this trait wears a top hat, or has worn one for a significant portion of the game.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Top_hat]top hat[/URL] is a tall, flat-crowned, broad-brimmed hat, predominantly worn from the latter part of the 18th to the middle of the 20th century. As of the early 21st century, it is usually worn only with morning dress or white tie, in dressage, as servants' or doormen's livery, or as a fashion statement.
name: Top Hat
School Drama Club President
description:
This character is the president of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drama]drama[/url] club associated with a school.

Drama club exists to provide an opportunity for students interested in theater to learn the art of acting and be able to create a performance, starting with the script and ending with decorations. Students create requisite and clothes for the show on their own. However, the purchase of necessary materials is provided at the expense of a school. Club can give performances in school during festivals and holidays.

name: Hand Saw
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hand_saw]hand saw[/url].

Hand saws are used to cut pieces of wood into different shapes. This is usually done in order to join the pieces together and create a wooden object. They usually operate by having a series of sharp points of some substance that is harder than the wood being cut. The hand saw is a bit like a tenon saw, but with one flat, sharp edge.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pickaxe]pickaxe[/url].

A pickaxe or pick is a hand tool with a hard head attached perpendicular to the handle.
name: Pickaxe
Detachable
description:
This character's body completely or partially consist of the parts that can be detached, and even operate on their own as an option. The owner of such a body might be a robot composed of sections or some fantastic creature that may not even have visual confirmation of separable parts.

Note that this trait is for the cases when a character can detach their parts voluntarily, without any damage caused in the process.

name: Mafia
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mafia]mafia[/url] member.

The Mafia (also known as Cosa Nostra) is a criminal syndicate that emerged in the mid 19th century in Sicily. It is a loose association of criminal groups that share a common organizational structure and code of conduct. Each group, known as a "family", "clan", or "cosca", claims sovereignty over a territory in which it operates its rackets – usually a town or village or a neighbourhood (borgata) of a larger city.

name: Vietnamese
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vietnamese]Vietnamese[/url].

Vietnamese refers to a member of the Vietnamese people, persons from Vietnam or of Vietnamese descent.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heterochromia_iridum]heterochromia iridum[/url] (usually shortened to heterochromia). That is, their irises are different colours.

There are several types of heterochromia. In complete heterochromia, one iris is a different color from the other. In partial heterochromia or sectoral heterochromia, part of one iris is a different color from its remainder.

In visual novels, "heterochromia" usually refers to complete heterochromia. It may occur from natural causes, but is often indicative of a supernatural characteristic.

When using this trait, also include the traits for the individual eye colours.

For characters with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heterochromia#Central_heterochromia]central heterochromia[/url], use [url=https://vndb.org/i934]Central Heterochromia[/url] instead of this trait.
name: Heterochromia
Slit Dress
description:
This character wears a slashed or slit dress.

A slit or slashed dress is an elegant and provocative dress with a slit or slashes that show the legs off.

[url=http://www.merleonline.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/501x668/9df78eab33525d08d6e5fb8d27136e95/n/o/noble_chiffon_sweetheart_strapless_floor-length_thigh_slit_dress-3.jpg]Slit Dress[/url]
[url=http://picture-cdn.wheretoget.it/txvzsa-i.jpg]Slashed Skirt[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/71/89471.jpg]Sprite Example[/url]

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samurai]samurai[/url].

Samurai is the term for the military nobility of pre-industrial Japan. The samurai followed a set of rules that came to be known as Bushidou. This code is said to have emphasized virtues such as loyalty, honor, obedience, duty, filial piety, and self-sacrifice.
name: Samurai
Gauntlet
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gauntlet_%28glove%29]gauntlets[/url].

Gauntlet is a name for several different styles of glove, particularly those with an extended cuff covering part of the forearm.

These are characters that play a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wind_instrument]wind instrument[/url].

A wind instrument is a musical instrument that contains some type of resonator (usually a tube), in which a column of air is set into vibration by the player blowing into (or over) a mouthpiece set at the end of the resonator.

The pitch of the vibration is determined by the length of the tube and by manual modifications of the effective length of the vibrating column of air. In the case of some wind instruments, sound is produced by blowing through a reed; others require buzzing into a metal mouthpiece.
name: Wind Instruments
Young-adult
description:
This character has the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_physical_appearance]physical appearance[/url] of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/young-adult]young-adult[/url] of ages 20 to 39.

Note that this trait only signifies the physical appearance of this character, and it may not reflect actual age.

name: School Swimming Club Member
description:
This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_%28sport%29]swimming[/url] club associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Swimming is the self propulsion of a person through water or other liquid, for survival, recreation, sport, exercise or other reason.

This character has an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_height]average physical stature[/url].

As a guideline, we decided to list characters between the heights of 1.45m and 1.80m as average.
name: Average Height

description:
This character has an actual [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tail]tail[/url].

The tail is the section at the rear end of an animal's body; in general, the term refers to a distinct, flexible appendage to the torso. It is the part of the body that corresponds roughly to the sacrum and coccyx in mammals and birds.

While tails are primarily a feature of vertebrates, some invertebrates including scorpions and springtails, as well as snails and slugs, have tail-like appendages that are sometimes referred to as tails.

This trait is intended for characters that really have tails and should not be mixed with the clothing trait tail which refers to a clothing accessory.
name: Tail

description:
These are the traits about [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_positions]sex positions[/url]. These traits are for the penetrating partner(s). Traits for the penetrated partner(s) are under [url=/i92]i92[/url].

Sex positions are positions which people may adopt during or for the purpose of sexual intercourse or other sexual activities.

These traits may be applied not only to characters using these positions for vaginal sex, but also to characters using them for anal sex, pegging, tribadism (between lesbians), frot (between gays), or sex with a double ended dildo. Even though neither partner is penetrated in tribadism or frot, and both partners are penetrated in sex with a double ended dildo, use the matching traits under [url=/i43]Engages in (Sexual)[/url] > [url=/i1649]Sex Positions[/url] and [url=/i1625]Subject of (Sexual)[/url] > [url=/i92]Sex Positions[/url] to indicate which character was in which position.
name: Sex Positions
Female Ejaculation
description:
This character engages in the act of female ejaculation during the game.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Female_ejaculation]Female ejaculation[/url] refers to the expulsion of fluid by females from the paraurethral ducts through and around the urethra during or before an orgasm.

name: Pale
description: This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Light_skin#Light_skin]light skin tone[/url].

name: Tribadism on Penis
description:
This is a sexual act involving one man and two women. The women rub their vulvas together with the man's penis between them. The man may also take a more active role by thrusting his penis between their vulvas or by penetrating either of the women (or both of them alternately).

Apply this trait to the character having their penis rubbed. Apply [url=/i1134]i1134[/url] to the characters rubbing their vulvas on this character's penis.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/73/85273.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/70699.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/85274.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Different position.

name: Hanyou
description:
This character is a [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Hanyou]hanyou[/url].

Hanyous are mythological creatures with one youkai parent and one human parent.

name: Cheerful
description: This character is [URL=https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/cheerful]cheerful[/URL], seeming to always be in a good mood. They're happy and wear big, bright smiles.
This meta-trait is designed to gather all traits regarding characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religion]religious beliefs[/url] that came strongly forward during games' stories.
name: Religious Belief

description:
This character is the non-blood-related father of a character in this game.

This may be the result of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adoption[/url] or something similar.
name: Non-blood-related Father

description:
Clamps can be used to stimulate the body by applying varying degrees of pressure. Simple clothspins could be used to this end as well. The most common application is on the nipples, but clamps can be used on any other bodyparts as well.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/01/91001.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/00/91000.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Clamps (BDSM)

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baby_bottle]baby bottle[/url] is a bottle with a teat (also called a nipple in the US) to drink directly from. It is typically used by infants and young children when a mother does not breastfeed, or if someone cannot (as conveniently) drink from a cup, for feeding oneself or being fed.
name: Baby Bottle
Book
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stuffed_toy]book[/url].

A book is a set or collection of written, printed, illustrated, or blank sheets, made of paper, parchment, or other various material, usually fastened together to hinge at one side. 

Books may also refer to works of literature, or a main division of such a work. In library and information science, a book is called a monograph, to distinguish it from serial periodicals such as magazines, journals or newspapers.
This character has more than one braids.
name: Multiple Braids
Confinement in a Simulated Reality
description:
This character is confined in a [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simulated_reality]simulated reality[/URL], involuntarily or voluntarily.

While this trait applies to anybody confined in any kind of simulated reality, the "Lotus-Eater Machine" scenario refers to a specific variety of confinement in a simulated reality. In this, a character, usually the protagonist, is knocked out or goes to sleep and wakes up in their own personal paradise. In reality, they're being held prisoner by another character who, using technology, magic or other methods, induces very intense and very realistic hallucinations. Sometimes the lotus-eater doesn't know it's all fake. Sometimes they do know but don't care. [Edited from [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/LotusEaterMachine]TV Tropes[/url]]


NOTE: By the very nature of this trait, the majority- if not all- of its instances would be spoilers. Please apply spoilers accordingly.

name: Cursing
description:
This character tries to put a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curse]curse[/url] on someone, using his religious, magical or any other mystical powers.

Not to be mixed with the speech pattern of using vulgar language.

name: Genital Piercing
description:
This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genital_piercing]genital piercing[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genital_jewellery]genital jewellery[/url].

Genital piercing is a form of body piercing. It involves piercing a part of the genitalia, thus creating a suitable place for wearing different types of jewellery. Nevertheless, the term may also be used pars pro toto to indicate all body piercings in the area of anus, perineum, genitals and mons pubis, including piercings such as anal, guiche, and pubic that do not involve perforation of genitalia.
Genital jewellery, also known as sex jewellery and adult jewellery, is jewellery which is designed specifically for wear on or to accentuate the genitals.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/92/100592.jpg]NSFW Pussy Piercing[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/93/100593.jpg]NSFW Anal Piercing[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/94/100594.jpg]NSFW Balls Piercing[/url]

name: Greave
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greave]greave[/url] is a piece of armour that protects the leg. Greaves usually consisted of a metal exterior with an inner padding of felt.

This character is [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/stubborn]stubborn[/url].

Stubborn characters are unreasonably, often perversely unyielding and bullheaded. They are firmly resolved or determined and resolute. Characterized by their perseverance, they are difficult to treat or deal with and resistant to treatment or efforts.
name: Stubborn

description:
This character has orange hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Orange

description:
An [url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Harpy]harpy[/url] is a bird type monster, with the body of a girl and the legs of a bird, with big bird-like wings. Harpies can fly and for this reason boies are usually light and small.

Except for mating season, when they become aggrssive, harpies have bright and cheerful personalities.
name: Harpy

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agreeableness]agreeable[/url].

Friendly characters have a tendency to be pleasant and accommodating in social situations. They also have an optimistic view of human nature and tend to believe that most people are honest, decent, and trustworthy.
name: Friendly

description:
This character pilots [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mecha]mecha[/url].

Mechs (plural), or mech (singular) is a broad genre of vehicles (normally walking vehicles) which are usually controlled by a pilot.

Mechs often appear in anime, science fiction, and other genres involving fantastic or futuristic elements. Mechs are generally, though not necessarily, bipedal and are best described ad a mix between a tank and a robot. Some mechs have arms, hands, and fingers capable of grasping objects. A mech that approximates the shape of a human body may allow the use of martial arts movements and swordsmanship, ceremonial acts of honor, saluting, and other human mannerisms.
name: Mecha Pilot

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spirit]spirit[/url].

The spirit of a human being is the animating, sensitive or vital principle in that individual, similar to the soul taken to be the seat of the mental, intellectual and emotional powers. The notions of a person's "spirit" and "soul" often also overlap, as both contrast with body and both are imagined as surviving the bodily death in religion and occultism, and "spirit" can also have the sense of "ghost", i.e. manifestations of the spirit of a deceased person.
name: Spirit
Triple Boobjob
description:
A triple boobjob is performed on this character. Apply i1664 to the performing characters.

This is a sexual act in which three women rub their breasts against each other with a man's penis in the middle of them.

name: Turtleneck Dress
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]dress with a turtleneck[/url].

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) dress is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.

These are the traits about various [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports]sports[/url] that the characters engage in.

A sport is an organized, competitive, entertaining, and skillful activity requiring commitment, strategy, and fair play, in which a winner can be defined by objective means. It is governed by a set of rules or customs. 

Activities such as card games and board games, are classified as "mind sports" and some are recognized as Olympic sports, requiring primarily mental skills and mental physical involvement.

Non-competitive activities, for example as jogging or playing catch are usually classified as forms of recreation. Though you should still use these traits for characters if they practice them even if not in the form of a sport.

Please make a specific trait for the type of sport that characters engage in and use this trait only if that sport is unknown or does not exists in the real world.
name: Sports

description:
A character with this trait is a runaway, or becomes a runaway during the course of the story.

A [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Runaway_%28dependent%29]runaway[/URL] is a minor or a person under an arbitrary age, depending upon the local jurisdiction, who has left the home of the parent or legal guardian without permission.
name: Runaway
Upper Body Clothing
description: These are the traits for all kinds of clothing and accessories worn on the upper part of the body including arms, hands and neck.

This character suffers from a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phobia]phobia[/url].

A phobia is a type of anxiety disorder, defined by a persistent fear of an object or situation.
name: Phobia
Death Game Accessory
description:
This character wears a band- usually a collar or bracelet- with lethal functions designed to force them into participating in a death game.

The band is typically unable to be removed by the person who wears it, and is equipped with a mechanism that causes the person's death, such as exploding or injecting poison into their body.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crossbow]crossbow[/url].

A crossbow is a weapon consisting of a bow mounted on a stock that shoots projectiles, often called bolts or quarrels.
name: Crossbow

description: The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ji_%28halberd%29]ji[/url] (Chinese: 戟), or Chinese halberd, was an ancient pole arm used as a military weapon in one form or another from at least as early as the Shang dynasty until the end of the Qing dynasty. They are still used for training purposes by many Chinese martial arts.
name: Ji
Hacker
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hacker]hacker[/url].

A hacker is a person who delights in having an intimate understanding of the internal workings of a system, computers and computer networks in particular. 

Modern popular use of the term refers to people committed to circumvention of computer security. This primarily concerns unauthorized remote computer break-ins via a communication networks such as the Internet (Black hats), but also includes those who debug or fix security problems (White hats), and the morally ambiguous Grey hats.

name: Host(ess)
description:
This character works at a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Host_club]hostess club[/url].

A host / hostess light cigarettes, pour drinks, offer flirtatious conversation and perform to entertain the customers.

This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piledriver_%28sexual%29]piledriver[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrating partner and apply [url=/i810]i810[/url] to the penetrated partner.

In this position the receiving partner lies on their head and upper body with their legs and hips up, while the penetrating partner stands above.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/84174.jpg]Example[/url] - Lesbians using double-ended dildo.
name: Piledriver

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Criminal]criminal[/url].

A criminal is a character that violates the law. Crime is the breach of rules or laws for which some governing authority (via mechanisms such as legal systems) can ultimately prescribe a conviction.
name: Criminal

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bodyguard]bodyguard[/url].

A bodyguard is a type of security operative or government agent who protects a person—usually a famous, wealthy, or politically important figure—from assault, kidnapping, assassination, stalking, loss of confidential information, terrorist attack or other threats.
name: Bodyguard

description:
This character is someone of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honor]honor[/url].

A honorable character acts in accordance with principles of honor, with dignity, distinction, and an illustrious, noble and distinguished way.

There are many definitions to being honorable, some are:

The Bushido code of the samurai that is said to have emphasized virtues such as loyalty, honor, obedience, duty, filial piety, and self-sacrifice.

Chivalry of medieval knights with ideals of knightly virtues, honor and courtly love, pride aspiring to beauty, and formalized pride giving rise to a conception of honor, which is states as the pole of noble life.

It should be noted that the principle idea is not being "good", but being "just" and "true to one's word" and in that sense even criminal organizations such as Yakuza consider themselves honorable.

This trait is intended to be used for characters that make it into a habit to mention that they are honorable, bound by a code of honor like Bushido or chivalry, just, fair, true-to-their-word, etc. And should not be applied to every character that looks honest.
name: Honorable
Voyeurism
description:
This character engages in voyeurism.

Usually it means that this character secretly observes another character particularly in intimate situations, during changing clothes, sexual intercourse, etc. The victim may or may not know about this.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian]Russian[/url].

Russians are an ethnic group of the East Slavic people, primarily living in Russia and neighboring countries.
name: Russian

description:
This character performs kneepit sex. Apply i1975 to the receiving character.

Kneepit sex is a non-penetrative sexual act where the penis is thrusted inside a person's kneepit.

[url=https://cdn.luscious.net/images/977/lusciousnet_bbb6f58e552703f6f48684b_152844634.640x0.jpg]Example 1 NSFW[/url], [url=https://cdn.luscious.net/images/246/lusciousnet_ed72be6c08b3e634fb5bc8b_1754450519.640x0.jpeg]Example 2 NSFW[/url]
name: Kneepit Sex

description:
Refusing to be told what to do or how to act, these characters will regularly lash out at authority, either passively or overtly, and often times reject the accepted mores of society. Examples of rebellious behavior include skipping school, smoking cigarettes, and getting into frequent arguments with authority figures such as teachers and parents.

Note that the motivation behind their behavior is important. Not all smokers or school skippers, or smoking school skippers, are rebellious. Their actions have to be primarily motivated purely by the will to defy.
name: Rebellious
Assertive
