description: This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assertiveness]assertive[/url] and takes the initiative in romantic and/or sexual pursuits.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vest]vest[/url].

A relationship breakup, often referred to simply as a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breakup]breakup[/url], is the termination of an intimate relationship by any means other than death. The act is commonly termed "dumping [someone]" in slang when it is initiated by one partner or "getting dumped by [someone]" for the partner on the receiving end.

Resurrection
description:
This character returns from the death, in other words gets [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Resurrection]resurrected[/url].

Resurrection refers to the literal coming back to life of the biologically dead. It is used both with respect to particular individuals or the belief in a General Resurrection of the dead at the end of the world. The General Resurrection is featured prominently in Jewish, Christian, and Muslim scriptures. The death and resurrection of Jesus is the central focus of Christianity.

The term, while acceptable in certain religious and spiritual contexts, is typically not used in medical circles to describe the return to life of one who was clinically dead, although rare extreme cases are properly classified scientifically as examples of the 'Lazarus syndrome', a term originating from the Biblical resurrection story.

description:

A crown is the traditional symbolic form of headgear worn by a monarch or by a deity, for whom the crown traditionally represents power, legitimacy, immortality, righteousness, victory, triumph, resurrection, honour and glory of life after death. In art the crown may be shown being offered to those on Earth by angels. Apart from the traditional form, crowns also may be made of, for example, flowers, stars, oak leaves or thorns and be worn by others, representing what the coronation part aims to symbolize with the specific crown. They often contain jewels.

These traits are intended for events that characters survive with a wound and does not apply if they die during that scene or they magically heal shortly afterwards.

This may be done for ransom or in furtherance of another crime, or in connection with a child custody dispute.

This trait is intended for rape scenes that involve penetration, ones that reach finality. For the scenes that stop before penetration use the "Rape Attempt" trait.

name: Stalking
description:
The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stalking]stalking[/url].

Stalking is a term commonly used to refer to unwanted, obsessive attention by individuals (and sometimes groups of people) to others.
Stalking can be defined as the willful and repeated following, watching, and / or harassing of another person. Most of the time, the purpose of stalking is to attempt to force a relationship with someone who is unwilling or otherwise unavailable. Unlike other crimes, which usually involve one act, stalking is a series of actions that occur over a period of time. Although stalking is illegal, the actions that contribute to stalking are legal, such as gathering information, calling someone on the phone, sending gifts, emailing or instant messaging. Such actions by themselves are not usually abusive, but can become abusive when frequently repeated over time.

The harmonica, also called harp, French harp, blues harp, and mouth organ, is a free reed wind instrument used primarily in blues and American folk music, jazz, country music, and rock and roll.

It is played by blowing air into it or drawing air out by placing lips over individual holes (reed chambers) or multiple holes. The pressure caused by blowing or drawing air into the reed chambers causes a reed or multiple reeds to vibrate up and down creating sound. Each chamber has multiple, variable-tuned brass or bronze reeds, which are secured at one end and loose on the other end, with the loose end vibrating and creating sound.

A queen consort is the wife of a reigning king. A queen consort usually shares her husband's rank and holds the feminine equivalent of the king's monarchical titles. Historically, queen consorts do not share the king regent's political and military powers. Most queens in history were queens consort.

Singapore, officially the Republic of Singapore, is a southeast asian city-state off the southern tip of the Malay Peninsula, 137 kilometers north of the equator. An island country made up of 63 islands, it is separated from Malaysia by the Straits of Johor to its north and from Indonesia's Riau Islands by the Singapore Strait to its south. The country is highly urbanised with very little primary rainforest remaining, although more land is being created for development through land reclamation.

This character identifies as a non-binary gender.

Non-Binary Genders are gender identities that don't fit within the accepted binary of male and female. People can feel they are both, neither, or some mixture thereof.

This is regardless of their physical sex or the way they present. Use the [url=http://vndb.org/i737]Futanari[/url] to mark that.

Please don't use this trait for characters of unconfirmed gender. This trait is only for characters officially confirmed to be of non-binary gender.

Please only use this trait for formal sex education teachers (for instance, somebody teaching an inexperienced partner "what to do" in a sexual situation doesn't count).

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wind_instrument]wind instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that contains some type of resonator (usually a tube), in which a column of air is set into vibration by the player blowing into (or over) a mouthpiece set at the end of the resonator. The pitch of the vibration is determined by the length of the tube and by manual modifications of the effective length of the vibrating column of air. In the case of some wind instruments, sound is produced by blowing through a reed; others require buzzing into a metal mouthpiece.
name: Wind Instruments

Cold-hearted characters act in a way that is lacking sympathy or feeling. They are usually indifferent to the plight of others and unkind.

This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tennis]tennis[/url].

Tennis is a sport usually played between two players (singles) or between two teams of two players each (doubles). Each player uses a racket that is strung to strike a hollow rubber ball covered with felt over a net into the opponent's court.

Tennis is an Olympic sport and is played at all levels of society at all ages. The sport can be played by anyone who can hold a racket, including people in wheelchairs.
name: Tennis

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coming_out]comes out of the closet[/url].

Coming out of the closet, or simply coming out, is a figure of speech for lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and asexual (LGBT) people's self-disclosure of their sexual orientation (or lack of) and/or gender identity.
name: Coming Out

description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bindle]bindle[/url] is a stick with cloth or a blanket tied around one end for carrying items, with the entire array being carried over the shoulder.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wand]wand[/url].

A wand is a thin, straight, hand-held stick of wood, stone, ivory, or metal. Generally, in modern language, wands are ceremonial and/or have associations with magic but there have been other uses, all stemming from the original meaning as a synonym of rod and virge, both of which had a similar development. A stick giving length and leverage is perhaps the earliest and simplest of tools.

Red is probably the rarest eye color amongst the human population of the world. It is mainly seen in case of albinos and is the result of either large quantities of the "normally scarce" red areas in the eyes or a small leakage of blood into the iris.

This character has a rather large, shapely, ample posterior, usually accompanied by curvacious and enticing hips and thighs.

It is a leotard but it looks kinkier than a traditional leotard and more functional to the purpose of having sex since it doesn't need to be removed to achieve vaginal and anal insertion.

name: Teasing
description:
This character becomes target of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teasing]teasing[/url].

Teasing comes in two major forms, playful and hurtful. When teasing is playful and friendly, and especially when it is reciprocal, teasing can be regarded as flirting.

People may be teased on such matters as their appearance, weight, behavior, abilities, and clothing. From the victim's point-of-view, this kind of teasing is often hurtful, irrespective of the intention of the teaser.

When teasing is unwelcome, it may be regarded as harassment or mobbing, especially in the work place, or as a form of bullying or emotional abuse. If done in public, it may be regarded as humiliation.

It is the opposite of [url=/i917]Tareme[/url].

description:
This character has stretched/extended nipples due to a temporary or permanent effect (magic, operation, experiment, etc...).

Nipples are streched/enlarged to an abnormal size; usually nipple start to look grotesque from 2-3 centimeters of length.

Note: in case of normal breast enlargement use [url=https://vndb.org/i1173]Breast Expansion[/url] instead.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superhuman]superhuman[/url].

Superhuman can mean an improved human, for example, by genetic modification, cybernetic implants, or as what humans might evolve into, in the distant future.

Occasionally, it could mean an otherwise "normal" human with unusual abilities, such as psychic abilities, flying abilities, unimaginable strength or exceptional proficiency at something, far beyond the norm.
name: Superhuman

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netball]netball[/url].

Netball is a ball sport played by two teams of seven players. Its development, derived from early versions of basketball, began in England in the 1890s.

Games are played on a rectangular court with raised goal rings at each end. Each team attempts to score goals by passing a ball down the court and shooting it through its goal ring. Players are assigned specific positions, which define their roles within the team and restrict their movement to certain areas of the court. During general play, a player with the ball can hold onto it for only three seconds before shooting for a goal or passing to another player. The winning team is the one that scores the most goals. Netball games are 60 minutes long. Variations have been developed to increase the game's pace and appeal to a wider audience.
name: Netball

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Procuring_(prostitution)]pimp[/url] or [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=madame]madame[/url].

The PIMP abbreviation stands for "Person Into Marketing Prostitutes", thus, it's an agent for hookers who receives part of the money earned by prostitutes in return for advertising services, physical protection, or for providing, and possibly monopolizing a location where the prostitute may engage clients.
According to different versions, "madame" may be a female version of pimp, as well as the owner and manager of brothel, who hires the pimps and prostitutes.
name: Pimp

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swedish_people]Swedish[/url].

Swedes are a nation and ethnic group native to Sweden, mostly inhabiting Sweden and the other Nordic countries, with descendants living in a number of countries.
name: Swedish

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indian_people]Indian[/url] (from India).

Indian people or Indians are people who are citizens of India, which forms a major part of South Asia, containing 17.31% of the world's population. The Indian nationality is in essence made up of many distinct regional ethno-linguistic groups, reflecting the rich and complex history of India. India, in its current boundaries, was formed out of a number of predecessors.

Do not mix with Native Americans who are sometimes also referred as Indians.
name: Indian

description:
Cowardice is a trait wherein fear and excess self-concern override what is socially deemed as right and courageous—it is the opposite of courage. As a label, "cowardice" indicates a perceived failure to show enough mental robustness and courage in the face of a challenge.

Under many military codes of justice, cowardice in combat is a crime punishable by death (e.g. shot at dawn). The term describes a personality trait which is seen as a negative characteristic and has been shunned and disdained (see norms) within most, if not all cultures, whilst courage, typically viewed as its direct opposite, is generally rewarded and encouraged.

Do not confuse with timid, which does not possess the abovementioned negative connotations. Timidity is closer to a general lack of self-confidence, and it is possible for a character to be a coward while lacking timidty (e.g.: c41).
name: Coward

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Misandry]misandrist[/url] (one who hates men).

Misandry is the hatred or dislike of men or boys. Misandry is the antonym of philandry, the fondness, love, or admiration of men. Misandry is a back-formation from misogyny, the hatred or dislike of women.
name: Misandrist
Autobukkake
description: This character ejaculates onto their own face or body, often multiple times, covering themself in their own semen.

These are the roles associated with a  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religion]religion[/url].

Religion is a cultural system that creates powerful and long-lasting meaning, by establishing symbols that relate humanity to truths and values.
name: Religious Roles
Eyepatch
description:
The character with this trait has an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eyepatch]eyepatch[/url]. He or she doesn't necessarily have to be blind in that eye, only requirement is that the character wears it enough to be associated with it.

An eyepatch is a small patch that is worn in front of one eye. It may be a cloth patch attached around the head by an elastic band or by a string, or an adhesive bandage. It is often worn by people to cover a lost or injured eye, but it also has a therapeutic use in children for the treatment of amblyopia.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Friend#Types_of_friendships]comrade[/url] of someone.

Comradeship is the feeling of affinity that draws people together in time of war or when people have a mutual enemy or even a common goal. Friendship can be mistaken for comradeship. As a war ends, or a common enemy recedes, many comrades return to being strangers, who lack friendship and have little in common.
name: Comrade

description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cupid]cupid[/url], god of love. The character may have the iconic bow and arrow to create love between people.
name: Cupid

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archaeology]archeologist[/url].

An archeologist is someone dealing in the study of  archeology. 
Archeology is the study of human activity in the past, primarily through the recovery and analysis of the material culture and environmental data that they have left behind, which includes artifacts, architecture, biofacts and cultural landscapes.
name: Archeologist
Amber
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eye_colors#Amber]amber eyes[/url].

Amber eyes are of a solid color and have a strong yellowish/golden and russet/coppery tint. It is a very rare eye color and also known as ‘wolf eyes’, since amber eye color is very common in wolves.

name: Serial Killer
description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serial_killer]serial killer[/url].

A serial killer is a person who murders three or more people over a period of more than thirty days, with a "cooling off" period between each murder.

name: Rape on Defeat
description: This character rapes another character after defeating them in some way (battle, game, etc).

name: Scalpel
description:
This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scalpel]scalpel[/url].

A scalpel, or lancet, is a small and extremely sharp bladed instrument used for surgery, anatomical dissection, and various arts and crafts (called a hobby knife). Scalpels may be single-use disposable or re-usable. Re-usable scalpels can have attached, resharpenable blades or, more commonly, non-attached, replaceable blades. Disposable scalpels usually have a plastic handle with an extensible blade (like a utility knife) and are used once, then the entire instrument discarded. Scalpel blades are usually individually packed in sterile pouches but are also offered non-sterile.

name: Pacifist
description:
This character is a follower or believes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacifism]pacifism[/url].

Pacifism is the opposition to war and violence.

The character does not like war or fighting. Preferring a non-violent, non-confrontational method to settle disputes.

name: Councillor
description:
This character is a councillor of a local government.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Councillor]councillor[/url] (Cllr, Coun, Clr or Cr for short) is a member of a local government council, such as a city council.
Often in the United States, the title is councilman or councilwoman.

name: Submachine Gun
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Submachine_gun]submachine gun[/url].

A submachine gun is an automatic carbine, designed to fire pistol cartridges. It combines the automatic fire of a machine gun with the cartridge of a pistol. An assault rifle, in contrast, uses an intermediate-power cartridge with more power than a pistol but less than a standard rifle or battle rifle.

name: Shared Body
description:
This person (or persons, rather) consists of multiple entities residing within the same vessel.

Note: Do not confuse this with the [url=http://vndb.org/i275]Split Personality[/url], which is exclusively a mental issue.

name: Machine Gun
description:
The character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Machine_gun]machine gun[/url].

A machine gun is a fully automatic mounted or portable firearm, usually designed to fire rounds in quick succession from an ammunition belt or large-capacity magazine, typically at a rate of several hundred rounds per minute.

This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seventh_Posture]seventh posture[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrating partner and apply [url=/i496]i496[/url] to the penetrated partner.

The receiving partner lies on their side, or on their back with their hips slightly rotated. The penetrating partner straddles the receiver's lower leg and faces them. The receiver's upper leg is lifted onto the crook of the penetrating partner's elbow or onto their shoulder.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/53/79853.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/24/7724.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/28/25528.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Lesbians engaging in tribadism
name: Seventh Posture
Shinai
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shinai]shinai[/url].

Shinai is a weapon used for practice and competition in kendo representing a Japanese sword.

The shinai comprises four slats known as take, usually made from dried bamboo, which are held together by three leather fittings: a hilt, or handle fitting; a fitting at the tip and a leather strip that binds the four slats. The parts are all secured with a string.

name: Yamata no Orochi
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yamata_no_Orochi]Yamata no Orochi[/url] is a gigantic dragon/serpent with eight heads and eight tails and red eyes. Its body is long enough to cover eight peaks and valleys, and it's covered with moss and trees. Its belly is inflamed and smeared with blood.

These are the role traits associated with characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Career]careers[/url].

Career is an individual's course or progress through life (or a distinct portion of life). It is usually considered to pertain to remunerative work (and sometimes also formal education).

While most of these traits can be used for either of the cases, there are some exceptions. For example the cook and cooking traits; while a lot of characters engage in cooking during stories, only a few are actually professional cooks. Users should keep these in mind while applying these traits.
name: Careers

description:
This character engages in explicit sexual conversations/fantasies over the telephone with someone else. Both parties have to be aware of the sexual nature of the phone call.

If the character has sex while on the phone but tries to hide that from the person on the other end of the line, use [url=https://vndb.org/i1840]Discreet Phone Sex[/url] instead.
name: Consensual Phone Sex
School Archery Club President
description:
This character is the leader of a student club.

A school archery club president leads the members of the student club in day to day training and prepares them for competitions.

name: Gas Mask
description:
This character wears a gas mask.

The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gas_mask]gas mask[/url] is a mask used to protect the user from inhaling airborne pollutants and toxic gases. The mask forms a sealed cover over the nose and mouth, but may also cover the eyes and other vulnerable soft tissues of the face.

name: Turtleneck Shirt
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]shirt with a turtleneck[/url].

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) shirt is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.

name: Discipline Committee Member
description:
This character is a member of his/her school's discipline committee.

A discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.

This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whip]whip[/url].

The word whip describes two basic types of tools:-

A long stick-like device, usually slightly flexible, with a small bit of leather or cord, called a "popper" or a "cracker," on the end. Depending on length and flexibility, this type is often called a riding whip, riding crop or "bat". It is also sometimes called a "horsewhip" or "horse whip".

The other type of whip is a long tapered flexible length of single-strand or plaited (braided) material (usually leather) with a stiff handle. Some whips of this type include the bullwhip and the stockwhip. Each design has many variations and lengths for different purposes, often with different names.

As well as these traditional whip types designed for use on animals, there are whip designs that had historic uses for inflicting pain on humans, such as the "cat o' nine tails", knout and others. These devices are used as flogging instruments, a means of control, corporal punishment or torture.
name: Whip

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pessimism]pessimist[/url].

Pessimism is a state of mind in which one anticipates undesirable outcomes or believes that the evil or hardships in life outweighs the good or luxuries.
These characters typically expect everything to go wrong, often depressing others.
name: Pessimist

description:
This character, futanari or male with tits, is performing a boobjob on himself. Usually to do so the penis must be huge.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/19/85819.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Auto-Boobjob
Criminal Organizations
description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Criminal_syndicate]criminal syndicate[/url].

Organized crime or criminal organizations are transnational, national, or local groupings of highly centralized enterprises run by criminals for the purpose of engaging in illegal activity, most commonly for monetary profit. Some criminal organizations, such as terrorist organizations, are politically motivated. Gangs may become "disciplined" enough to be considered "organized". An organized gang or criminal set can also be referred to as a mob.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exorcist]exorcist[/url].

In some religions, an exorcist is a person who is believed to be able to cast out the devil or other demons. A priest, a nun, a monk, a healer, a shaman or other specially prepared or instructed person can be an exorcist. An exorcist is a person who performs the ridding of demons or other supernatural beings who are alleged to have possessed a person, or (sometimes) a building or even an object.
name: Exorcist

description: The character has wings which are feathered like a bird. These are typical with characters of an angelic or divine nature.
name: Feathery Wings
Sex with Others
description:
This character has a sex scene with someone other than the protagonist.

Don't use this trait for group sex scenes that the protagonist is also a part of.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wrinkle]wrinkles[/url] somewhere on their body, especially on the face.

A wrinkle is a fold, ridge or crease in the skin. Skin wrinkles typically appear as a result of aging processes, habitual sleeping positions, loss of body mass, or temporarily, as the result of prolonged immersion in water. Age wrinkling in the skin is promoted by habitual facial expressions, aging, sun damage, smoking, poor hydration, and various other factors.
name: Wrinkles

description: This character uses (voluntarily or not) a vibrator in secret during everyday activities. For example, while at work, while at school, or while walking in public.
name: Hidden Vibrator

description:
These are the traits for the characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moustache]moustache[/url].

A moustache is facial hair grown on the outer surface of the upper lip.
name: Moustache

description:
These characters use "jibun" (自分), one of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Literally means "oneself". Can also be used as casual second person in the Kansai dialect.
name: Jibun

description:
This character is sexually stimulated in a non-penetrative way by one or more long appendages (tails, tentacles, roots, etc.) of another character. Apply i1909 to the character performing the stimulation.

A tail/tentacle/root job is a non-penetrative sexual act where a character use one or more of his appendages to rub a penis or suck it.

Avoid using this trait when the tail/tentacle/root is used to penetrate anus, vagina or urethra and becomes penetrative sex, use i704 or i654 instead. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/69/88369.jpg]NSFW Example Tailjob[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/68/88368.jpg]NSFW Rootjob/Flowerjob[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/67/88367.jpg]NSFW Example Tentaclejob[/url]
name: Tailjob

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Driving]driver[/url].

Driving is the controlled operation and movement of a land vehicle, such as a car, truck or bus.

This trait should be used for professional drivers, not every character with driving related scenes.
name: Driver

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infection]infected[/url] with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virus]virus[/url].

An infection is the colonization of a host organism by parasite species. Infecting parasites seek to use the host's resources to reproduce, often resulting in disease.

A virus is a small infectious agent that can replicate only inside the living cells of organisms. Most viruses are too small to be seen directly with a light microscope.
name: Viral Infection

description:
This character is violent.

Violent characters prefer the usage physical force or power against others that can result in injuries, death, physiological scars or other forms of serious harm.
name: Violent

description:
This character wears a skirtall.

Skirtalls are like overalls except that the bottom of the garment resembles a skirt.
name: Skirtall

description:
This character is subject of tickling torture.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tickle_torture]Tickle torture[/url] is the use of tickling to abuse, dominate, humiliate or even "prank" someone. The victim laughs even if he or she finds the experience unpleasant because the laughter is an innate reflex rather than social conditioning. Tickle torture can either be consensual or forced, depending on the circumstances. 

If tickle torture is consensual, it is usually done as a part of some sort of sexual ritual or another mode of affection. Forced tickle torture can either be used for mild interrogation purposes or simply for a harmless method of dominating someone.


[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/74/103074.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/75/103075.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Tickle Torture
Competition
description:
This character participates in the competitions.

Competition is the official sporting or intellectual confrontation between several people or teams for the right to receive a prize, fame and/or moral satisfaction. This may be the internal contest of several school clubs as well as the big event like Olympic Games.

Please note that the small non-official contests and disputes are not count for this trait.

name: Non-consensual Porn Production
description: This character engages in creating a pornographic production against the subject's will.

This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tea_ceremony]tea ceremony[/url] club associated with a school.

Students involved in such a club may learn and practice how to prepare and drink tea in a traditional way.
name: School Tea Ceremony Club Member
Pig Cosplay
description:
This character is seen wearing a pig costume/dress.

The key parts of a pig costume/dress are (not all necessary for trait to apply): pig ears (headband, hood, hat, etc...), pig tail, pig paw gloves, a pink costume (leotard, stocking, gloves, etc...) resembling pig skin.

The form of the costume itself can vary, depending on its nature. In case of a sexy dress, it can be a leotard, or just underwear with pig design stockings. In case a dress aimed for children (like for a masquerade) can be pyjama-like in design, covering the entire body.

In case of sexual roleplay use it in conjunction with [URL=https://vndb.org/i2458]Sexual Animal Cosplay[/URL] and [url=https://vndb.org/i1370]Petplay[/url] (if applicable).

Pig costume: 
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/77/101277.jpg]Example[/url]
Sexy pig costumes:
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/79/101279.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/78/101278.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

name: Scar
description:
This character has a visible [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scar]scar[/url].

A scar results from the biologic process of wound repair in the skin and other tissues of the body. Thus, scarring is a natural part of the healing process. With the exception of very minor lesions, every wound (e.g. after accident, disease, or surgery) results in some degree of scarring. An exception to this is animals with regeneration, which do not form scars and the tissue will grow back exactly as before.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assault]assaults[/url] another character.

Assault is a crime of violence against another person. The specific meaning of assault varies between countries, but can refer to an act that causes another to apprehend immediate and personal violence, or in the more limited sense of a threat of violence caused by an immediate show of force.

Assault is often defined to include not only violence, but any intentional physical contact with another person without their consent.

This trait is intended to be used in situations that the victim can't or doesn't fight back, at least on an equal level to make the situation more of a fight then an attack. In the other case, please use the Fighting trait.
name: Assault
Stutter
description: This character speaks with a stutter. [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stuttering]Stuttering[/url], also known as stammering, is a speech disorder in which the flow of speech is disrupted by involuntary repetitions and prolongations of sounds, syllables, words or phrases as well as involuntary silent pauses or blocks in which the person who stutters is unable to produce sounds.

name: Hero
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hero]hero[/url].

Hero refer to characters who, in the face of danger and adversity or from a position of weakness, display courage and the will for self sacrifice—that is, heroism—for some greater good of all humanity. This definition originally referred to martial courage or excellence but extended to more general moral excellence.

This trait is for characters moral quality and should not be mixed with their roles in games such as a protagonist or hero/heroine of a VN.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cravat]cravat[/url].

A cravat is a neckband, this term applied to any long-strip neckcloth that was not a ruff. The ruff, a starched, pleated white linen strip, can also be a bib, or a napkin. A band can be either a plain, attached shirt collar or a detachable "falling band" that draped over the doublet collar.
name: Cravat
Singing
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singing]singing[/url].

Singing is the act of producing musical sounds with the voice, and augments regular speech by the use of both tonality and rhythm. One who sings is called a singer or vocalist. Singers perform music known as songs that can be sung either with or without accompaniment by musical instruments.

name: Clothing with Ribbons
description:
This character wears clothing decorated with ribbons.

A ribbon or a thin band of flexible material, typically cloth but also plastic or sometimes metal, used primarily for binding and tying. In this case, a cloth or plastic ribbon is used as a clothing decoration or a fashion item.

This character is the non-blood-related son of a character in this game.

This may be the result of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adoption[/url] or something similar.
name: Non-blood-related Son

description: This character enters an area where he does not have a permission to be. This can be through sneaking, the use of disguises, fake IDs and so forth. Generally the aim is to get in and to stay undetected while inside.
name: Infiltration

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jumpsuit]jumpsuit[/url].

Jumpsuit originally referred to the utilitarian one-piece garments used by parachuters/skydivers, but has come to be used as a common term for any one-piece garment with sleeves and legs.

The original skydivers' jumpsuits were simple garments designed to insulate the body from the cold of high altitudes and minimize risk of covering important handles and grips. Today, however, the garment has found other use.

Now its being used by pilots, drivers, sportspersons and tradesmen, such as cleaners, auto mechanics and plumbers as a means of protective clothing. It also finds use as a institutional uniform and clothing for children.
name: Jumpsuit

description:
A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prisoner]prisoner[/URL], also known as an inmate or detainee, is a person who is deprived of liberty against their will. 

This can be by confinement, captivity, or by forcible restraint. 

The term applies particularly to those on trial or serving a prison sentence in a prison.
name: Prisoner

description:
A character with this personality trait is often jealous of others.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jealousy]Jealousy[/URL] is an emotion, and the word typically refers to the negative thoughts and feelings of insecurity, fear, and anxiety over an anticipated loss of something of great personal value, particularly in reference to an existing connection. Jealousy often consists of a combination of emotions such as anger, resentment, inadequacy, helplessness and disgust.

Though jealous is used synonymously with [url=http://vndb.org/i1283]Envious[/url] in modern English, the two words are different.
name: Jealous

description:
This character becomes the victim of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rape[/url] attempt, but the perpetrator stops or gets stopped before penetration.

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

This trait is intended to be used on characters that the games give the option to not to proceed with the rape or ones that gets interrupted somehow.

This trait doesn't require the said attempt to have any erotic components such as CG's and it can only appear as a part of the script when avoided.
name: Rape Attempt

description:
This character has some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoke_bomb]smoke bombs[/url].

Smoke bombs can be used to create a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoke_screen]smoke screen[/url], as a ground-to-ground or ground-to-air signaling devices, fireworks, etc. Smoke bombs are normally considered non-lethal, although incorrect use may cause death.
name: Smoke Grenade
Rape by Proxy
description: This character is forced by to perform sexual acts, via threats of violence or other means of coercion. However, the forcing people are not physically involved in the rape itself.

name: Ambassador
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ambassador]ambassador[/url].

An ambassador is the highest ranking diplomat who represents a nation and is usually accredited to a foreign sovereign or government, or to an international organization.

The act of escaping prison, jail, solitary confinement (or any form of confinement for that matter), or escaping in general. This trait can also be applied to escaping in any form as long as the person is either imprisoned (Example: jail) or confined in a way that it is imprisonment (Example: tied up and locked in a basement)

Successfully or unsuccessfully doesn't matter as long as an attempt to escape was made.
name: Escape From Confinement
Shapeshifting
description:
This character has the ability to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shapeshifting]shapeshift[/url] into something else.

Shapeshifting is a common theme in mythology and folklore as well as in science fiction and fantasy. In its broadest sense, it is when a being has the ability to alter its physical appearance. The transformation may be purposeful or not, depending on whether it has been the subject of a curse or spell. In some folklore, once the shapeshifter has become transformed, it becomes progressively more difficult for it to return to its original form.

Unlike metamorphosis, shapeshifting is not permanent and shapeshifter can change back.

This trait refers to changing the shape of the whole body and in that context do not cover partial transformations such as turning one's hands into claws.

name: Rope Bondage Harness
description:
This character is seen wearing a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bondage_rope_harness]rope bondage harness[/url].

A rope bondage harness, sometime also referred to as a bondage web, rope web, rope dress or karada, is a rope bondage technique which involves the tying of an intricate structure of rope around the body in a complex web-like fashion. A rope harness is similar in effect to a leather bondage harness, in that both are not in themselves normally used to bind a person, but are used to apply pressure over the area bound and can provide securing points for other bondage techniques, including suspension bondage.

Use this trait for ROPE bondage harness in case of LEATHER bondage harness use i846.
Leather Bondage Harness: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/38/97838.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/36/97836.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
Rope Bondage Harness: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/40/97840.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/37/97837.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

Note: Wearing a rope bondage harness with a high chance involve trait i2025 so it can be used in conjunction with this trait but remeber that there are many cases where i2025 does not involve wearing a rope bondage harness. [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/39/97839.jpg]NSFW Example Rope Bondage without Rope Bondage Harness[/url]

name: Twin Footjob
description:
A twin footjob is performed on this character. Apply i1920 to the performing character.

This is a sexual act in which two women rub their feet against a man's penis. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/63/88363.jpg]NSWF Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/88362.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

This character has sex while being suspended above the floor. Apply this trait on the bound partner.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspension_bondage]Suspension bondage[/url] is a form of sexual bondage where a bound person is hung from one or more overhead suspension points.
name: Suspended Sex
Armpit Sex
description:
Armpit sex is performed on this character. Apply i1779 to the performing character.

Armpit sex is a non-penetrative sexual act where the penis is thrusted inside a woman's armpit.

[url=https://hitomi.la/reader/629663.html#161]Example NSFW[/url]

name: Priestess
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Priest]priestess[/url].

A priest or priestess is one authorized to perform the sacred rites of a religion, especially as a mediatory agent between humans and deities. They also have the authority or power to administer religious rites; in particular, rites of sacrifice to, and propitiation of, a deity or deities.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cape]cape[/url].

A cape is any sleeveless outer garment, such as a poncho, but usually it is a long garment that covers only the back half of the wearer, fastening around the neck.
name: Cape

description: The person is almost murdered by another human (or humans) during the story. i.e. The person is almost strangled to death but is released before death or the person is shot (in the head for example) but manages to survive. The important thing is that they were nearly killed but managed to survive and the person who nearly killed he/she was intending on killing them.
name: Attempted Homicide

description:
This character uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medication]prescribed[/url] medication.

Prescribed medication refers to use of drugs at set intervals and doses decided by medical professionals as a means of treatment of an illness, disease or unwanted health condition.

It differs from recreational drug use by this factor of professional guidance and legality.

This trait is intended to be used for characters that take drugs not for fun but by doctors or in some cases other authorities orders.
name: Medication
Construction Worker
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Construction_worker]construction worker[/url].

A construction worker is someone who is involved in the physical construction of the built environment and its infrastructure.
This character has a hairstyle that hides one or both of his/her eyes. This method of hiding the eyes can also be the result of hair and shadows working together.
name: Eye Covering

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exile]exiled[/url].

Exile means to be away from one's home (i.e. city, state or country), while either being explicitly refused permission to return and/or being threatened with imprisonment or death upon return.
name: Exile

description:
These are the traits regarding [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homicide]homicide[/url].

Homicide refers to the act of a human killing another human.Homicide is not always a punishable act under the criminal law, and is different than a murder from such formal legal point of view.
name: Homicide
Length
description: This is a meta trait to gather all hair traits that are named by the length of the hair.

name: Shorts
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shorts]shorts[/url].

Shorts are a bifurcated garment worn by both men and women over their pelvic area, circling the waist, and covering the upper part of the legs, sometimes extending down to or even below the knee, but not covering the entire length of the leg, either as outer or undergarment, which makes them comfortable and easy to wear. They are called "shorts" because they are a shortened version of trousers, which cover the entire leg.

This character engages in a sexual scene involving adult breast feeding. Apply i2211 to the receiving character.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_lactation]Erotic lactation[/url] also called adult breast feeding is sexual arousal by breastfeeding on a female's breast.

Breast feeding is the act of sucking on the breast directly and does not require any milk to be visible or present. In hentai many times the fetish work around the fact of being treated as a child sucking on mother's brest. This tag must be used only in case of fetish and sexual breast feeding and not just normal child mother breast feeding.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/49/95949.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/95951.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/95950.jpg]NSFW Example 3[/url]
name: Adult Breast Feeding
Optimist
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Optimism]optimist[/url].

Optimism is a mental attitude or world view that interprets situations and events as being best (optimized), meaning that in some way for factors that may not be fully comprehended, the present moment is in an optimum state. The concept is typically extended to include the attitude of hope for future conditions unfolding as optimal as well.

name: Parted in Middle
description: This character has hair that is parted in the middle. The hair is parted on center, creating bangs or a fringe that is even on both sides. Examples include Da Capo's [url=/c4017]Miharu[/url] and Fate/Stay Night's [url=/c34]Rin[/url]. If the hair is parted off center, use the [url=/i1091]Parted to Side[/url] trait.

name: Slit Pupils
description:
This character's pupils are slits, as opposed to dilated pupils.

In real life these can be found on cats and several species of reptiles.

In fiction, supernatural beings like demons, monsters, vampires etc. would have such a trait. 
Normal human characters rarely have this.

Example: [url=https://vndb.org/c9433]Foxy[/url]

This character is the leader of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_club]student club[/url].

A student club president leads the members of the student club in day to day tasks to follow and achieve the goal of the club.
name: Student Club President

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Husband]husband[/url].

A husband is a male participant in a marriage, a social union or legal contract between people that creates kinship.
name: Husband

description:
A character with this trait wears a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beanie_%28seamed_cap%29]beanie[/URL].

In other English-speaking countries, a "beanie" is a knitted cap (often woollen), known in the United States as a "stocking cap" and in Canada as a "tuque".

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Beanie.svg]Example.[/URL]
name: Beanie
Photography
description:
This character engages in photography.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Photography]Photography [/url] is the art or practice of taking and processing pictures.

The use of this trait is not limited to professional photographers, and can be applied to characters who use any kind of instrument that can capture still images.

This character can be seen in the [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/37/60437.jpg]swimming spats[/url].

It's a variation of sports swimsuit that cover not only the torso, but also the foots of woman (partially or completely). Men's version may be similar to the woman's, or it may be just the tight-fitting shorts/leggings. This type of swimwear appeared in the world around the 2000s.
name: Swimming Spats

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scarf]scarf[/url].

A scarf is a piece of fabric worn around the neck, or near the head or around the waist for warmth, cleanliness, fashion or for religious reasons.
name: Scarf

description:
This character plays or engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Air_hockey]air hockey[/url].

Air hockey is a game where 2 players play against each other on a low-friction table. Air hockey requires an air-hockey table (a table with large, smooth playing surface), two player-held mallets, and a puck. Though it is mostly a free time game for some, it is also a worldwide competitive sport with a long history.
name: Air Hockey
Girlfriend
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Girlfriend]girlfriend[/url].

A girlfriend is a person's regular female companion in a romantic and/or sexual relationship, though normally not in long-term committed (e.g. marital) relationships, where other titles (e.g. husband, partner) are more commonly used.

Due to database classification, this trait should not be used for the meaning of "female non-romantic friend that is closer than other friends".
These are the traits for clothing with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religious]religious[/url] signifiance.
name: Religious Clothing and Accessories

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gynophobia]gynophobic[/url] (afraid of women).

Gynophobia is an abnormal fear of women. In the past, the Latin term was used, horror feminae, meaning "fear of women". In many cases, it may also be rooted in social phobia or social anxiety disorder.
name: Gynophobia

description:
This character is subject of a debt.

A debt generally refers to money owed by one party, the borrower or debtor, to a second party, the lender or creditor. Debt is generally subject to contractual terms regarding the amount and timing of repayments of principal and interest.

Common types of debt owed by individuals and households include mortgage loans, car loans, and credit card debt. Besides these more formal debts, private individuals also lend informally to other people, mostly relatives or friends. One reason for such informal debts is that many people, in particular those who are poor, have no access to affordable credit. Such debts can cause problems when they are not paid back according to expectations of the lending household.
name: Debt
Talking Patterns
description: These are the traits about notable talking patterns that make this character stand out.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boyfriend]boyfriend[/url].

A boyfriend is a person's regular male companion in a romantic and/or sexual relationship, though normally not in long-term committed (e.g. marital) relationships, where other titles (e.g. husband, partner) are more commonly used.

Due to database classification, this trait should not be used for the meaning of "guy friend" as "a male non-romantic and non-sexual friend".
name: Boyfriend

description: This meta-trait is designed to house student traits by activity.
name: Students by Activity
Other Route Death
description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death]dies[/url] on a route that is not of his/her own.

This means that while playing the route of this character the scenes involving his/her death can be avoided, but not on other routes such as the routes for other characters and "evil routes".

name: Double Bass
description:
This characters carries the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Double_bass]double bass[/url], a largest and lowest-pitched bowed string instrument in the modern symphony orchestra.
The double bass is a standard member of the orchestra's string section as well as the concert band, and is featured in concertos, solo and chamber music in Western classical music. The bass is used in a range of other genres, such as jazz, 1950s-style blues and rock and roll, rockabilly/psychobilly, traditional country music, bluegrass, tango and many types of folk music.

This character engages in a sexual act where "living clothes" play a significant role.

The term "Living clothes" means clothings that moves on its own volition. They are usually depicted as clothing that have small tentacles under their surface and they usually become alive by magic or by any other supernatural way.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/61/91661.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/60/91660.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Living Clothes Sex

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Veterinary_physician]veterinarian[/url].

Veterinarians treat disease, disorder or injury in animals, which includes diagnosis, treatment and aftercare.
name: Veterinarian

description:
This character gives birth to any kind of non-human creature during the course of the story. Egg laying belongs here as well.

Important note: Only use this tag if the birth of the baby monsters are part of the story. If it's just implied or covered by a time-jump and only the result (e.g. monsters are running rampart where there were none before) is shown, then do NOT use this tag!
name: Monster Birth

description:
This character is a member of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nobility]nobility[/url].

Nobility is a state-privileged status which is generally hereditary. The privileges associated with nobility may constitute substantial advantages over or relative to non-nobles, or may be largely honorary (e.g. precedence), but are maintained, or at least officially acknowledged, by law or government.
name: Noble

description:
This character uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tonfa]Tonfas[/url].

The tonfa, also known as tong fa or tuifa, is an Okinawan weapon. It is a stick with a handle, and is about 15-20 inches long. It was traditionally made from red oak and wielded in pairs.
name: Tonfa

description:
This character has red hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Red
Beard
description:
These are the traits for the characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beard]beard[/url].

A beard is the collection of hair that grows on the chin, cheeks and neck, but not the upper lip, of human beings

name: Discipline Committee Leader
description:
This character is the leader of his/her school's discipline committee.

A discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.

This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Casual_sex]casual sex[/url], sexual activity outside the context of a romantic relationship. This may include extramarital sex, sex in casual dating, one-time encounters, promiscuous sex, or sex in the absence of any emotional attachment, which can include swinging.
name: Casual Sex
Sexual Harassment
description:
This character becomes a victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_harassment]sexual harassment[/url].

Sexual harassment is intimidation, bullying or coercion of a sexual nature, or the unwelcome or inappropriate promise of rewards in exchange for sexual favors. 

Sexual harassment does not have to be of a sexual nature, however, and can include offensive remarks about a person’s sex.

Both victim and the harasser can be either a woman or a man, and the victim and harasser can be the same sex.

This character has a human-like appearance. Features include two-legged bipedalism and at least two arms and hands.

This trait is to describe [url=/i408]nature[/url] characters that feature human-like features. Do not apply this trait to characters who are pure human beings.
name: Humanoid (Non-human)

description:
The character is a subject of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_loop]time loop[/url].

A time loop or temporal loop is a common plot device in science fiction (especially in universes where time travel is commonplace) in which time runs normally for a set period (usually a day or a few hours) but then skips back like a broken record. When the time loop "resets", the memories of most characters are reset (i.e. they forget all that happened).
name: Time Loop

description: This character has an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ectomorphic]ectomorphic[/url] body type characterized by long and thin muscles/limbs and low fat storage; usually referred to as slim.

In other words, this kind of people humbly recognizes the leadership and authority of their woman. In some comedic stories women can even use a frying pan or other painful tool as an argument.

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basketball]basketball[/url].

Basketball is a team sport in which two teams of five players try to score points by throwing or "shooting" a ball through the top of a basketball hoop while following a set of rules.

A regulation basketball hoop consists of a rim 45.7cm in diameter and 3.05m high mounted to a backboard. A team can score a field goal by shooting the ball through the hoop during regular play. A field goal scores two points for the shooting team if a player is touching or closer to the hoop than the three-point line, and three points (a "3 pointer") if the player is "outside" the three-point line. The team with more points at the end of the game wins, but additional time (overtime) may be issued when the game ends with a tie. The ball can be advanced on the court by bouncing it while walking or running (dribbling) or passing it to a teammate. It is a violation (traveling) to walk with the ball, carry it, or to double dribble (to hold the ball and then resume dribbling).
name: Basketball

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pink-collar_worker]pink-collar worker[/url].

Pink-collar worker is a term designating a type of worker and is set to contrast with a blue-collar worker or a white-collar worker. A pink-collar worker performs work said to be stereotypical women's work and are typically in the service industry.

Pink-collar occupations tend to be personal-service oriented and are a significant portion of the economy. Waiting on tables is (along with nursing and teaching) part of the service sector, and among the most common occupations in the United States.
name: Pink-collar Worker

description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flute]flute[/url] is a family of musical instrument of the woodwind group. Unlike woodwind instruments with reeds, a flute is an aerophone or reedless wind instrument that produces its sound from the flow of air across an opening. According to the instrument classification of Hornbostel–Sachs, flutes are categorized as edge-blown aerophones.

A musician who plays the flute can be referred to as a flute player, a flautist, a flutist, or, less commonly, a fluter.

Aside from the voice, flutes are the earliest known musical instruments. A number of flutes dating to about 43,000 to 35,000 years ago have been found in the Swabian Alb region of Germany. These flutes demonstrate that a developed musical tradition existed from the earliest period of modern human presence in Europe.
name: Flute
Umbrella
description:
This character is seen with an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Umbrella]umbrella[/url].

An umbrella is a canopy designed to protect against rain or sunlight. The term parasol usually refers to an item designed to protect from the sun; umbrella refers to a device more suited to protect from rain. Often the difference is the material; some parasols are not waterproof. Parasols are often meant to be fixed to one point and often used with patio tables or other outdoor furniture. Umbrellas are almost exclusively hand-held portable devices; however, parasols can also be hand-held.

The rope bites into her private parts, causing pain and/or pleasure, depending on the preparation taken. The rope might have knots in regular or irregular intervals to intensify the sensation.

Hikikomori is a Japanese term to refer to the phenomenon of reclusive people who have chosen to withdraw from social life, often seeking extreme degrees of isolation and confinement because of various personal and social factors in their lives. The term hikikomori refers to both the sociological phenomenon in general as well as to people belonging to this societal group.

This character is refered to as a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jock_(athlete)#Stereotypical_characteristics_of_jocks]Jock[/url].

The term jock, when used in the United States and Canada, refers to the classic stereotype of a male athlete. It is generally a negative stereotype, and is attributed mostly to high school and college athletics participants who form a distinct youth subculture. In sociology, the jock is thought to be included within the socialite subculture, which also contains the preps and Ivy-Leaguers. As a blanket term, jock can be considered synonymous with athlete. 

Similar words that may mean the same as "jock" include "meathead," "musclebrain," and "musclehead." These terms are based on the stereotype that a jock is muscular, but not very smart, and cannot carry a conversation on any topic other than one relating to sports or exercise.

This trait does not refer to the job but the personality stereotype that comes with the people that are usually associated with this job.

description:
The character with this trait is/was a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monk]monk[/url].

A monk is a person who practices religious asceticism, living either alone or with any number of monks, while always maintaining some degree of physical separation from those not sharing the same purpose. The concept is ancient and can be seen in many religions and in philosophy.

A lawyer is a person learned in the law; as a attorney, counsel or solicitor; a person who is practicing law. Law is the system of rules of conduct established by the sovereign government of a society to correct wrongs, maintain the stability of political and social authority, and deliver justice.

name: Military Uniform
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Military_uniform]military uniform[/url].

Military uniforms comprises standardized dress worn by members of the armed forces and paramilitaries of various nations.

Military dress and military styles have gone through great changes over the centuries from colourful and elaborate to extremely utilitarian. Military uniforms in the form of standardized and distinctive dress, intended for identification and display, are typically a sign of organized military forces equipped by a central authority.

This character changes appearance with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henshin]henshin[/url].

Henshin is the Japanese word for "transformation", literally meaning, "to change or transform the body." This word is primarily used in manga, anime, and tokusatsu dramas for when a character transforms into a superhero. Henshin heroes usually have a "henshin call", a catchphrase which they recite when they transform.

This trait is intended for characters that transform but retain their nature, so while it is valid for a human to human transformation, other forms are covered by shapeshifting and metamorphosis.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_branding]Human branding[/url] or stigmatizing is the process in which a mark, usually a symbol or ornamental pattern, is burned into the skin of a living person, with the intention that the resulting scar makes it permanent. This is performed using a hot or very cold branding iron. 

It therefore uses the physical techniques of livestock branding on a human, either with consent as a form of body modification; or under coercion, as a punishment or to identify an enslaved or otherwise oppressed person. It may also be practiced as a "rite of passage", e.g. within a tribe, or to signify membership of or acceptance into an organization.
name: Human Branding

Native Americans in the United States are the indigenous peoples in North America within the boundaries of the present-day continental United States, parts of Alaska, and the island state of Hawaii. They are composed of numerous, distinct Native American tribes and ethnic groups, many of which survive as intact political communities

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog_tag]dog tags[/url].

A dog tag is the informal name for the identification tags worn by military personnel, because of their resemblance to actual dog tags. The tag is primarily used for the identification of dead and wounded along with providing religion (to provide for calling a Catholic priest or Jewish rabbi for last rites) and essential basic medical information for the treatment of the latter, such as blood type and history of inoculations.

Dog tags are usually fabricated from a corrosion-resistant metal or alloy such as aluminum, monel or stainless-steel, although, during wartime, they have been made from whatever metals were available. In the event the member has a medical condition that requires special attention, an additional, red tag with the pertinent information is issued and worn with the dog tags.

Wearing of the tag is required at all times by soldiers in the field.
name: Dog Tags

A half-brother is a male sibling who shares one biological parent with the other siblings. Do not confuse with Step-brother. Half-brothers share blood relations, while step-brothers do not.

name: Open Relationship
description:
This character is in an open relationship.

An [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open_relationship]open relationship[/URL] is an umbrella term for any relationship that is open to new sexual and/or romantic partners.

Specifically, it is an interpersonal relationship in which the parties want to be together but agree to a form of non-monogamous relationship. This means that they agree that other people relating in a flirting manner, sexual or physical, or intimate way with their partner is permitted, or often times tolerated. Generally, an open relationship is when the parties involved have two or more sexual relationships occurring at the same time either as a short-term relationship, such as dating, or a long-term relationship, such as marriage.

name: Slutty

This character is considered to be a slut (sexually promiscuous). Slut or slattern is a term applied to an individual who is considered to have loose sexual morals or who is sexually promiscuous. The accepted denotative meaning is a sexually promiscuous woman.

The term is generally pejorative and most often used as an insult, sexual slur or offensive term of disparagement (slut shaming). However, in recent times, there have been attempts to "reclaim" the word, while some individuals embrace the title as a source of pride.

name: Paranoia
description: [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paranoia]Paranoia[/URL] is a thought process believed to be heavily influenced by anxiety or fear, often to the point of irrationality and delusion. Paranoid thinking typically includes persecutory beliefs, or beliefs of conspiracy concerning a perceived threat towards oneself. Making false accusations and the general distrust of others also frequently accompany paranoia. For example, an incident most people would view as an accident or coincidence, a paranoid person might believe was intentional.

Slingback's straps is usually adjustable through a buckle or an elastic allowing the wearer to slip their foot into the sandal easily without the need to make further (or any) manual adjustment to the strap or buckle, while still holding the foot in the sandal relatively securely.
