This tag is used to differentiate tanned skin gyaru from ganguro so don't tag ganguro as kuro-gyaru.

Ganguro examples: https://s.vndb.org/sf/98/91698.jpg, https://s.vndb.org/sf/96/91696.jpg, https://s.vndb.org/sf/97/91697.jpg
With some exceptions a gallery of correclty identified [url=http://g.e-hentai.org/g/651734/b13400cde8/]Ganguros[/url].

Kuro-Gyaru examples: https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/91699.jpg, https://s.vndb.org/sf/00/91700.jpg
name: Kuro-Gyaru
Twin Footjob
description:
This character is one of the performers of a twin footjob. Apply i1919 to the receiving character.

This is a sexual act in which two women rub their feet against a man's penis. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/63/88363.jpg]NSWF Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/88362.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

name: Peeing
description:
This character is seen [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Urination]peeing[/url] in a sex scene. Use [url=/i2227]Peeing on Others[/url] instead if they're peeing on another character.

Try not to confuse this with [url=/i1113]Female Ejaculation[/url]. Use the text to determine which trait applies.

Urination is the ejection of urine from the urinary bladder through the urethra to the outside of the body. In healthy humans the process of urination is under voluntary control. In infants, some elderly individuals, and those with neurological injury, urination may occur as an involuntary reflex.

name: Bandanna
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bandana]bandanna[/url].

A bandana is a type of large, usually colorful, kerchief, usually worn on the head or around the neck of a person or pet.

Bandannas are frequently printed in a paisley pattern and most often used to hold hair back, either as a fashionable head accessory, or for practical purposes.

name: Unusual Hair Ornaments
description:
This character wears hair ornaments that do not fit other hair ornament traits such as [url=https://vndb.org/i151]ribbons[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i1103]beads[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i726]flowers[/url], or [url=https://vndb.org/i152]bands[/url].

Instead they wear something unusual such as stars (c5178), food (c4222), wings (c6350), or even ducks (c4448).

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Friend#Types_of_friendships]acquaintance[/url] of someone.

An acquaintance is usually considered as a friend, but sharing of emotional ties isn't present. An example would be a coworker with whom you enjoy eating lunch or having coffee, but would not look to for emotional support. Many "friends" that appear on social networking sites are generally acquaintances in real life.

This trait is intended to be used if a character knows another character from the same story, but the type of this relationship isn't easy to define by one of the child traits of this one. Otherwise use one of them or add a new appropriate one.
name: Acquaintance

description:
This character is a horse, or has horse-like features.

Use [url=/i2314]centaur[/url] instead if applicable.
name: Horse

description:
This character engage in wormhole sex. Apply i2113 to the receiving character.

Quick version: wormohole sex is a sexual act where penetration is achieved while being inside a portal or through a portal. 

Long version: "wormhole sex" can be divided in two subcategory: 
1) The body of a person is phisically in more than one place (dimension also) due to a portal or wormhole while having sex with another one. This is usually depicted as the person being penetrated is phisically cut in half (or more parts) by a wormhole. In this version the portal achieve a function similar to the one the wall achieve in the "[url=https://vndb.org/i1740]Stuck in Wall Sex[/url]" trait.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/63/91663.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]

2) The key point about the second version of "wormohole sex" is the fact that two or more people can engage in a sexual act even though they are far away one from the other through a wormhole or magical portal device. Some example are magical mirror, handheld device, ecc..

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/91662.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Wormhole Sex

description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handbag]handbag[/url].

A handbag, or purse in American English, is a handled medium-to-large bag that is often fashionably designed, typically used by women, and used to hold personal items such as wallet/coins, keys, cosmetics, a hairbrush, mobile phone etc.
name: Handbag
Graduation
description: This character graduates from school during the story.

name: Lieutenant
description: This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lieutenant]Lieutenant[/url].

This character is subjected to navel penetration. Apply i2167 to the penetrating character.

Navel penetration is a sexual act where a penis, tentacle or object is thrust into a character's navel.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/13/91013.jpg]NSFW Example Penis[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/11/91011.jpg]NSFW Example Tentacle[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/12/91012.jpg]NSFW Example Object[/url]
name: Navel Penetration

description: This character is the leader of a school computer club.
name: School PC Club President

description:
The eyes of this character are always [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/EyesAlwaysShut]closed[/url].

By the laws of the anime genre, this sort of eyes can occur among the wise or sly people as well as among the dangerous folks who can explode with incredible rage, when they get angry.
name: Kitsuneme

description:
This character sometimes acts like a  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foolishness]fool[/url].

Foolishness is the lack of wisdom. In this sense it differs from stupidity, which is the lack of intelligence.
name: Airhead

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wife]wife[/url].

A wife is a female participant in a marriage, a social union or legal contract between people that creates kinship.
name: Wife
Tanline
description:
This character has prominent [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tan_line]tanlines[/url].

Tanlines are a division between an area or areas on the skin of pronounced comparative paleness relative to other areas of their body that have been suntanned.

name: Malagasy
description: This character comes from Madagascar.

This character has a strict personality.

Strict people believe that every aspect of one's life should be taken seriously and time should not be wasted on trivial pursuits that won't progress career.

They accept no mistakes in work and consider them a result of laziness. They tend to follow a routine and have a very solid view of the world and how the things should be, and they consider any other opinions and acts outside that frame a foolish waste of time.
name: Strict

description:
Another character tries to seduce this character.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seduction]Seduction[/url], seen negatively, involves temptation and enticement, often sexual in nature, to lead someone astray into a behavioral choice they would not have made if they were not in a state of sexual arousal. Especially, it may be a treason against the wife/husband or girlfriend/boyfriend. Seen positively, seduction is a synonym for the act of charming someone by an appeal to the senses, often with the goal of reducing unfounded fears and leading to their "sexual emancipation".
name: Seduction
Malevolent Possession
description:
This character possesses another character against their (the host's) wishes.

Note: If this character is possessing an inanimate object, just use [url=http://vndb.org/i1288]Possession[/url].

name: Voodoo
description:
The character performs [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voodoo]Voodoo[/url] rituals - specifically Japanese style voodoo known as Ushinokokumairi.

The Ushinokokumairi ritual seem to origin around the year 800 at the Kibune Shrine in Kyoto, where a young beautiful woman cursed her husband in a 7 day long ritual for cheating on her.

This ritual still practiced today involves hammering 15 cm nails into straw dolls to put curses on chosen victims.

Sometimes these curses are for good health and luck as well as the opposite.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brother-in-Law]brother-in-law[/url].

A brother-in-law is the brother of one's spouse, the husband of one's sister, or the husband of one's spouse's sister.
name: Brother-in-law

description:
This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intercrural_sex]intercrural sex[/url]. Apply this trait to the character thrusting their penis between their partner's thighs. Apply [url=/i1631]i1631[/url] to the other character.

Intercrural sex is a type of non-penetrative sex, in which a male places his penis between his partner's thighs and thrusts to create friction.
name: Intercrural Sex

description:
This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insanity]insanity[/url].

Insanity is a spectrum of behaviors characterized by certain abnormal mental or behavioral patterns. Insanity may manifest as violations of societal norms, including becoming a danger to themselves and others, though not all such acts are considered insanity.
name: Insanity

description:
A character who is only half elven, the other half usually being human.

Example c4705
name: Half-elf
Baseball Glove
description: A baseball glove allows the wearer to more easily catch a baseball, due to its large, cupped shape. It is generally made up of a leather (or synthetic alternative) outer layer, with a fabric lining.

name: Toy
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toy]toy[/url].

A toy is any object that can be used for play. Toys are usually associated with children and pets. Playing with toys is training the young for their social role. Many items are designed to serve as toys, but goods produced for other purposes can also be used. Some toys are produced primarily as collector's items and are intended for display only.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slipper]slippers[/url].

A slipper is a semi-closed type of indoor/outdoor shoe, consisting of a sole held to the wearer's foot by a strap running over the toes or instep. Slippers are soft and lightweight compared to other types of footwear. They are mostly made of soft or comforting materials that allow a certain level of comfort for the wearer. This can range from faux fur to leather. Most slippers are worn in late autumn and winter and on occasion in other seasons. Slippers are cosy and most popular in cold countries.
name: Slippers
Psychometrist
description:
This character is a psychometrist.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychometry_(paranormal)]Psychometry[/url],  also known as token-object reading, or psychoscopy, is a form of extra-sensory perception characterized by the claimed ability to make relevant associations from an object of unknown history by making physical contact with that object. Supporters assert that an object may have an energy field that transfers knowledge regarding that object's history.

This character carries and/or uses paper talismans. They consists of a small rectangular paper with the kanji of a representative Shinto kami inscribed.

Paper talisman often originate from Shinto religion. They are often used in exorcism, wards, and purification. They may be hanged around a house or placed on things in hopes

In fictional use of paper talismans, they may contain mystical magic powers. Generally these are used as a tool for fighting spirits and monsters. Intuitively, paper talismans may function as something else, such as being made as an explosive item.
name: Paper Talismans
Anal Fingering
description: Another character uses their fingers to stimulate this character's anus. Apply [url=/i1597]i1597[/url] to the performing character.

name: Teal
description:
This character has teal hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.

This character has black hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Black
Mind Control
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brainwashing]brainwashing[/url].

Brainwashing refers to a process in which a group or individual "systematically uses unethically manipulative methods to persuade others to conform to the wishes of the manipulator(s), often to the detriment of the person being manipulated". The term has been applied to any tactic, psychological or otherwise, which can be seen as subverting an individual's sense of control over their own thinking, behavior, emotions or decision making.

name: Cunnilingus
description:
This character performs [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cunnilingus]cunnilingus[/url]. Apply [url=/i1636]i1636[/url] to the receiving character.

Cunnilingus is the act of using the mouth, lips and tongue to stimulate the female genitals. [url=/i100]Blowjob[/url] may be considered the equivalent trait for a male receiver.

This character is a practitioner of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wrestling]wrestling[/url].

Wrestling is a form of grappling type techniques such as clinch fighting, throws and take-downs, joint locks, pins and other grappling holds. A wrestling bout is a physical competition, between two (occasionally more) competitors or sparring partners, who attempt to gain and maintain a superior position. There are a wide range of styles with varying rules with both traditional historic and modern styles.
name: Wrestling

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midwife]midwife[/url].

A midwife is a professional in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Midwifery]midwifery[/url], specializing in pregnancy, childbirth, postpartum, women's sexual and reproductive health (including annual gynecological exams, family planning, menopausal care and others), and newborn care.
name: Midwife

description:
This character acts like a doting, fawning parent towards another of the story characters. They may or may not be actual family members but "the taking under one's wing" and "protecting against dangers" are important parts of this behavior.

This trait is intended for mild cases which are most usually found in parents. Extreme cases of this behavior results in acting [url=http://vndb.org/i556]Possessive[/url], which is presented as a child trait to this.
name: Protective

description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crutches]crutch or crutches[/url].

A crutch is a device used to counter a mobility impairment or an injury that limits walking ability.
name: Crutch

description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn cufflinks.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cufflink]Cufflinks[/URL] are used to secure French button cuffs and are also an item of jewellery for men. Cufflinks can be manufactured from a variety of different materials, such as glass, stone, leather, metal, precious metal or combinations of these. Securing of the cufflinks is usually achieved via toggles or reverses based on the design of the front section, which can be folded into position.
name: Cufflink

description:
Urethral intercourse is performed on this character. Apply i1855 to the performing character.

Urethral intercourse refers to the penetration of the female or male urethra by a penis, a finger, a tentacle, etc.

It is not to be confused with urethral sounding, the act of inserting a specialized medical tool into the urethra as a form of sexual or fetishistic activity.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/86251.jpg]Futanari NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/18/85818.jpg]Futanari NSFW Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/52/86252.jpg]Female NSFW Example[/url]
name: Urethral Intercourse

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fur]fur[/url] covering most or all of their body.

Fur is a synonym for hair, used more in reference to non-human animals, usually mammals; particularly those with extensive body hair coverage. The term is sometimes used to refer to the body hair of an animal as a complete coat, also known as the "pelage". Fur is also used to refer to animal pelts which have been processed into leather with the hair still attached. The words fur or furry are also used, more casually, to refer to hair-like growths or formations; particularly when the subject being referred to exhibits a dense coat of fine, soft "hairs".
name: Furry

description:
This character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monomolecular_wire]monomolecular wire[/url].

Monomolecular wire is a fictional wire, often used as a weapon, consisting of single strand of strongly-bonded molecules, like carbon nanotubes. It has applications in cutting objects and severing adjacent molecules. A similar or identical concept may be called a microfilament wire or, as a weapon, a microfilament whip.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/31/79431.jpg]Example image[/url]

Monomolecular wires are seen in the Star Wars Expanded Universe, Cyber City Oedo 808, Hyperion Cantos, Robert J. Sawyer's Illegal Alien, the manga Battle Angel Alita, Naruto, Hellsing, My-Hime, Simon R. Green's Deathstalker series, as well as the roleplaying games Shadowrun, and Cyberpunk 2020.
name: Wire Weapon

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reincarnation]Reincarnation[/url] is the religious or philosophical concept that the soul or spirit, after biological death, begins a new life in a new body that may be human, animal or spiritual depending on the moral quality of the previous life's actions.
name: Reincarnation
Muscular
description: This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mesomorphic]mesomorphic[/url] body type characterized by medium bones, solid torso, low fat levels, wide shoulders with a narrow waist; usually referred to as muscular.

name: School Newspaper Club Member
description:
This character is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newspaper]newspaper[/url] club associated with a school.

The newspaper may either be published online or on paper. Students involved in such a club often try to get their hands on the latest scoops.

name: Shovel
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shovel]shovel[/url].

A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bulk materials, such as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore. Shovels are common tools that are used extensively in agriculture, construction, and gardening. 
Most shovels are hand tools consisting of a broad blade fixed to a medium-length handle. Shovel blades are usually made of sheet steel or hard plastics and are very strong. Shovel handles are usually made of wood or glass-reinforced plastic (fibreglass).

name: High Heels Boots
description:
This character wears high heels [url=https://vndb.org/i179]boots[/url].

Try to use this trait in conjunction with [url=https://vndb.org/i1573]Ankle Boots[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i1932]Knee-high Boots[/url] and [url=https://vndb.org/i180]Thigh-high Boots[/url], since this trait doesn't take in account the height of the boots but just the presence of the heels.

name: Perfectionist
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perfectionism_(psychology)]perfectionist[/url].

Perfectionism is a belief that work or output that is anything less than perfect is unacceptable.

name: Towel
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Towel]bath towel[/url].

A towel is a piece of absorbent fabric or paper used for drying or wiping. It draws moisture through direct contact, often using a blotting or a rubbing motion. Common household textile towels are made from cotton, rayon, bamboo, nonwoven fibers or a few other materials.

A bath towel is used for drying the body after bathing, showering or swimming. It is typically rectangular, with a typical size around 30"×60" (75×150 cm). A large bath towel is sometimes called a bath sheet.

This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Astral_projection]astral projection[/url].

Astral projection or travel denotes the astral body (spirit, soul, etc.) leaving the physical body to travel in an astral plane, or wandering around the mortal plane. In some variants the spirit may only watch, others can communicate or even interact with their environment, up to fully looking like any physical body, except for the usual limitations of ghosts (can't go into water, may interfere with electric waves, etc.).
name: Astral Projection

description: A person who works the land or who keeps livestock, especially on a farm.
name: Farmer
Fingering
description:
These are the traits about [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fingering_%28sexual_act%29]fingering[/url]. These traits are for the receiving partner. Traits for the performing partner are under [url=/i402]i402[/url].

Fingering is the act of using one's fingers to stimulate a partner's clitoris, vulva, vagina or anus.

Don't use these traits for cases where a character fingers themselves. Use [url=/i592]Masturbation[/url] instead.

name: Memory Alteration
description:
This character's memory gets altered.

Memory alteration is the modification, loss, and gaining of memories by a character through means that are not natural. For example: falling down stairs and receiving brain trauma could be considered natural in this context, whereas falling down stairs into another dimension and passing/gaining inter-dimensional memories would not.

Memories do not necessarily need to be genuine, the only requirement apart from the natural cause is that after the memory modification event (be it via reality warps, a machine, magic powers or otherwise) the "new" set of memories are different from the "old" set of memories, even if only slight.

May sometimes overlap with amnesia depending on the circumstances.

This character's hair has one or more [url=http://translate.google.com/translate?sl=ja&tl=en&js=n&prev=_t&hl=en&ie=UTF-8&layout=2&eotf=1&u=http%3A%2F%2Fja.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2F%25E3%2582%25A4%25E3%2583%25B3%25E3%2583%2586%25E3%2583%25BC%25E3%2582%25AF_%2528%25E9%25AB%25AA%25E5%259E%258B%2529&act=url]intakes[/url].

An intake is created by an arch in the character's hair that folds over itself, creating an upside-down V shape. The intake itself should be on the second layer of hair, which has an opening with visible shadow(s) created by the arch folding over itself.

If the intake is right at the hairline, please use the [url=/i25]Curtained[/url] hairstyle trait instead.

[URL=/c4054]Example 1[/URL]
[URL=/c74]Example 2[/URL]
name: Intake

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Woman_on_top_(sex_position)#Reverse_missionary_position]reverse missionary[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1695]i1695[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the penetrating partner lies on their back, while the receiving partner lies on on top of them, facing down. This is similar to the [url=/i93]missionary[/url] position, except the participants' positions are switched.

Don't apply this trait to lesbians engaging in tribadism, gays engaging in frot, or lesbians using a double-ended didlo. Use [url=/i93]i93[/url] and [url=/i1694]i1694[/url] instead.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/4484.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/73/84173.jpg]Example 2[/url]
name: Reverse Missionary

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=Phimosis]Phimosis[/url] is a condition of the penis where the foreskin cannot be fully retracted over the glans penis.
name: Phimosis

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twin]twin[/url] sister.

A twin is one of two offspring produced in the same pregnancy. Twins can either be identical (in scientific usage, "monozygotic"), meaning that they develop from one zygote that splits and forms two embryos, or fraternal ("dizygotic") because they develop from two separate eggs that are fertilized by two separate sperm.
name: Twin Sister
Erotic Massage
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_massage]Erotic massage[/url] or sensuous massage is the use of massage techniques by a person on another person's erogenous zones to achieve or enhance their sexual excitation or arousal. In the case of women, the two focal areas are the breasts and pubis, while in case of men, the focal area is the male genitals.

This character has no eyes. They may have lost them, or their species may naturally have no eyes.

If a character is simply blind, use the [url=http://vndb.org/i439]Blindness[/url] trait instead. Note that having no eyes does not imply blindness (and vice versa). For example, the character can be an alien who sees through psychic methods.

If a character's eyes are just not drawn (possibly due to being covered by bangs or as part of the art style (common for protagonists)), and it's never stated or implied that the character has no eyes, use [url=/i116]Hidden[/url] instead.
name: No Eyes

description:
This character character masturbates whilst somebody else is watching them.

This trait differs from [url=https://vndb.org/i1403]Public Masturbation[/url] in that the place can be private or public, only the presence of an audience counts.
name: Masturbation in front of an Audience

description:
This character wears a [url=/i666]leotard[/url] with a turtleneck.

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) leotard is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck. Other than that, this is a regular leotard.
name: Turtleneck Leotard

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Technician]technician[/url].

A technician is a worker in a field of technology who is proficient in the relevant skills and techniques, with a relatively practical understanding of the theoretical principles.

Experienced technicians in a specific tool domain typically have intermediate understanding of theory and expert proficiency in technique. As such, technicians are generally much better versed in technique compared to average layman and even general professionals in that field of technology.
name: Technician
Shikomizue
description:
This character has a [url=http://ninja.wikia.com/wiki/Shikomizue]shikomizue[/url].

The shikomizue is a Japanese concealed sword disguised as a cane or walking stick, similar to the swordstick.

It was used mostly by the ninja. It is most famous for its use by the fictional swordmaster Zatoichi.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Santa_suit]Santa suit[/url], usually consisting of red jacket with white fur trim, stocking cap, a wide buckled belt, and black boots. A women's costume may differ slightly.
name: Santa Suit
Wagahai
description:
This character uses "wagahai", an archaic [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronoun[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Literally "my fellows; my class; my cohort", but used in a somewhat pompous manner.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Club_%28weapon%29]club[/url].

A club is among the simplest of all weapons. A club is essentially a short staff, or stick, usually made of wood, and wielded as a weapon since prehistoric times.

Most clubs are small enough to be swung in one hand although two-handed variants are known. Various kinds of clubs are used in martial arts and other specialized fields, including the law-enforcement baton. The military mace is a more sophisticated descendant of the club, typically made of metal and featuring a spiked, knobbed or flanged head attached to a haft.

The wounds inflicted by a club are generally known as bludgeoning or blunt-force trauma injuries.
name: Club
Keikogi
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Keikogi]keikogi[/url].

Keikogi is a uniform for training, used in martial arts derived from Japan, or budou. The top part of the keikogi is called the uwagi. The pants of the keikogi are called zubon, which is the Japanese word for pants or trousers.

name: Hellhound
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hellhound]hellhound[/url] is a supernatural dog. Hellhounds have mangled black fur, glowing red eyes, super strength or speed, ghostly or phantom characteristics, and a foul odor. In cultures that associate the afterlife with fire, hellhounds may have fire-based abilities and appearance. 

They are often assigned to guard the entrances to the world of the dead, such as graveyards and burial grounds, or undertake other duties related to the afterlife or the supernatural, such as hunting lost souls or guarding a supernatural treasure. In European legends, seeing a hellhound or hearing it howl may be an omen or even a cause of death.

[url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Hellhound]Hellhound monster girls[/url] exhist too and they are ferocious, bold, selfish and untamable by man.

name: Classic Tsundere
description:
This character is a classic [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsundere]tsundere[/url].

Tsundere is a Japanese character development process which describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing their warm side over time. This change of behavior is permanent, and that's where the classic tsundere type is different form the modern tsundere.

name: Pony
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pony]pony[/url].

Bird

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bird]bird[/url] or has bird-like physical features.

Birds are feathered, winged, bipedal, warm-blooded, egg-laying, vertebrate animals. Many can fly, although some cannot.

Danes are the citizens of Denmark, most of whom speak Danish and consider themselves to be of Danish ethnicity. However, people with a Danish ancestral or ethnic identity; people living outside Denmark such as emigrants; and descendants of emigrants are also considered to be Danes.

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anemia]anemia[/url].

Anemia is a decrease in number of red blood cells (RBCs) or less than the normal quantity of hemoglobin in the blood. However, it can include decreased oxygen-binding ability of each hemoglobin molecule due to deformity or lack in numerical development as in some other types of hemoglobin deficiency. Anemia is the most common disorder of the blood.

People with anemia report non-specific symptoms of a feeling of weakness, or fatigue, general malaise and sometimes poor concentration. They may also report dyspnea (shortness of breath) on exertion. In very severe anemia, the body may compensate for the lack of oxygen-carrying capability of the blood by increasing cardiac output. The patient may have symptoms related to this, such as palpitations, angina (if preexisting heart disease is present), intermittent claudication of the legs, and symptoms of heart failure.
name: Anemia
Kindergarten Hat
description:
A hat used frequently in Japan by children in kindergarten for safety reasons and are required by most schools. They are bright yellow to be easily seen in crowds and on streets.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/93/86293.jpg]Example[/url]

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tengu]tengu[/url].

Tengu are a class of supernatural creatures found in Japanese folklore, art, theater, and literature. They are one of the best known youkai (monster-spirits) and are sometimes worshipped as Shinto kami (revered spirits or gods). Although they take their name from a dog-like Chinese demon (Tiangou), the tengu were originally thought to take the forms of birds of prey, and they are traditionally depicted with both human and avian characteristics. The earliest tengu were pictured with beaks, but this feature has often been humanized as an unnaturally long nose, which today is practically the tengu's defining characteristic in the popular imagination.
name: Tengu
Miko
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url].

Miko is a Japanese term that anciently meant a "female shaman, spirit medium" who conveyed oracles from kami ("spirits; gods"), and presently means a "shrine maiden; virgin consecrated to a deity" who serves at Shinto shrines.

name: Grumbler
description:
This character is grumbler.

The position of such characters is to go against the opinion of others and to complain about any events that occur around them. Such people are quite difficult to please.

This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paraphilic_infantilism]paraphilic infantilism[/url].

Paraphilic infantilism is a sexual fetish for some that involves role-playing a regression to an infant-like state. Behaviors may include drinking from a baby bottle or wearing diapers. Use this trait only on the rolepalying character.
name: Paraphilic Infantilism

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloves]gloves[/url].

A glove is a garment covering the hand.
name: Gloves

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baseball_bat]baseball bat[/url].

A baseball bat is a smooth wooden or metal club used in the game of baseball to hit the ball after the ball is thrown by the pitcher. It is no more than 12cm in diameter at the thickest part and no more than 100cm in length. It typically weighs no more than 1 kg.
name: Baseball Bat

description: This character is the subject of someone's sexual dream, fantasy, illusion, etc. Unlike the dream's host, this character may not be aware of such event. On the other hand, he/she may be the one who instigated this dream in the host's mind using magic, hypnosis, supernatural abilities or other methods.
name: Sexual Fantasy
Senpai
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sempai]senpai[/url] of another character in this story.

A junior student will often refer to senior students as "senpai", and alumni will often refer to alumni from earlier classes as "senpai". This holds true particularly if fate brings them together later on, such as joining the same company, serving on a board together, or simply being in a club or parent's organization at the same time.

A triple footjob is performed on this character. Apply i1922 to the performing character.

This is a sexual act in which three women rub their feet against a man's penis. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/60/88360.jpg]NSWF Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/61/88361.jpg]NSWF Example 2[/url]

description:
This character is see in or described as being part of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gyaru]Gyaru[/url] fashion.

Gyaru fashion is a type of Japanese street fashion that originated in the 1970s. In English speaking countries Gyaru is commonly mistaken for ganguro, but that is actually a subculture of gyaru. Gyaru is a girly-glam style, breaking away from traditional standards of beauty by dwelling on the man-made (wigs, fake eyelashes, fake nails, etc).

Gyaru fashion is typically characterized by having heavily bleached or dyed hair (mostly shades from dark brown to blonde), excessively decorated nails, and dramatic makeup.

The makeup typically consists of dark eyeliner and fake eyelashes used in ways intended to make the eyes appear larger. Clothing pieces for gyaru fashion differ depending on which gyaru style the individual chooses.
name: Gyaru

description: The person goes through surgery for some reason. A botched operation counts too.
name: Surgery
No Panties
description:
This character wears no panties or any other form of lower body undergarments even though they are otherwise clothed. In Japan it's shortened to 'Nopan' when a girl wears a skirt with no panties. Sometimes called 'Commando' or '[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Going_Commando]Going Commando[/url]' in the west.

Do not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's lack of undergarments are briefly shown. Use it on occasions where a character's lack of panties is revealed as part of the story or character design.

name: Weakness
description:
This character has a generally [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weakness]weak body[/url]. This character may be also sickly. (optional)

Weakness is a symptom represented, medically, by a number of different conditions, including: lack of muscle strength, malaise, dizziness, or fatigue. The causes are many and can be divided into conditions that have true or perceived muscle weakness. True muscle weakness is a primary symptom of a variety of skeletal muscle diseases, including muscular dystrophy and inflammatory myopathy. It occurs in neuromuscular junction disorders, such as myasthenia gravis.

name: Communications Officer
description:
This character is a communications officer.

In military, a communications officer is responsible for all kinds of communications between the command and the soldiers in the field.

In civil life, a communications officer coordinates the promotion of products, services and public image of an organization which may include the publication of news and press releases, brochures and/or related materials.

name: Supernatural Cloning
description:
The character tagged with this creates one or more identical copies of someone (could be him/herself), through supernatural / sci-fi means.

The trait does not cover the actual biological process of extracting DNA and using it to grow organs.

name: Halberd
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halberd]halberd[/url] is a two-handed pole weapon that came to prominent use during the 14th and 15th centuries. The halberd consists of an axe blade topped with a spike mounted on a long shaft.

This character is a mascot.

A mascot character is a figure who represents a group with a common public identity. These characters are often used to symbolize their representative companies. Most represent as spokespeople for promoting products and marketing.
name: Mascot Character
Sheep
description:
This character is a sheep.

A sheep is a type of farm mammal known for their distinguishable woolly fur.

Male sheeps are called "rams" and are known to possess horns.

name: All The Way Through

This character is subject of a tentacle sexual scene called "All The Way Through" meaning that one or more tentacles goes all the way through the whole gastrointestinal tract, entering the anus and emerging from the mouth (or vice versa).

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/09/90909.jpg]NSFW Example[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/10/90910.jpg]NSFW Group Example[/url]

name: Flying

This character can fly using their own wings, special devices (such as jetpack), magic, or supernatural powers.

Please use the [url=http://vndb.org/i368]Pilot[/url] and [url=http://vndb.org/i255]Piloting[/url] traits instead, when a character is piloting the aircraft.

name: Straps
description:
This character wears straps.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straps]strap[/url], sometimes also called strop, is an elongated flap or ribbon, usually of fabric or leather.

Thin straps are used as part of clothing or baggage, or bedding such as a sleeping bag. See for example spaghetti strap, shoulder strap. A strap differs from a belt mainly in that a strap is usually integral to the item of clothing; either can be used in combination with buckles.

This character is one of the performers of a twin blowjob. Apply [url=/i1638]i1638[/url] to the receiving character.

A twin blowjob is a blowjob performed by two people at the same time on a single person.
name: Twin Blowjob
Consensual Porn Production
description: This character is involved in a pornographic video or photo shooting on their own will, either as a professional porn actor, or as an amateur.

name: Sign Language
description: The person engages in sign language which is a form of non-verbal communication with your hands using a dedicated sign language.

In Japan, a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R%C5%8Dnin_(student)]kanendosei[/url] (colloquially, a "ronin") is a student who has graduated from middle school or high school but has failed to enter a school at the next level, and consequently is studying outside of the school system for entrance in a future year. They may study at a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yobik%C5%8D]yobiko[/url].

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R%C5%8Dnin]ronin[/url] was a samurai with no lord or master during the feudal period (1185–1868) of Japan. In modern Japanese usage, the term also describes a salaryman who is "between employers" or a secondary school graduate who has not yet been admitted to university.
name: Kanendosei

description: This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infidelity]infidelity[/url]; that is, they have sex with someone other than their partner or spouse, without their partner's knowledge or permission.
name: Infidelity
Italian

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragon]dragon[/url].

Dragons are legendary creatures, typically with serpentine or reptilian traits, that feature in the myths of many cultures.
name: Dragon

description:
This character engages in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rope_bondage]rope bondage[/url] in a sex scene. Apply this trait to the unrestrained character(s) and apply [url=/i2025]Subject of (Sexual) >> Rope Bondage[/url] to the restrained character(s).

Rope bondage is bondage involving the use of rope to restrict movement, wrap, suspend, or restrain a person, as part of BDSM activities.
name: Rope Bondage
Strapless Swimsuit
description:
This character wears a strapless swimsuit. 

A strapless swimsuit has no shoulders or shoulder straps. Note that a strapless swimsuit can be a one piece or a bikini.

This character engages in sexual scenes that involve prostitution.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prostitution]Prostitution[/url] is the business or practice of engaging in sexual relations in exchange for payment or some other benefit. Prostitution is sometimes described as commercial sex. 

A common form of prostitution in Japan is called [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JK_business]JK business[/url] (Enjo-kousai) that means "compensated dating" and is a practice where older men give money and/or luxury gifts to attractive women for their companionship and possibly, for sexual favors.
name: Sex involving Prostitution

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Throwing_knife]throwing knife[/url].

Throwing knives are knives that are specially designed and weighted so that they can be thrown effectively. They are commonly made of a single piece of steel or other material, without handles, unlike other types of knives. The knife has two sections, the "blade" which is the sharpened half of the knife and the "grip" which is not sharpened. The purpose of the grip is to allow the knife to be safely handled by the user and also to balance the weight of the blade.
name: Throwing Knife
Headphones
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headphones]headphones or earbuds.[/url]

Headphones are a pair of small loudspeakers, or, less commonly, a single speaker, held close to a user's ears and connected to an audio source.

This character wears a open cup babydoll.

An open cup baby-doll is a like a [url=https://vndb.org/i1084]baby-doll[/url] but it looks kinkier and sexier than traditional baby-doll since it leaves in plain sight the tits area of the wearer.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/09/101309.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/10/101310.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Open Cup Baby-doll

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/47/88347.jpg]Example 2 NSFW[/url]
name: Twin Buttjob
Older Appearance
description:
This character is younger than they appear to be.

For example a child that looks like a young adult.

This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wild_boar]boar[/url].

Boars are a suid native to much of Eurasia, North Africa, and the Greater Sunda Islands. Boars are a bulky, massively built suid with short and relatively thin legs. The trunk is short and massive, while the hindquarters are comparatively underdeveloped. The animal's head is very large, taking up to one third of the body's entire length.
name: Boar

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honors_student]honor student[/url].

An honors student is a person recognized for achieving high grades or high marks in their course work.
Honor students are recognized for their academic achievement on lists published periodically throughout the school year, known as honor rolls, varying from school to school, and from different levels of education.
name: Honor Student
Gender Change
description:
The character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_change]sex-change[/url].

In real life sex change is a term often used for sex change in humans, that is all medical procedures transgender people may pursue, or specifically to sex reassignment surgery, which usually refers to genital surgery only.

In visual novels, sex change is rarely realistic and usually involves futuristic technology or some sort of magic. or alternatively the developers doesn't care much for explanations and the character just wakes up one day with his/her gender swapped.

This character becomes the target of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blackmail]blackmail[/url].

Blackmail is the act of threatening to reveal substantially true information about a person to the public, a family member, or associates unless a demand is met. This information is usually of an embarrassing, socially damaging, and/or incriminating nature. As the information is substantially true, the act of revealing the information may not be criminal in its own right nor amount to a civil law defamation; it is the making of demands in exchange for withholding the information that is often considered a crime.
name: Blackmail
Goggles
description: This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goggles]goggles[/url], a form of protective eyewear that protect the eye area in order to prevent particulates, water or chemicals from striking the eyes.

name: Sunglasses
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sunglasses]sunglasses[/url].

Sunglasses are a form of protective eyewear designed primarily to prevent bright sunlight and high-energy visible light from damaging or discomforting the eyes. They also help cancel out harmful UV rays from the sun. They can sometimes also function as a visual aid, as variously termed spectacles or glasses exist, featuring lenses that are colored, polarized or darkened.

name: Sex in Water
description: This character engages in sexual acts in water. For example, in the sea, a pool, a bath, a river or a shower.

These are the traits for the characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Role]roles[/url] in the game's story.

They usually apply to characters' current vocation, or social state, but also apply to their previous ones if those are a part of the story.

Do not mix with the term "Role" for their character types such as protagonist, hero/heroine.

While these traits might sound a bit off as a characters role in a story if you think it alone, like "this characters role in this game isn't being an American", think them more along the lines of: "Alex plays the role of an American soldier in this story.". As long as a trait can fit to this structure it can be used as a role trait.
name: Role

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paintball]paintball[/url].

Paintball is a sport in which players compete, in teams or individually, to eliminate opponents by hitting them with capsules containing food coloring and gelatin (referred to as paintballs) propelled from a device called a paintball marker.

Paintballs have a non-toxic, biodegradable, water soluble mineral-oil. The game is regularly played at a sporting level with organized competition involving worldwide leagues, tournaments, professional teams, and players.

Paintball technology is also used by armies to supplement military training, riot response, and non-lethal suppression of dangerous suspects.
name: Paintball

description: This character has no bangs. They might be held back by a headband, or they might simply not be a part of the character's hairstyle.
name: No Bangs

description:
This character competes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhythmic_gymnastics]Rhythmic Gymnastics[/url].

Rhythmic gymnastics is a sport in which individuals or teams of competitors (2 or more people) manipulate one or two pieces of apparatus: rope, clubs, hoop, ball, ribbon and Free (no apparatus, so called "floor routine"). An individual athlete only manipulates 1 apparatus at a time. When multiple gymnasts are performing a routine together a maximum of two types of apparatus may be distributed through the group. An athlete can exchange apparatus with a team member at any time through the routine. Therefore, an athlete can manipulate up to two different pieces of apparatus through the duration of the routine. Rhythmic gymnastics is a sport that combines elements of ballet, gymnastics, dance, and apparatus manipulation. The victor is the participant who earns the most points, determined by a panel of judges, for leaps, balances, pirouettes (pivots), flexibilities, apparatus handling, execution, and artistic effect.
name: Rhythmic Gymnastics
Group Sex with Clones
description:
This character engages in a grouped sex with least one of the party having identical copies of themselves, or both parties at the same time. Cloning can be done be done through scientific cloning or by magical means (ex: Ninja technique).

It doesn't matter which of the two parties is cloned in this group sex activity. This trait applies if at least one of the two partners have identical copies of themselves and both parties and the clones engage in sex with each other.

This person have voluntary sexual relationships with other people, without being emotionally involved. Typically two good friends who have casual sex without a monogamous relationship or any kind of commitment. Or a random people from some Internet club having fun more than once. At the same time, both sex friends may be married to other people and, in fact, engage in sexual infidelity (with their spouse aware of it or not). Still, don't confuse them with lovers, who are involved romantically as well.
name: Sex Friend
School Science Club Member
description:
This character is a member of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Science]science[/url] club associated with a school.

A school science club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on scientific research.

name: Pyrokinetic
description: This character's power or powers include setting things on fire with their mind.
This character engages in a specific type of [URL=https://vndb.org/i557]cosplay[/URL]- dressing up in sexualised animal costumes.
name: Sexual Animal Cosplay

description:
This character engages in the acts of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frotteurism]frotteurism[/url].

Frotteurism refers to a paraphilic interest in rubbing, usually one's pelvis or erect penis, against a non-consenting person for sexual gratification. It may involve touching any part of the body including the genital area.
name: Molesting

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ex-girlfriend]ex-girlfriend[/url].

In social relationships, an ex (plural is exes) is someone with whom a person was once associated. As a prefix, ex- can refer to a variety of different relationships; for example, one might refer to a music group's ex-guitarist, or someone's ex-friend. When used alone, ex as a noun is assumed to refer to a former sexual or romantic partner, especially a former spouse. This often has a derogatory tinge, especially if it refers to unrequited feelings.
name: Ex-girlfriend
Head of a Sect
description:
This person is the head (or leader) of some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sect]sect[/url].

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sect]sect[/url] is a subgroup of a religious, political or philosophical belief system, usually an offshoot of a larger religious group. Although in past it was mostly used to refer to religious groups, it has since expanded and in modern culture can refer to any organization that breaks away from a larger one to follow a different set of rules and principles.
This character works in an office's but not as an executive's or in a managing position.
name: Office Worker

description:
This character performs a bellyjob. Apply i1869 to the receiving character.

The bellyjob is a sexual act where the penis is thrust between a woman's belly, usually achieved by wrapping the belly skin around the penis. To do so the performer is often overweight.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/54/86254.jpg]Example NSFW[/url]
name: Bellyjob

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/antisocial]antisocial[/url].

Different from just being [url=http://vndb.org/i250]shy[/url] or [url=http://vndb.org/i249]reserved[/url], antisocial people are unwilling or unable to associate normally with other people. They may or may not be a [url=http://vndb.org/i720]hikikomori[/url].
name: Antisocial
Wise
description:
This character is endowed with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wisdom]wisdom[/url].

Wisdom is the ability to think and act using knowledge, experience, common sense, and insight. This quality is usually inherent to middle-aged and old people, who have seen many things in their life, and can give a good advice to those who may need it.

This character engages in music learning: this can mean learning how to play an instrument, to sing or another music related ability, without necessarily being a pro musician or having a music related role.
name: Music Learning

description:
This character has [url=http://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyan]cyan[/url] eyes.

It is a light blue color with a subtle hint of green.
name: Cyan
Multiple Tails
description: This character has multiple ponytails.
This character is the father of another character's spouse.
name: Father-in-law
Deepthroat
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Wiki-dthroat.png]deep-throating[/url]. Apply this trait to the character taking their partner's penis into their mouth, and apply [url=/i1641]Subject of (Sexual) >> Deepthroat[/url] to the character whose penis is being stimulated.

Deep-throating is a sexual act in which a character takes their partner's entire erect penis deep into their mouth, past the epiglottis and into the throat. The practice is a type of fellatio, a form of oral sex.

name: Relaxed
description:
This character has a relaxed attitude.

Relaxed characters act without [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anxiety]anxiety[/url] or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Worry]worry[/url]. They may have solid reasons for doing so, like having made all possible preparations for a situation, or they may be prepared to accept the negative consequences.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brass_Knuckles]brass knuckles[/url].

Brass knuckles are weapons used in hand-to-hand combat. Brass knuckles are pieces of metal, usually steel despite their name, shaped to fit around the knuckles. Designed to preserve and concentrate a punch's force by directing it toward a harder and smaller contact area, they result in increased tissue disruption, including an increased likelihood of fracturing the victim's bones on impact. The extended and rounded palm grip also spreads across the attacker's palm the counter-force that would otherwise be absorbed primarily by the attacker's fingers, reducing the likelihood of damage to the attacker's fingers.
name: Brass Knuckles

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villain]villain[/url].

A villain is an "evil" character in a story, whether a historical narrative or, especially, a work of fiction. The villain usually is the antagonist, the character who tends to have a negative effect on other characters.

A character may start as a villain or hero and later switch to the other side, this trait should be used in either case.
name: Villain

description:
This character wears [url=http://www.animena.com/images/201005/goods_img/2333_P_12740177565685.jpg]paw gloves[/url].

A paw glove is a garment covering the hand in the shape of an animal paw. Paw gloves are usually weared during kemonomimi cosplay.
name: Paw Gloves

description:
The characters is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gnome]gnome[/url].

Gnomes are diminutive spirits in Renaissance magic and alchemy, first introduced by Paracelsus in the 16th century and later adopted by more recent authors including those of modern fantasy literature. Its characteristics have been reinterpreted to suit the needs of various storytellers, but it is typically said to be a small humanoid that lives underground.
name: Gnome

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Power_armor]power armor[/url].

A powered exoskeleton, also known as powered armour is a powered mobile machine consisting primarily of an exoskeleton-like framework worn by a person and a power supply that supplies at least part of the activation-energy for limb movement.

The shock is delivered by making direct contact with the target using the device.

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Volleyball]volleyball[/url].

Volleyball is an Olympic team sport in which two teams of six players are separated by a net. Each team tries to score points by grounding a ball on the other team's court under organized rules.

The complete rules are extensive. But simply, play proceeds as follows: A player on one of the teams begins a 'rally' by serving the ball (tossing or releasing it and then hitting it with a hand or arm), from behind the back boundary line of the court, over the net, and into the receiving team's court. The receiving team must not let the ball be grounded within their court. They may touch the ball as many as three times. Typically, the first two touches are to set up for an attack, an attempt to direct the ball back over the net in such a way that the serving team is unable to prevent it from being grounded in their court.
name: Volleyball

Social Worker
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_worker]social worker[/url].

Social work is a professional and academic discipline committed to the pursuit of social welfare, social change and social justice. The field works towards research and practice to improve the quality of life and to the development of the potential of each individual, group and community of a society.

Social workers perform interventions through research, policy, community organizing, direct practice and teaching. Research is often focused on areas such as human development, social policy, public administration, program evaluation and international and community development.

name: Time Travel

The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_travel]time travel[/url].

Time travel is the concept of moving between different points in time in a manner analogous to moving between different points in space, either sending objects (or in some cases just information) backwards in time to some moment before the present, or sending objects forward from the present to the future without the need to experience the intervening period (at least not at the normal rate).

This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blacksmith]blacksmith[/url].

A blacksmith is a metalsmith who creates objects from wrought iron or steel by forging the metal, using tools to hammer, bend, and cut. Blacksmiths produce objects such as gates, grilles, railings, light fixtures, furniture, sculpture, tools, agricultural implements, decorative and religious items, cooking utensils and weapons.

Blacksmiths also have a general knowledge of how to make and repair many things, from the most complex of weapons and armor to simple things like nails or lengths of chain.
name: Blacksmith

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chastity_belt]Chastity Belt[/url].

A chastity belt is a locking item of clothing designed to prevent sexual intercourse. They may be used to protect the wearer from rape or temptation. Some devices have been designed with additional features to prevent masturbation.

Modern Chastity Belts are most often used in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chastity_belt_%28BDSM%29]BDSM play[/url]. Chastity belts in BDSM are a way for the wearer to surrender control over their sexual behavior by providing a physical barrier that deters sexual intercourse and possibly masturbation. The device is usually worn by the submissive in the relationship, as a way of providing control to the dominant (often referred to as the "keyholder" in this context). This is a part of the wider practice of orgasm denial.
name: Chastity Belt

Space pirates operate as pirates in outer space and travel by spacecraft, as opposed to the more traditional pirates on the high seas of Earth, who travel by ship. However, just as traditional seafaring pirates target sailing ships, space pirates serve a similar role in sci-fi media: they capture and plunder spacecraft for cargo, loot and occasionally they steal the entire spacecraft itself, and kill the crewmembers.
name: Space Pirate
Epaulette
description:
This character wears [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Epaulette]epaulette(s)[/url].

An Epaulette is a decorative tasseled shoulder piece associated to high ranking individuals as an insignia of rank. They consists of a flat seam with a fasten button on top. The edges along are then decorated with strings of laces around it.

Epaulettes are often worn by elite ranking officers and units in European countries. Other nobles such as princes can also be found wearing epaulettes.

[URL=https://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/streetwise]Streetwise[/URL] characters have a wealth experience and knowledge in dealing with dangerous or difficult situations. They are comfortable in navigating criminal circles, though it does not necessarily mean they are criminals themselves.

A disease or illness is an abnormal condition affecting the body of an organism. It is often construed to be a medical condition associated with specific symptoms and signs.

It may be caused by external factors, such as infectious disease, or it may be caused by internal dysfunctions, such as autoimmune diseases.

Illnesses and diseases usually affect people not only physically, but also emotionally, as contracting and living with many diseases can alter one's perspective on life, and their personality.

It's a one-piece swimsuit, which is most common in modern Japanese schools. In contrast to the previous type, it can have both a closed and an open back. It may also contain a tag with the name of the girl. This kind of swimsuit is commonly worn by high school students, but this is not necessarily so.

Hand Fan
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hand_fan]fan[/url].

A hand-held fan is an implement used to induce an airflow for the purpose of cooling or refreshing oneself. Any broad, flat surface waved back-and-forth will create a small airflow and therefore can be considered a rudimentary fan. But generally, purpose-made hand-held fans are shaped like a sector of a circle and made of a thin material (such as paper or feathers) mounted on slats which revolve around a pivot so that it can be closed when not in use.

The movement of a hand-held fan provides cooling by increasing the airflow over the skin which in turn increases the evaporation rate of sweat droplets on the skin. This evaporation has a cooling effect due to the latent heat of evaporation of water. Fans are convenient to carry around, especially folding fans.

It is colloquially used for any marriage performed in haste, with a limited public engagement period or without a public engagement period. Blazers are often part of a uniform that denotes, for example, an airline's employees, students of a particular school, members of yachting and rowing clubs, and athletes on a particular team.

They evolved in the 17th century from spring powered clocks, which appeared in the 15th century. The first watches were strictly mechanical.
