However, transferring can be done by students at schools of any level of education, high schools being the most commonly in visual novels. Younger students may transfer because of a parent's job changing to a new area, but in visual novels it's often the result of the student's personal, and often secret or mysterious, circumstances.
name: Transfer Student

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daughter]daughter[/url].

A daughter is a female offspring; a girl or woman in relation to her parents.
name: Daughter
Visual Arts
description:
This character engages in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Visual_Art]visual art[/url].

The visual arts are art forms that create works which are primarily visual in nature, such as ceramics, drawing, painting, sculpture, printmaking, design, crafts, and often modern visual arts (photography, video, and filmmaking) and architecture. These definitions should not be taken too strictly as many artistic disciplines (performing arts, conceptual art, textile arts) involve aspects of the visual arts as well as arts of other types. Also included within the visual arts are the applied arts such as industrial design, graphic design, fashion design, interior design and decorative art.

name: Strapless Shirt
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tube_top]strapless shirt[/url].

A tube top is a shoulderless, sleeveless women's garment that wraps around the upper torso. It is generally tight over the breasts, usually by means of elastic bands at its top and bottom.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grandmother]grandmother[/url].

A grandmother is the female parent of a person's own parent.
name: Grandmother

description:
[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samue]Samue[/URL] is the work clothing of Japanese Zen Buddhist monks, worn when engaged in samu. It is a two-piece set of matching robe-like shirt and pants. 

In modern times they have become popular as general casual or work wear.
name: Samue
Kindergarten Teacher
description: This character is a teacher in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kindergarten]kindergarten[/url] or in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nursery_school]nursery school[/url].

name: Condoms (Clothing)
description:
This character wears condoms as clothes (belt, necklace, dress, hair tie, etc...). 

Wearing condoms as clothes in nukige is part of a process of [url=https://vndb.org/g1993]non-consensual erotic humilation[/url], [url=https://vndb.org/i1879]sexual slavery[/url] or [url=https://vndb.org/i1933]mindbreak[/url].

DO NOT use this trait for characters wearing condoms normally on penis.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/53/102753.jpg]NSFW Example Condoms Belt 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/52/102752.jpg]NSFW Example Condoms Belt 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/102751.jpg]NSFW Example Condoms Hair Tie, Belt, Necklace[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/54/102754.jpg]NSFW Example Condoms Hair Tie, Belt, Nipple Accessory[/url]

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hakama]hakama[/url].

Hakama are a type of traditional Japanese clothing. Hakama are tied at the waist and fall approximately to the ankles. There are two types of hakama, undivided andon bakama and umanori type with divided legs, both appear similar outside.
name: Hakama

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beret]beret[/url].

A beret is a soft, round, flat-crowned hat, usually of woven or hand-knitted wool or wool felt, or these days often acrylic fiber.

Berets are worn as part of the uniform of many military and police units worldwide, as well as by other organizations.
name: Beret

description:
This character performs a shoejob. Apply i1782 to the receiving character.

A shoejob is the act of rubbing shoes or boots on a partner genitalia to stimulate or excite them. In most cases, the performer uses their shoes or boots to rub a man's penis. This is a sexual practice similar to [url=https://vndb.org/i606]footjob[/url] but wearing shoes or boots.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/01/23101.jpg]Example NSWF[/url]
name: Shoejob

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bunches]bunches hairstyle[/url].

Bunches, also called angel wings and pigtails, are a hairstyle in which the hair is parted down the middle and gathered into two symmetrical bundles, like ponytails, secured near the scalp. In some English-speaking regions, this hairstyle is referred to as "pigtails," but in others, the term "pigtails" applies only if the hair is braided.
name: Twin Tails

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straw_hat]straw hat[/url].

A straw hat is a brimmed hat that is woven out of straw or reeds. The hat is designed to protect the head from the sun and against heatstroke, but straw hats were also used in fashion and as a decorative element of a uniform.
name: Straw Hat
Psychosis
description:
This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychotic]psychosis[/url].

Psychosis means abnormal condition of the mind, and is a generic psychiatric term for a mental state often described as involving a "loss of contact with reality".

People suffering from psychosis are described as psychotic. Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder, during which hallucinations and delusions and impaired insight may occur.

name: Sloppy
description: This character lacks of elegance, neatness and order. They're rarely watching their appearance, being unfamiliar with the mirror, and their apartment is in a mess most of the time.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warrior]warrior[/url].

A warrior is a person experienced in or capable of engaging in combat or warfare.

This trait is intended to cover all characters that had some self-defense and weapons training, it does not mean that all of these people are war veterans.
name: Warrior

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promiscuity#Male_promiscuity]womanizer[/url].

A man is considered a womanizer if he has frequent relationships with various women and shows no sign of commitment. 
They may often engage in [url=http://vndb.org/i755]flirting[/url].

This trait is reserved for male characters.
name: Womanizer

description:
This character can be seen in the [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/36/60436.jpg]sports swimsuit[/url].

This type of swimwear is available in various (and multiple) colors and designs. It is made of the new generation materials to be highly comfortable for professional swimming. In Japan, it's mostly worn by participants of the school competitions and the sportsmen, as well as by all who have the desire and the money to buy such a swimsuit.
name: Sports Swimsuit

description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bag]bag[/url].

A bag is a non-rigid container.
name: Bag
Vampire
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vampire]vampire[/url].

Vampires are mythological or folkloric beings who subsist by feeding on the life essence (generally in the form of blood) of living creatures, regardless of whether they are undead or a living person.

name: Anal Birth
description:
This character gives [URL=https://vndb.org/i1121]birth[/URL] from the anus.

If the character gives birth to non-humanoids or monsters use this trait in conjunction with [URL=https://vndb.org/i1128]Monster Birth[/URL].

name: Pressure Suit
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pressure_suit]pressure suit[/url].

A pressure suit is a protective suit worn by high-altitude pilots who may fly at altitudes where the air pressure is too low for an unprotected person to survive, even breathing pure oxygen at positive pressure. Such suits may be either full-pressure (i.e. a space suit) or partial-pressure (as used by air crew). Partial-pressure suits work by providing mechanical counter-pressure to assist breathing at altitude.

Diving suits that protect the wearer from excessively high pressure are called atmospheric diving suits. Pressure suits in general are examples of environmental suits.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parallel_universe_%28fiction%29]travels dimensions[/url] throughout the story, at least once. Please use [url=https://vndb.org/i696]Time Travel[/url] if it's strictly time travel though.

A parallel universe or alternative reality is a hypothetical self-contained separate reality coexisting with one's own. While the terms "parallel universe" and "alternative reality" are generally synonymous and can be used interchangeably in most cases, there is sometimes an additional connotation implied with the term "alternative reality" that implies that the reality is a variant of our own. The term "parallel universe" is more general, without any connotations implying a relationship, or lack of relationship, with our own universe.
name: Dimensional Travel
Smuggling
description: This character is being secretly smuggled from one place to another. Either as a immigrant or part of part of some secret governmental / scientific project.

This character is seen with a musical instrument.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musical_instrument]musical instrument[/url] is a device created or adapted for the purpose of making musical sounds.

In principle, any object that produces sound can serve as a musical instrument—it is through purpose that the object becomes a musical instrument.
name: Musical Instrument
Sex with Tentacles (Consensual)
description:
This character is voluntarily involved in sexual activities with people or creatures with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tentacle_erotica]tentacles[/url].

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tentacle]tentacle[/url] is a flexible, mobile, elongated organ present in some species of animals, most of them invertebrates.

name: Trampling
description:
This character is subject of trampling. Apply i1945 to the character trampling over this character.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trampling]Trampling[/url] refers to the sexual activity that involves being trampled underfoot by another person or persons. Because trampling can be used to produce pain, the trampling fetish for some adherents is closely linked to sadomasochistic fetishism.

The most common form of trampling is done by a female (in rare situations by a male) walking on a male or female submissive and is usually done barefooted, in socks, nylons, or shoes. The trampler will predominantly walk, jump and stomp on the person's back, chest, stomach, genitalia and face.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/87684.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

name: Canadian
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canadian]Canadian[/url].

Canadians are the people who are identified with the country of Canada, residential, legal, historical, cultural or ethnic. For most Canadians, several (frequently all) of those types of connections exist and are the source(s) of them being considered Canadians.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cardigan_%28sweater%29]cardigan[/url].

A cardigan is a type of machine- or hand-knitted sweater that ties, buttons or zips down the front; by contrast, a pullover does not open in front but must be "pulled over" the head to be worn.
name: Cardigan
British
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/British_people]British[/url].

A citizen of the United Kingdom which consists of England, Scotland, Wales & Northern Ireland.

name: Empress Regnant
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor]empress regnant[/url].

A empress regnant is a female monarch who reigns in her own right, in contrast to a "empress consort", who is the wife of a reigning emperor. Empress regnant possess and exercise sovereign powers.

Empresses are generally recognized to be of a higher honor and rank than queens.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-heeled_footwear]footwear with high heels[/url].

High-heeled footwear is footwear that raises the heel of the wearer's foot significantly higher than the toes. When both the heel and the toes are raised equal amounts, as in a platform shoe, it is technically not considered to be a high heel; however, there are also high-heeled platform shoes.

High heels tend to give the aesthetic illusion of longer, more slender legs. High heels come in a wide variety of styles, and the heels are found in many different shapes, including stiletto, pump (court shoe), block, tapered, blade, and wedge.
name: High Heels
Maid
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maid]maid[/url].

A maid is a female employed in domestic service. Maids perform typical domestic chores such as cooking, ironing, washing, cleaning the house, grocery shopping, walking the family dog, and taking care of children.

name: Pegging
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pegging_%28sexual_practice%29]pegging[/url]. Apply this trait to the character wearing the strap-on, and apply [url=/i728]i728[/url] to the character being pegged.

Pegging is a sexual practice in which a woman penetrates a man's anus with a strap-on dildo.

This character is or shares resemblance to a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bear]bear[/url].

Common characteristics of modern bears include a large body with stocky legs, a long snout, shaggy hair, plantigrade paws with five nonretractile claws, and a short tail. While the polar bear is mostly carnivorous and the giant panda feeds almost entirely on bamboo, the remaining six species are omnivorous, with largely varied diets including both plants and animals.
name: Bear
Obsessive–Compulsive Disorder
description:
This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Obsessive–compulsive_disorder]OCD[/url].

Obsessive–compulsive disorder (OCD) is an anxiety disorder characterized by intrusive thoughts that produce uneasiness, apprehension, fear or worry (obsessions), repetitive behaviors aimed at reducing the associated anxiety (compulsions), or a combination of such obsessions and compulsions. Symptoms of the disorder include excessive washing or cleaning, repeated checking, extreme hoarding, preoccupation with sexual, violent or religious thoughts, relationship-related obsessions, aversion to particular numbers and nervous rituals such as opening and closing a door a certain number of times before entering or leaving a room.

This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Motorsport]motorsports[/url].

Motorsport or motorsports is the group of sports which primarily involve the use of motorized vehicles, whether for racing or non-racing competition. MotoSport refers to motorcycle racing specifically and includes off-road racing such as motocross and MotoGP.
name: Motorsports
Mercenary
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mercenary]mercenary[/url].

A mercenary is a person who takes part in an armed conflict, who is not a national or a party to the conflict, and is "motivated to take part in the hostilities essentially by the desire for private gain and, in fact, is promised, by or on behalf of a party to the conflict, material compensation substantially in excess of that promised or paid to combatants of similar ranks and functions in the armed forces of that Party" (Additional Protocol I to the Geneva Convention of August 1949).

name: Futanari
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Futanari]futanari[/url].

Futanari have a mostly female body and female gender presentation, but possess both female and male genitalia (testicles are not always present). The character may be this way naturally or become futanari through magical or scientific means.

Please note that futanari and [URL=https://vndb.org/i2450]transwomen[/URL] are not the same as transwomen only have one set of genitalia.

name: Minigun
description:
The character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minigun]minigun[/url].

A minigun is a barreled machine gun with a high rate of fire, it features Gatling-style rotating barrels with an external power source, normally an electric motor.

name: Precog
description:
This character has some form of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Precognition]precognitive[/url] powers that he/she uses in the story.

Precognition refers to perception that involves the acquisition or effect of future information that cannot be deduced from presently available and normally acquired sense-based information or laws of physics and/or nature. The related terms, premonition and presentiment refer to information about future events that is perceived as emotions.

The terms are usually used to denote a seemingly parapsychological or extrasensory process of perception, including clairvoyance.

This character engages in the acts of bondage during sexual scenes. Use this trait for the unrestrained partner and use i1643 on the partner in bondage.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bondage_(sexual)]Bondage[/url] is the use of restraints for the sexual pleasure of the parties involved. It may be used in its own right, as in the case of rope bondage and breast bondage, or as part of sexual activity or BDSM activity.
name: Bondage Sex

description: These are the traits for clothing with a signifiance in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christianity]christianity[/url].
name: Christianity

description:
This character has pubic stubble.

Pubic stubble refers to pubic hair which has been shaven and just begun to regrow. It is short, with a rough texture.

NOTE: In case of facial hair stubble use [url=https://vndb.org/i901]Stubble[/url].

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/103133.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/34/103134.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

description:
Erotic sexual denial is a sexual practice or sex play in which a person is kept in a heightened state of sexual arousal for an extended length of time without orgasm, and is commonly practiced in association with BDSM and sexual bondage.

Apply this trait to the passive participant, whose orgasm is controlled by his/her partner.

name: Robot
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robot]robot[/url].

A robot is a mechanical intelligent agent which can perform tasks on its own, or with guidance. The term robot can also apply to a virtual agent. In practice it is usually an electro-mechanical machine which is guided by computer or electronic programming.

This trait is intended for mechanical machine bodies with artificial intelligences and should not be mixed with cyborgs which are part human part machine.

name: Halterneck Dress
description:
A halterneck dress is a type of dress with the straps being tied behind the neck.
The straps can be tied behind the neck in various [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halterneck]forms[/url].

name: Nurse Uniform
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurse_uniform]nurse uniform[/url].

A nurse uniform is attire worn by nurses for hygiene and identification.

name: Bodysponge
description:
This character gets washed by another character. Apply i1938 to the performing character.

A Bodysponge is someone, mostly a woman, who uses their body to wash, usually (but not limited to) the back, of another character. This creates friction which may or may not lead to i1826. Can also result from (or to) sexual tension or as a form of gratitude.

Do not confuse with i1889, which refers to macrophillia, whereas here both are normal-sized.

This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immortality]immortal[/url].

Immortality is the ability to live forever.

 It is unknown whether human physical immortality is an achievable condition. Biological forms have inherent limitations which may or may not be able to be overcome through medical interventions or engineering. Natural selection has developed potential biological immortality in at least one species, the jellyfish Turritopsis nutricula.
name: Immortal
Containers
description: Any items with a primary purpose of containing any other items or substances belong here.

name: Navel Penetration
description:
This character engages in navel penetration. Apply i2168 to the penetrated character.

Navel penetration is a sexual act where a penis, tentacle or object is thrust into a character's navel.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/13/91013.jpg]NSFW Example Penis[/url]

name: Gardening
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gardening]gardening[/url].

Gardening is the practice of growing plants. Ornamental plants are normally grown for their flowers, foliage, overall appearance, or for their dyes. Useful plants are grown for consumption (vegetables, fruits, herbs, and leaf vegetables) or for medicinal use. A gardener is someone who practices gardening.

Gardening ranges in scale from fruit orchards, to long boulevard plantings with one or more different types of shrubs, trees and herbaceous plants, to residential yards including lawns and foundation plantings, to large or small containers grown inside or outside.

Gardening may be very specialized, with only one type of plant grown, or involve a large number of different plants in mixed plantings. It involves an active participation in the growing of plants, and tends to be labor intensive, which differentiates it from farming or forestry.

Hispanics and Latinos are an ethnolinguistic group of Americans with genealogical origins in the countries of Latin America and Spain. More generally it includes all persons in the United States who self-identify as Hispanic or Latino. Hispanic and Latinos are racially diverse, although predominately White or Mestizo. As a result of their racial diversity, Hispanics form an ethnicity sharing a language (Spanish) and cultural heritage, rather than a race.
name: Hispanic

description:
This character is an artist in the medium of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voice_acting]voice acting[/url].

Voice acting is the art of providing voices for animated characters (including those in feature films, television program, animated short films, and video games) and radio and audio dramas and comedy, as well as doing voice-overs in radio and television commercials, audio dramas, dubbed foreign language films, video games, puppet shows, and amusement rides.
name: Seiyuu

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cooking]cooks[/url].

Cooking is the process of preparing food with heat. 

This trait should be used for characters with cooking related scenes, and not just because they are professional cooks.
name: Cooking
Massage
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massage]Massage[/url] involves working and acting on the body with pressure – structured, unstructured, stationary, or moving – tension, motion, or vibration, done manually or with mechanical aids. Massage can be applied with the hands, fingers, elbows, knees, forearm, feet, or a massage device. Massage can promote relaxation and well-being, can be a recreational activity, and can be sexual in nature.
Somewhat similar to naked apron, this refers to a character wearing a shirt without any other forms of attire, including lingerie. Typically, though not always, an open shirt.
name: Naked Shirt

description:
This character is a middle brother.

A middle brother is a male sibling who is older than his younger sibling, but at the same time he's younger than his elder sibling.
name: Middle Brother

description: Similar to a [url=/i1633]handjob[/url] except instead of using a hand to stimulate the shaft of the penis, a hand is used to stimulate the scrotum (ballsack) containing the testicles.
name: Ball-cupping

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religious_habit]religious habit[/url].

A religious habit is a distinctive set of garments worn by members of a religious order.
name: Habit

description:
This character uses her/his body to wash another character. Apply i1939 to the receiving character.

A Bodysponge is someone, mostly a woman, who uses their body to wash, usually (but not limited to) the back, of another character. This creates friction which may or may not lead to i1826. Can also result from (or to) sexual tension or as a form of gratitude.

Do not confuse with i1888, which refers to macrophillia, whereas here both are normal-sized.
name: Bodysponge

description:
This character uses "oira", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.
"Oira" is similar to "ore", but more casual. May give off sense of more country bumpkin.
name: Oira

description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baseball]baseball[/url].

Baseball is a bat-and-ball sport played between two teams of nine players each. The goal is to score runs by hitting a thrown ball with a bat and touching a series of four bases arranged at the corners of a ninety-foot square, or diamond.

Players on one team (the batting team) take turns hitting against the pitcher of the other team (the fielding team), which tries to stop them from scoring runs by getting hitters out in any of several ways. A player on the batting team can stop at any of the bases and later advance via a teammate's hit or other means. The teams switch between batting and fielding whenever the fielding team records three outs. One turn at bat for each team constitutes an inning and nine innings make up a professional game. The team with the most runs at the end of the game wins.
name: Baseball
Central Heterochromia
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heterochromia#Central_heterochromia]central heterochromia[/url].

Central heterochromia is an eye condition where there are two colors in the same iris; the central (pupillary) zone of the iris is a different color than the mid-peripheral (ciliary) zone, with the true iris color being the outer color.

name: Sexual Fantasy
description: This character engages in sexual intercourse in their own dream, fantasy, illusion, etc.

name: Familiar
description:
The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Familiar]familiar[/url].

In European folklore and folk-belief of the Medieval and Early Modern periods, familiar spirits (sometimes referred to simply as "familiars") were supernatural entities believed to assist witches and cunning folk in their practice of magic. According to the records of the time, they would appear in numerous guises, often as an animal, but also at times as a human or humanoid figure, and were described as "clearly defined, three-dimensional… forms, vivid with colour and animated with movement and sound" by those alleging to have come into contact with them, unlike later descriptions of ghosts with their "smoky, undefined form[s]".

The person exhibits great amount of cruelty. Cruelty is indifference to suffering or even pleasure in inflicting it. The person enjoys making other people's lives a living hell. Can be related to sadism.
name: Cruel
Greek
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greeks]Greek[/url].

The Greeks, also known as the Hellenes, are an ethnic group native to Greece, Cyprus and other regions. They also form a significant diaspora, with Greek communities established around the world.
Greek colonies and communities have been historically established in most corners of the Mediterranean, but Greeks have always been centered around the Aegean Sea, where the Greek language has been spoken since antiquity. Until the early 20th century, Greeks were uniformly distributed between the Greek peninsula, the western coast of Asia Minor, Pontus, Egypt, Cyprus and Constantinople; many of these regions coincided to a large extent with the borders of the Byzantine Empire of the late 11th century and the Eastern Mediterranean areas of the ancient Greek colonization.

Lace-up shoes are shoes which are fastened with laces.

Laces are usually fastened to the foot and ankle but sometimes they reach the knee.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/29/90129.jpg]Ankle lace-ups[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/30/90130.jpg]Knee lace-ups[/url]
name: Lace-up Shoes

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colombian_people]Colombian[/url].

Colombian people are from a multiethnic Spanish speaking nation in South America called Colombia. Colombians are predominantly Roman Catholic and are a mixture of Europeans, Africans, and Amerindians.
name: Colombian

description: This is a meta-trait to house all traits about devices used in sex.
name: Sexual Devices
Tiny
description:
This character is tiny compared to regular humans, small enough to fit into the hand of a regular human. This is an example though, actual size may vary.

While fairies are usually depicted at this size, the trait is not exclusive to them nor applies to them all. There may be many other fantastical explanations, like the potion Alice drank in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alice_in_Wonderland]Alice's Adventures in Wonderland[/url] that made her tiny enough to fit a very, very small door.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medical_student]medical student[/url].

A person accepted into a medical school and enrolled in an educational program in medicine is referred to as a medical student.
name: Medical Student

description:
This character wears a kindergarten uniform or kindergarten smock either because they are a kindergarten student or as a form of cosplay.

Example: http://media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/a3/a5/e2/a3a5e227b460022a612fb0ca13a02686.jpg
name: Kindergarten Uniform

description:
This character is seen with (an ersatz of) [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pocky]Pocky[/url].

Pocky (ポッキー Pokkī) is a Japanese snack food produced by Ezaki Glico. Pocky was first sold in 1966, and consists of chocolate-coated biscuit sticks. It was named after the Japanese onomatopoetic word pokkin (ポッキン).

The original was followed by almond coatings in 1971, and strawberry coatings in 1977. Today, the product line includes variations as milk, mousse, green tea, honey, banana, cookies and cream, and coconut flavored coatings, and themed products such as "Decorer Pocky", with colorful decorative stripes in the coating, and "Men's Pocky", a dark (bittersweet) chocolate and "mature" version.
name: Pocky

description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ninjato]ninjato[/url].

The ninjatō is typically depicted as being a short sword, often portrayed as having a straight blade (similar to that of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shikomizue#Shikomizue]shikomizue[/url]) with a square guard. Usually of a length "less than 60 cm", the rest of the sword is comparatively "thick, heavy and straight".
name: Ninjato

description:
This character has white eye color.

It can be either of pure white with no iris, or colored pupils with white iris.
name: White
Wooden Horse
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wooden_horse_%28device%29]wooden horse[/url] is used on this character.

These devices can be used either for torturing a victim or as part of a BDSM scene.

name: Spaulders
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spaulders]Spaulders[/url] are pieces of armour in a harness of plate armour. Typically, they are a single plate of steel or iron covering the shoulder with bands (lames) joined by straps of leather or rivets.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monocle]monocle[/url].

A monocle is a type of corrective lens used to correct or enhance the vision in only one eye. It consists of a circular lens, generally with a wire ring around the circumference that can be attached to a string. The other end of the string is then connected to the wearer's clothing to avoid losing the monocle.
name: Monocle
Blue
description: This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eye_colors#Blue]blue eyes[/url].

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shopkeeper]shopkeeper[/url].

A shopkeeper is an individual who owns a shop. Generally, shop employees are not shopkeepers, but are often incorrectly referred to as shopkeepers.

Today, a shopkeeper is usually referred to as a manager, though this term could apply to larger firms (ie: multiple shops).
name: Shopkeeper
Pendant Earring
description:
A pendant earring is an earring with a piece hanging down.

Example: https://s.vndb.org/ch/35/29835.jpg

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Office_lady]office lady[/url].

An office lady is a female office worker in Japan who performs generally pink collar tasks such as serving tea and secretarial or clerical work. OLs are often unmarried and live with their parents well into early adulthood. Office ladies are usually full-time permanent staff, although the jobs they do usually have little opportunity for promotion, and there is usually the tacit expectation that they leave their jobs once they get married.

Often nicknamed shokuba no hana or "office flower", these women suffer discrimination due to the M-Curve. Office ladies are usually hired right after high school or junior high, with university graduates discouraged from pursuing this type of career. They are kept around the office for the youth they bring to it, hence the "flower" nickname. They are charged with routine, menial tasks meant to support the male workers. This type of career offers very little chance of advancement and was specifically designed so that women would leave for marriage before their thirties. Women between the ages of twenty four and twenty eight often are advised to settle down as a subtle message to quit, as those years are considered the most suitable for marriage.
name: Office Lady
Curtained
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curtained_hair]curtained hairstyle[/url].

Curtained hair is the term given to the hairstyle featuring a long fringe divided in either a middle parting or a side parting. When used, it generally applies to males.

name: Subject of
description: These are the traits for the actions characters get subjected to by others and situations that they are being the subject of.

name: Circlet
description: A circlet is a crown with neither arches nor a cap (internal covering).

name: Mind Control
description:
This character becomes the target of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brainwashing]brainwashing[/url].

Brainwashing refers to a process in which a group or individual "systematically uses unethically manipulative methods to persuade others to conform to the wishes of the manipulator(s), often to the detriment of the person being manipulated". The term has been applied to any tactic, psychological or otherwise, which can be seen as subverting an individual's sense of control over their own thinking, behavior, emotions or decision making.

name: Management
description: This character works in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Management]management[/url] career. Management is the process of getting people together to accomplish desired goals and objectives using available resources efficiently and effectively.

This character performs a buttjob. Apply i1775 to the receiving character.

The buttjob is a sexual act where the penis is thrust several times between a woman's buttocks. It is similar to boobjob and does not include any anal or vaginal penetration by itself.

[url=http://gelbooru.com//images/3f/64/3f644b6d92683b0d88ec3d8d05540099.jpeg?2649593]Example NSFW[/url]
name: Buttjob

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bandages]bandage[/url].

A bandage is a piece of material used either to support a medical device such as a dressing or splint, or on its own to provide support to the body. Bandages are available in a wide range of types, from generic cloth strips, to specialised shaped bandages designed for a specific limb or part of the body, although bandages can often be improvised as the situation demands, using clothing, blankets or other material.
name: Bandages

description:
This character engages in the acts of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domestic_violence]domestic violence[/url].

Domestic violence can be broadly defined as a pattern of abusive behaviors by one or both partners in an intimate relationship such as marriage, dating, family, friends or cohabitation. Domestic violence has many forms including physical aggression (hitting, kicking, biting, shoving, restraining, slapping, throwing objects), or threats thereof; sexual abuse; emotional abuse; controlling or domineering; intimidation; stalking; passive/covert abuse (e.g., neglect); and economic deprivation.

In games and anime domestic violence may appear as a comedy routine.
name: Domestic Violence

description: This character has garnet eye color.
name: Garnet

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leg_warmer]leg warmers[/url].

Leg warmers are coverings for the lower legs, similar to socks but thicker and generally footless. They were originally used as dancewear by ballet and other classic dancers in order to keep the leg muscles warm and to prevent cramping or other muscle injuries. No scientific data has been yet collected to substantiate the claim that leg warmers prevent injury.

Traditionally knitted from pure sheep wool, modern variants are more typically made of cotton, synthetic fibers, or both. Some are made of other materials, such as chenille.

Leg warmers can vary in length, and in width, due to the material's stretchiness. They are commonly worn between the ankle to just below the knee, though many dancers prefer it to extend to cover the lower parts of the thigh. 
Some leg warmers are particularly short and made of thinner material; these are also known as 'ankle warmers'.
name: Leg Warmers

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confident]confident[/url].

A confident person is sure of oneself; having no uncertainty about one's own abilities, correctness or success.
name: Confident

description: These are the traits for the characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clothing]clothing[/url] and [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Personal_armour]armor[/url].
name: Clothes
Furry Tail
description:
This character has a tail covered with fur. This type of tail is usually drawn to resemble the tail of a particular mammalian species, and the character will typically have ears that match it.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/37/7737.jpg]Example 1[/url] - cat tail
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/10/11610.jpg]Example 2[/url] - dog tail
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/46/87246.jpg]Example 3[/url] - fox tail

name: Detached Sleeves
description: This character wears an outfit with sleeves that aren't attached to a top; instead they're strapped onto the arm close to the shoulder.
