This is a sexual act in which three women rub their feet against a man's penis. 

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/60/88360.jpg]NSWF Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/61/88361.jpg]NSWF Example 2[/url]

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ribbon#Cloth_ribbon]ribbon[/url] on his/her hair.

A ribbon or riband is a thin band of flexible material, typically cloth but also plastic or sometimes metal, used primarily for binding and tying. In this case, a cloth or plastic ribbon is used on hair either as a decoration or to tie the hair.
name: Hair Ribbon
Donkan
description:
This character is blind against all romantic feelings and actions of people nearby.

Donkan characters can't read the atmosphere at all. Some donkans may be smart like a genius but they still can't understand the romantic feelings of anyone until a clear confession is made. Even than they need to ask for a confirmation and think about it for a while.

This character is wearing a randoseru.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Randoseru]randoseru[/url] is a sturdy leather backpack most often used by elementary school children in Japan.  They are most often red for girls and black for boys.
name: Elementary School Backpack

description:
This character is an older sister.

An older sister is a female sibling who is older than at least one of the other siblings.
name: Older Sister

description: This character has an irrational fear of dead things or things associated with death.
name: Necrophobia

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloning]clone[/url] of another character from the same game.

Cloning in biology is the process of producing similar populations of genetically identical individuals that occurs in nature when organisms such as bacteria, insects or plants reproduce asexually. Cloning in biotechnology refers to processes used to create copies of DNA fragments (molecular cloning), cells (cell cloning), or organisms.
name: Clone
Chinese Dress
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qipao]chinese dress[/url].

The cheongsam is a body-hugging (modified in Shanghai) one-piece Chinese dress for women; the male version is the changshan.

The stylish and often tight-fitting cheongsam that is most often associated with today was created in the 1920s in Shanghai and was made fashionable by socialites and upperclass women.

name: Mahjong
description:
Mahjong is a game that originated in China. It is commonly played by four players (with some three-player variations found in South Korea and Japan). Similar to the Western card game rummy, mahjong is a game of skill, strategy, and calculation and involves a degree of chance.

The game is played with a set of 144 tiles based on Chinese characters and symbols, although some regional variations use a different number of tiles. In most variations, each player begins by receiving 13 tiles. In turn players draw and discard tiles until they complete a legal hand using the 14th drawn tile to form four groups (melds) and a pair (head).

This character gets caught in an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accident]accident[/url].

An accident is a specific, unpredictable, unusual and unintended external action which occurs in a particular time and place, with no apparent and deliberate cause but with marked effects. It implies a generally negative outcome which may have been avoided or prevented had circumstances leading up to the accident been recognized, and acted upon, prior to its occurrence.
name: Accident
Rebellion
description:
This character takes part in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebellion]rebellion[/url].

Rebellion, uprising, or insurrection is a refusal of obedience or order. It may encompass a range of behaviors aimed at destroying or replacing an established authority such as a government or a head of state. On the one hand the forms of behaviour can include non-violent methods such as the phenomena of civil disobedience, civil resistance and nonviolent resistance. On the other hand it may encompass violent campaigns. Those who participate in rebellions, especially if they are armed rebellions, are known as rebels.

This character has sex in the [url=http://glamerotica101.com/blog/2014/09/29/sex-position-of-the-week-reverse-pile-driver/]reverse piledriver position[/url]. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply i1829 to the penetrating partner.

In this position the receiving partner lies on their head and upper body with their legs and hips up, while the penetrating partner stands above but instead of facing the receiver he faces away.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/86262.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/63/86263.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Reverse Piledriver

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alchemist]alchemist[/url].

Alchemy refers to a quest for a fabled elixir or kimia (Old Persian for "elixir", later arabicized as alchemy) capable of turning copper and other base metals to gold and also a quest for something to prevent human beings' bodies from becoming old.

Alchemy is both a philosophy and an ancient practice that seeks to prepare the "elixir of longevity" or philosophers' stone, accomplish the transmutation into gold, and attain ultimate wisdom. It supposedly involves the manufacture of several substances with unusual properties, as well as improvement of the alchemist. Some alchemical sources treat the various substances, equipment and processes in an allegorical sense, as metaphors for a spiritual discipline.

Practical alchemy, on the other hand, can be viewed as a protoscience, the precursor to modern inorganic chemistry, having provided many procedures, equipment and names of substances that are still in use.
name: Alchemist

description:
This character has some kind of symbol or picture in his/her eye(s).

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/79350.jpg]Example[/url].
name: Symbol
Betrothed
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engagement]engaged to be married[/url].

An engagement is a promise to marry, and also the period of time between proposal and marriage – which may be lengthy or trivial.

name: Socks
description:
These are the traits for characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Socks]socks[/url].

A sock is an item of clothing worn on the feet.

name: Taiwanese
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taiwanese_people]Taiwanese[/url].

Taiwanese people are individuals who either claim or are imputed cultural identity focused on Taiwan, or Taiwan Area which has been governed by the Republic of China (ROC) since 1945. 
At least three competing (occasionally overlapping) paradigms are used to identify someone as a Taiwanese person: a nationalist criteria, self-identification (including the concept of "New Taiwanese") criteria, and socio-cultural criteria.

name: Flight Attendant Uniform
description:
This character wears a [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flight_attendant#Uniforms_and_presentation]flight attendant's uniform[/URL] at some stage. It doesn't matter whether the character is actually a flight attendant or not.

[URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/81/79381.jpg]Example #1[/URL]
[URL=https://s.vndb.org/sf/82/79382.jpg]Example #2[/URL]

name: Patriotic
description:
The character is a patriot, a person who vigorously supports his country and its way of life.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patriotism]Patriotism[/url] is a devotion to one's country. In a generalized sense applicable to all countries and peoples, patriotism is a devotion to one's country for no other reason than being a citizen of that country.

name: Armpit Licking
description:
This character licks the armpit of another person. Apply i1992 to the receiving character.

Armpit licking is the act of licking someone's armpit.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/69/89469.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

This character wears [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/OpaqueNerdGlasses]coke-bottle glasses[/url].

Coke-bottle glasses have extremely thick lenses that hide the wearer's eyes behind blank white circles, that can be marked either with thin black spiraling lines, or, in the western variant, small or hazy dots denoting pupils.
name: Coke-bottle Glasses
Items
description: These are the traits for the things characters carry around with them most of the time, things that they can be identified with.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bun_%28hairstyle%29#Double_bun]double bun hairstyle[/url].

A bun is a type of hairstyle, typically worn by women, where the hair is pulled back from the face, twisted or plaited, and wrapped in a circular coil around itself, typically on the back of the head or neck. They can either be secured with a hairpiece, a hairnet and bobby pins. They may be tightly gathered or slightly messier and more informal. A double bun is a variation of this hairstyle featuring two of these buns.
name: Odango

description:
This character is seen with a radio.

A transistor radio is a small portable radio receiver that uses transistor-based circuitry.
name: Radio

description:
This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tray]tray[/url].

A tray is a shallow platform designed for carrying things. It is larger than a salver, a diminutive version commonly used for lighter and smaller servings, and it can be fashioned from numerous materials, including silver, brass, sheet iron, wood, melamine, and papier-mâché. Some examples have raised galleries, handles, and short feet for support.

Trays are flat, but with raised edges to stop things from sliding off of them. They are made in a range of shapes but are commonly found in oval or rectangular forms, sometimes with cutout or attached handles with which to carry them.
name: Tray
Teacher
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teacher]teacher[/url].

A teacher is a person who provides schooling for pupils and students. A teacher who facilitates education for an individual student may also be described as a personal tutor.

name: Suicide Attempt
description:
This character tried to commit suicide, but was stopped by people around, changed their mind in the last moment or simply didn't manage to actually kill themselves, even though they've tried.

Suicide is the act of intentionally causing one's own death. Suicide is often committed out of despair, the cause of which can attributed to a mental disorder such as depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, autism spectrum disorders, alcoholism, or drug abuse. Stress factors such as financial difficulties or troubles with interpersonal relationships often play a significant role.

name: Ribbon Hair Accessory
description: This character uses a ribbon as a hair accessory. The ribbon isn't used to tie anything and is typically located above the bangs or on top of the head.

This character engages in trampling. Apply i1945 to the character being trampled.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trampling]Trampling[/url] refers to the sexual activity that involves being trampled underfoot by another person or persons. Because trampling can be used to produce pain, the trampling fetish for some adherents is closely linked to sadomasochistic fetishism.

The most common form of trampling is done by a female (in rare situations by a male) walking on a male or female submissive and is usually done barefooted, in socks, nylons, or shoes. The trampler will predominantly walk, jump and stomp on the person's back, chest, stomach, genitalia and face.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/87684.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Trampling
Non-blood-related Sister
description:
This character is the non-blood-related sister of a character in this game.

This may be the result of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adoption[/url] or something similar.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diaper]diaper[/url].

A diaper is a kind of underwear that allows one to defecate or urinate on oneself discreetly. When diapers become soiled, they require changing; this process is often performed by a second person such as a parent or caregiver. Failure to change a diaper on a regular enough basis can result in diaper rash.
name: Diaper
Non-blood-related Daughter
description:
This character is the non-blood-related daughter of a character in this game.

This may be the result of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adoption[/url] or something similar.

name: Conductor
description:
This character is someone who is skilled in the art of directing a musical performance by way of visible gestures.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conducting]Conducting[/url] is the art of directing a musical performance by way of visible gestures. The primary duties of the conductor are to unify performers, set the tempo, execute clear preparations and beats, and to listen critically and shape the sound of the ensemble. Orchestras, choirs, concert bands and other musical ensembles often have conductors.
This character's military rank is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corporal]Corporal[/url].
name: Corporal

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secondary_education]seconday education[/url] [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student]student[/url].

Secondary education is the stage of education following primary school. Secondary education is generally the final stage of compulsory education. However, secondary education in some countries includes a period of compulsory and a period of non-compulsory education. The next stage of education is usually college or university.
name: High School Student

description:
This character is a middle sister.

A middle sister is a female sibling who is older than her younger sibling, but at the same time she's younger than her elder sibling.
name: Middle Sister

description:
This character wears a leather jacket.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leather_jacket]leather jacket[/url] is a jacket-length coat that is usually worn on top of other apparel or item of clothing, and made from the tanned hide of various animals.
name: Leather Jacket
AV Actor/Actress
description: This character plays in porn movies as a professional.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disappointment]Disappointment[/url] is the feeling of dissatisfaction that follows the failure of expectations or hopes to manifest. Similar to regret, it differs in that a person feeling regret focuses primarily on the personal choices that contributed to a poor outcome, while a person feeling disappointment focuses on the outcome itself.
name: Disappointment

description:
This character was not born under normal circumstances, even in the fantasy setting it belongs to. It may have been made purposefully or may have come into being by an accident. The point is, it was made, not born.

Golems animated by magic, creatures made in labs, all of them fall under this category. Walking dead do not count.
name: Construct
Nunchaku
description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nunchaku]nunchaku[/url] is a traditional Okinawan martial arts weapon consisting of two sticks connected at one end by a short chain or rope. The two sections of the weapon are commonly made out of wood, while the link is a cord or a metal chain. 

Modern-day nunchaku can be made from metal, wood, plastic or fibreglass.The nunchaku is most widely used in martial arts such as Okinawan kobudō and karate. Many varieties of nunchaku are available.

name: Absentminded
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Absentminded]absentminded[/url]. 

Absent-mindedness is a mental condition in which the subject experiences low levels of attention and frequent distraction. Absent-mindedness is not a diagnosed condition but rather a symptom of boredom and sleepiness which people experience in their daily lives. When suffering from absent-mindedness, people tend to show signs of memory lapse and weak recollection of recently occurring events. This can usually be a result of a variety of other conditions often diagnosed by clinicians such as ADD and depression. In addition to absent-mindedness leading to an array of consequences affecting daily life, it can have as more severe, long-term problems.
This character has sex in the infirmary of the school.
name: Sex in School Infirmary

description:
This person does not have/get sexual urges nor feel the need/interest to engage in it for any reason.

Not the same as abstinence or celibacy where they choose to ignore/hold back urges.
name: Asexual
Based on a Fictional Character
description:
This character is based on a famous character from another work of fiction.

This is different from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crossover_fiction]fictional crossover[/url] where the character is the actual famous character, not just a character inspired by that person.

This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Receptionist]receptionist[/url].

A receptionist is an employee taking an office/administrative support position. The work is usually performed in a waiting area such as a lobby or front office desk of an organization or business. The title "receptionist" is attributed to the person who is employed by an organization to receive or greet any visitors, patients, or clients and answer telephone calls. The term Front Desk is used in many hotels for an administrative department where a receptionist's duties also may include room reservations and assignment, guest registration, cashier work, credit checks, key control as well as mail and message service. Such receptionists are often called front desk clerks.
name: Receptionist

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equestrianism]horseback riding[/url] or another [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riding_animal#Riding_animals_or_mounts]riding animal or mount[/url].

Equestrianism more often known as riding, horseback riding (American English) or horse riding (British English) refers to the skill of riding, driving, or vaulting with horses. This broad description includes the use of horses for practical working purposes, recreational activities, artistic or cultural exercises, and competitive sports.
name: Riding
Mental Affliction
description:
This character suffers from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mental_disorder]mental disorder[/url].

A mental disorder is a psychological or behavioral pattern generally associated with subjective distress or disability that occurs in an individual, and which is not a part of normal development or culture. 

A few mental disorders are diagnosed based on the harm to others, regardless of the subject's perception of distress. Over a third of people in most countries report meeting criteria for the major categories at some point in their lives.

name: Trap
description:
This character is a boy who looks like, or usually mistaken as, a girl.

Dressing and acting like a girl is optional.

"Trap" does not imply any specific form of sexual orientation but only the physical appearance.
The preternatural entity possessing this character was either summoned or otherwise invited into the host's body.
name: Benevolent Possession
Barefoot
description:
This character is often [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barefoot]barefoot[/url]; doesn't wear any shoes.

Barefoot is the state of not wearing any footwear. 

Note: Do not use this trait if the character is barefoot just in the sex scenes, or once or twice takes off his/her shoes in the novel.

name: Indonesian
description: This character is a native of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indonesia]Indonesia[/url], or a person of Indonesian descent.

name: Princess
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess]princess[/url].

Princess is a general term for a ruler, monarch or member of a monarch's or former monarch's family, and is a hereditary title in the nobility of some European states.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laziness]lazy[/url] person.

Laziness (also called indolence) is a disinclination to activity or exertion despite having the ability to do so.
name: Lazy
Trousers
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trousers]trousers[/url].

Trousers are an item of clothing worn on the lower part of the body from the waist to the ankles, covering both legs separately.

A character with this trait wears a police officer's uniform. The character doesn't have to be an actual police officer to have this trait.

Accessories, equipment, colours and styles differ from country-to-country, and even state-to-state. It can also depend on a variety of other factors, such as an officer's rank or job within the force.

In general, both sexes wear:
* A hat with the force's insignia on it (usually as a metallic plate or an embroidery)
* A shirt
* A necktie
* A pair of trousers
* A utility belt that stores equipment (handcuffs, gun, pepper spray, radio, baton, etc.)
* Leather dress shoes, usually black or dark brown
name: Police Officer Uniform
Violinist
description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violin]violin[/url].

The violin is a string instrument, usually with four strings tuned in perfect fifths. It is the smallest, highest-pitched member of the violin family of string instruments, which includes the viola and cello.

name: Seduction
description:
This character tries to seduce another character(s).

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seduction]Seduction[/url], seen negatively, involves temptation and enticement, often sexual in nature, to lead someone astray into a behavioral choice they would not have made if they were not in a state of sexual arousal. Especially, it may be a treason against the wife/husband or girlfriend/boyfriend. Seen positively, seduction is a synonym for the act of charming someone by an appeal to the senses, often with the goal of reducing unfounded fears and leading to their "sexual emancipation".

This character gets her breast size increased in a very short period of time. This can be the result of a realistic medical procedure like breast implants, or of fantasy origin like some super drugs or magic.
name: Breast Expansion

description: This character has a significantly larger than [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_penis_size]average[/url] penis. This is either obvious in the art (e.g. v13053) or discussed by characters in the game.
name: Large Penis

description: A pinafore is a sleeveless dress intended to be worn over a top or blouse. Unlike an apron, it is a full sleeveless dress with two holes cut out for arms, and unlike other sleeveless dresses should be worn over a blouse or an underdress.
name: Pinafore Dress

description: These are the traits for the characters' clothing worn over others, or ones that cover their entire body or worn as a set. Like a robe or uniform.
name: Over Body Clothing
Empress
description:
This character is an [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/empress]empress[/url].

An empress is a female ruler of an empire or the consort of an emperor.

name: Bathrobe
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bathrobe]bathrobe[/url] is usually made from towelling or other absorbent textile, and may be donned while the wearer's body is wet, serving both as a towel and an informal garment.

A mandragora is [url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Mandragora]plant monster[/url] in the form of a woman with roots and a [url=http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mandragora]mandragora[/url] on top of the head. 

The parts corresponding to the roots are buried deep within the earth. They only push out the flower on their head to the surface of the ground. They wait for their prey, which is lured by the sweet fragrance released from the flower petals, to come and pull them up.
name: Mandragora

description: This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Underarm_hair]armpit hair[/url] and it is visible in some scenes.
name: Armpit Hair
Insightful
description:
This character can see right through people. You cannot hide anything from him, because he still will guess, and bring you to clean water.

Note: Please don't apply this trait to those who use telepathy.

name: Chaps
description: Chaps are sturdy coverings for the legs consisting of leggings and a belt. They are buckled on over trousers with the chaps' integrated belt, but unlike trousers they have no seat and are not joined at the crotch. They are designed to provide protection for the legs and are usually made of leather or a leather-like material. They are most commonly associated with the cowboy culture of the American west as a protective garment to be used when riding a horse through brushy terrain.

name: Researcher
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Research]researcher[/url].

A researcher is someone who conducts research, i.e., an organized and systematic investigation into something.

name: Scat
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coprophilia]Scat[/url] is a fetish involving the act of defecation or the feces itself in a sexual context.

name: Drinking
description:
This character drinks [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alcoholic_beverage]alcoholic beverages[/url].

An alcoholic beverage is a drink containing ethanol, commonly known as alcohol. Alcoholic beverages are divided into three general classes: beers, wines, and spirits. They are legally consumed in most countries, and over 100 countries have laws regulating their production, sale, and consumption.

This trait is intended for characters that drink alcoholic beverages a few times in the story, for the addiction alcoholism use the [url=https://vndb.org/i263]Alcohol Abuse[/url] trait.

name: Cousin
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cousin]cousin[/url].

A cousin is a relative outside the immediate family with whom one shares a common ancestor. The term is usually used when any of the other known terms are not applicable.

name: Personality
description:
These are the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trait_theory]traits for characters' personality[/url].

These traits are planned to be the ones that are about how characters act, so even if the trait you thought about sounds closer to a role, put the it here if it is more about characters' mindsets.

name: Spoiled
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spoiled]spoiled like a child[/url].

Spoiled characters exhibit behavioral problems as a result of overindulgence by parents or similar figures. They usually believe that they are more important than everybody else and they are supposed to get everything they want, when they want.

name: Ambitious
description: An ambitious person is defined as a person with an earnest desire for some type of achievement or distinction, such as power, honor, fame, or wealth, and the willingness to strive for its attainment.

This character is seen with a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wrench]wrench[/url].

A wrench is a tool used to provide grip and mechanical advantage in applying torque to turn objects—usually rotary fasteners, such as nuts and bolts—or keep them from turning.
name: Wrench

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kimono]kimono[/url].

Kimonos are T-shaped, straight-lined robes worn so that the hem falls to the ankle, with attached collars and long, wide sleeves. Kimonos are wrapped around the body, always with the left side over the right (except when dressing the dead for burial), and secured by a sash called an obi, which is tied at the back. Kimonos are generally worn with traditional footwear (especially zouri or geta) and split-toe socks (tabi).
name: Kimono

description:
This character skin is covered or partially covered by [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Feather]feathers[/url].

Feathers are epidermal growths that form the distinctive outer covering, or plumage, on birds. They aid in flight, thermal insulation, waterproofing, and coloration that helps in communication and protection.
name: Feathers

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kindness]kind[/url].

Kindness is the act or the state of being kind —ie. marked by goodness and charitable behaviour, mild disposition, pleasantness, tenderness and concern for others. It is known as a virtue, and recognized as a value in many cultures and religions.
name: Kind
Soldier
description:
This character is a [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/soldier]soldier[/url].

A soldier is a person who serves in an army; a person engaged in military service.
A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacifier]pacifier[/url] is a rubber, plastic, or silicone nipple given to an infant or other young child to suck upon.
name: Pacifier

description:
The character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Y%C5%8Dkai]youkai[/url].

They are a class of preternatural creatures in Japanese folklore ranging from the evil oni (ogre) to the mischievous kitsune (fox) or snow woman yuki-onna. Some possess part animal and part human features (e.g. kappa and tengu). Yōkai generally have a sort of spiritual or supernatural power. Yōkai that have the ability to shape-shift are called obake.
There are a wide variety of yōkai in Japanese folklore. In general, youkai is a broad term, and can be used to encompass virtually all monsters and supernatural beings, even including creatures from European folklore on occasion (e.g., the English bugbear is often included in Japanese folklore to the point that some mistakenly believe it originates from said folklore).
name: Youkai

description:
This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Culture_of_Japan]cultural[/url] club associated with a school.

A school cultural club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected discipline, that is somehow related to the culture, arts, science, IT and other non-sports subjects.
name: School Cultural Club Member
Tail
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tail]tail[/url] on her clothing.

The tail is the section at the rear end of an animal's body; in general, the term refers to a distinct, flexible appendage to the torso. It is the part of the body that corresponds roughly to the sacrum and coccyx in mammals and birds.

While tails are primarily a feature of vertebrates, some invertebrates including scorpions and springtails, as well as snails and slugs, have tail-like appendages that are sometimes referred to as tails.

This trait is intended for characters that have tails on their clothing as an accessory and should not be mixed with the body trait tail which refers to a real tail that is a part of a characters body.

name: South African
description: This character is from South Africa.
These are the traits for the characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Facial_Hair]facial hair[/url].
name: Facial Hair
Principal
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Principal#Education]principal[/url].

A headmaster is the most senior teacher, leader and manager of a school. And in academic level, a principal is the chief executive and the chief academic officer of a university or college in certain parts of the Commonwealth.

name: String Ribbon Tie
description: This character wears a very thin, almost string-like ribbon tie around their neck, contrary to the commonly thicker and larger bowtie-like ribbon ties.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infant]infant[/url] or has the appearance of being an infant.

The term infant is typically applied to young children between the ages of 1 month and 12 months; however, definitions may vary between birth and 2 years of age. A newborn is an infant who is only hours, days, or up to a few weeks old.
name: Infant

description:
This character wears a mini-dress.

A mini-dress is a very short dress, at least 10 cm above the knee.
name: Mini-dress

description:
These are the traits for characters' apparent age. Listed age categories are designed based on the concepts from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erikson%27s_stages_of_psychosocial_development]Erikson's stages of psychosocial development[/url].

Note that these traits only signify the physical appearance of characters, and they might not reflect actual age.
name: Apparent Age

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Driving]drives[/url] a vehicle.

Driving is the controlled operation and movement of a land vehicle, such as a car, truck or bus.

This trait should be used for characters with driving related scenes, and not just because they are professional drivers.
name: Driving

description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Massage]Massage[/url] involves working and acting on the body with pressure – structured, unstructured, stationary, or moving – tension, motion, or vibration, done manually or with mechanical aids. Massage can be applied with the hands, fingers, elbows, knees, forearm, feet, or a massage device. Massage can promote relaxation and well-being, can be a recreational activity, and can be sexual in nature.
name: Massage

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuff]cuffs[/url].

A cuff is an extra layer of fabric at the lower edge of the sleeve of a garment covering the arms.

Do not mix this with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handcuffs]handcuffs[/url].
name: Cuffs
Strapless Panties
description:
This character wears strapless panties.

Strapless panties as the name suggest are panties without straps or strings. It comes mainly in two forms: adhesive strapless panties or C-String.

[url=http://www.shibuecouture.com/product/shibue-no-line-strapless-panty-classic-black]Adhesive strapless panties[/url] are a self-adhesive strip of polyester fabric that reaches from the top of your lady regions back to the tip of your tailbone.

[url=http://www.buzzfeed.com/juliegerstein/the-c-string-makes-the-average-thong-look-like-granny-pantie#.ff8ggKOea2]C-Strings[/url] instead are looking more like a headband, the briefest of fronts tapers to a wire that tucks between your cheeks and holds everything together.

Use this trait also for any other strange kind of adhesive strapless panties.

This character receives a blessing of some kind from either a supernatural entity (god, angel, demon) or a prestigous person (king, priest). Consequently the blessing might be either an actual supernatural boost to his abilities/luck or just a verbal declaration of support.
name: Blessing

description:
This character plays the role of an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antihero]antihero[/url].

An antihero is a character lacking conventional heroic attributes. They are contrary to belief of a typical archetype hero using questionable methods to achieve their own ideals, all while staying true as a 'hero'. Often, they possess darker personalities and perform less moral actions such as unjustified killing of others and selfish gain, doing whatever it takes for them to achieve their goal.
name: Antihero
Selfish
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Selfish]selfish[/url].

Selfishness denotes an excessive or exclusive concern with oneself; and as such it exceeds mere self interest or self concern. In that it necessarily connotes a disregard for others, it is beyond the act of placing one's own needs or desires above the needs or desires of others (self interest).

name: Aunt
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Family#Western_kinship]aunt[/url].

An aunt is a father's sister, mother's sister, father's brother's wife, mother's brother's wife.
This character cannot touch or be touched. They might be someone's delusion, magic related, made of light, etc.
name: Intangible
Puffy
description: This character likes to puff out his cheeks like a child when he was insulted or when he cannot admit his own feelings and tries to hide them from the partner. It may look funny and cute.
Any sport related items belong here.
name: Sports Equipment
Marriage Proposal
description:
The character with this trait is proposed to in the story.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marriage_proposal]marriage proposal[/url] is an event where one person in a relationship asks for the other's hand in marriage.

name: Walking Stick
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walking-stick]walking stick[/url].

A walking stick is a device used by many people to facilitate balancing while walking. Some kinds of walking stick may be used by people with disabilities as a crutch.

The walking stick has also historically been known to be used as a defensive or offensive weapon, and may conceal a knife or sword as in a swordstick.

name: Astronaut
description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Astronaut]astronaut[/url].

An astronaut or cosmonaut is a person trained by a human spaceflight program to command, pilot, or serve as a crew member of a spacecraft.
This character uses "yo" (余), a formal [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronoun[/url], to address themselves.
name: Yo

description:
This character is a [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/Schoolmate]schoolmate[/url] of another character in this story.

A schoolmate is someone that you go to the same school with.
name: Schoolmate
Shopping
description:
The character partakes in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shopping]shopping[/url].

Shopping is the examining of goods or services from retailers with the intent to purchase at that time. Shopping is an activity of selection and/or purchase. In some contexts it is considered a leisure activity as well as an economic one.

name: Strange
description:
This character is considered [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/Strange]strange[/url] by the people around.

A strange character speaks and behaves in a different way then the surrounding people, who consider him/her off, odd, weird or even repulsive/attractive.

name: Sideburns
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sideburns]sideburns[/url].

Sideburns are patches of facial hair grown on the sides of the face, extending from the hairline to below the ears and worn with an unbearded chin.

Sideburns can be worn and grown in combination with other styles of facial hair, such as the moustache or goatee, but once they extend from ear to ear via the chin they cease to be sideburns and become a beard, chinstrap beard, or chin curtain.

A [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/pragmatic?s=t]pragmatic[/URL] person is somebody who makes decisions and take action based on logical, practical and/or rational considerations and perspectives. It should be noted that pragmatic people aren't necessarily cold or unemotional.
name: Pragmatic
Drawing
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drawing]drawing[/url].

Drawing is a form of visual expression and is one of the major forms within the visual arts. There are several categories of drawing, including figure drawing, cartooning and doodling. There are also many drawing methods, such as line drawing, stippling, shading, the surrealist method of entopic graphomania, and tracing.

name: Mistress
description:
This character is a mistress of another character.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mistress_%28lover%29]mistress[/url] is a relatively long-term female lover and companion who is not married to her partner, especially when her partner is married. Generally, the relationship is stable and at least semi-permanent, but the couple does not live together openly and the relationship is usually, but not always, secret. There is often also the implication (if not the fact) that the mistress is "kept" – i.e. that her lover is paying for some (and sometimes all) of her living expenses. 

This role does not preclude a character from also being a i371, i1493 or a courtesan.

This character walks around fully [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nudity]naked[/url].

Usually used to refer to characters not wearing any clothes.

This trait refers to characters walking around dressed in this sense, don't use it for characters who have naked sprites/tachies on rare occasions like sexual scenes, while most of the same time being clothed properly.
name: Naked
Coach
description:
This character acts as a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coach_%28sport%29]coach[/url].

In sports, a coach is an individual involved in the direction, instruction and training of the operations of a sports team or of individual sportspeople.

A coach can also be a person who instructs an actor or singer or any other type of a trainer.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belt_%28clothing%29]belt[/url].

A belt is a flexible band or strap, typically made of leather or heavy cloth, and worn around the waist. A belt supports trousers or other articles of clothing.

This trait is intended for characters that are actually seen wearing a belt, don't add it to anyone that is seen wearing a piece of clothing that is normally worn with a belt (like trousers) and add this tag too unless the belt is also seen or mentioned.
name: Belt
Bodyjob
description:
A bodyjob is performed on this character. Apply i1888 to the performing character.

A bodyjob is a non-penetrative sexual act witch involves the rubbing of the whole body against the penis of another person. For this to be even possible there should be remarkable size difference between the characters involved.
Possible example of bodyjobs can be a tiny fairy rubbing the body against the penis of a normal person, or a normal girl rubbing the body against the penis of a giant. This sexual act is most of the time represented as if the performer of the bodyjob is trying to hug the penis of the receiver.

This kind of sexual act is considered to be one of many examples of [url=https://vndb.org/g1405]macrophilia[/url].

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/41/86641.jpg]NSFW Fairy Example[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/42/86642.jpg]NSFW Giant Example[/url]

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yandere#Y]yangire[/url].

Yangire is used to describe a character who is mentally ill and snaps instantly without showing affection for the victim of their outbursts.

Just like yandere characters, yangire characters star very loving and gentle, and suddenly turn out violent, but the difference is that yangire characters' actions are not related to romantic feelings.
name: Yangire

description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Architect]architect[/url].

An architect is a person who plans, designs, and oversees the construction of buildings.
name: Architect
Naizuri
description:
Another character is attempting to perform a [url=/i1627]Boobjob[/url] on this character, but their breasts are too small to do it properly. Apply [url=/i1253]i1253[/url] to the performing character.

Naizuri literally means "rubbing against nothing".

Note: It's possible that the character realises the futility of their attempt and and helps our with their hands for example by rubbing the penis between their chest and the palms of their hands. The trait still applies in such cases.

This character has the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_physical_appearance]physical appearance[/url] of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/teen]teen[/url] of ages 13 to 19.

Note that this trait only signifies the physical appearance of this character, and it may not reflect actual age.
name: Teen
Fisting
description:
Another character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisting]inserts their fist[/url] into this character's vagina or anus in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1653]i1653[/url] to the character inserting their fist.

Don't use this trait for cases where a character fists themselves. Use [url=/i592]Masturbation[/url] instead.

name: Nymphomania
description:
This character suffers from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypersexuality]hypersexuality or nymphomania[/url].

Hypersexuality, or excessive sexual drive, are medical terms for a desire to engage in sexual activities at a level that is considered abnormally high in relation to normal development or culture and at a level that causes distress or serious problems for the person affected or to persons associated with them.

name: Class President
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Class_President]class president[/url].

A class president is usually the leader of a student body class, and presides over its class cabinet or organization within a student council, in a grade school class presidents are generally elected by the class, a constituency composed of all students in a grade level.

Class presidents are different from the student-body president in that they represent only a specific class of students, rather than the entire student body.

This character has a sex scene where they lose their virginity.

The usual bleeding need not be shown, but then it must be mentioned in the game (or in a trusted source like the game's website) that this was the first time this character had sex.

This trait can be used for both male and female characters. Do not use it on characters that have sex with a virgin, but are not virgins themselves.
name: Virgin Sex
Unnatural Tone
description: This character has a skin color and/or tone that is not found on humans normally.

This character has blond hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: Blond

description: This character engages in dancing at some point of the story.
name: Dancing

description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boxing]boxes[/url].

Boxing is a combat sport in which two people fight each other using their fists for competition.

Boxing is typically supervised by a referee engaged in during a series of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds, and boxers generally of similar weight. There are four ways to win; if the opponent is knocked out and unable to get up before the referee counts to ten seconds (a knockout, or KO) or if the opponent is deemed too injured to continue (a Technical Knockout, or TKO), if an opponent is disqualified for breaking a rule, or if there is no stoppage of the fight before an agreed number of rounds, a winner is determined either by the referee's decision or by judges' scorecards.
name: Boxing
Hermaphrodite
description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hermaphrodite]hermaphrodite[/url], possessing a mix of male and female sexual characteristics such as external genitalia, or chromosomes but does not fit the more specific (and more common) [url=/i737]Futanari[/url] trait.

For characters who have a non-binary gender identity regardless of their physical sex, please use the [url=/i1430]Non-Binary[/url] trait.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Politician]politician[/url].

A politician is an individual who is involved in influencing public policy and decision making. This includes people who hold decision-making positions in government, and people who seek those positions, whether by means of election, coup d'état, appointment, electoral fraud, conquest, right of inheritance or other means.
name: Politician
Leotard
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leotard]leotard[/url].

A leotard is a skin-tight one-piece garment that covers the torso but leaves the legs free. 

Leotards are worn by acrobats, gymnasts, dancers, figure skaters, athletes, actors, and circus performers both as practice garments and performance costumes. They are often worn together with tights or sometimes bike shorts. There are sleeveless, short-sleeved and long-sleeved leotards. A variation is the unitard, which also covers the legs. As a casual garment, a leotard can be worn with a belt.

Leotards are entered through the neck, in contrast to bodysuits which generally have snaps at the crotch, allowing the garment to be pulled on over the head. Scoop-necked leotards have wide neck openings and are held in place by the elasticity of the garment. Others are crew necked or polo necked and close at the back of the neck with a zipper or snaps.

This character has anal hair and it is visible in some scenes.

Anal hair in hentai characters is the extremization of an hairy character where hair usually grows just around the vagina. A character with anal hair is considered a carelessness and messy character usually found in niche fetish VN involving [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pubic_hair_fetishism]pubic hair fetishisim[/url].

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/35/97835.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/33/97833.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url] 
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/34/97834.jpg]NSFW Example Close Up[/url]
name: Anal Hair
Brown
description:
This character has brown hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginity]virgin[/url] at the time she is married.
name: Virgin Bride

description: This character has two identical braids, one on each side of their head.
name: Twin Braids
Trench Coat
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trenchcoat]trench coat[/url].

A trench coat or trenchcoat is a raincoat made of waterproof heavy-duty cotton drill or poplin, wool gabardine, or leather. It generally has a removable insulated lining; and it is usually knee-length.

name: Talkative
description: This character loves to talk. However, the topic he started is not always meaningful, which often annoys his companions, especially when they want to enjoy the silence.
This character is a father-con - a person who is overly attached to his/her father and would do anything for him. Can serve both as a comedic factor and/or romantic.
name: Father Complex
Immature
description:
This character doesn't act maturely.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maturity_%28psychological%29]Maturity[/url] is a psychological term used to indicate how a person responds to the circumstances or environment in an appropriate manner.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pocket_knife]pocket knife[/url].

A pocketknife is a folding knife with one or more blades that fit inside the handle that can still fit in a pocket. A larger folding knife or pocket knife is also known as a jackknife or jack-knife. Blades can range from 1 cm to as much as 30 cm in length, but a more typical blade length is 5 to 15 cm.
name: Pocket Knife
Side Tail
description:
A side tail is like a ponytail on the side of the head.

Different from [url=https://vndb.org/i19]Twin Tails[/url] as only the hair on one side of the head is tied up.

name: Nipple Piercing
description:
This character has a nipple piercing.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nipple_piercing]nipple piercing[/url] is a body piercing, centered usually at the base of the nipple.

name: Stethoscope
description:
This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/?title=Stethoscope]stethoscope[/url].

The stethoscope is an acoustic medical device for auscultation, or listening to the internal sounds of an animal or human body.

name: Benevolent Possession
description:
This character possesses another character with their (the host's) permission.

Note: If this character is possessing an inanimate object, just use [url=http://vndb.org/i1288]Possession[/url].

name: Premier
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Premier]Premier[/url] is a title for the head of government in some countries, states and sub-national governments. A second in command to a premier is designated as a vice-premier or deputy premier.

name: Pendant Necklace
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pendant]pendant[/url].

A pendant is a loose-hanging piece of jewellery, generally attached by a small loop to a necklace, when the ensemble may be known as a "pendant necklace". A pendant earring is an earring with a piece hanging down.

This character is the victim of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape_by_deception]deception or fraud[/url] to gain their sexual compliance from someone whom they would otherwise not give consent.

Examples include the use of disguises to confuse the victim or lying about oneself or the purpose for having sex.
name: Rape by Deception
Multilingual
description: This character is fluent in more than one language.

This character is subject of [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=ballbusting]ballbusting[/url]. Apply i1944 to the performing character.

Ballbusting is the act of kicking, kneeing or punching the testicles of a male deliberately for the sexual arousal or gratification of either or both parties.
The performer of the act is directly connected to the concept of domination while the receiver is connected to masochism and foot/shoe fetishism.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/85/87685.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Ballbusting
Prince Consort
description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_consort]prince consort[/url].

A prince consort is the husband of a [url=/i338]queen regnant[/url] who is not himself a king in his own right.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Personal_armour]armor[/url].

Personal armor is the whole of protecting clothing, designed to absorb and/or deflect slashing, bludgeoning, and penetrating attacks.
name: Armor
Cosmetic Surgery
description:
This person receives a cosmetic surgery. Cosmetic surgery is an optional procedure that is performed on normal parts of the body with the only purpose of improving a person's appearance and/or removing signs of aging.

The scope of cosmetic surgery procedures includes:
* Breast Enhancement: Augmentation, Lift, Reduction
* Facial Contouring: Rhinoplasty, Chin, or Cheek Enhancement
* Facial Rejuvenation: Facelift, Eyelid Lift, Neck Lift, Brow Lift
* Body Contouring: Tummy Tuck, Liposuction, Gynecomastia Treatment
* Skin Rejuvenation: Laser Resurfacing, Botox, Filler Treatments

This person exchanges his mind or soul with that of another's either through supernatural or technological means and they end up in each other's bodies. Alternatively, their minds may stay where they are as their bodies adjust.
name: Body Swap

description:
This character wears a [url=http://s2.thisnext.com/media/230x230/Gothic-Lolita-Elegant-Mini-Hat_F628F458.jpg]Mini hat[/url]. 

A mini hat is a tiny top hat which is usually worn on one side of the head, due to its size. It can be attached to a headband, although it's optional. 
More examples: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/84/79384.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/00/9200.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/85/79385.jpg]Example 3[/url].
name: Mini Hat

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Telepathy]telepathic[/url] abilities.

Telepathy refers to communication between minds by some means other than sensory perception. Examples include the capability of reading the thoughts of others around, influencing them, talking without speaking, etc.
name: Telepath
Arson
description: This character sets fire to a property.

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Family#Western_kinship]uncle[/url].

An uncle is a father's brother, mother's brother, father's sister's husband, mother's sister's husband.
name: Uncle

description:
This character is [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/distrustful]distrustful[/url].

Distrustful characters are unable or unwilling to trust, doubtful and suspicious of others.

Being suspicious of everyone else usually results from a previous trauma or similar event.
name: Distrustful

description:
This character plays [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Table_tennis]table tennis[/url].

Table tennis is a sport in which two or four players hit a lightweight ball back and forth across a table using a small bat. The game takes place on a hard table divided by a net. Except for the initial serve, the rules are generally as follows: players must allow a ball played toward them to bounce one time on their side of the table, and must return it so that it bounces on the opposite side at least once. A point is scored when a player fails to return the ball within the rules. Play is fast and demands quick reactions. Spinning the ball alters its trajectory and limits an opponent's options, giving the hitter a great advantage.
name: Table tennis

description:
This character sometimes acts like an  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idiot]idiot[/url].

An idiot is a mentally deficient person, or someone who acts in a self-defeating or significantly counterproductive way.
name: Idiot

description:
A vassal is a person regarded as having a mutual obligation to a lord, monarch, shogun or a person with similar authority. The obligations often included military support and mutual protection, in exchange for certain privileges, usually including land held as a tenant or fief.

In Feudal Japan, the relations between the powerful daimyo and shugo and the subordinate ji-samurai bear some obvious resemblance to western vassalage, although there are also some significant differences.
name: Vassal
Eidetic Memory
description:
This character has an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eidetic_memory]eidetic memory[/url].

Eidetic memory is an ability to vividly recall images from memory after only a few instances of exposure, with high precision for a brief time after exposure, without using a mnemonic device. Although the terms eidetic memory and photographic memory are popularly used interchangeably, they are also distinguished, with eidetic memory referring to the ability to view memories like photographs for a few minutes, and photographic memory referring to the ability to recall page or text numbers, or similar, in great detail.

A character with this trait had his/her committed romantic partner [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cuckold]stolen from them[/URL]. It doesn't matter if the "victim" in question enjoys this or not.

Please apply the [URL=https://vndb.org/i1325]Netori[/URL] trait to the character that did the stealing.
name: Netorare

description:
This character acts [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/possessive]possessive[/url].

A possessive character is jealously opposed to the personal independence of, or to any influence other than one's own upon, a child, spouse, etc.
name: Possessive
Practice Swords
description: This is the meta-tag to house all item traits that belong to the wooden swords family.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hood_%28headgear%29]hood[/url].

A hood is a kind of headgear that covers most of the head and neck and sometimes the face.
name: Hood
Goatee
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goatee]goatee[/url].

Goatee refers to a style of facial hair incorporating hair on a man’s chin.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jiangshi]jiangshi[/url] is a chinese [url=https://vndb.org/i487]vampire[/url]/[url=https://vndb.org/i1393]zombie[/url]. Jiangshi literally translates to 'stiff corpse'. It is a horrific creature that usually hops along, and when it comes across a victim it will suck the life force (in Chinese, "qi") out of them.

The jiangshi is said to be raised by a necromancer, or when the soul of a dead man cannot leave his body due to reasons in life, such as they were a horrible troublemaker, or if they commit suicide. The body looks different due to when they were raised. If they are raised soon after death, their appearance looks almost like a normal human, however if they have decomposed some time before they come to life, they can look horrific and ghastly.

Usually they are described as a pale white colour with furry green hair, moss, or mold growing on their flesh. The Jiang Shi also has pale, long white, messy hair atop their heads. They are said to have extremely long tongues and black, sharp fingernails, and they walk along with their arms outstretched.
name: Jiangshi
Ninja Suit
description:
This character wears a [url=http://romenov.com/daniel/?p=614]ninja suit[/url].

Usually the ninja wore more appropriate clothes to disguise the day-to-day activity or to mingle with the population, without attracting attention. One characteristic of the shinobi shozoku are the various compartments used to conceal weapons and other tools.

Each family had its own shinobi shozoku, with individual modifications appropriate to what they thought best for the moment, type of mission or for the season.

This character is the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student-body_president]student government president[/url].

The president of the student government is the highest ranking officer of a student government or student union association on the high school, college, or university level. Respected as one of the highest honored roles to achieve during academic studies, serving as president can enable a student to gain strong interpersonal, leadership, social, economic, and management skills. Employers may look highly upon an applicant who has served in this capacity.

A student government president is different from a class president. Class presidents only represent a specific class (grade) of students, while the body president is the highest ranking student in the school.
name: Student Council President

description: A member of the lowly social class which toils on the land, constituted by small farmers and tenants, sharecroppers, farmhands and other laborers on the land where they form the main labor force in agriculture and horticulture.
name: Peasant
Fishing
description:
The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fishing]fishing[/url].

Fishing is the activity of trying to catch fish. Fish are normally caught in the wild. Techniques for catching fish include hand gathering, spearing, netting, angling and trapping. The term fishing may be applied to catching other aquatic animals such as molluscs, cephalopods, crustaceans, and echinoderms. The term is not normally applied to catching aquatic mammals, such as whales, where the term whaling is more appropriate, or to farmed fish.

The character is subjected to torture using needles, nails, or other pointy objects.

Needles, nails or spikes are used to perforate or pierce the skin and body of a character with the intention of hurting him. This trait should not be used by unintentional perforation.
name: Piercing Torture
Rubber Band With Beads
description:
This character's hair is tied with a rubber band which has bead(s) on it as a decoration.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/63/7963.jpg]Example[/url]

Duct tape bondage is bondage involving the use of duct tape to restrict movement, wrap, suspend, or restrain a person, as part of BDSM activities.

NOTE: Duct tape used *only* as a mouth gag should be applied with "[url=https://vndb.org/i1080]Gag[/url]" instead.

Use "Subject of (Sexual)/[URL=https://vndb.org/i2368]Duct Tape Bondage[/URL]" for character(s) getting bound by the tape.

Cooking is the process of preparing food with heat. 

This trait should be used for professional cooks, not every character with cooking related scenes.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crop_top]crop top[/url].

A crop top is a T-shirt or blouse with the lower part cut off, showing off some of the abdomen. The half shirt (or belly shirt) is a kind of shirt that is cut off from the bottom of the chest.
name: Crop Top

description: This is the meta-trait to group relationship traits about brothers.
name: Brother
Bodyjob
description:
This character performs a bodyjob. Apply i1889 to the receiving character.

A bodyjob is a non-penetrative sexual act witch involves the rubbing of the whole body against the penis of another person. For this to be even possible there should be remarkable size difference between the characters involved.
Possible example of bodyjobs can be a tiny fairy rubbing the body against the penis of a normal person, or a normal girl rubbing the body against the penis of a giant. This sexual act is most of the time represented as if the performer of the bodyjob is trying to hug the penis of the receiver.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ribbon]ribbons[/url].

A ribbon or a thin band of flexible material, typically cloth but also plastic or sometimes metal, used primarily for binding and tying. In this case, a cloth or plastic ribbon is used as a clothing decoration or a fashion item.
name: Ribbon
Sitting
description:
This character has sex in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_positions#Sitting_and_kneeling]sitting[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1691]i1691[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the penetrating partner sits with their torso mostly upright, while the receiving partner sits or squats over their lap, possibly leaning on the penetrating partner for support. They may face towards or away from the penetrating partner.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/37/22737.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/36/84136.jpg]Example 2[/url] - Receiving partner facing away
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/37/84137.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Participants facing each other. Similar to [url=/i95]cowgirl[/url] position except penetrating partner is sitting mostly upright instead of lying down.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magical_girl]magical girl[/url].

A magical girl is a young girl with superhuman abilities, who fights evil and protects the Earth.
name: Mahou Shoujo

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Family#Western_kinship]grandson[/url].

A grandson is a child's son.
name: Grandson
Glaive
description:
This character carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glaive]glaive[/url].

A glaive is a European polearm weapon, consisting of a single-edged blade on the end of a pole.

name: Mother
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mother]mother[/url].

A mother is a woman who has conceived, given birth to, or raised a child in the role of a parent.

name: Kouhai
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sempai]kouhai[/url] of another character in this story.

A senior student will often refer to junior students as "kouhai", and alumni will often refer to alumni from late classes as "kouhai". This holds true particularly if fate brings them together later on, such as joining the same company, serving on a board together, or simply being in a club or parent's organization at the same time.

name: Bridal Carry
description:
This character is carried the bridal style.

A man or possibly a woman carries a woman/man in his arms — one arm under their legs and the other supporting their back like a groom carrying his bride.

This character is subject to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Facesitting]facesitting[/url] in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1527]i1527[/url] to the character sitting on this character.

Facesitting is a sexual practice in which one partner sits on or over the other's face, typically to allow or force oral-genital or oral-anal contact. Facesitting is common among dominant and submissive individuals, for demonstrating superiority and for sexual gratification.
name: Facesitting
Half-sister
description:
This character is a half-sister.

A half-sister is a female sibling who shares one biological parent with the other siblings.  Do not confuse with Step-sister.  Half-sisters share blood relations, while step-sisters do not.

name: Comedian
description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comedian]comedian[/url].

A comedian is somebody who makes a living off of entertaining an audience, usually by making them laugh with jokes or amusing skits.

name: Ceremonial Japanese Clothing
description:
The character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_Japanese_clothing]traditional Japanese clothing[/url].

The various traditional ethnic garments worn in Japan, mainly worn for ceremonies and special occasions like weddings or festivals.

name: Electric Appliances
description: Any kind of small electronic device.

This character is drugged by one or several characters. He/she usually, but not always, has no knowledge of the act and those responsible.

It's not limited to just narcotic or aphrodisiac, but rather indicates any substance, chemical, pill, drug, potion, etc. with effect ranging from heightening/lowering sexual desire to affecting or interfering with the brain/body functions.

This tag is not for medication or prescribed medicine.
name: Being Drugged
One Piece Swimsuit
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/One-piece_swimsuit]one-piece swimsuit[/url].

A one-piece swimsuit is a usually skin-tight one-piece swimsuit worn by women and girls when swimming in the sea or in a swimming pool, or for any activity in the sun, such as sun bathing. The one-piece swimsuit usually covers a female's torso.

Some women wear a one-piece swimsuit because they consider it to be more modest than a two-piece bikini. Before the popularity of the bikini, virtually all female swimsuits were one piece, and in older days men wore similar swimsuits that covered their whole torso.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skiing]skis on snow[/url].

Skiing is a recreational activity using skis as equipment for traveling over snow. Skis are used in conjunction with boots that connect to the ski with use of a binding.

Skiing can be grouped into two general categories. The older of the two disciplines originated in Scandinavia and uses free-heel bindings that attach at the toes of the skier's boots but not at the heels. Types of Nordic skiing include cross-country, ski jumping and Telemark. Alpine skiing (more often called "downhill skiing"), originated in the European Alps, and is characterized by fixed-heel bindings that attach at both the toe and the heel of the skier's boot.
name: Skiing
Lesbian Sex
description:
This character participates in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lesbian_sex]lesbian sex[/url].

Lesbian sexual practices are sexual activities where the participants are women.

This character have grotesque holed nipples due to a temporary or permanent effect (magic, operation, experiment, etc...).

Holed nipples is a grotesque body modification where tits have a big hole where nipples should be. This hole is usually, but not always, used for [url=https://vndb.org/i1175]nipple insertion[/url].

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sailor_suit]sailor suit[/url] is a uniform traditionally worn by enlisted seamen in the navy, and other government funded sea services. It later developed into a popular clothing style for children.

Some Japanese [url=/i62]school uniforms[/url] are in the style of sailor suits.
name: Sailor Suit

description: These are the traits related to the characters [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Health]health[/url].
name: Health Related
Swimming
description: This character competes in or engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_(sport)]swimming[/url].

name: Baby Complex
description:
This character wants to have a baby with the protagonist and will do anything for it.
Idea of bearing protagonist's children means everything for this character and is basically obsessed by this.
In extreme cases this character is even capable to rape the protagonist just to have his children.

name: Funny
description:
This character is usually considered [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Funny]funny[/url].

Humour or humor is the tendency of particular cognitive experiences to provoke laughter and provide amusement.

People of all ages and cultures respond to humour. The majority of people are able to experience humour, i.e., to be amused, to laugh or smile at something funny, and thus they are considered to have a sense of humour. The hypothetical person lacking a sense of humour would likely find the behaviour induced by humour to be inexplicable, strange, or even irrational. Though ultimately decided by personal taste, the extent to which an individual will find something humorous depends upon a host of variables, including geographical location, culture, maturity, level of education, intelligence and context.

name: Group Sex
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Group_sex]group sex[/url].

Group sex is sexual behavior involving more than two participants. Group sex can occur amongst people of all sexual orientations and genders.

The following traits are for the active or performing participant(s). Traits for the passive or receiving participant(s) are under [url=/i1625]Subject of (Sexual)[/url]>[url=/i1687]Group Sex[/url].

name: Non-human
description:
This character is not a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human]human[/url], nor a member of any species listed under [url=http://vndb.org/i408]Nature[/url].

This trait is intended to be used for characters that are revealed to be something else than a human, or a member of any of the existing traits under [url=http://vndb.org/i408]Nature[/url]. If the species is something that can be described easily, something relatively common, make a new trait for it and use this trait mainly for things that are not easy to identify, things that are not explained.

name: Tracksuit
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tracksuit]tracksuit[/url].

A tracksuit is an article of clothing consisting of two parts: trousers and a jacket usually with front zipper. It was originally intended for use in sports, mainly as what athletes wore over competition clothing (such as running shirt and shorts or a swimsuit) and would take off before competition.

name: Short Bangs
description: This character has short bangs. The bangs are located above the eyebrows and only a little lower than the hairline.

name: Skull-fucking

This character is subject of skullfucking. Apply i2087 to the performing character.

Skullfucking is a dark sexual act involving the penetration of head (skull) cavities except for the mouth. Amongst those cavities we include: eye sockets, nose holes, ears but also brain through a wound or neck if head is chopped off. 
Skullfucking is a sub-section of [url=https://vndb.org/g162]guro[/url] and it is considered a dark sexual act.

This character wears a crotchless and/or open cup teddy.

An open cup crotchless teddy is a [url=https://vndb.org/i2276]teddy[/url] that does not cover crotch or tits area. It looks kinkier than a traditional teddy and more functional to the purpose of having sex since it doesn't need to be removed to achieve vaginal and anal insertion.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/94/101794.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
