description:
This character dresses in the [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=kodona]Kodona style[/url].

Kodona is literally the boys solution to the popular japanese 'lolita' fashion. 
It involves wearing a style similar to what victorian boys wore. Including masculine blouses and shirts, knickerbockers, short trousers, knee high socks, top hats and newsboy caps. This is also what some girls use when they don't want to dress 'up like a victorian doll'.
name: Kodona
Head Wings
description: The character has wings on his or her head.

This character has an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Axe]axe[/url].

The axe, or ax, is an implement that has been used for millennia to shape, split and cut wood; to harvest timber; as a weapon; and as a ceremonial or heraldic symbol. The axe has many forms and specialized uses but generally consists of an axe head with a handle, or helve.
name: Axe
Employee
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Employee#Employee]employee[/url].

An employee is any person hired by an employer to do a specific "job". In most modern economies, the term employee refers to a specific defined relationship between an individual and a corporation, which differs from those of customer, or client.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost]ghost[/url].

In traditional belief, a ghost is the soul or spirit of a deceased person or animal that can appear, in visible form or other manifestation, to the living. Descriptions of the apparition of ghosts vary widely: The mode of manifestation can range from an invisible presence to translucent or wispy shapes, to realistic, life-like visions. The deliberate attempt to contact the spirit of a deceased person is known as necromancy, or in spiritism as a séance.
name: Ghost

description:
This character is the student government vice president.

The vice president of the student government is the second highest ranking officer of a student government or student union association on the high school, college, or university level. The vice president is the right-hand person of the president of the student government, and is usually the second-in-command within the student government.

Should the president be unable to fulfill the role of his/her position due to absence, having resign, or some other reasons, the vice president will be the one to succeed the position, whether temporarily or permanently depending on the nature of the situation. Depending on the school, this decision can also be influenced by the votes of the other members of the student government and/or the student body.

The vice president also have a high authority in the student government, surpassed only by the president. The vice president is also often in charge of making important decisions in the student government and can also act as the representative of the president as the right-hand person of the highest ranking officer of the student government.
name: Student Council Vice President
Healer
description:
This character is a healer. The known types of healers are:

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faith_healer]Faith Healers[/url]
Faith healing is healing through spiritual means. Believers assert that the healing of a person can be brought about by religious faith through prayer and/or rituals that, according to adherents, stimulate a divine presence and power toward correcting disease and disability. Belief in divine intervention in illness or healing is related to religious belief. In common usage, faith healing refers to notably overt and ritualistic practices of communal prayer and gestures (such as laying on of hands) that are claimed to solicit divine intervention in initiating spiritual and literal healing.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_healer]Traditional Healer[/url]
Traditional healing covers the health practices, approaches, knowledge and beliefs incorporating plant, animal and mineral-based medicines, spiritual therapies, manual techniques and exercises, applied singularly or in combination to treat, diagnose and prevent illnesses or maintain well-being. And should not be mixed with modern, government regulated, medicine and medical practices.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Healer_%28alternative_medicine%29]Alternative Medicine Healer[/url]
Alternative medicine is any practice that is put forward as having the healing effects of medicine, but is not based on evidence gathered with the scientific method. Often not part of conventional treatment, alternative medicine is usually based on tradition, belief in supernatural energies, pseudoscience, errors in reasoning, propaganda, or fraud. Alternative therapies lack scientific validation, and their effectiveness is either unproved or disproved. They have also been defined more broadly as the treatments that are not part of the conventional healthcare system.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dog]dog[/url] or has dog-like physical features.

The dog is a domesticated form of the gray wolf, a member of the Canidae family of the order Carnivora. The term is used for both feral and pet varieties. Through selective breeding by humans, the dog has developed into hundreds of varied breeds, and shows more variation than any other land mammal.
name: Dog
Kevlar Armor
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ballistic_vest]bulletproof vest[/url].

A bulletproof vest is an item of personal armor that helps absorb the impact from firearm-fired projectiles and shrapnel from explosions, and is worn on the torso.

name: Round
description:
This character has round, cartoonish eyes. They may or may not have irises. Do not mix this trait with [url=/i917]Tareme[/url], chibi eyes or any other common anime eyes.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/81/12781.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/46/79346.jpg]Example 2[/url]

name: Mayadere
description:
This character is a mayadere, a deadly dangerous tsundere.

A mayadere usually starts as an antagonist trying to kill the someone but switches sides after falling in love. This character is unpredictable and dangerous for everyone including the romantic interest.

This character is overconfident.

Overconfidence is a well-established bias in which someone's subjective confidence in their judgments is reliably greater than their objective accuracy, especially when [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Confidence]confidence[/url] is relatively high.
name: Overconfident

description:
This character [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/confine]confines[/url] someone.

Confinement is to shut or keep a person in a small closed space and prevent that person from leaving this place because of imprisonment, illness, discipline, etc.
name: Confinement
Saw
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saw]saw[/url].

A saw is a tool that uses a hard blade, wire, or chain with a toothed edge to cut through softer materials. A saw may be worked by hand, or powered by steam, water, electricity or other power. An abrasive saw uses a powered circular blade for cutting metal.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turban]turban[/url].

A turban is a kind of headwear based on cloth winding. Featuring many variations, it is worn as customary headwear, usually by men.
name: Turban

description:
This character uses "atashi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns for "I"[/url], to address themselves.

The "atashi" pronoun is used mostly by females, rarely males (girlish), and is often considered cute. Rarely used in written language, but common in conversation, especially among younger women.
name: Atashi
Regicide
description: The person is responsible for the murder of a royalty.

name: Stuffed Toy
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stuffed_toy]stuffed toy[/url].

A stuffed toy is a toy sewn from cloth, plush, or other textiles, and stuffed with straw, beans, plastic pellets, cotton, synthetic fibres, or other similar materials. Stuffed toys are also known as plush toys (U.S. English) from plush, the outer material used, and soft toys or cuddly toys (British English).

Stuffed toys are made in many different forms, often resembling animals, legendary creatures, cartoon characters or inanimate objects. They are often used as comfort objects, for display or collecting and given as gifts, such as for graduation, Valentine's Day or birthdays.

The Metropolitan of the Malankara Mar Thoma Syrian Church also wears a mitre during important ceremonies such as the Episcopal Consecration.

A blade is used to cut, stab, slash, chop, slice, thrust, position and/or place (an example of this is razor wire), or scrape (an example of this is an ink eraser).

As a prefix, ex- can refer to a variety of different relationships; for example, one might refer to a music group's ex-guitarist, or someone's ex-friend. When used alone, ex as a noun is assumed to refer to a former sexual or romantic partner, especially a former spouse. This often has a derogatory tinge, especially if it refers to unrequited feelings.

One of the most recognized justifications is self defense, which provides, in part, that in certain circumstances a person is justified in killing another to protect his own life from a deadly attack.

There are many other species of rabbit, and these, along with pikas and hares, make up the order Lagomorpha. The male is called a buck and the female is a doe; a young rabbit is a kitten or kit.

The cat, also known as the domestic cat or housecat[5] to distinguish it from other felines and felids, is a small furry domesticated carnivorous mammal that is valued by humans for its companionship and for its ability to hunt vermin and household pests.

Cats have been associated with humans for at least 9,500 years, and are currently the most popular pet in the world. Owing to their close association with humans, cats are now found almost everywhere in the world.

Magatama (勾玉), less frequently (曲玉), are curved, comma-shaped beads that appeared in prehistoric Japan from the Final Jōmon period through the Kofun period.

The beads, also described as jewels, were made of primitive stone and earthen materials in the early period, but by the end of the Kofun period were made almost exclusively of jade. 

Magatama originally served as decorative jewelry, but by the end of the Kofun period functioned as ceremonial and religious objects.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asphyxia]Asphyxia[/url] or asphyxiation is a condition of severely deficient supply of oxygen to the body. In order to be considered torture asphyxia should not be caused by natural causes or by any incidental means.

Strangling - using hands, rope, ecc... to suffocate someone for a period of time 
Drowning - forcing someone to keep head underwater for a period of time
Hanging - forcing someone to hang for a period of time

Metamorphosis in fiction is not exclusive to animals.

Unlike shapeshifting, metamorphosis is permanent and there is no turning back.

The process of writing source code often requires expertise in many different subjects, including knowledge of the application domain, specialized algorithms and formal logic.

Criminal Accomplice
description:
At law, an [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accomplice]accomplice[/URL] is a person who actively participates in the commission of a crime, even though they take no part in the actual criminal offense. For example, in a bank robbery, the person who points the gun at the teller and asks for the money is guilty of armed robbery. However, anyone else directly involved in the commission of the crime, such as the lookout or the getaway car driver, is an accomplice, even though in the absence of an underlying offense keeping a lookout or driving a car would not be an offense.

Not to be confused with an [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accessory_%28legal_term%29]accessory[/URL] in that an accomplice is present at the actual crime, and could be prosecuted even if the main criminal (the principal) is not charged or convicted. An accessory is generally not present at the actual crime, and may be subject to lesser penalties than an accomplice or principal offender.

name: Tomboy

A tomboy is a girl who exhibits some characteristics and or behavior considered typical of the gender role of a boy, including the wearing of typically masculine-oriented types of clothes and engaging in games and activities that are often physical in nature, and which are considered in many cultures to be the domain of boys.

This character reacts like a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsukkomi]tsukkomi[/url].

In a Japanese comedy duo, the tsukkomi (突っ込み) refers to the role one comedian plays in "butting in" and correcting the errors of the other (called the boke). It is common for tsukkomi to berate boke and hit them on the head with a swift smack; traditionally, tsukkomi often carried a fan as a multi-purpose prop, one of the uses for which was to hit the boke with. Boke and tsukkomi are loosely equivalent to the roles of "funny man" or "comic" (boke) and "straight man" (tsukkomi) in the comedy duos of western culture.

In stories, tsukkomi refers to a typically level-headed character who habitually engages in no-nonsense critical commentary on the behavior of funny characters.
name: Tsukkomi

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fairy]fairy[/url].

A fairy is a type of mythical being or legendary creature, a form of spirit, often described as metaphysical, supernatural or preternatural.

This trait is intended to be used for tiny fairies like [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tinker_Bell]Tinker Bell[/url] of the Peter Pan stories and should not be used for any other types of characters such as LotR inspired [url=http://vndb.org/i712]Elves[/url].
name: Fairy

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/School_nurse]school nurse[/url].

Schools have nurses to promote good health in students, and in preparation for illnesses and emergencies in students.
name: School Nurse

description: Meta trait for full body suits. Unlike [url=https://vndb.org/i143]business suits[/url], full body suits are usually designed for a specific purpose, usually to protect the wearer from harsh conditions. A few examples: space suits, diving suits, tactical suits, etc.
name: Full Body Suit

description:
This character has braids fashioned as a headband on their head.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/29/33129.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/12/11112.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/06/25606.jpg]Example 3[/url]
name: Braided Headband

description: These characters use "boku", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronoun]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.
name: Boku
Soul Patch
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soul_patch]soul patch[/url].

A soul patch is a small patch of facial hair just below the lower lip and above the chin.

This character has sex in the [url=http://www.menshealth.com/sex-position-playbook/quicke-fix]quickie fix[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrating partner and apply [url=/i1327]i1327[/url] to the penetrated partner.

This is a variant of the [url=/i1692]doggy[/url] position. The receiving partner stands while bending at the waist and leaning on a piece of furniture, a wall, or their knees for support. The penetrating partner stands behind the receiving partner, possibly holding the receiving partner's hips or hands for support while they thrust.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/68/84168.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/70/84170.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/92/90892.jpg]Example 3[/url]
name: Quickie Fix
Mask
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mask]mask[/url].

A mask is an article normally worn on the face, typically for protection, disguise, performance or entertainment.

name: Cannibalism
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cannibalism]cannibalism[/url].

Cannibalism is the act or practice of humans eating the flesh of other human beings.

While the expression "cannibalism" has origins in the act of humans eating other humans, it has extended into zoology to mean the act of any animal consuming members of its own type or kind, including the consumption of mates.

name: Ogre
description:
An [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ogre]ogre[/url] is a being usually depicted as a large, hideous, manlike monster that eats human beings.

Ogres are often depicted as inhumanly large and tall and having a disproportionately large head, abundant hair, unusually colored skin, a voracious appetite, and a strong body. Ogres are closely linked with giants and with human cannibals in mythology.

This character has white hair.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
name: White

description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Australians]Australian[/url].

Australians are defined as people native to or residents in Australia.
name: Australian
Nipple Covers
description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pasties]Nipple covers or pasties[/url] are patches that cover a person's nipples and areolae which are affixed with adhesive. Pasties come in a variety of colors, diameters, and shapes. Though pasties come in a variety of sizes, they usually are not much larger than the areola.

Though pasties are commonly associated with burlesque and erotic entertainment, they are also at times worn more casually as an undergarment and occasionally as beachwear.

This character use "watakushi", one of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/url] for "I", to address themselves.

Watakushi is the most formal polite form of the Japanese pronouns for "I".
name: Watakushi

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Braid]braided[/url] hairstyle.

Braid is a hair style formed by interweaving three or more strands of hair.
name: Braid

description:
The pubic hair near this character's genitals is shaved during the story.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/27/56927.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
name: Pubic Hair Shaving
Missionary
description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_positions#Penetrating_partner_on_top_with_front_entry]missionary[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1694]i1694[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the receiving partner lies on their back with their legs apart, while the penetrating partner lies, (or supports themselves) on top.

This is similar to some of the [url=https://vndb.org/i1700]butterfly[/url] positions except the penetrating partner's torso is closer to horizontal instead of vertical.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/71/84171.jpg]Example[/url]

This character is seen with a vacuum cleaner.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vacuum_cleaner]vacuum cleaner[/url] is a device that uses an air pump, to create a partial vacuum to suck up dust and dirt, usually from floors, and from other surfaces as well.
name: Vacuum Cleaner

description: An [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assault_rifle]assault rifle[/url] is a selective fire rifle that uses an intermediate cartridge and a detachable magazine.
name: Assault Rifle

description:
This character is a [url=http://yokai.wikia.com/wiki/Tsukumogami]tsukumogami[/url].

Tsukumogami is a term used to categorize a type of yôkai. The most accepted definition of the term says that tsukumogami are inanimate objects that once they have served their owner/s for 100 years, they receive a soul and therefore become alive and self-aware.

Tsukumogami can range from weapons to clothes to umbrellas. The umbrella version ([url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kasa-obake]karakasa[/url]) is typically depicted with one eye, a mouth, two arms and one leg. Another popular one is [url=http://yokai.wikia.com/wiki/Ittan_Momen]Ittan-momen[/url], a floating strip of cotton cloth with eyes and arms.
name: Tsukumogami
Delusion
description:
A character with this trait is afflicted with or experiences a delusion. It could be a result of a [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/hallucination?&path=/]hallucination[/URL], [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/brainwashing?&path=/]brainwashing[/URL] or drug abuse. It doesn't matter if they have an actual, established mental disorder or not.

A [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/delusion?s=t]delusion[/URL] is a mistaken or misleading opinion, idea or belief, and/or a fixed false belief that is resistant to reason or confrontation with actual fact.

name: Regenerative Hymen
description: This character has a regenerative hymen making it possible to lose her virginity multiple times throughout a single story.

name: Shop Clerk
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Retail_clerk]shop clerk[/url].

A retail clerk obtains or receives merchandise, totals bills, accepts payment, and makes change for customers in retail stores such as drug stores, candy stores, or liquor stores (thus, the position may partially overlap with that of cashier). They clean shelves, counters, or tables; stock shelves, counters, or tables with merchandise; set up advertising displays or arrange merchandise on counters or tables to promote sales; stamp, mark, or tag prices on merchandise; and obtain merchandise requested by customers or receive merchandise selected by customers. They are expected to answer customers' questions concerning location, price, and use of merchandise; to total price and tax on merchandise purchased by customers to determine bill; and to accept payment, make change, and wrap or bag the merchandise for customers. They may remove and record the amount of cash in register at end of shift. A retail clerk, particularly in a smaller store, may keep record of sales, prepare inventory of stock, or order merchandise.

name: Chain Jewellery
description:
This character wears one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chain]chains[/url]. A chain is a series of connected links which are typically made of metal. Use this with the [url=http://vndb.org/i158]Necklace[/url] trait when the chain is worn around the neck.

Not to be confused with the [url=http://vndb.org/i200]chain weapon[/url] trait, this is for chains worn, not used as weapons.

name: Ore-sama
description:
A character with this trait uses one of the masculine [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_pronouns]Japanese pronouns[/URL], "ore-sama". Ore-sama comes from the Japanese masculine pronoun for “I; me (俺 or オレ)” and the very respectful honorific suffix, “-sama (様)”.

Since this is the most arrogant masculine reference of oneself, characters who use "ore-sama" tend to be aggressively overconfident and pompous males. Characters who utilise "ore-sama" are also known to be boastful, forward, hasty and having a “my way or the highway” attitude.

"Ore-sama" is also sometimes used as a personality trait term to describe such characters.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sceptre]sceptre[/url].

A sceptre is a symbolic ornamental rod or wand borne in the hand by a ruling monarch as an item of royal or imperial insignia. It is usually much longer than a wand.
name: Sceptre

description:
These are the traits about [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oral_sex]oral sex[/url]. These traits are for the receiving partner(s). Traits for the performing partner(s) are under [url=/i99]i99[/url].

Oral sex may or may not be penetrative, and is the term given to genital stimulation by the mouth. People may engage in oral sex as part of foreplay before intercourse, or as, during or following intercourse. It may also be performed for its own sake, and can be performed simultaneously.
name: Oral Sex
Swim Shorts
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boardshorts]boardshorts[/url].

Boardshorts are a style of men's and, recently, women's swimwear. They were originally developed for aquatic sports, specifically for surfing, but in more recent years they have grown in popularity outside of these sports, and have become a popular form of general beach and swimwear.

name: Forced Cross-dressing
description:
This character was forced to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-dressing]cross-dress[/url] by other people.

Cross-dressing is the wearing of clothing and other accessories commonly associated with a gender within a particular society that is seen as different than the one usually presented by the dresser. Cross-dressing has been used for disguise, performance art and as a literary trope in modern times and throughout history.

For cross-dressing consented by the character itself, use [url=/i48]Engages in >> Cross-dressing[/url].

This character engages in Polygamy.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polygamy]Polygamy[/url] is a marriage which includes more than two partners.

When a man is married to more than one wife at a time, the relationship is called polygyny, and there is no marriage bond between the wives; and when a woman is married to more than one husband at a time, it is called polyandry, and there is no marriage bond between the husbands. If a marriage includes multiple husbands and wives, it can be called group marriage.

Compare [url=/i2177]polyamory[/url], which does not require partners to be married.
name: Polygamy

description:
This character is wearing [url=http://media4.popsugar-assets.com/files/2013/07/29/078/n/4981322/76f16882a7b0ccf0_thumb_temp310527341375055922.xxxlarge/i/Essential-Wardrobe-Pointy-Ankle-strap-Pumps.jpg]ankle-strap shoes[/url].

Ankle-strap shoes as the name suggests are shoes with a strap fastened around the ankle.
name: Ankle-Strap Shoes
Breast-Pads
description: The person has padding in their bra in order to make their breasts seem bigger. The reason for it can vary but it can be to hide the fact the person has little to no breasts or the person is trying to disguise themselves as a woman.

name: Afro
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Afro]afro[/url] hairstyle.

An afro, sometimes shortened to 'fro and also known as a "natural", is a hairstyle worn naturally by people with lengthy kinky hair texture or specifically styled in such a fashion by individuals with naturally curly or straight hair. The hairstyle is created by combing the hair away from the scalp, allowing the hair to extend out from the head in a large, rounded shape, much like a halo, cloud or ball.

name: Healthcare Professional
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Healthcare_professional]healthcare professional[/url].

A healthcare professional is a person trained and knowledgeable in medicine, nursing or other allied health professions, or public/community health.

name: Terminal Illness
description:
This character suffers from  a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terminal_illness]terminal illness[/url].

A terminal illness is a medical term popularized in the 20th century to describe a disease that cannot be cured or adequately treated and that is reasonably expected to result in the death of the patient within a relatively short period of time. This term is more commonly used for progressive diseases such as cancer or advanced heart disease than for trauma. In popular use, it indicates a disease which will end the life of the sufferer.

name: Sensitive
description:
A character with this trait is sensitive.

A [URL=http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/english/sensitive]sensitive[/URL] person is one who has or displays a quick and delicate appreciation of others' feelings. They tend to be easily hurt, offended or upset.
These are the traits for the actions characters engage in, usually by their own initiative.
name: Engages in
Sleep Sex
description: While this character is sleeping, another character engages in sexual acts with them. This character remains asleep for the duration of the sex scene. Apply [url=/i1299]i1299[/url] to the other character.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Happi]happi[/url].

Happi is a traditional Japanese straight-sleeved coat usually made of indigo or brown cotton and imprinted with a distinctive mon (crest). They are usually worn only to festivals. Originally, these represented the crest of a family, as happi were worn by house servants. Later, the coats commonly began to display the crests of shops and organisations. Firefighters in the past also used to wear happi; the symbol on their backs referred to the group with which they were associated. In English, "happi" is most often translated as "happi coat" or "happy coat".
name: Happi

description: This character loves reading books a lot, and may spend most of their free time on it.
name: Bookworm

description:
This character has multiple animal tails, a common trait among youkai, like kitsune or nekomata.

This trait is intended for characters that really have tails and should not be mixed with the clothing trait tail which refers to a clothing accessory, or the hairstyle trait which refers to multiple ponytails.
name: Multiple Tails
Kidnapping
description:
This character is a victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kidnapping]kidnapping[/url].

In criminal law, kidnapping is the taking away or transportation of a person against the person's will, usually to hold the person in false imprisonment, a confinement without legal authority. This may be done for ransom or in furtherance of another crime, or in connection with a child custody dispute.

name: Vegetarian
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vegetarian]vegetarian[/url].

Vegetarianism is the practice of abstaining from the consumption of meat – red meat, poultry, seafood and the flesh of any other animal; it may also include abstention from by-products of animal slaughter.

Ankle socks do not raise higher than to a person's ankles.

Note: Do NOT use this trait for socks that stop at the heel.
name: Ankle Socks

description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Estrous_cycle]Estrus cycle[/url] is the period of maximum sexual receptivity that the female of most mammals, excluding humans, experience just prior to ovulation.

In species/monsters with estrous cycles, females are generally only sexually active during the estrus phase of their cycle. This is also referred to as being "in heat".
name: Being in Heat
Motorcycle
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Motorcycle]motorcycle[/url] is a two-wheeled vehicle that is powered by a motor and has no pedals.

name: Nipple Sucking
description: This character sucks another character's nipples in a sex scene. Apply [url=/i1630]i1630[/url] to the other character.

This character works as a dentist. 

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dentist]dentist[/url], also known as a dental surgeon, is a surgeon who specializes in dentistry, the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases and conditions of the oral cavity. The dentist's supporting team aids in providing oral health services. The dental team includes dental assistants, dental hygienists, dental technicians, and, in some states, dental therapists.

This trait can also be used for those who work in the aforementioned dental supporting team.
name: Dentist
Anal Plug Tail
description:
This character is penetrated with a plug tail.

This is an anal plug with a tail on the end. The tail may resemble that of a real animal, like a fox or dog, or that of a fictional creature, like a succubus. Such a device may be used in sexual petplay.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/29/29029.jpg]Example[/url]

name: Niece
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Family#Western_kinship]niece[/url].

A niece is a sister's daughter, brother's daughter, wife's brother's daughter, wife's sister's daughter, husband's brother's daughter, husband's sister's daughter.

This character is a member of his/her school's health committee.

Students in the health committee usually help out in the school's infirmary.
name: Health Committee Member
Khakkhara
description:
This character carries a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Khakkhara]khakkhara[/url] staff.

A Khakkhara is a Buddhist staff consisting of a steel ringed head with dangling metal rings intertwined in the loop. They are primarily used in prayers, or sometimes used as a weapon.

This character, while playing with another character's penis, calls particular attention to the foreskin. Apply [url=/i1654]i1654[/url] to the character having their foreskin played with.

During the act of foreskin play they may mention the presence or possibility of phimosis (where the foreskin cannot be readily retracted from the glans of the penis). Typically, special focus is given to fully retracting said foreskin prior to or during fellatio, thus enhancing sexual pleasure of the male partner.
name: Foreskin Play
Wormhole Sex
description:
This character is subject of wormhole sex. Apply i2112 to the performing character.

Quick version: wormohole sex is a sexual act where penetration is achieved while being inside a portal or through a portal. 

Long version: "wormhole sex" can be divided in two subcategory: 
1) The body of a person is phisically in more than one place (dimension also) due to a portal or wormhole while having sex with another one. This is usually depicted as the person being penetrated is phisically cut in half (or more parts) by a wormhole. In this version the portal achieve a function similar to the one the wall achieve in the "[url=https://vndb.org/i1740]Stuck in Wall Sex[/url]" trait.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/63/91663.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]

2) The key point about the second version of "wormohole sex" is the fact that two or more people can engage in a sexual act even though they are far away one from the other through a wormhole or magical portal device. Some example are magical mirror, handheld device, ecc..

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/91662.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

This character is a transman.

A [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trans_man]trans man[/URL] is a man who was assigned female at birth.
name: Transman

description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://danbooru.donmai.us/wiki_pages/16203]reverse spitroast[/url] position. Apply this trait to the partners on the "ends" and apply [url=/i1133]i1133[/url] to the partner in the middle.

For this position, one partner (typically male) has sex with another partner (typically female) in the cowgirl position while performing oral sex on a third partner (typically female) who is sitting on their face. The two participants on top typically (but don't always) face each other.

Do not confuse this with the [url=/i1499]spitroast[/url] position. For the spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrated, while for the reverse spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrating one of the other partners.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/21/85321.jpg]Example[/url]
name: Reverse Spitroast

description: This character is a member of school musical collective, which arranges unprofessional performances at school events. School band members may or may not belong to the school music club.
name: School Band Member
aliases: Member of the School Musical Group

name: Sexual Slavery (Non-consensual)
description:
This character is a victim of non-consensual sexual slavery.

This form of sexual slavery is the slavery of unwilling people for sexual exploitation.
Forced prostitution, also known as involuntary prostitution is a classical form of this form of sexual slavery, wherein sex traffickers force victims to become prostitutes or work in the sex industry.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Non-consensual sexual slavery starts out as non-consensual and stays that way. The victim doesn't go through mindbreak and doesn't become a willing slave at any point in the story.

name: Multiple Penetration
description:
This character is penetrated [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_positions#Multiple_penetration]multiple times[/url] simultaneously.

They may be penetrated by multiple objects (penis, sex toy, tentacle, etc) in a single orifice (vagina, anus or mouth). Alternatively, they may be penetrated in more than one orifice at the same time.

name: Mental Breakdown
description:
A [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mental_breakdown]mental breakdown[/URL] is an acute, time-limited mental disorder that manifests primarily as severe stress-induced depression, anxiety, or dissociation in a previously functional individual, to the extent that they are no longer able to function on a day-to-day basis until the disorder is resolved.

A nervous breakdown is defined by its temporary nature, and often closely tied to psychological burnout, severe overwork, sleep deprivation, and similar stressors, which may combine to temporarily overwhelm an individual with otherwise sound mental functions.

name: Blunt Bangs
description:
This character has blunt bangs.

Blunt bangs are straight cut bangs, done with straight or almost straight hair. The edges must be horizontal (not spiky, even if the spikes are in the same length!).

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Keyboardist]keyboardist[/url].

A keyboardist is a musician who plays keyboard instruments. A keyboard instrument is any musical instrument played using a musical keyboard. The most common of these is the piano. Other widely used keyboard instruments include multiple types of organs as well as other mechanical, electromechanical and electronic instruments. In common language, it is mostly used to refer to keyboard-style synthesizers.
name: Keyboardist
School Swimsuit
description: This character wears a [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/SchoolSwimsuit]school swimsuit[/url].

name: Rhythmic Gymnastic Ribbon
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ribbon_(rhythmic_gymnastics)]Ribbon[/url] is a component of rhythmic gymnastics composed of a handle (called "stick"), a ribbon, and attachment.

This character is infertile.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infertility]Infertility[/url] is the inability of a person to reproduce by natural means. It may describe a woman who is unable to conceive as well as being unable to carry a pregnancy to full term.
name: Infertility

description: A character with this trait is [URL=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/whimsical]whimsical[/URL]. These characters act and make decisions on a whim. They change their tune on things at a moment's notice. It's often hard to tell what they're planning next.
name: Whimsical

description: A maid's headdress is a type of frilly hairband usually found in maid cosplay or as part of a standard [url=http://vndb.org/i433]maid's dress[/url].
name: Maid's Headdress

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bun_%28hairstyle%29]bun hairstyle[/url].

A bun is a type of hairstyle, typically worn by women, where the hair is pulled back from the face, twisted or plaited, and wrapped in a circular coil around itself, typically on the back of the head or neck. They can either be secured with a hairpiece, a hairnet and bobby pins. They may be tightly gathered or slightly messier and more informal.
name: Bun

description:
This character is an older brother.

An older brother is a male sibling who is older than at least one of the other siblings.
name: Older Brother
Superficial
description: A superficial person is one who lacks substance, and tends to be materialistic. They judge others based on appearances, wealth, social standing or otherwise, purely surface values. In romantic situations, a superficial person (usually) only takes interest in those who are good-looking, rich and/or high in social value.

name: Dual-Wield Weapon
description:
This character uses [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dual_wield]dual-wield weapons[/url].

Dual wielding is the technique of utilizing two weapons, one in each hand, during combat.
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blindfold]blindfold[/url], a piece of cloth that covers the eyes.
name: Blindfold
Transparent
description: This character wears transparent clothing.

name: Stockings
description:
This rait groups the traits for socks (or stockings) that reach higher than the knee, but not higher than the waist. Please use the specific child traits instead if applicable.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stocking]stocking[/url] is a close-fitting, variously elastic garment covering the foot and part of the leg. In American and Australian English it is also a synonym for pantyhose.

name: Inbreeding
description:
This character engages in inbreeding.

Inbreeding is when two people who are closely related by blood have a child.

name: Cross-dressing
description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross-dressing]cross-dresses[/url].

Cross-dressing is the wearing of clothing and other accoutrement commonly associated with a gender within a particular society that is seen as different than the one usually presented by the dresser. Cross-dressing has been used for disguise, performance art and as a literary trope in modern times and throughout history.

name: Spit-roast
description:
This character has sex in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_position#Threesomes]spit-roast[/url] position. Apply this trait to the partners on the "ends", and apply [url=/i1703]i1703[/url] to the partner in the middle.

For this position, one partner (typically female) performs oral sex on another partner (typically male) while being penetrated in the doggy position by a third partner (typically male).

Do not confuse this with the [url=/i1133]reverse spitroast[/url] position. For the spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrated, while for the reverse spitroast, the partner in the middle is penetrating one of the other partners.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/26/85126.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/11/43911.jpg]Example 2[/url] - Gender-inverted example.

name: Reins
description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rein]Reins[/url], [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bridle]bridle[/url] and [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bit_%28horse%29]bit (horse)[/url] are different horse tacks used to direct a horse or other animal used for riding or driving.

This character engages in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/69_%28sex_position%29]sixty-nine[/url] position.

In the sixty-nine position, two people position themselves so that each person's mouth is near the other's genitals, and simultaneously perform oral sex.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/04/7004.jpg][Example][/url]
name: Sixty-nine

description:
This character's mind is usually occupied by sexual thoughts.

Perverted characters think about sex all the time and they would do anything to get close to things that they consider erotic.
name: Pervert

description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scissors]scissors[/url].

Scissors are hand-operated shearing instruments. They consist of a pair of metal blades pivoted so that the sharpened edges slide against each other when the handles (bows) opposite to the pivot are closed. Scissors are used for cutting various thin materials, such as paper, cardboard, metal foil, thin plastic, cloth, rope, and wire. Scissors can also be used to cut hair and food. Scissors and shears are functionally equivalent, but larger implements tend to be called shears.
name: Scissors
Utility Belt
description:
This character wears a [URL=http://www.yourdictionary.com/utility-belt]utility belt[/URL], which is a is a belt with pockets, loops, etc. for carrying useful items.

Often used for professional purposes but this trait can also apply to those who wear it as a fashion statement.

[URL=http://www.occidental-leather.com/adjustable/9855.jpg]Example 1: Builder[/URL]
[URL=http://multifiles.pressherald.com/uploads/sites/4/2011/04/UtilityBeltGraphic0411-1024x914.jpg]Example 2: Police officer[/URL]
[URL=http://www.thefoamcave.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/41Iqk2V-MoL.jpg]Example 3: Generic/Unspecified[/URL]

This character suffers from [url=http://en.dic.pixiv.net/a/Chuunibyou]Chuunibyou[/url].

Chuunibyou or "Middle-school 2nd Year Syndrome", is a colloquial and rather derisive term in Japan which describes a person at the age of fourteen would either act like a know-it-all adult, or thinks they have special powers no one else has. Some would even go as far as being obnoxious, arrogant, and often look down on adults or older people. This way of thinking or acting is mostly seen in teenagers during adolescence, however there are people who still act like this even after reaching adulthood.

Do not use this tag for cases where this way of thinking or acting is natural for the setting (e.g. for a mahou shoujo heroine in a fantasy world with actual magic powers) or when the character REALLY wields supernatural powers. Only use it where this behaviour is out of place.
name: Chuunibyou

description:
This character's true form is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grimoire]grimoire[/url], or a book of magical power. 

Such books typically include instructions on how to create magical objects like talismans and amulets, how to perform magical spells, charms and divination and also how to summon or invoke supernatural entities such as angels, spirits, and demons. In many cases the books themselves are also believed to be imbued with magical powers.
name: Grimoire

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sundress]sundress[/url].

A sundress is a dress intended to be worn in warm weather. Typically, it is an informal or casual dress in a lightweight fabric, most commonly cotton, and usually loose fitting. The dress is intended to be worn without a layering top. Sundresses can be of any neckline and hemline, including modest styles and a variety of patterns.
name: Sundress
School Kendo Club Member
description:
This character is a member of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kendo]kendo [/url] club associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Kendo is a modern Japanese martial art of sword-fighting based on traditional samurai swordsmanship.

This character practices [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Figure_skating]figure skating[/url].

Figure skating is an Olympic sport in which individuals, pairs, or groups perform spins, jumps, footwork and other intricate and challenging moves on ice skates.

Figure skaters compete at various levels from beginner up to the Olympic level (senior), and at local, national, and international competitions. The International Skating Union (ISU) regulates international figure skating judging and competitions. Figure skating is an official event in the Winter Olympic Games.
name: Figure Skating
Tailcoat
description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn a tailcoat.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tailcoat]tailcoat[/URL] is a coat with the front of the skirt cut away, so as to leave only the rear section of the skirt, known as the tails.

name: Shrug
description: A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shrug_%28clothing%29]shrug[/URL] is a cropped, cardigan-like garment with short or long sleeves, typically knitted. Generally, a shrug covers less of the body than a vest would, but it is more tailored than a shawl. Shrugs are typically worn as the outermost layer of an outfit, with a full shirt, tank top, or dress beneath. A shrug covers a small portion of the upper body. Some shrugs are tied together just below the bustline.

name: Based on a Real Person
description:
This character is based on a famous person from the history of Earth, and on rare cases someone that is still alive.

This is different from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Real_person_fiction]real person fiction[/url] where the character is the actual famous person, not just a character inspired by that person.

name: Turtleneck Swimsuit
description:
This character wears a swimsuit with a turtleneck.

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) swimsuit is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck. other than that, this is a regular swimsuit. Note that a turtleneck swimsuit can be a one piece or a bikini.

name: Long
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Long_hair]long hair[/url].

Long hair is used when referring to hair longer than shoulder length.

name: Tattoo
description:
This character has a visible [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tattoo]tattoo[/url].

A tattoo is a marking made by inserting indelible ink into the dermis layer of the skin to change the pigment for decorative or other reasons. Tattoos on humans are a type of decorative body modification, while tattoos on animals are most commonly used for identification or branding.

name: Reserved
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Introversion]introvert[/url].

Introvert characters tend to be more reserved, less outgoing, and less sociable. They are not necessarily loners but they tend to be satisfied with having fewer friends. Introversion does not describe social discomfort but rather social preference: an introvert may not be shy but may merely prefer less social activities.

name: Asthma
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asthma]asthma[/url].

Asthma is a common chronic inflammatory disease of the airways characterized by variable and recurring symptoms, reversible airflow obstruction, and bronchospasm. Symptoms include wheezing, coughing, chest tightness, and shortness of breath.

It is thought to be caused by a combination of genetic and environmental factors. Treatment of acute symptoms is usually with an inhaled short-acting beta-2 agonist (such as salbutamol). Symptoms can be prevented by avoiding triggers, such as allergens and irritants, and by inhaling corticosteroids. Leukotriene antagonists are less effective than corticosteroids and thus less preferred.

name: Witch
description:
This character is a type of magician that delves into the context of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Witchcraft]witchcraft[/url].

Witchcraft, in historical, anthropological, religious and mythological contexts, is the alleged use of supernatural or magical powers. Historically, it was widely believed that witchcraft involved the use of these powers to inflict harm upon members of a community or their property, and that all witches were in league with the devil.

name: Earrings
description:
This character wears an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earring]earring[/url].

Earrings are jewelry attached to the ear through a piercing in the earlobe or some other external part of the ear (except in the case of clip earrings, which clip onto the lobe).

These are the traits for characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_style]hairstyles[/url]. It doesn't matter if this hair style is natural or a result of some conditions affecting hair style.
name: Hairstyle

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koreans]Korean[/url].

The Korean people are an ethnic group originating in the Korean peninsula.
name: Korean
Brave
description: This character is not afraid to face the danger head-on. He's always ready to defend his country or close people, and fulfill his duty, even if it means death.

name: Flat Cap
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flat_cap]flat cap[/url].

A flat cap is a rounded men's or women's cap with a small stiff brim in front. Cloths used to make the cap include wool, tweed (most common), and cotton. Less common materials may include leather or linen. Cord flat caps are also worn in various colours. The inside of the cap is usually lined with silk for comfort and warmth. The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newsboy_cap]newsboy cap[/url] is a variation of this kind of cap.

Not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/i517]Beret[/url]. Unlike berets, a flat cap has a visor (peak).
These are the traits for characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_physical_appearance]physical appearance[/url].
name: Body
Standing
description:
This character has sex in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_positions#Standing]standing[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1698]i1698[/url] to the penetrating partner.

There are several different positions that may be considered "standing", but they all involve at least one participant standing on their feet, and both participants with their torso upright. The receiving partner may be penetrated from in front, or behind. In one variant, both participants stand upright, possibly leaning on a wall for support. In another variant, the penetrating partner carries the receiving partner.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/79/53779.jpg]Example 1[/url] - Both participants standing, one leaning on a glass wall. Similar to [url=/i1327]quickie fix[/url] except the receiving partner is more upright.
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/09/84309.jpg]Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/11/84311.jpg]Example 3[/url] - Receiving partner carried by penetrating partner, participants facing each other.
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/10/84310.jpg]Example 4[/url] - Receiving partner carried by penetrating partner, participants facing away from each other.

name: Malevolent Possession
description: The preternatural entity possessing this character is not welcomed and is cohabiting against the host's wishes.

name: Robe
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robe]robe[/url].
A robe is a loose-fitting outer garment. A robe is distinguished from a cape or cloak by the fact that it usually has sleeves.

This character's breasts are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brassiere_measurement#Continental_Europe_.2F_Japan]E cup size[/url] or larger.

The cup size should come from a reliable source such as the game itself or the developer's website. Don't try to guess a character's cup size unless it appears to be AA (very flat-chested) or E+ (very well-endowed).
name: E+ Cup

description:
This character wears footwear with [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Platform_shoe]platform.[/url]

Platform shoes (from french plateau = platform) are shoes, boots, or sandals with an obvious thick sole.
name: Platform Shoes

description: [url=http://www.thefreedictionary.com/bib]A piece of cloth or plastic[/url] secured under the chin and worn, especially by small children, to protect the clothing while eating.
name: Bib

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shogun]shogun[/url].

Shogun is a military rank and historical title for a hereditary military dictator of Japan. The modern rank is equivalent to a Generalissimo.
name: Shogun

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Photographer]professional photographer[/url].

A professional photographer uses photography to make a living, while amateur photographers take photographs for pleasure and to record an event, place or person.
name: Professional Photographer

description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Masturbation]masturbation[/url].

Masturbation refers to sexual stimulation of a person's genitals, usually to the point of orgasm.

The stimulation can be performed manually, by other types of bodily contact (short of sexual intercourse), by use of objects or tools, or by some combination of these methods. Self masturbation is a common form of autoeroticism. Masturbation with a partner, called mutual masturbation, is also common.
name: Masturbation
Anal Sex
description:
This character takes part in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anal_sex]anal sex[/url] during a sexual scene. Use this trait on the penetrating partner and i1721 on the receiving partner.

Anal sex commonly refers to the sex act involving insertion of the penis into the anus of a sexual partner.

The term can also include other sexual acts involving the anus, including pegging, anal–oral sex, fingering, and object insertion.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dress]dress[/url].

A dress is a garment consisting of a skirt with an attached bodice (or a matching bodice giving the effect of a one-piece garment).
name: Dress

description:
The character with this trait is seeking and often getting [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Revenge]revenge[/url] throughout the story.

Revenge is a harmful action against a person or group in response to a grievance, be it real or perceived.

Although revenge resembles some conceptions of justice, vengeance is usually depicted as more injurious and punitive as opposed to being harmonious and restorative. Whereas justice implies actions undertaken and supported by a legitimate judicial system grounded upon a foundation of ethics and morals of the authorities, revenge implies actions undertaken by an individual or narrowly defined group outside the boundaries of judicial or ethical conduct whose goal is to force a wrongdoer to suffer the same or greater pain than that which was originally inflicted to a party.
name: Revenge

description:
Another character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spitting]spits[/url] on this character during a sex scene in order to produce erotic excitement or sexual arousal. Apply [url=/i2474]Engages in (Sexual) > Erotic Spitting[/url] to the spitting character.

Erotic Spitting can be done, but not necessarily, as a type of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erotic_humiliation]erotic humiliation[/url] and usually contains elements of submission for the person being spat on, and dominance, for the person spitting.
name: Erotic Spitting
Blowbang
description:
This character performs a blowbang. Apply i1887 to the receiving characters.

This act of group sex is restricted to one person giving oral sex to several men, commonly referred to as a gangsuck, blowbang or lineup.
All these derivatives of the slang term gang bang.

This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mail_%28armour%29]mail armor[/url].

Mail or chain mail is a type of armour consisting of small metal rings linked together in a pattern to form a mesh.
name: Mail Armor
Child Abuse
description:
This character becomes a victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Child_abuse]child abuse[/url].

Child abuse is any recent act or failure to act on the part of a parent or caretaker which results in death, serious physical or emotional harm, sexual abuse or exploitation, an act or failure to act which presents an imminent risk of serious harm.

name: Adult
description:
This character has the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_physical_appearance]physical appearance[/url] of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/adult]adult[/url] of ages 40 to 65.

Note that this trait only signifies the physical appearance of this character, and it may not reflect actual age.

This character engages in mercy killing.

A mercy kill is a death blow to end the suffering of a severely wounded person or animal. It may be a mercy killing of civilians or soldiers, friends or enemies, with or without the sufferer's consent.
name: Mercy Killing

description:
This character's skin is covered or partially covered by [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scale_(anatomy)]scales[/url].

A scale is a small rigid plate that grows out of an animal's skin to provide protection and coloration. Scales are common amongst reptiles (snakes, dragons), fish and insects. Various types of scales exists according to shape and to class of animal.
name: Scales

description:
This character performs a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prostate_massage]prostate massage[/url]. Apply i2271 to the receiving character.

A prostate massage is the massage or stimulation of the male prostate gland for sexual stimulation often in order to reach orgasm. The prostate is sometimes referred to as the "male G-spot". Prostate massage can be done also using equipment like dildos, butt plugs and G-spot vibrators. Prostate massage scenes are easy to find in VN involving female domination where prostate is usually stimulated while performing a handjob or blowjob.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/93/98593.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/94/98594.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Prostate Massage
Kemonomimi Hat
description: This character wears a hat with animal ears on it.

name: Spear
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spear]spear[/url].

A spear is a pole weapon consisting of a shaft, usually of wood, with a pointed head.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bracelet]bracelet[/url].

A bracelet is an article of jewelry that is worn around the wrist. Bracelets can be manufactured from metal, leather, cloth, plastic or other materials and sometimes contain jewels, rocks, wood, and/or shells. 

Bracelets are also used for medical and identification purposes, such as allergy bracelets and hospital patient-identification tags.
name: Bracelet
Nightmares
description: The character often has nightmares, more than the ordinary person. It might be a single recurring nightmare or a different one each time.

name: Violet
description:
This character has purple eye color.

It is not a natural eye color in the real world.
Any item for purpose of facilitating or aiding transportation.
name: Locomotion
Mullet
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mullet_%28haircut%29]mullet hairstyle[/url].

The mullet is a hairstyle that is short at the front and sides, and long in the back.

name: Living Alone
description:
This character is a non-adult living without his/her parents at home.
This can be because they are dead, on a trip, the character has run from home or simply, his/her parents are never mentioned in the game.

name: Dress Shoes
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dress_shoe]dress shoes[/url].

A dress shoe is a shoe to be worn at smart casual or more formal events.

The [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chimera_(mythology)]Chimera[/url] was, according to Greek mythology, a monstrous fire-breathing hybrid creature, composed of the parts of more than one animal.

It is usually depicted as a lion, with the head of a goat arising from its back, and a tail that might end with a snake's head. However, "chimera" has come to describe any mythical or fictional animal with parts taken from various animals.
name: Chimera

description:
This character is involved in sexual activities while being restrained to a gynecologist chair, medical chair or experiment chair.

A gynecologist chair is a piece of equipment used during gynecologic examination and it's composed of leg holders to help the patient  spread his legs. In hentai those chairs are sexual devices primarly used to restrain characters during a bondage sexual scene. 

Note: Just use this trait for medical chairs used to accomplish sexual or bondage scene. In case chairs are also an high tech device capable of penetration use it in conjunction with [url=https://vndb.org/i1115]Sex Engine[/url].

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/40/103140.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/41/103141.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/42/103142.jpg]NSFW Example 3[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/43/103143.jpg]NSFW Chair and Sex Engine Example[/url]
name: Gynecologist Chair

description:
This character suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amnesia]amnesia[/url].

Amnesia is a condition in which memory is disturbed or lost.

The causes of amnesia have traditionally been divided into categories. Functional causes are psychological factors, such as mental disorder, post-traumatic stress or, in psychoanalytic terms, defense mechanisms.
name: Amnesia
Desu
description:
This character overuses or overemphasizes the word ~desu at the end of their sentences.

Desu is a Japanese copula often given the translation of 'to be' or 'it is'.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Copula_(linguistics)#Japanese

An onahole, aka an artificial vagina is used on this character.

An [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_vagina]artificial vagina[/url] is a device designed to imitate the female sex organ. To achieve this, it will generally be made of a soft material, lubricated, and sometimes heated.
name: Onahole

description:
A Lolita Hairband is a type of frilly wide headband similar to but much smaller than a [url=http://vndb.org/i992]bonnet[/url] that is sometimes covered in ribbons and bows.

Originally seen in Victorian fashion they have returned as a type of headwear for many types of [url=http://vndb.org/i820]lolita[/url] fashion.
name: Lolita Hairband

description:
This character refers to themself by their own name. In other words, this character refers to themself in the third person. This is also called "[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Illeism]Illeism[/url]".

This talking pattern may be used by small children and young women, and is considered to be cute and childish.
name: Third Person

description: This character's eye shape resembles that of normal people from the "real world". However, in the world of anime such cut of eyes is most common among the adults and villains; with normal characters having big, round eyes.
name: Hosome

description: This is a meta trait to group all of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BDSM]BDSM[/url] related traits together.
name: BDSM
Wake-up Sex
description: While this character is asleep, another character performs a sexual act on them, waking them up in the middle of doing so, either intentionally or not. Apply [url=/i1191]i1191[/url] to the performing character.

name: Flirting
description:
This character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flirting]flirting[/url] with other characters.

Flirting is a playful, romantic or sexual overture by one person to another subtly indicating an interest in a deeper relationship with the other person, and can involve verbal communication as well as body language. Body language can include flicking the hair, eye contact, brief touching, open stances, proximity etc. Verbal communication of interest can include the vocal tone, such as pace, volume, intonation. Challenges (teasing, questions, qualifying, feigned disinterest) serve to increase tension, test intention and congruity.

Almost every VN has some romance and relationships, but rarely they do have actual flirting. Use this trait sparingly for only the ones that actually do.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Workaholic]workaholic[/url].

A workaholic is a person who is addicted to work. While the term generally implies that the person enjoys their work, it can also imply that they simply feel compelled to do it. There is no generally accepted medical definition of such a condition, although some forms of stress, impulse control disorder, obsessive-compulsive personality disorder and obsessive-compulsive disorder can be work-related.

Workaholism in Japan is considered a serious social problem leading to early death, often on the job, a phenomenon dubbed karōshi.
name: Workaholic
Demon Tail
description:
This character has a demon-like pointy tail with an arrowhead/triangular/heart-shaped tip. This type of tail is typically hairless and has a smooth, glossy surface resembling latex or leather. It is often red, purple, black, or otherwise darkly-colored.

If the tail has scales, consider using [url=/i2385]Reptilian Tail[/url] instead.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/47/44947.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/45/43445.jpg]Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/75/52075.jpg]Example 3[/url]

This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godparent]godparent[/url].

A godparent, in many denominations of Christianity, is someone who bears witness to a child's baptism, although the term has also been used in a legal sense. In both religious and civil views, a godparent tends to be an individual chosen by the parents to take an interest in the child's upbringing and personal development, and to take care of the child should anything happen to the parents.
In fairy tales, a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fairy_godmother]fairy godmother[/url] is a fairy with magical powers who acts as a mentor or parent to someone, in the role that an actual godparent was expected to play in many societies.
name: Godparent

description: These are the traits about characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eye_colors]eye colors[/url].
name: Eye Color
School Backpack
description:
This character is wearing a school backpack intended for transporting educational materials to and from school.

Typical school backpacks generally lack the rigid frame of an outdoor-style backpack and include only a few pockets in addition to the main storage compartment. While traditionally very simple in design, school backpacks are often made with padded shoulder straps and backs as well as additional reinforcement to hold large numbers of heavy textbooks, as well as safety features such as reflective panels to make the wearer of the pack more visible at night.
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Long_hair#Hair_lengths]hair length[/url] which is ankle length or longer.
name: Ankle Length
Group (4+) Footjob
description:
A group footjob (by at least 4 characters) is performed on this character. Apply i1924 to the performing character.

This is a sexual act in which four or more women rub their feet against a man's penis.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/57/88357.jpg]NSWF Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/58/88358.jpg]NSWF Example 2[/url]

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bow_%28weapon%29]bow[/url].

A bow is a weapon that projects arrows by its elasticity. Essentially, it is a form of spring. As the bow is drawn, energy is stored in the limbs of the bow and transformed into rapid motion when the string is released, with the string transferring this force to the arrow.
name: Bow

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bonnet_%28headgear%29]bonnet[/url]. 

The most common kind of bonnet worn today is a soft headcovering for babies. They are shaped similarly to the kind of bonnets women used to wear, that is they cover the hair and ears, but not the forehead.

However the term has also been used, for example, for steel helmets. We don't use this meaning in the database.
name: Bonnet

description: This is used to describe a character with a suntan, either naturally applied by the sun or through artificial means.
name: Tanned
Bunny Dress
description:
This character is seen wearing a bunny costume/dress.

The two essential part of the dress are the bunny ears (usually in the form of a headband) and the bunny tail tailored to the lower back of the dress.

The form of the costume itself can vary, depending on its nature. In case of a sexy dress, it can be a leotard, or just underwear. In case a dress aimed for children (like for a masquerade) can be pyjama-like in design, covering the entire body.
This character is the mother of another character's spouse.
name: Mother-in-law

description:
This character has a sword with blades on each sides of its handle.

[url=http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs15/f/2007/012/d/8/Dual_Bladed_Mithrodin_by_SiberianRaccoon.jpg]example[/url]
name: Twin Blade Sword

description: These are the clothing tags that don't come up with where they are worn but with other aspects.
name: Accessories and Others

description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toga]toga[/url] or one of its related garments. A toga is a robe-like garment made from a semicircular piece of cloth which is draped over the body. Togas are traditionally associated with ancient Rome, where they were a type of (usually men's) formal wear.

Related to the toga is the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stola]stola[/url], a type of long, pleated dress worn by women in ancient Rome which looks similar and is often called a toga in modern English.
name: Toga
Medical Tools
description: Any items that are used in modern medicine belong here.

This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rapes[/url] one or more of game's other characters during some specific routes.

This means that while playing some routes, this character will be the perpetrator of rape(s), while on other routes not committing such crimes.
name: Other Route Rape

description:
This character was put into [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suspended_animation]artificial sleep[/url] or hibernation.

Suspended animation is the slowing of life processes by external means without termination. Breathing, heartbeat, and other involuntary functions may still occur, but they can only be detected by artificial means. Extreme cold can be used to precipitate the slowing of an individual's functions; use of this process has led to the developing science of cryonics. Cryonics is another method of life preservation but it cryopreserves organisms using liquid nitrogen that will preserve the organism until reanimation.
name: Suspended Animation
Panties
description:
This character is often shown wearing [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Panties]panties[/url].

Panties are a form of underwear designed to be worn by women and children in the crotch area below the waist. Typical components include an elastic waistband, a crotch panel to cover the genital area (usually lined with absorbent material such as cotton), a pair of leg openings which, like the waistband, are often made of elastic, and constructed with material that is breathable. Whilst panties were originally designed to cover the entire lower half of the female form, the modern version (since the 1970s) has either no legs or, in some cases, very short ones, and has become progressively more revealing over time.

Do not use this trait related to sex scenes where a character's undergarment is briefly shown. Use it on occasions where characters are displaying their undergarments occasionally either because their other clothing are designed in a way that it reveals them or when they don't wear anything else to cover their undergarments.

This character engages in sex with children.

The character has sex with someone whose age is actually confirmed underage, either directly (by explicitly stating how old they are) or indirectly (by mentioning that the character is an elementary school student or that the heroine hasn't had her period yet, for example).
name: Sex with Children

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Misogyny]misogynist[/url], a person who hates, dislikes, mistrusts, or mistreats women.

Misogyny is the hatred or dislike of women or girls. Misogyny can be manifested in numerous ways, including sexual discrimination, denigration of women, violence against women, and sexual objectification of women. Misogyny has been characterised as a prominent feature of the mythologies of the ancient world as well as various religions. In addition, many influential Western philosophers have been described as misogynistic. The male counterpart of misogyny is misandry, the hatred or dislike of men; the antonym of misogyny is philogyny, the love or fondness of women.
name: Misogynist
Bell
description:
This character has one or more [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/bell]bells[/url] on his/her clothing.

A bell is a hollow instrument of cast metal, typically cup-shaped with a flaring mouth, suspended from the vertex and rung by the strokes of a clapper, hammer, or the like.

The bell that appears as an accessory on animal collars and later as a clothing accessory on humans is usually ball shaped with a slit.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swim_cap]swim cap[/url].

Caps are worn for various reasons. Some facilities require the wearing of swim caps, in order to protect filters from becoming clogged with loose hairs which fall from the scalp of swimmers who are not wearing a cap. Caps are also sometimes worn in an attempt to keep the hair relatively dry or free from chlorinated water, to keep the sun off of the hair, and also, when a cap is worn with ear plugs, in order to keep water out of the ears.

Competitive swim caps are made of tightly fitted silicone, latex, or lycra that hugs the skull of its user, providing cover for his or her hair. This reduces drag in the water caused by loose hair. During longer swimming sessions, a swim cap keeps the head warm.
name: Swim Cap
Pajamas
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pajamas]pajamas[/url].

Pajamas may refer to several garments, for both daywear and nightwear, derived from traditional pajamas and involving variations of style and material.

name: Wristband
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wristband]wristband[/url].

Wristbands are encircling strips worn on the wrist, made of any of a variety of materials depending on the purpose. The term can be used to refer to the bracelet-like band of a wristwatch, to the cuff or other part of a sleeve that covers the wrist, or to decorative or functional bands worn on the wrist for other reasons, such as lanyards.

This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bead]beads[/url] interwoven in his/her hair.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/43/79343.jpg]Example 1[/url], [url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/44/11144.jpg]Example 2[/url]
name: Hair Beads
Gothic
description:
This character is dressed in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gothic_fashion]gothic fashion[/url].

Gothic fashion is a clothing style worn by members of the Goth subculture; a dark, sometimes morbid, eroticized fashion and style of dress.

Typical Gothic fashion includes dyed black hair, black lips and black clothes. Both male and female goths wear dark eyeliner and dark fingernails.

Styles are often borrowed from the Punks, Victorians and Elizabethans. BDSM imagery and paraphernalia are also common.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baseball_cap]baseball cap[/url].

A baseball cap is a type of soft cap with a long, stiff brim that may either be curved or flat. The front of the cap typically contains designs or logos of sports teams (namely baseball teams). The back of the cap may be "fitted" to the wearer's head size or it may have a plastic, Velcro, or elastic adjuster so that it can be quickly adjusted to fit different wearers.
name: Baseball Cap
Diary
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diary]diary[/url].

A diary is a record (originally in handwritten format) with discrete entries arranged by date reporting on what has happened over the course of a day or other period. Diaries undertaken for institutional purposes play a role in many aspects of human civilization, including government records, business ledgers and military records.

Generally the term is today employed for personal diaries, in which the writer may detail more personal information and normally intended to remain private or to have a limited circulation amongst friends or relatives. The writer may also describe recent events in his/her personal diary. The word "journal" may be sometimes used for "diary," but generally one writes daily in a diary, whereas journal-writing can be less frequent.

name: Grey

This character has grey hair color.

Please see the [url=http://i.imgur.com/EvG0Q3R.jpg]VNDB Hair Color Chart[/url] for examples when in doubt.
