They’re generally harmless monsters most of the time, but they will be in heat every few months, when they will become incredibly violent and force human males they like into having sex with them.

Lacrosse
description:
This character plays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lacrosse]lacrosse[/url].

Lacrosse is a team sport of Native American origin played using a small solid rubber ball and a long-handled stick called a crosse or lacrosse stick, mainly played on the East Coast of the United States and Canada.

The head of the lacrosse stick is strung with loose mesh designed to catch and hold the lacrosse ball. Offensively, the objective of the game is to score by shooting the ball into an opponent's goal, using the lacrosse stick to catch, carry, and pass the ball to do so. Defensively, the objective is to keep the opposing team from scoring and to dispossess them of the ball through the use of stick checking and body contact or positioning.

This character's boobs get pressed against a glass surface (usually a window or table) in a sex scene.

Only use this trait if the girl's boobs are exposed, or her clothing is transparent (possibly due to being wet).

Polydactyly
description:
This character has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polydactyly]polydactyly[/url].

Polydactyly is a congenital physical anomaly in humans, dogs, and cats having supernumerary fingers or toes.

The extra digit is usually a small piece of soft tissue that can be removed. Occasionally it contains bone without joints; rarely it may be a complete, functioning digit. The extra digit is most common on the ulnar (little finger) side of the hand, less common on the radial (thumb) side, and very rarely within the middle three digits. These are respectively known as postaxial (little finger), preaxial (thumb), and central (ring, middle, index fingers) polydactyly. The extra digit is most commonly an abnormal fork in an existing digit, or it may rarely originate at the wrist as a normal digit does.

This person has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halo_%28religious_iconography%29]halo[/url]. 

A halo is a ring of light that surrounds a person in art. They have been used in the iconography of many religions to indicate holy or sacred figures, and have at various periods also been used in images of rulers or heroes.

When perspective came to be considered essential, painters also changed the halo from an aura surrounding the head, always depicted as though seen full-on, to a flat golden disk or ring that appeared in perspective, floating above the heads of the saints, or vertically behind, sometimes transparent. This is the version often depicted in modern pop culture and art.
name: Halo

description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karuta]Karuta[/url] is a Japanese card game originating from Portugal. Most of the karuta games use [url=/https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E-awase]e-awase[/url] cards.

The basic idea of any e-awase karuta game is to be able to quickly determine which card out of an array of cards is required and then to grab the card before it is grabbed by an opponent. The two types of e-awase karuta decks that are most often seen are the uta-garuta and iroha-karuta. In uta-garuta, players try to find the last two lines of a waka given the first three lines. It is often possible to identify a poem by its first one or two syllables. The poems for this game are taken from the Ogura Hyakunin Isshu and are traditionally played on New Year's Day.
name: Karuta

description:

A nurse is a healthcare professional who, in collaboration with other members of a health care team, is responsible for: treatment, safety, and recovery of acutely or chronically ill individuals; health promotion and maintenance within families, communities and populations; and, treatment of life-threatening emergencies in a wide range of health care settings.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Detective]detective[/url].

A detective is an investigator, either a member of a police agency or a private person. The latter may be known as private investigators.

Informally, and primarily in fiction, a detective is any licensed or unlicensed person who solves crimes, including historical crimes, or looks into records.

Tsundere is a Japanese character development process which describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing their warm side over time.

This character has sex in the [url=http://www.sofeminine.co.uk/relationships/album856252/sex-positions-kamasutra-sex-positions-21211764.html]tominagi[/url] position. Apply this trait to the penetrated partner and apply [url=/i1702]i1702[/url] to the penetrating partner.

In this position, the penetrating partner kneels in front of the receiving partner, with their torso mostly upright, while the receiving partner lies on their back, with their legs folded. They may rest their feet against the penetrating partner's torso.

This is similar to other butterfly positions, but the receiving partner is in a noticeably "curled up" position.

If the penetrating partner's torso is mostly horizontal and on top of the receiving partner, consider using the [url=/i93]missionary[/url] trait instead.

name: Lifeguard
description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lifeguard]lifeguard[/url].

A lifeguard is a person who supervises the safety and rescue of swimmers, surfers, and other water sports participants such as in a swimming pool, water park, or beach.

description:

A preternatural entity takes residence in this person's body. The degree of control may vary, but the possessing entity is both foreign and not a naturally occurring phenomenon. Furthermore, the preternatural entity may take residence in an uninhabited vessel (such as a corpse).
name: Possession

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pole_weapon]polearm[/url].

A pole weapon is a close combat weapon in which the main fighting part of the weapon is placed on the end of a long shaft, typically of wood, thereby extending the user's effective range.

Spears, glaives, poleaxes, halberds, and bardiches are all varieties of polearms. The idea of attaching a weapon onto a long shaft is an old one, as the first spears date back to the Stone Age. The purpose of using pole weapons is either to extend reach or to increase angular momentum—and thus striking power—when the weapon is swung.

This trait is intended to be used for made up or unidentified types of pole weapons that are not mentioned above, for those use (or make) the appropriate trait.
name: Polearm

description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cautiousness]cautious[/url].

Cautious characters are on their guard, acting with caution and watching their surroundings with alertness.

Aside from the people that are required to be cautious as a part of their jobs, like guards or military personnel, it is also noticed in the behaviors of people that have been in prolonged conflicts or dangerous environments.
name: Cautious

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glasses]glasses[/url].

Glasses are frames bearing lenses worn in front of the eyes, normally for vision correction or eye protection.
name: Glasses

Dressing and acting like a boy is optional.

"Trap" does not imply any specific form of sexual orientation but only the physical appearance.

Bass Guitar
description:
This character is seen with a bass guitar.

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bass_guitar]bass guitar[/url] is a stringed instrument played primarily with the fingers or thumb (by plucking, slapping, popping, tapping, or thumping), or by using a pick.

The bass guitar is similar in appearance and construction to an electric guitar, but with a longer neck and scale length, and four, five, or six strings. The four-string bass—by far the most common—is usually tuned the same as the double bass, which corresponds to pitches one octave lower than the four lower strings of a guitar (E, A, D, and G).

The bass guitar is a transposing instrument, as it is notated in bass clef an octave higher than it sounds (as is the double bass) to avoid excessive ledger lines. Like the electric guitar, the bass guitar is plugged into an amplifier and speaker for live performances.

name: Strapless Leotard

Archery is the art, practice, or skill of propelling arrows with the use of a bow, from 'arcus' (Latin). Archery has historically been used for hunting and combat; in modern times, however, its main use is that of a recreational activity.
name: Archery

Parricide
description:
This character engages in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parricide]parricide[/url].

Parricide (Latin: parricida, killer of parents or another close relative) is defined as:

*    the act of murdering one's father (patricide), mother (matricide) or other close relative, but usually not children (infanticide).
*    the act of murdering a person (such as the ruler of one's country) who stands in a relationship resembling that of a father
*    a person who commits such an act.

This character has a carefree attitude.

Carefree characters act without [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anxiety]anxiety[/url] or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Worry]worry[/url] similar to relaxed characters. But it is mostly because they don't take anything too seriously or because they don't care about the results at all. They are known to be able to to crack a joke or two even in worst situations.
name: Carefree
Megaphone
description: A megaphone is a portable, usually hand-held, cone-shaped acoustic horn used to amplify a person’s voice or other sounds and direct it in a given direction. The sound is introduced into the narrow end of the megaphone, by holding it up to the face and speaking into it, and the sound waves radiate out the wide end. The megaphone increases the volume of sound by increasing the acoustic impedance seen by the vocal cords, matching the impedance of the vocal cords to the air, so that more sound power is radiated. It also serves to direct the sound waves in the direction the horn is pointing.

name: Dao
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dao_%28sword%29]dao[/url].

Dao is actually a generic word used to denote any member of a family of single-edged, broad-bladed cutting or slicing tools, but in common, everyday usage means knife.

Dao blades are moderately curved and single-edged, though often with few inches of the back edge sharpened as well; the moderate curve allows them to be reasonably effective in the thrust. Hilts are canted, curving in the opposite direction as the blade which improves handling in some forms of cuts and thrusts.

name: Lab Coat
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lab_coat]lab coat[/url].

A laboratory coat is a knee-length overcoat/smock worn by professionals in the medical field or by those involved in laboratory work to protect their street clothes.

The garment is made from white or light-colored cotton, linen, or cotton polyester blend, allowing it to be washed at high temperature and make it easy to see if it is clean.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform]uniform[/url].

A uniform is a set of standard clothing worn by members of an organization while participating in that organization's activity.
name: Uniform

description: This character is seen carrying a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ball]ball[/url]. These generally are used in various kind of sports and exist in various sizes.
name: Ball

They are also used in the military for protection while kneeling.

He knows the weak points of the interlocutor and tries to stab him there as hard as possible. He might do so in order to annoy, humiliate, or just to tease someone.

name: Earmuffs
description:
This character wears [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earmuffs]earmuffs[/url].

Earmuffs are objects designed to cover a person's ears for protection or for warmth. They consist of a thermoplastic or metal head-band, that fits over the top or back of the head, and a pad at each end, to cover the external ears.

Modern earmuffs come in two basic kinds:

-Thermal earmuffs, worn in cold environments to keep a person's ears warm with pads of cloth or fur.
-Acoustic earmuffs, also known as ear defenders: cups lined with sound-deadening material, like thermal earmuffs and headphones in appearance, which are worn as hearing protection. These may be carried on a head-band or clipped onto the sides of a hard hat, for use on construction sites.
This character is one of the performers of a group blowjob (by at least 4 characters). Apply [url=/i1640]i1640[/url] to the receiving character.

A half-skirt is a kind of skirt that is missing a vertical half. So it can only cover one leg or just buttocks like the garments worn by middle age knights.

Son
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Son]son[/url].

A son is a male offspring; a boy or man in relation to his parents.

This character performs cock and ball torture (CBT) on another character. Apply i1950 to the receiving character.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cock_and_ball_torture]Cock and ball torture (CBT)[/url] is a sexual activity involving torture of the male genitals. This may involve directly painful activities on male genitals, such as [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/40/88240.jpg]wax play[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/88262.jpg]genital spanking/flogging[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/50/88250.jpg]genital squeezing[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/85/87685.jpg]ball-busting[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/61/88261.jpg]urethral play[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/89/66989.jpg]tickle torture[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/59/88259.jpg]erotic electrostimulation[/url] or [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/88251.jpg]any other way of torturing balls or cock[/url].

The recipient of such activities may receive direct physical pleasure via masochism, or emotional pleasure through knowledge that the play is pleasing to a sadistic dominant. It also exist a wide range of [url=https://vndb.org/i1952]CBT sexual devices[/url] to enhance pain or pleasure.

Secret Identity

A loincloth is a one-piece garment – sometimes kept in place by a belt – which covers the genitals and, at least partially, the buttocks.

This trait is intended to be used for visible changes and does not mean character development like psychological changes within a character.

This character is seen wearing a cat costume/dress.

The key parts of a cat costume/dress are (not all necessary for trait to apply): cat ears (headband, hood, hat, etc...), cat tail, cat paw gloves, a cat themed costume (leotard, stocking, gloves, etc...) resembling cat skin.

The form of the costume itself can vary, depending on its nature. In case of a sexy dress, it can be a leotard, or just underwear. In case a dress aimed for children (like for a masquerade) can be pyjama-like in design, covering the entire body.

In cases of sexual roleplay use it in conjunction with [URL=https://vndb.org/i2458]Sexual Animal Cosplay[/URL] and [url=https://vndb.org/i1370]Petplay[/url] (if applicable).

description:
The character is forced into a marriage that is not by his or her choice, is something they are opposed to actually doing, and would not consent to under normal circumstances. Reasons can vary between being sold into marriage against their will, parents forcing them to get married to someone (possibly under threat), or for some other reason.

This trait also counts if it was attempted but not successfully completed (such as the ceremony being interrupted for some reason). What matters is opposition to the marriage and being forced to go along with it.
name: Forced Marriage
Multiple Eyes
description: This character has more than two eyes. This may be due to their non-human nature (extraterrestrial, monster, monster girl, android) or due to a mutation (genetic experiment, mutant).

name: Blunt
description:
The blunt person is the realest person you will ever meet, they don't sugarcoat anything and say what the mean: they often come of as rude and even insensitive at times, but they don't have any bad intentions. They aren't afraid of confrontations and will say what they honestly think without beating around the bush. A blunt person can say the truth when others can't or won't point it out.

Not to be confused with sharp-tongued. A sharp-tongued person is simply sarcastic & is often comments to tease or annoy someone using the oppositions weak point. A blunt person however is simply brutally honest & very frank about what they think. Most, if not all of the time, their comments are simply the truth. Though they way they convey it is another matter entirely.

Different from the normal honest person who's honest in a helpful way and try not to offend the opposition while being honest, a blunt person just say the truth and what they honestly feel or think flat out. Honest has a positive connotation, while blunt has a more negative connotation.

name: Dyed
description:
This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_coloring]dyes his/her hair[/url].

Hair coloring is the practice of changing the color of hair. Hair dyeing, which is an ancient art, involves treatment of the hair with various chemical compounds.

Note: Please do not use this trait just because the character has an unnatural hair color. Purple, blue, pink, green and other colors that are impossible without hair coloring in the real world, are used abundantly in visual novels. Thus only use this tag, if the VN explicitly states that this character colors his/her hair.

name: School Art Club Member
description:
This character is a member of an art club associated with a school.

Art clubs engage members in the creation of artwork. Artworks are traditionally either paintings or sculptures, but can sometimes include collages, installations, and photographs. Art clubs may teach techniques, provide critique or enter competitions and exhibitions.

name: Jewish
description:
This character is Jewish. [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jews]Jews[/url] are an ethnoreligious and ethno-cultural group originating from the Israelites of the Ancient Near East.

This trait is about a character's cultural/racial heritage, not necessarily their religious belief. For religious practitioners of Judaism, please also use the [url=/i873]religious[/url] trait.

This character wears crotchless panties.

Crotchless Panties are a form of underwear designed to be worn by women in the crotch area below the waist.
Crotchless panties look kinkier than traditional panties and they are usually worn in conjuction with other sexy lingerie to the purpose of having sex since they do not need to be removed or moved to the side to achieve vaginal and anal insertion.

Note: Do not use this trait with normal transparent panties. This trait is about the shape of the panties and not about visible pussy or anus.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/62/89162.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=http://ep7.xhcdn.com/000/078/267/593_1000.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url],
name: Crotchless Panties

description:
These are the traits for characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_color]hair colors[/url] and [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hair_style]hairstyles[/url]. Said hair does not need to be real, it can be a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wig]wig[/url] or something else.

Do not create child tags related to hair accessories and headwear here, use the clothing trait group headwear section instead.
name: Hair

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headband]headband[/url] or hairpin with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Horn_%28anatomy%29]horns[/url] attached to it. He or she may wear it as an accessory in order to dress or look like a demon or a cow, for example.

This trait is different from Body > [url=https://vndb.org/i828]Horns[/url] by being a piece of clothing, instead of a part of a body.
And it is different from [url=https://vndb.org/i17]Odango[/url] by not being made of hair.
name: Horns
Ball Gown
description:
This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ball_gown]ball gown[/url].

A ball gown is the most formal female attire for social occasions. It is traditionally a full-skirted gown reaching the floor, made of luxurious fabric, delicately and exotically trimmed. Most versions are cut off the shoulder with decollete necklines. Such gowns are typically worn with a stole (a formal shawl in expensive fabric), cape or cloak in lieu of a coat, "good" (couture or vintage) jewellery and opera-length gloves. Standard accessories are dancing shoes and a clutch style evening bag.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychiatrist]psychiatrist[/url].

A psychiatrist is a physician who specializes in psychiatry. A psychiatrist specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of mental disorders.
name: Psychiatrist

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monarch]monarch[/url].

A monarch is the person who heads a monarchy, a form of government in which a country or entity is usually ruled or controlled by an individual who typically inherits the throne by birth and normally rules for life or until abdication.

Monarchs may be autocrats (absolute monarchy) or ceremonial heads of state who exercise little or no power or only reserve power, with actual authority vested in a parliament or other body (constitutional monarchy).

This trait is intended for monarchs that are outside of the common norms listed as child traits to this, if applicable use them instead.
name: Monarch

description:
A bellyjob is performed on this character. Apply i1868 to the performing character.

The bellyjob is a sexual act where the penis is thrust several times between a woman's belly, usually achieved by wrapping the belly skin around the penis. To do so the performer is often overweight.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/54/86254.jpg]Example NSFW[/url]
name: Bellyjob

description:
This character wears a traditional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maid]maid[/url]'s or a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_maid]French maid[/url]'s dress.

French maid refers to a strongly modified style of servant’s dress that evolved from typical maids’ black and white afternoon uniforms of the nineteenth century (and their later use by stereotypical characters in risqué burlesque dramas of the bedroom farce variety).
name: Maid's Dress

description:
This character owns a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pet]pet[/url]. 

The character is solely responsible for the welfare of the animal/s in question.
As such, a companionship is formed.
name: Pet Owner

description:
This character engages in erotic spanking. Apply [url=/i1139]i1139[/url] to the character being spanked.

Erotic spanking is the act of spanking another person for the sexual arousal or gratification of either or both parties.
name: Erotic Spanking

description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seriousness]serious[/url] personality.

Serious people treat everything with an attitude of gravity and earnestness.

The opposite of [url=http://vndb.org/i432]relaxed[/url].
name: Serious
Turtleneck Sweater
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polo_neck]turtleneck sweater[/url].

A polo neck, roll-neck(UK) or turtleneck (US) or skivvy (Australia) sweater is a garment with a close-fitting, round, and high collar that folds over and covers the neck.

name: Dwarf
description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dwarf_(mythology)]dwarf[/url] is a being that dwells in mountains and in the earth, and is variously associated with wisdom, smithing, mining, and crafting. Dwarfs are often also described as short and ugly, although some scholars have questioned whether this is a later development stemming from comical portrayals of the beings.

This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Broom]broom[/url].

A broom is a cleaning tool consisting of stiff fibers attached to, and roughly parallel to, a cylindrical handle, the broomstick. It is thus a variety of brush with a long handle. It is commonly used in combination with a dustpan.
name: Broom
Rags
description: This character wears simple clothes made ​​of rags. This is the clothes of slaves and poor people, who are not able to buy civilized clothes.

name: Body Painting
description:
This character got his body or face temporarily painted with colors.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Body_painting]Body painting[/url], or sometimes bodypainting, is a form of body art. Unlike tattoo and other forms of body art, body painting is temporary, painted onto the human skin, and lasts for only several hours, or at most (in the case of Mehndi or "henna tattoo") a couple of weeks. Body painting that is limited to the face is known as face painting.
This character is a novelist. Novelists are people who write fiction in a prose format.
name: Novelist
Dishonest
description:
A character with this trait is [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dishonesty]dishonest[/URL]. Perhaps they're not frequently dishonest (e.g., like a con artist or a pathological liar would be), but a dishonest act in the story defines their character and/or is a prominent plot point.

Dishonesty is to act without [URL=http://vndb.org/i822]honesty[/URL]. It is used to describe a lack of probity, cheating, lying or being deliberately deceptive or a lack in integrity, knavishness, perfidiosity, corruption or treacherousness.

name: Stalking
description:
The character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stalking]stalking[/url].

Stalking is a term commonly used to refer to unwanted, obsessive attention by individuals (and sometimes groups of people) to others.
Stalking can be defined as the willful and repeated following, watching, and / or harassing of another person. Most of the time, the purpose of stalking is to attempt to force a relationship with someone who is unwilling or otherwise unavailable. Unlike other crimes, which usually involve one act, stalking is a series of actions that occur over a period of time. Although stalking is illegal, the actions that contribute to stalking are legal, such as gathering information, calling someone on the phone, sending gifts, emailing or instant messaging. Such actions by themselves are not usually abusive, but can become abusive when frequently repeated over time.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handgun]handgun[/url].

A handgun is a firearm designed to be held and operated by one hand. This characteristic differentiates handguns as a general class of firearms from long guns such as rifles and shotguns (which are mounted against the shoulder).
name: Handgun

description:
This character is considered [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beauty#Ugliness]ugly.[/url]

To be ugly is to be aesthetically unattractive, repulsive, or offensive. Like its opposite, beauty, ugliness involves a subjective judgment and is at least partly in the "eye of the beholder."
name: Ugly

description:
This character is one of the performers of a triple blowjob. Apply [url=/i1639]i1639[/url] to the receiving character.

A triple blowjob is a blowjob performed by three people at the same time on a single person.
name: Triple Blowjob
Divorcee
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Divorcee]divorcee[/url].

Divorcee refers to a person whose marriage has ended in divorce, a legal dissolution of marriage before death by either spouse.

name: Artist
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artist]artist[/url].

An artist is a person engaged in one or more of any of a broad spectrum of activities related to creating art, practicing the arts and/or demonstrating an art.

This character becomes a victim of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frotteurism]frotteurism[/url].

Frotteurism refers to a paraphilic interest in rubbing, usually one's pelvis or erect penis, against a non-consenting person for sexual gratification. It may involve touching any part of the body including the genital area.
name: Molesting

description:
This character has a habit of using made-up words or coming up with unique sounds.

Wikipedia refers to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pseudodictionary]pseudodictionary[/url] for these kinds of made-up words.
name: Made-up Words

description:
This character sports the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ringlet_%28haircut%29]ringlet hairstyle[/url].

The ringlet hairstyle is achieved by wrapping a lock of hair around the length of a thin curling iron or can be sported naturally by people with sufficiently tightly curled hair.
name: Ringlet

description:
This character is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stepsibling]step sister[/url].

A stepsister is the daughter of one's stepparent from a previous relationship. They are not related by blood.
name: Step Sister

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yandere#Y]yandere[/url].

Yandere is a Japanese term for a person who is initially very loving and gentle to someone before their devotion becomes destructive in nature, often through violence. Yandere characters are mentally unstable, often using extreme violence as an outlet for their emotions.

Unlike Yangire characters, yandere characters' actions are motivated by love.
name: Yandere

description: This character wears tight form fitting shorts that cover most of the thigh they are often associated with cycling in the west and known as [[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cycling_shorts]Cycling or Bicycle Shorts[/url]] in English but are primarily known as 'Spats' in Japanese anime and games where they are often seen as common sports wear.
name: Spats
Turkish
description: This character is from Turkey.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monster]monster[/url].

A monster is any fictional creature, usually found in legends or horror fiction, that is somewhat hideous and may produce physical harm or mental fear by either its appearance or its actions.

The word "monster" derives from Latin monstrum, an aberrant occurrence, usually biological, that was taken as a sign that something was wrong within the natural order. The word connotes something wrong or evil; a monster is generally morally objectionable, physically or psychologically hideous, and/or a freak of nature.
name: Monster

description: This character [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_chat]chats online[/url] with others.
name: Online Chatting

description:
This character engage in sexual scenes that involve the presence of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smegma]smegma.[/url]

Smegma is a combination of shed skin cells, skin oils, and moisture. It occurs in both female and male mammalian genitalia.

NOTE: The example images are for reference only! Do NOT use this trait based only on them, since the art might not make the difference between smegma and precum clear. Please ONLY use this trait if the description of the scene makes the difference clear.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/43/90443.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/42/90442.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Sex Involving Smegma

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lion]lion[/url] or a lioness.

The lion (Panthera leo) is a large mammal of the Felidae (cat) family, and is often called the "king of the beasts".
name: Lion
Penis Removal
description: This character suffers of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Penis_removal]penis removal[/url], voluntary or not.

This character carries or owns and cares for a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plant]flower or plant of some sort[/url].

Plants are living organisms belonging to the kingdom Plantae. They include familiar organisms such as trees, flowers, herbs, bushes, grasses, vines, ferns, mosses, and green algae.

This trait is intended for characters having a specific plant under their care as an item associated with that character. It should not be used for characters taking care of a garden since that wouldn't be an item.
name: Flower / Plant

description:
Those characters have sex while being underwater either by diving or simply holding their breath while being underwater.

Only add this trait if the character's whole body is under water. If is just partially then use [url=/i1067]Sex in Water[/url] trait instead.
name: Sex Under Water

description: [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fratricide]Fratricide[/URL] is the act of a person killing his or her brother.
name: Fratricide

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fishnet]fishnet stockings[/url].

In the field of textiles, fishnet is hosiery with an open, diamond shaped knit; it is most often used as a material for stockings, tights or bodystockings. Fishnet is available in a multitude of colors, although it is most often sported in traditional matte black.

Use [url=/i186]Thigh-high Stockings[/url], [url=/i184]Pantyhose[/url] or [url=/i607]Garter Belt Stockings[/url] in addition to this trait to describe the height of the fishnet stockings and whether they have a garter belt or not. For fishnet bodystockings, use the [url=/i1150]fishnet clothing[/url] and [url=/i1097]bodystocking[/url] traits instead of this one.
name: Fishnet Stockings
Ferret
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ferret]ferret[/url].

The ferret is a domesticated mammal of the type Mustela putorius furo. Ferrets are sexually dimorphic predators with males being substantially larger than females. They typically have brown, black, white, or mixed fur.

name: Rifle
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rifle]rifle[/url].

A rifle is a firearm designed to be fired from the shoulder, with a barrel that has a helical groove or pattern of grooves ("rifling") cut into the barrel walls.

This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sniper_rifle]sniper rifle[/url].

In military and law enforcement terminology, a sniper rifle is a precision-rifle used to ensure more accurate placement of bullets at longer ranges than other small arms. A typical sniper rifle is built for optimal levels of accuracy, fitted with a telescopic sight and chambered for a military centerfire cartridge.
name: Sniper Rifle

description:
This character performs urethral intercourse. Apply i1856 to the receiving character.

Urethral intercourse refers to the penetration of the female or male urethra by a penis, a finger, a tentacle, etc.

It is not to be confused with urethral sounding, the act of inserting a specialized medical tool into the urethra as a form of sexual or fetishistic activity.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/86251.jpg]Futanari NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/18/85818.jpg]Futanari NSFW Example 2[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/52/86252.jpg]Female NSFW Example[/url]
name: Urethral Intercourse
Conjoined Twins
description: [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conjoined_twins]Conjoined twins/siblings[/url] are identical twins/siblings joined in utero. Conjoined twins are typically classified by the point at which their bodies are joined, and they can share one or two bodies.

name: Loud
description: The person has a very loud voice, that is acknowledged by other characters, or has a tendency to yell.

name: Simple Tools
description: Simple household or worktools that has little to no moving mechanical part.

name: Fake Death
description: During the course of this game's story, this character dies and later it is revealed that this death was a fake, a ploy of sorts.

name: Part-time Worker
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Part-time]part-time worker[/url].

A part-time job is a form of employment that carries fewer hours per week than a full-time job. Workers are considered to be part-time if they commonly work fewer than 30 or 35 hours per week. There are many reasons for working part-time, including the desire to do so, having one's hours cut back by an employer and being unable to find a full-time job.

name: Reptilian Tail
description:
This character has a reptilian tail. They may or may not have legs.

This type of tail is covered in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reptile_scale]scales and scutes[/url], it also may be crested and armoured with spikes.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/ch/79/63779.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/89/103389.jpg]Example 2[/url]

The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/self-sacrifice]self-sacrifice[/url].

Self-sacrifice means sacrificing one's personal interests or well-being for the sake of others or for a cause, the giving up of one's own benefit, especially giving up one's life, for the good of others.
name: Self-sacrifice

description: This character has V-shaped bangs.
name: V Bangs

description:
This character is involved in a romantic relationship that doesn't work out and "gets dumped" by their partner.

A relationship breakup, often referred to simply as a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breakup]breakup[/url], is the termination of an intimate relationship by any means other than death. The act is commonly termed "dumping [someone]" in slang when it is initiated by one partner or "getting dumped by [someone]" for the partner on the receiving end.

Please refer to the "Engages in/[URL=https://vndb.org/i2455]Breakup[/URL]" for characters that are the ones initiating the breakup.
name: Breakup
Sword
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sword]sword[/url].

A sword is a long, edged piece of forged metal, used in many civilizations throughout the world, primarily as a cutting or thrusting weapon and occasionally as a clubbing or bludgeoning weapon.

name: Fanny Pack
description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn a fanny pack.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fanny_pack]fanny pack[/URL] is a small fabric pouch usually secured with a zipper and worn by use of a strap around the hips or waist.

name: Figment
description: A character created by another character's imagination. May eventually become an independent being due to magic, science, or paranormal reasons.

name: Sex in Classroom
description: This character has sex in a school classroom.
This character engages in the process of developing various inventions, contraptions, equipment, etc.
name: Inventor

description:
This character is an artist in the medium of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Painting]painting[/url].

Painting is the practice of applying paint, pigment, color or other medium to a surface (support base). The application of the medium is commonly applied to the base with a brush but other objects can be used. In art the term describes both the act and the result which is called a painting.

This trait is for characters that are creating paintings as a form of art, do not use it for someone who paints the walls of buildings in a single color as a job.
name: Painter
Bedridden
description: The character has to stay in bed for an extended period of time due to illness or injury.

name: Infidelity
description:
This character is subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Infidelity]infidelity[/url].
In other words, his/her partner or spouse has sex with someone other, without his/her knowledge or permission.

name: Old-fashioned
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/old-fashioned]old-fashioned[/url].

Refers to a person that is behind the times, not up to date, preferring the customs of earlier times.

name: Footjob
description:
A [url=/http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Footjob]footjob[/url] is performed on this character. Apply [url=/i606]i606[/url] to the performing character.

A footjob is the act of rubbing one's feet on a partner to stimulate or excite them. In most cases, the performer uses their feet to rub a man's penis. Sometimes the recipient is a woman, and the performer uses their feet to rub the recipient's vulva.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/14/19414.jpg]Example[/url]

name: Vomiting
description:
This character [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vomiting]vomits[/url].

Vomiting, is the involuntary, forceful expulsion of the contents of one's stomach through the mouth and sometimes the nose.

name: Androphobia
description:
This character is [url=http://www.fearof.net/fear-of-men-phobia-androphobia/]androphobic[/url].

Androphobia is an abnormal and irrational fear of men. Androphobia may be related to traumatic events in the sufferer's past (for example rape/sexual assault, witnessing physical and verbal abuse). It may also be due to social phobia or social anxiety disorder.

This character is a sports club manager.

A sports club manager is a person (typically female) who helps a sports team with various menial tasks, such as cleaning and sorting equipment, laundry, recording player and game stats, distributing towels and drinks, and others.
name: School Sports Club Assistant

description:
This character is partially or completely [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deafness]deaf[/url].

Deafness, or hearing impairment, is a partial or total inability to hear.
name: Deafness

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bindi_(decoration)/]bindi[/url].

A bindi is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia and Southeast Asia.

Traditionally it is a bright dot of red colour applied in the centre of the forehead close to the eyebrows, but it can also consist of other colours with a sign or piece of jewellery worn at this location.

Note: This trait is for the latter usage. If the bindi appears as a painted mark on the forehead, then use the [url=http://vndb.org/i1514]Bindi (Mark)[/url] trait instead.
name: Bindi (Jewelry)

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grandiosity]grandiosit[/url].

An extreme case of narcissism. Grandiosit characters have an unrealistic sense of superiority, a sustained view of oneself as better than others that causes the narcissist to view others with disdain or as inferior. It was originally a method of using hair to hold a samurai helmet steady atop the head in battle, and became a status symbol among Japanese society.

A headache is pain anywhere in the region of the head or neck.

It can be a symptom of a number of different conditions of the head and neck. The brain tissue itself is not sensitive to pain because it lacks pain receptors. Rather, the pain is caused by disturbance of the pain-sensitive structures around the brain.

The dress shirts are short-sleeved, collared, button up shirts that are printed with colorful patterns, usually of flowers or other plant life. Aloha dress shirts usually have a left chest pocket sewn in, often with attention to ensure the printed pattern remains continuous. The lower hem is straight, as the shirts are not meant to be tucked in.

Kemonomimi, literally meaning "animal ears", is based on the the concept of drawing animals as bishoujo or having bishoujo wear or have animal accessories (such as ears or tails). Catgirls are the most prolific in this category, although bunnygirls, foxgirls, and dog girls are also common.

Kemonomimi characters typically appear human except for added animal-like qualities.

This trait is intended for humanoid characters with actual animal ears. And it should not be mixed with the other two kemonomimi traits:

A disaster is a natural or man-made hazard that has come to fruition, resulting in an event of substantial extent causing significant physical damage or destruction, loss of life, or drastic change to the environment. A disaster can be ostensively defined as any tragic event with great loss stemming from events such as earthquakes, floods, catastrophic accidents, fires, or explosions.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Jane_%28shoe%29]Mary Jane[/URL] is an American term for a closed, low-cut shoe with one or more straps across the instep.

It is so named because it looks as though someone put a bowl on the head and cut off or trimmed short all the visible hair.

Dreadlocks are matted coils of hair. They are usually intentionally formed; because of the variety of different hair textures, various methods are used to encourage the formation of locks such as backcombing. If combs, brushes, and scissors aren’t used on the hair, the hair will tangle together as it grows, eventually resulting in the twisted, matted ropes of hair known as dreadlocks.

Dreadlocks are associated most closely with the Rastafari movement, but people from many groups in history before them have worn dreadlocks. Dreadlocks can represent a spiritual journey that is not just related to the Rastafari movement.

A wheelchair is a chair with wheels, designed to be a replacement for walking. The device comes in variations where it is propelled by motors or by the seated occupant turning the rear wheels by hand. Often there are handles behind the seat for someone else to do the pushing. Wheelchairs are used by people for whom walking is difficult or impossible due to illness (physiological or physical), injury, or disability.

description:
This character can be seen in the "[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/34/60434.jpg]old type[/url]" school swimsuit.

This type of swimwear began to appear in Japanese schools around the 1970s. Its color is usually dark blue, violet or black. There are also the Moe-versions like translucent or white, which is popular among the perverts, since the drenched white swimsuit becomes almost transparent.
Old type school swimsuit has a distinctive front skirt. Unlike the very first version of the school swimsuit (so-called "old old type"), which consists of two separate pieces (panties and "tunic"), in this type of swimwear the back part of the panties is a continuation of the tunic, while the front part is sewn to the inner part of the tunic along two lines, as it shown in the picture. However, if desired, a small area above the pubis can be exposed. There are also might be the tags with the girl's name or class, which can be sewn to the frontside, backside or bottom of the tunic. Old type school swimsuit is mostly worn by girls of the junior or middle schools, although it can be worn by anyone.

More information can be found [url=http://kgtblog.seesaa.net/archives/201204-1.html]here[/url] and [url=http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/スクール水着]here[/url] (Japanese).

Christian Nun
description: This character is a [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nun#Christianity]Christian nun[/URL].

This character is an advisor of a student's club.

Club advisors play a vital role in ensuring that student involvement within the club is meaningful and productive. The most successful clubs are those in which the advisor takes an active interest in the group. The role of the advisor is to support and help guide the club, not to make decisions for the club. The club advisor serves a dual role in serving both the interests of the club and the school. It is essential that advisors are fully aware of their responsibilities.

The role of the advisor is to provide guidance and oversight of elections and by-laws. Although the advisor does not need to attend all club meetings and events, he or she must sanction all of the club’s activities. In addition, the advisor reserves rooms for club meetings and events and posts these onto the Student Events Calendar.
name: Student's Club Adviser

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baker]baker[/url].

A baker is someone who makes, bakes and sells breads, rolls, biscuits or cookies, and/or crackers using an oven or other concentrated heat source. Cakes and similar foods may also be produced, as the traditional boundaries between what is produced by a baker as opposed to a pastry chef, have blurred in recent decades.
name: Baker
Beelzebub
description:
A [url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Beelzebub]beelzebub[/url] is a bug type monster, with the body of a girl and the legs of a fly, with big fly-like wings. Beelzebubs can fly and for this reason bodies are usually light and small.

Beelzebubs are referred to as "Lord of the flies" and "Lord of gluttony" since their lust and appetite are extremely ravenous.

[url=http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/subcultures/monster-girls]Monster Girls[/url] are a special type of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mythic_humanoids]humanoid[/url] where the anthropomorphic character is a mix between a creature (both real and fictional) and a human. Which means some body parts/limbs of a creature has generally been added or switched on a human body. Most of them are an human torso on the top of a monster bottom body. One of the general rule is to keep the face and torso area human. The human is usually a female, though some rare male examples exist.

The umbrella terminology of monster girl can include certain types of personifications of monsters from video games, movies, books and so forth, like vampires, trolls, succubus... 
Mythological creatures such as fox girls or other types of humanoid creatures are often included and so forth.

Fetishism involving around monster girls is referred to as [url=https://vndb.org/g2205]teraphilia[/url].

A "glory hole" is a hole in a wall for people to engage in sexual activity through, or just observe the other participant through while one or both participants masturbate. The penis, fingers, clitoris, breast, or tongue may be inserted into the hole.

Do not confuse with [url=https://vndb.org/i1740]stuck-in-wall sex[/url], where the person is usually stuck in a hole while the sexual act is performed freely from one or both sides, or with [url=https://vndb.org/i2112]wormhole sex[/url] where a sexual act is performed through a portal.

Sorcery is the art, practices, or spells of a person who is supposed to exercise supernatural powers through the aid of evil spirits and black magic.

name: Guitar
description:
This character is seen with a guitar.

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guitar]guitar[/url] is a plucked string instrument, usually played with fingers or a pick. The guitar consists of a body with a rigid neck to which the strings, generally six in number, are attached.

Guitars are traditionally constructed of various woods and strung with animal gut or, more recently, with either nylon or steel strings. Some modern guitars are made of polycarbonate materials.

name: Transsexual
description:
[URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transsexual]Transsexual[/URL] people experience a gender identity that is inconsistent or not culturally associated with their assigned sex, and desire to permanently transition to the gender with which they identify- usually seeking medical assistance to help them align their body with their identified sex or gender.

Please note that the transsexual traits refer to [URL=https://vndb.org/i49]transgender[/URL] characters who have made a permanent transition (this could be before or during the story).

An employer is a person or institution that hires employees or workers.

Younger Appearance

This character is older than they appear to be.

This can be anything from a young adult that looks like a child, to someone that is centuries older than their appearance.

This character's body is partially clothed.

Usually used to refer to characters not wearing any clothes above waistline, like a man only wearing jeans, but can also be used for the other way around.

This trait refers to characters walking around dressed in this sense, other than the times of changing clothes, undressing or having sex.

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sister-in-law]sister-in-law[/url].

A sister-in-law is the sister of one's spouse, the wife of one's brother, or sometimes the wife of one's spouse's brother.
name: Sister-in-law
Gang Leader
description:
This character is the leader of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gang]gang[/url].

A gang leader is the person who has the most authority in a gang. In japan, gang-leaders are usually called as Aniki/Aneki (meaning older brother/sister) by the other gang members.

This character wears a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tutu_%28clothing%29]tutu[/url].

A tutu is a female ballet dancer’s costume consisting of a bodice and an attached skirt incorporating numerous layers of fabric, this being either short and stiff and projecting horizontally from the waist (the classical tutu) or long, soft, and bell-shaped (the romantic tutu).
name: Tutu
Sleep Sex

name: Disability
description:
The character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disability]disability[/url]. The disability may be physical, cognitive, mental, sensory, emotional, developmental or some combination of these.

Disabilities is an umbrella term, covering impairments, activity limitations, and participation restrictions. An impairment is a problem in body function or structure; an activity limitation is a difficulty encountered by an individual in executing a task or action; while a participation restriction is a problem experienced by an individual in involvement in life situations.

name: Genetic Research
description:
The character with this trait is a participant in genetic research. This character participated in the research as a scientist/researcher.

Genetics deals with the molecular structure and function of genes, with gene behavior in the context of a cell or organism (e.g. dominance and epigenetics), with patterns of inheritance from parent to offspring, and with gene distribution, variation and change in populations. Given that genes are universal to living organisms, genetics can be applied to the study of all living systems, from viruses and bacteria, through plants (especially crops) and domestic animals, to humans (as in medical genetics).

This character is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arabs]Arab[/url].

Arabs (Arabic: عرب‎‎, ‘arab) are a major panethnicity whose native language is Arabic, comprising the majority of the Arab world. They primarily inhabit Western Asia, North Africa, and parts of the Horn of Africa.
name: Arab
No Eyebrows
description:
This character has no eyebrows.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/ch/21/7321.jpg]Example[/url]

Students in the broadcasting committee transmit information through the school's speakers, such as informing about special dates or more casual stuff like answers to a survey among the school.
name: Broadcasting Committee Member

description: This character is a member of a musical collective which performs on a stage.
name: Band Member

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bindi_(decoration)]bindi[/url].

A bindi is a forehead decoration worn in South Asia and Southeast Asia.

Traditionally it is a bright dot of red colour applied in the centre of the forehead close to the eyebrows, but it can also consist of other colours with a sign or piece of jewellery worn at this location.

Note: This trait is for the former usage. If the bindi appears as a form of jewelry, please use the [url=http://vndb.org/i1513]Bindi (Jewelry)[/url] trait instead.
name: Bindi (Mark)
School Extraordinary Club Member
description: This character is a member of a club that is not common in terms of the real Japanese schools. For example, a club of occultism, a club of sexual humiliation, a club of gambling games, etc. These clubs might be official or not.

A skeleton is a type of physically manifested undead often found in fantasy, and horror fiction, and mythical art. Most are human skeletons, but they can also be from any creature or race found on Earth or in the fantasy world.
name: Skeleton

description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Food]Food[/url] is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
name: Food
Proactive
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proactive]proactive[/url] or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conscientiousness]conscientious[/url] in another meaning.

Conscientious characters have self-discipline, carefulness, thoroughness, organization, deliberation (the tendency to think carefully before acting), and need for achievement. Conscientious individuals are generally hard working and reliable. When taken to an extreme, they may also be workaholics, perfectionists, and compulsive in their behavior.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Housekeeper_%28servant%29]housekeeper[/url].

A housekeeper is an individual responsible for the cleaning and maintenance of the interior of a residence. A housekeeper is usually a woman, and in charge of female servants, while a butler is usually male, and in charge of male servants.
name: Housekeeper
One-eyed
description: This character has only one eye. This may be due to the physiological features (he has one eye because of mutations or due to non-human nature of himself) or wounds received in a fight or accident.

A hospital gown is a long loose piece of clothing worn in a hospital by someone doing or having an operation. It can also be used as clothing for bedridden patients.
name: Hospital Gown

Chain Weapon
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chain_weapon]chain weapon[/url].

A chain weapon is a weapon made of one or more heavy object attached to a chain, sometimes with a handle.

This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lollipop]lollipop[/url].

A lollipop is a type of confectionery consisting mainly of hardened, flavored sucrose with corn syrup mounted on a stick and intended for sucking or licking. They are available in many flavors and shapes.
name: Lollipop
Choker
description:
A character with this trait wears or has worn a choker.

A [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Choker]choker[/URL] is a close-fitting band encircling the neck. Chokers can be made of a variety of materials, including velvet, plastic, beads, metal such as silver, gold or platinum, leather, etc. They can be adorned in a variety of ways, including with sequins, studs, or a pendant. 

This also includes collar-style chokers (typically leather bands with buckles) which are worn as fashion accessories and [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Detachable_collar]detachable shirt collars[/URL].

name: Binoculars
description:
This character is seen with a (pair of) [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binoculars]binocular(s)[/url].

Binoculars are a pair of identical or mirror-symmetrical telescopes mounted side-by-side and aligned to point accurately in the same direction, allowing the viewer to use both eyes (binocular vision) when viewing distant objects. Most are sized to be held using both hands, although sizes vary widely from opera glasses to large pedestal mounted military models.

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tutor#Private_tutors]private tutor[/url].

A private tutor teaches a specific subject or skill to an individual student or small group of students. Such attention ideally allows the student to improve knowledge or skills more rapidly than in a classroom setting.
name: Tutor

description:
The character engages in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mass_murder]mass murder.[/url]

Mass murder is the act of murdering a large number of people (four or more), typically at the same time or over a relatively short period of time.
name: Mass Murder
Diving Mask
description:
This character wears a diving mask.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diving_mask]diving mask[/url] is an item of diving equipment that allows underwater divers, including, scuba divers, free-divers, and snorkelers to see clearly underwater.

name: Mole
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beauty_mark]beauty mark[/url].

A beauty mark or beauty spot is a euphemism for a type of dark facial mole, so named because such birthmarks are sometimes considered an attractive feature. Moles of this type may also be located elsewhere on the body.

name: BL Fan
description:
This character is a part of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yaoi_fandom]yaoi fandom[/url].
Yaoi fandom refers to people with obsessive interest in anime, manga and novels that feature romantic relationships between men. Female fans are called "Fujoshi" (lit. "rotten girl"), while male fans are referred to as "Fudanshi" (lit. "rotten boy").
This character wears a [url=http://amtwiki.net/amtwiki/index.php/Haori]haori[/url] (Japanese formal coat).
name: Haori

description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeans]jeans[/url].

Jeans are trousers made from denim. Starting in the 1950s, jeans, originally designed for working people, became popular among teenagers. They come in many styles and colors; however, "blue jeans" are particularly identified with American culture, especially the American Old West.
name: Jeans
Pompadour
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pompadour_(hairstyle)]pompadour hairstyle[/url].

Pompadour is a style of hair with a large portion sticking out in front. The name comes from Madame de Pompadour. In Japanese popular culture, the pompadour is a stereotypical hairstyle often worn by gang members, thugs, members of the yakuza and bousouzoku, and other similar groups such as the yankii (high-school hoodlums).

name: Not Sexually Involved
description: This character has no scenes of sexual activity in any visual novel.

name: Cyborg
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyborg]cyborg[/url].

A cyborg is a being with both biological and artificial (e.g. electronic, mechanical or robotic) parts.

Fictional cyborgs are portrayed as a synthesis of organic and synthetic parts, and frequently pose the question of difference between human and machine as one concerned with morality, free will, and empathy.

Real cyborgs are more frequently people who use cybernetic technology to repair or overcome the physical and mental constraints of their bodies.

name: Naginata
description:
The character uses a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naginata]Naginata[/url].

A pole weapon that was traditionally used in Japan by members of the samurai class, naginata consists of a wooden shaft with a curved blade on the end; it is similar to the Chinese Guan Dao or European glaive or Russian sovnya. Usually it also had a sword-like guard (tsuba) between the blade and shaft.

The naginata has become associated in modern Japan as a woman's weapon as it is studied by women more than men, whereas in Europe and Australia naginata is practiced predominantly by men—this is however simply a reflection of the martial arts demographics of Europe, where there is no historical association—as there is in Japan—that naginatajutsu is for women.

name: Mummification

This character is subject of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mummification_(BDSM)]mummification[/url] or [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_enclosure_fetishism]total enclosure fetishism[/url].

1) Mummification - a BDSM practice that involves restraining a living person's body in a non-damaging way by wrapping it head to toe, or neck to toe, in materials like saran wrap, clingfilm, cloth, bandages, rubber strips, duct tape, plaster bandages, bodybags, straitjackets, latex or rubber suits, gas masks. As the name states the end result is a person completely immobilized and looking like an Egyptian mummy.

name: Orphan
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orphan]orphan[/url].

An orphan is a child permanently bereaved of his or her parents. In common usage, only a child who has lost both parents is called an orphan. However, adults can also be referred to as orphans, or "adult orphans".

name: Pink Rotor
description:
This character is caressed with small egg-shaped vibrator, which is traditionally called "pink rotor" in Japan. They can be either hard-wired or remote-controlled. Vibro egg is designed to stimulate the nipples, clitoris and other erogenous zones. Although this type of vibrators is not intended to be inserted into vagina or anus due to lack of water resistance, sometimes they're used that way.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/72/82772.jpg]NSFW example[/url]

This character is wearing [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shoes]shoes[/url].

A shoe is an item of footwear intended to protect and comfort the human foot while doing various activities. Shoes are also used as an item of decoration.
name: Shoes

description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Servant]servant[/url].

Servant is an older English term for "domestic worker", though not all servants worked inside the home. A domestic worker is someone who works within the employer's household. Domestic workers perform a variety of household services for an individual or a family, from providing care for children and elderly dependents to cleaning and household maintenance, known as housekeeping.
name: Servant
Mittens
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gloves#Mittens]Mittens[/url]. 

Mittens are gloves which cover the entire hand or fist but do not have separate finger openings or sheaths. Mittens are warmer than gloves made of the same material because fingers maintain their warmth better when they are in contact with each other. Reduced surface area reduces heat loss.

name: Ear Tag
description:
This character wears an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ear_tag]ear tag[/url].

An ear tag is a plastic or metal object used for identification of domestic livestock and other animals. In hentai ear tags worn by human characters are usually related to [url=https://vndb.org/i1879]Sexual Slavery[/url] or humans treated as [url=https://vndb.org/i2292]Livestock[/url].

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/76/103176.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Half-orphan]half-orphan[/url].

An half-orphan is a child bereaved one of his or her parents. In common usage, only a child who has lost one of parents is called an half-orphan. However, adults can also be referred to as half-orphans, or "adult half-orphans".
name: Half-orphan
Gamer
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gamer]gamer[/url].

Gamer refers to someone who frequently plays table-top games (boardgames and role playing games), wargames or video games.

While the term nominally includes those who do not necessarily consider themselves to be gamers (i.e., casual gamers), it is commonly used to identify those who spend much of their leisure time playing or learning about games.

name: Psychologist
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychologist]psychologist[/url].

Psychologist is a professional or academic title used by individuals who are either:
*Clinical professionals who work with patients in a variety of therapeutic contexts (contrast with psychiatrists, who typically provide medical interventions and drug therapies, as opposed to analysis and counseling).
*Social scientists conducting psychological research or teaching psychology in a college or university;
*Academic professionals who apply psychological research, theories and techniques to "real-world" problems, questions and issues in business, industry, or government.

name: Slave Collar
description:
This character wears a collar for slavery purposes.

A slave collar is a band encircling the neck which is placed on the wearer by another person to indicate the wearer's submission or enslavement.

In sexual situations, this often incorporates [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Collar_(BDSM)]collar use in BDSM[/URL].

This character is a [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/coworker]coworker[/url] of another character in this story.

A coworker is someone that you work together with at the same company/office.
name: Coworker

description: This character becomes the subject of the (sudden/mysterious) disappearance. Temporarily or permanently. According to their will or not. It may also be the complete disappearance of a character out of this world, which cannot be equated to common physical death. For example, the repose of the soul that existed in this world as a ghost, or the disappearance of the physical and mental component of the human, as if he/she never existed, due to interference of someone's special powers.
name: Disappearance
Loafers
description:
A character with this trait wear loafers.

[URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slip-on_shoe]Loafers[/URL] are typically low, lace-less shoes. The style most commonly seen, known as a loafer or slippers in American culture, has a moccasin construction. A less casual, earlier type of loafer is made with side gussets. These shoes have elasticated inserts on the side which allow the shoe to be easily removed but remain snug when worn.

name: Skirt Suit

A blouse, which can be white or colored, takes the place of a shirt. Women's skirt suits can also be worn with colored tops or t-shirts.

Scythe
description:
This character has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scythe]scythe[/url].

A scythe is an agricultural hand tool for mowing grass, or reaping crops.

It consists of a wooden shaft about 170 centimetres long called a snaith, snath, snathe or sned (modern versions are sometimes made from metal or plastic). The snaith may be straight, or with an "S" curve, but the more sophisticated versions are curved in three dimensions, allowing the mower to stand more upright. The snaith has either one or two short handles at right angles to it – usually one near the upper end and always another roughly in the middle. A long, curved blade about 60 to 90 centimetres long is mounted at the lower end, perpendicular to the snaith. Scythes always have the blade projecting from the left side of the snaith when in use, with the edge towards the mower. In principle a left-handed scythe could be made, but it could not be used together with right-handed scythes in a team of mowers, as the left-handed mower would be mowing in the opposite direction.

Jewellery
description:
This character wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jewellery]Jewellery[/url].

Jewellery is a form of personal adornment, such as brooches, rings, necklaces, earrings, and bracelets.

With some exceptions, such as medical alert bracelets or military dog tags, jewellery normally differs from other items of personal adornment in that it has no other purpose than to look appealing, but humans have been producing and wearing it for a long time – with 100,000-year-old beads made from Nassarius shells thought to be the oldest known jewellery.

Jewellery may be made from a wide range of materials, but gemstones, precious metals, beads and shells have been widely used. Depending on the culture and times jewellery may be appreciated as a status symbol, for its material properties, its patterns, or for meaningful symbols. Jewellery has been made to adorn nearly every body part, from hairpins to toe rings.

In case of sexual roleplay use it in conjuction with [URL=https://vndb.org/i2458]Sexual Animal Cosplay[/URL] and [url=https://vndb.org/i1370]Petplay[/url] (if applicable).

The receiving partner may be penetrated from in front, or behind. In one variant, both participants stand upright, possibly leaning on a wall for support. In another variant, the penetrating partner carries the receiving partner.

name: Elf
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elf]elf[/url].

An elf (plural elves) is a fantasy and mythological being. The elves were originally thought of as a race of divine beings (wights, vættir) endowed with magical powers, which they use both for the benefit and the injury of mankind. In medieval Norse mythology, they appear to have been divided into light elves and dark elves, difficult to delineate from the Æsir (gods) on one hand and the dvergar (dwarves) on the other.

In early modern and modern folklore, they become associated with the fairies of Romance folklore and assume a diminutive size, often living mainly in forests but also underground in hills or rocks, or in wells and springs. 19th-century Romanticism attempted to restore them to full stature making them men and women of great beauty. They were often depicted as very young, probably adolescents as male elves lack facial hair.

From their depiction in Romanticism, elves entered the 20th-century high fantasy genre in the wake of the published work of J. R. R. Tolkien (especially the posthumous publication of his Silmarillion where Tolkien's treatment of the relation of light elves, dark elves and dwarves is made explicit).

This trait is intended to be used for LotR inspired elves that are human-like. For the tiny flying ones like [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tinkerbell]Tinker Bell[/url] use [url=http://vndb.org/i516]Fairy[/url].

This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence]artificial intelligence[/url].

Artificial intelligence is the intelligence of machines and the branch of computer science that aims to create it.

AI textbooks define the field as "the study and design of intelligent agents" where an intelligent agent is a system that perceives its environment and takes actions that maximize its chances of success.
name: Artificial Intelligence

description:
An orc is a fictional humanoid creature that is part of a fantasy race akin to goblins.

While the overall concept of orcs draws on a variety of pre-existing mythology, the main conception of the creatures stems from the fantasy writings of J. R. R. Tolkien, in particular "The Lord of the Rings".

Tolkien's concept of orcs has subsequently been adapted and imported into other works of fantasy fiction.

[From [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orc]Wikipedia[/url]]

This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Record_producer]record producer[/url]

A record producer is an individual working within the music industry, whose job it is to oversee and manage the recording (i.e. "production") of an artist's music. A producer has many roles that may include, but are not limited to, gathering ideas for the project, selecting songs and/or musicians, coaching the artist and musicians in the studio, controlling the recording sessions, and supervising the entire process through mixing and mastering. Producers also often take on a wider entrepreneurial role, with responsibility for the budget, schedules, and negotiations.

With today's relatively easy access to technology, an alternative to the record producer just mentioned, is the so called 'bedroom producer'. With today's technological advances, it is very easy for a producer to achieve high quality tracks without the use of a single instrument. Many established artists take this approach.
name: Record Producer

description:

[URL=http://www.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/english/charisma]Charisma[/URL] is defined as the "compelling attractiveness or charm that can inspire devotion in others".

Charismatic people are charming, friendly and extroverted people with great social skills. They tend to be good public speakers and street smart.

This character makes an appearance in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Film]film[/url].

A film, also called a movie or motion picture, is a series of still or moving images. It is produced by recording photographic images with cameras, or by creating images using animation techniques or visual effects. The process of filmmaking has developed into an art form and industry.
name: Filming

description:
This character is seen wearing an engagement ring.

An [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engagement_ring]engagement ring[/url] is a ring indicating that the person wearing it is engaged to be married, especially in Western cultures. Engagement rings are traditionally worn only by women, and rings can feature diamonds or other gemstones. In some cultures, engagement rings are also used as [url=http://vndb.org/i1186]wedding rings[/url].

name: Backpack
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Backpack]backpack[/url].

A backpack is, in its simplest form, a cloth sack carried on one's back and secured with two straps that go over the shoulders, but there can be exceptions. Lightweight types of backpacks are sometimes worn on only one shoulder strap.

This character dresses in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lolita_fashion]Lolita style[/url].

Lolita is a fashion subculture originating in Japan that is based on Victorian-era clothing as well as costumes from the Rococo period, but the style has expanded greatly beyond these two. 
The original silhouette is of a knee length skirt or dress with a 'cupcake' shape assisted by petticoats, but has expanded into various types of garments including corsets and floor lengths skirts. Blouses, knee high socks or stockings and headdresses are also worn. 

Lolita fashion has evolved into several different sub styles and has a subculture that is present in many parts of the world.
name: Lolita

A priest or priestess is one authorized to perform the sacred rites of a religion, especially as a mediatory agent between humans and deities. They also have the authority or power to administer religious rites; in particular, rites of sacrifice to, and propitiation of, a deity or deities.

In criminal law, rape is a type of sexual assault usually involving sexual intercourse, which is initiated by one or more persons against another person without that person's consent.

A garter belt or suspender belt is a woman's undergarment consisting of an elastic piece of cloth worn around the waist to which garters are attached to hold up stockings.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/01/39801.jpg]Example[/url]

name: Clumsy
description:
This character is [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/clumsy]clumsy[/url] or known to be [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accident-proneness]prone to accidents[/url].

A clumsy person is someone lacking in skill or physical coordination, who tends to be prone to more accidents then others.

Accident-proneness, also known as clumsiness, is the conception that some people might have predisposition, or that they might be more likely to suffer accidents, such as car crashes and industrial injuries, than other people. It may be used as a reason to deny any insurance on such individuals.

name: Cancer
description:
A [url=http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Cancer]cancer[/url] is a crustacean type monster, with the upper body of a woman, a lower body covered in a hard shell, and one of their five pairs of crab legs have become giant pincers.

Cancers usually live near water, such as oceans, seashores, and rivers as normal crabs do.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coat_%28clothing%29]coat[/url].

A coat is a long garment worn by both men and women, for warmth or fashion. Coats typically have long sleeves and open down the front, closing by means of buttons, zippers, hook-and-loop fasteners, toggles, a belt, or a combination of these. Other possible ornaments include collars and shoulder straps.
