description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physician]medical doctor[/url].

A physician practices the ancient profession of medicine, which is concerned with maintaining or restoring human health through the study, diagnosis, and treatment of disease or injury. This properly requires both a detailed knowledge of the academic disciplines (such as anatomy and physiology) underlying diseases and their treatment—the science of medicine—and also a decent competence in its applied practice—the art or craft of medicine.
name: Medical Doctor
Ushanka
description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ushanka]ushanka[/url].

An ushanka is a Russian fur cap with ear flaps that can be tied up to the crown of the cap, or tied at the chin to protect the ears, jaw and lower chin from the cold. The thick dense fur also offers some protection against blunt impacts to the head.
A character with this trait engages in non-blood-related [URL=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incest]incestuous[/URL] relations.
name: Non-blood-related Incest
Strapless Dress
description:
This character wears a strapless dress.

A strapless dress is a shoulderless, sleeveless women's garment that consists of a skirt with an attached bodice (or a matching bodice giving the effect of a one-piece garment).

This character wears clothing made partly or completely from [url=/http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fishnet]fishnet[/url] material.

In the field of textiles, fishnet is hosiery with an open, diamond shaped knit; it is most often used as a material for stockings, tights or bodystockings. Fishnet is available in a multitude of colors, although it is most often sported in traditional matte black.
name: Fishnet Clothing

Clothing of this character has some kind of wings attached.

description:
This character is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incubus]incubus[/url].

An incubus is a demon in male form who, according to mythological and legendary traditions, lies upon women in order to engage in sexual activity with them.
name: Incubus
Portuguese
description: This character is from Portugal.

This character commits an act of betrayal.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betrayal]Betrayal [/url] (or backstabbing) is the breaking or violation of a presumptive contract, trust, or confidence that produces moral and psychological conflict within a relationship amongst individuals, between organizations or between individuals and organizations. Often betrayal is the act of supporting a rival group, or it is a complete break from previously decided upon or presumed norms by one party from the others. Betrayal is also a commonly used literary element and is often associated with or used as a plot twist.

When a person betrays their country use the [url=/i691]treason[/url] trait.
name: Betrayal
Shogi
description:
This character plays [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shogi]shogi[/url] at some point in the story.

Shogi is a two-player strategy board game in the same family as Western (international) chess, chaturanga, makruk, shatranj and xiangqi, and is the most popular of a family of chess variants native to Japan.

Two players, Sente 先手 (Black; more literally, person with the first move) and Gote 後手 (White; person with the second move), play on a board composed of rectangles in a grid of 9 ranks (rows) by 9 files (columns). The board is nearly always rectangular. Each player has a set of 20 wedge-shaped pieces of slightly different sizes. Except for the kings, opposing pieces are undifferentiated by marking or color.

name: Naked Ribbon

This character wears ribbons and nothing else.
[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/22/85322.jpg]Example[/url]

name: Harp
description:
The harp is a multi-string musical instrument which has the plane of its strings positioned perpendicularly to the soundboard. Organologically, it is in the general category of chordophones (stringed instruments) and has its own sub category (the harps). All harps have a neck, resonator and strings. Some, known as frame harps, also have a pillar; those without the pillar are referred to as open harps. 

These instruments also belong into this category: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lyre]Lyre[/url] (a smaller harp-like instrument) , [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konghou]Konghou[/url] (Chinese harp. In Japanese it is called "Kugo"), [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chang_%28instrument%29]Chang[/url] (Persian).

This character attends middle school. In Japan middle school is typically between the 7th and 9th grades and students commonly range between 12 and 15 years of age. In some countries middle school is 7th and 8th grade only and known primarily as junior high.
name: Middle School Student

Baseball is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each who take turns batting and fielding. Softball is a variant of baseball played with a larger ball on a smaller field, with relaxed rules, what made it popular among amateurs and females.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brass_instrument]brass instrument[/url] is a musical instrument that produces sound by sympathetic vibration of air in a tubular resonator in sympathy with the vibration of the player's lips. Brass instruments are also called labrosones, literally meaning "lip-vibrated instruments".
name: Brass Instrument
Electric Shock
description:
This character gets shocked by electricity.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electric_shock]Electric shock[/url] occurs upon contact of a (human) body with any source of electricity that causes a sufficient current through the skin, muscles, or hair. Typically, the expression is used to describe an injurious exposure to electricity. When exposed to a lethal electrical shock one is electrocuted.

name: Coercion
description:
This character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coercion]coercion[/url].

Coercion is the practice of forcing another party to act in an involuntary manner (whether through action or inaction) by use of threats or intimidation or some other form of pressure or force.

name: Nipple Teasers
description: Devices are attached to this character's nipples which use vibration, electrical current, vacuum or other methods to stimulate this erogenous zone.

name: Pubic Hair
description: This character has [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pubic_hair]pubic hair[/url] and it is visible in some scenes.

name: Widow's Peak
description: A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Widow%27s_peak]widow's peak[/url] is a V-shaped point in the hairline in the center of the forehead.

name: Tentacle Rape
description:
This character performs a tentacle rape, use i654 on the character being raped. Tails, roots, appendages and whatnot are also covered by this trait.

Tentacle rape or shokushu goukan is a concept found in some horror hentai titles, where various tentacled creatures (usually fictional monsters) rape or otherwise penetrate women, anthropomorphous creatures, futanari and, less commonly, men.

name: Voyeurism
description:
This character is a subject of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Voyeurism]voyeurism[/url].

Usually it means that this character is secretly observed by another character (a voyeurist) particularly in intimate situations, during changing clothes, sexual intercourse, etc. The victim may or may not know about this.

name: Idol
description:
This character is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_idol]idol[/url].

Idols are (usually female) media personalities in their teens and early twenties who are considered particularly attractive or cute and who will, for a period ranging from several months to a few years, regularly appear in the mass media, e.g. as singers for J-pop groups, bit-part actors, TV personalities (tarento), models in photo spreads published in magazines, advertisements, etc.

This character is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Track_and_field]track & field[/url] club associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport. Track and field is a group of athletic sports, consisting mainly of various kinds of running, jumping and throwing, that take place on a track and the enclosed field.
aliases: School Track and Field Club Member
name: School Athletic Club Member

description:
This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adhesive_bandage]band-aid[/url].

Band-aid is a small dressing used for injuries not serious enough to require a full-size bandage.

It also can be used as an accessory in order to look sloppy, tough or dangerous.

Note: Only used this tag if the character actually has a band-aid on for a length of time or shown wearing it.
For example, do NOT use this tag, if a character accidentally cuts his/her finger, puts a band-aid on the wound and then the visual novel immediately cuts to the next scene, never mentioning or showing the band-aid again.
name: Band-aid

description:
This character has a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tongue_piercing]tongue piercing[/url].

A tongue piercing is a body piercing, usually done directly through the center of the tongue.
name: Tongue Piercing
Bone Fracture
description:
As a result of an event in this story this character gets a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wound]bone fracture[/url].

A bone fracture is a medical condition in which there is a break in the continuity of the bone. A bone fracture can be the result of high force impact or stress, or trivial injury as a result of certain medical conditions that weaken the bones, such as osteoporosis, bone cancer, or osteogenesis imperfecta, where the fracture is then properly termed a pathologic fracture.

These traits are intended for events that characters survive with a bone fracture and does not apply if they die during that scene or they magically heal shortly afterwards.

name: Unemployed
description:
This character is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unemployed]unemployed[/url].

Unemployment, as defined by the International Labour Organization, occurs when people are without jobs and they have actively looked for work within the past four weeks.

The difference between an unemployed person and a neet is that the fist one is looking for a job.

This character is subject of an orifice investigatation (usually anus or vagina) with a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colposcopy]colposcopy[/url] camera for sexual purpose. Usually, but it's not required for trait to apply, the video of internal utherine walls and cervix is projected on screen in a nearby computer or laptop to enhance sexual desire or shame of the participants.

Do not use this trait for a normal medical investigation.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/21/99821.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/20/99820.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]
name: Colposcopy Camera

description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Witch_hat]witch hat[/url], in popular culture, is the style of hat characterized by a conical crown and a wide brim (like akubras and gats), usually worn by fictional characters like witches or sorcerers.

Depending upon the material in which the hat is made, the crown may regularly be observed in a flexed, bent or crumpled condition.
name: Witch Hat
Blessing
description: This character gives his/her blessing to another person. Said blessing might be an actual power-up or just a verbal declaration of his/her support.

name: Superhero
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superhero]superhero[/url].

A superhero is a type of stock character possessing "extraordinary or superhuman powers" and dedicated to protecting the public.

This character is a sculptor.

A sculptor is an artist who specializes in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sculpture]sculpture[/url].
name: Sculptor

description: This character uses his intelligence for selfish purposes. To achieve his goals, he can use deception, blackmail, and other tricks. But having a difficult character, such people are not necessarily bad.
name: Sly
Sexual Harassment
description:
This character engages in the acts of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_harassment]sexual harassment[/url].

Sexual harassment is intimidation, bullying or coercion of a sexual nature, or the unwelcome or inappropriate promise of rewards in exchange for sexual favors. 

Sexual harassment does not have to be of a sexual nature, however, and can include offensive remarks about a person’s sex.

Both victim and the harasser can be either a woman or a man, and the victim and harasser can be the same sex.

name: Subject of (Sexual)
description:
These are the traits related to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_sexual_activity]sexual activities[/url].

These traits are intended to be used on a single character for a sexual act, instead of both characters involved. The aim is to clarify the confusion of which one being the active and which one being the passive partner in such an acts. The child traits of this traits should be used on the passive partner in a sexual act.

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violin]violin[/url], also known as a fiddle, is a string instrument, usually with four strings tuned in perfect fifths. It is the smallest, highest-pitched member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violin_family]violin family[/url] of string instruments, which also includes the viola, the cello and the double bass.
name: Violin

description:
This character is the [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/Head+of+Household]head of a household[/url].

Head of Household refers to indivduals that are the leading member of a large household or family or tribe.

This trait is not connected to the tax term with the same name and should only be used for the leaders of big families, not all fathers, mothers etc.
name: Head of Household
School Band Leader
description: This character is the leader of a school music band.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raincoat]rain coat[/url].

A raincoat is a waterproof or water-resistant coat worn to protect the body from rain. The term rain jacket is sometimes used to refer to raincoats that are waist length. A rain jacket may be combined with a pair of rain pants to make a rain suit.
name: Rain Coat
Off Screen Sex
description:
This character engages in sexual activities that are discussed or explained but never shown.

As a rule of thumb, if you can't pin down the time and place of the implied sex scene, don't use this trait. For example don't use this tag for long time jumps, after which the couple in question is shown to have kids, even though they didn't have a single H-scene.

name: Eye Mask
description:
This character wears an [url=http://www.polyvore.com/cgi/img-thing?.out=jpg&size=l&tid=13156647]eye mask[/url].

An eye mask is an article normally worn on the face, typically for disguise, entertainment, cosplay.

[url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/37/89337.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

name: Unusual Eyebrows
description:
This characters has eyebrows that have an unusual or unnatural shape.

Example: [url=https://vndb.org/c37794]Ukon[/url]

Do not add this trait if the characters eyebrows are only shaped this way in certain expressions. It needs to be part of their normal appearance.

This character wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Catsuit]catsuit[/url].

A catsuit is a close-fitting one-piece garment that covers the torso and the legs, and frequently the arms.

Catsuits, which date from at least the 1940s, can be worn by both men and women, and, despite the name, do not generally have feline characteristics.
name: Catsuit
Paint
description:
This character wears paint as clothing. Often the painted clothing is designed to trick the viewer into believing they are otherwise clothed.

name: Pen
description:
This character is seen with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pen]pen[/url].

A pen is a writing implement used to apply ink to a surface, usually paper, for writing or drawing.

This character is seen wearing a bondage harness.

A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bondage_harness]bondage harness[/url] is a piece of BDSM equipment worn for the purposes of sexual bondage. It typically consists of a series of leather straps, typically between 1 and 2 cm wide, attached together in such a way as to allow a person to "wear" the item.

The item is very closely associated with BDSM play, and is often immediately identifiable as being something to do with "bondage" when depicted. For this reason, it is sometimes worn publicly as a way to reference fetish culture and gain attention.
name: Bondage Harness

description:
This character is a [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pharmacist]pharmacist[/URL].

Pharmacists are healthcare professionals who practice in pharmacy, the field of health sciences focusing on safe and effective medication use. A pharmacist is a member of the health care team directly involved with patient care.
name: Pharmacist
Ribbon Hair Tie
description: This character uses a ribbon as a hair tie. It may be used to tie a ponytail, twintails, or other similar hairstyles.
